original: Tattha paṭhameneva vitathanti, tāta, rājā nāma āditova musāvādaṃ nivāraye. Musāvādino

original: have hato hantī”ti cetiyajātakaṃ kathetabbaṃ.
analyzed: have hataḥ hanti iti cetiya jātakam kathetabbam

analyzed: kodhanti tāta rājā nāma paṭhamam eva kujjhana lakkhaṇam kodham pi nivāreyya tāta

analyzed: vāsudeva kulassa na āsita bhāvaḥ ca kathetabbo

analyzed: khattiya mahā rāja yam mayā vuttam etam raññaḥ vata samādānam ti porāṇaka paṇḍitā kathayiṃsu

original: Evaṃ sā kāḷakaṇṇī, mahārāja, ramati patirūpadesavāsādino kusalacakkassa bhañjanī.

original: Suhadayoti sundaracitto hitacittako. Nudāti nīhara. Nivesananti lakkhiyā pana nivesanaṃ

original: “Dveva tāta padakāni, yattha sabbaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ;

original: Aladdhassa ca yo lābho, laddhassa cānurakkhaṇā.

original: “Amacce tāta jānāhi, dhīre atthassa kovide;
analyzed: amacce tāta jānāhi dhīre atthassa kovide

original: Anakkhākitave tāta, asoṇḍe avināsake.

analyzed: avahaṭesu suddha vāluka vassam vassi suddha vāluka matthake dibba puppha vassam vassi

analyzed: vināsam patto ti sūyati imesam pana catunnam rājūnam nibbatta ṭṭhānam mayam na jānāma

original: Te pana “asukopi nikkhanto”ti na jānanti, ekeko “ahameva gacchāmī”ti maññati, tesaṃ

original: godhāvarinadito avidūre samāgamo ahosi. Te rathehi otaritvā tayopi ekameva rathaṃ

original: abhiruyha godhāvarinadītīraṃ sampāpuṇiṃsu.
analyzed: abhiruyha godhāvari nadī tīram sampāpuṇiṃsu

original: “Alaṅkatā kuṇḍalino suvatthā, veḷuriyamuttātharukhaggabandhā;

original: Rathesabhā tiṭṭhatha ke nu tumhe, kathaṃ vo jānanti manussaloke”ti.

original: “Ahamaṭṭhako bhīmaratho panāyaṃ, kāliṅgarājā pana uggatoyaṃ;

analyzed: su saññatānam isīnam dassanāya idha āgatā pucchitāya imha pañhā iti

original: Pucchāmi taṃ yakkha mahānubhāva, kataṃ taṃ jānanti manussaloke”ti.

original: Tattha sa devarājāti so ahaṃ sakko devarājā. Idamajja pattoti idaṃ ṭhānaṃ ajja āgato. Dassanāyāti dassanatthāya vandanatthāya sarabhaṅgasatthārañca pañhaṃ pucchanatthāyāti āha.

original: Vandāmi te ayire pasannacitto, ye jīvalokettha manussaseṭṭhā”ti.
analyzed: vandāmi te pasanna cittaḥ ye jīva lokā ittha manussa seṭṭhā ti

original: Tattha dūre sutā noti, bhante, amhehi tumhe dūre devaloke ṭhitehiyeva sutāti mamāyanto
analyzed: tattha dūre sutā no ti bhante amhehi tumhe dūre deva loke sutā ati

original: evamāha. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ime idha samāgatā amhākaṃ isayo dūre sutā yāva brahmalokā
analyzed: evam āha idam vuttam hoti ime idha samāgatāḥ amhākam isayaḥ dūre sutāḥ yāva brahma lokā

original: Evaṃ isigaṇaṃ vaṇṇetvā sakko cha nisajjadose pariharanto ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Atha naṃ isīnaṃ adhovāte nisinnaṃ disvā anusisso chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha –

original: “Gandho isīnaṃ ciradikkhitānaṃ, kāyā cuto gacchati mālutena;

analyzed: ālapanam etam sakkaḥ hi amacca sahassehi cintitam attham ekakaḥ uva passati tasmā sahassanetto ti

original: Taṃ sutvā sakko itaraṃ gāthamāha –

original: “Gandho isīnaṃ ciradikkhitānaṃ, kāyā cuto gacchatu mālutena;

original: Vicittapupphaṃ surabhiṃva mālaṃ, gandhañca etaṃ pāṭikaṅkhāma bhante;

original: Na hettha devā paṭikkūlasaññino”ti.

analyzed: tattha gacchatu uti yathāsukham pavattatu nāsa puṭam no paharatu iti

analyzed: hi devāḥ jigucchanti na sīlavantā iti

original: Evañca pana vatvā “bhante, anusissa ahaṃ mahantena ussāhena pañhaṃ pucchituṃ āgato,
analyzed: evam ca pana vatvā bhante anusissa aham mahantena ussāhena pañham pucchitum āgataḥ

original: okāsaṃ me karohī”ti āha. So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā uṭṭhāyāsanā isigaṇaṃ okāsaṃ karonto gāthādvayamāha –
analyzed: okāsam me karohi iti āha saḥ tassa vacanam sutvā uṭṭhāya āsanā isi gaṇam okāsam karontaḥ gāthā dvayam āha

original: “Purindado bhūtapatī yasassī, devānamindo sakko maghavā sujampati;
analyzed: purindadaḥ bhūta patī yasassī devānam indo sakkaḥ maghavā su jampati

original: Sa devarājā asuragaṇappamaddano, okāsamākaṅkhati pañha pucchituṃ.
analyzed: sa devarājā asura gaṇa pamaddanaḥ okāsam ākaṅkhati pañha pucchitum

original: “Ko nevimesaṃ idha paṇḍitānaṃ, pañhe puṭṭho nipuṇe byākarissati;
analyzed: kaḥ idha paṇḍitānam pañhe puṭṭhaḥ nipuṇe byākarissati

original: Tiṇañca raññaṃ manujādhipānaṃ, devānamindassa ca vāsavassā”ti.
analyzed: tiṇam ca raññam manuja adhipānam devānam indassa ca vāsavassa ati

original: Tattha “purindado”tiādīni sakkasseva guṇanāmāni. So hi pure dānaṃ dinnattā purindado,
analyzed: tattha purindadaḥ ti ādīni sakkassa iva guṇa nāmāni saḥ hi pure dānam dinnattā purindadaḥ

original: bhūtesu jeṭṭhakattā bhūtapati, parivārasampadāya yasassī, paramissaratāya devānamindo,
analyzed: bhūtesu jeṭṭha kattā bhūta pati parivāra sampadāya yasassī devānam indo

original: sattannaṃ vattapadānaṃ suṭṭhu katattā sakko, purimajātivasena maghavā, sujāya asurakaññāya
analyzed: sattannam vatta padānam suṭṭhu kata ttā sakko purima jāti vasena maghavā sujāya asura kaññāya

original: patibhāvena sujampati, devānaṃ rañjanatāya devarājā. Ko nevāti ko nu eva. Nipuṇeti
analyzed: pati bhāvena sujampati devānam rañjanatāya devarājā kaḥ na iva ati kaḥ nu eva nipuṇā iti

original: saṇhasukhume pañhe. Raññanti rājūnaṃ. Imesaṃ catunnaṃ rājūnaṃ manaṃ gahetvā ko imesaṃ
analyzed: saṇha su khume pañhe raññanti rājūnam imesam catunnam rājūnam manam gahetvā kaḥ imesam

original: paṇḍitānaṃ isīnaṃ pañhe kathessati, pañhaṃ nesaṃ kathetuṃ samatthaṃ jānāthāti vadati.
analyzed: paṇḍitānam isīnam pañhe kathessati pañham na īsam kathetum samattham jānātha iti vadati

original: Taṃ sutvā isigaṇo, “mārisa, anusissa tvaṃ pathaviyaṃ ṭhatvā pathaviṃ apassanto viya
analyzed: tam sutvā isi gaṇaḥ mārisa tvam pathaviyam ṭhatvā pathavim a passantaḥ viya

original: kathesi, ṭhapetvā sarabhaṅgasatthāraṃ ko añño etesaṃ pañhaṃ kathetuṃ samattho”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
analyzed: kathesi ṭhapetvā sarabhaṅga satthāram kaḥ aññaḥ etesam pañham kathetum samatthaḥ iti vatvā gātham āha

original: “Ayaṃ isi sarabhaṅgo tapassī, yato jāto virato methunasmā;
analyzed: ayam isi sarabhaṅgaḥ tapassī yatas jātaḥ virataḥ methunasmā

original: Āceraputto suvinītarūpo, so nesaṃ pañhāni viyākarissatī”ti.
analyzed: ācera putto su vinīta rūpo so na esam pañhāni viyākarissati iti

original: Tattha sarabhaṅgoti sare khipitvā ākāse sarapāsādādīni katvā puna ekena sarena te
analyzed: tattha sarabhaṅgo ti sare khipitvā ākāse sara pāsāda ādīni katvā punar ekena sarena te

original: sare pātento bhaṅgavibhaṅge akāsīti sarabhaṅgo. Methunasmāti methunadhammato. So
analyzed: sare bhaṅga vibhaṅge akāsi iti sarabhaṅgaḥ methunasma ati methuna dhammato so

original: kira methunaṃ asevitvā pabbajito. Āceraputtoti rañño ācariyassa purohitassa putto.
analyzed: kira methunam a sevitvā pabbajitaḥ ācera putto ti raññaḥ ācariyassa purohitassa putto

original: Evañca pana vatvā isigaṇo anusissaṃ āha – “mārisa, tvameva satthāraṃ vanditvā isigaṇassa
analyzed: evam ca pana vatvā isi gaṇaḥ āha mārisa tvam eva satthāram vanditvā isi gaṇassa

original: vacanena sakkena pucchitapañhakathanāya okāsaṃ kārehī”ti. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā
analyzed: vacanena sakkena pucchita pañha kathanāya okāsam kārehi iti saḥ sādhu iti sampaṭicchitvā

original: satthāraṃ vanditvā okāsaṃ kārento anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
analyzed: satthāram vanditvā okāsam kārentaḥ anantaram gātham āha

original: “Koṇḍañña pañhāni viyākarohi, yācanti taṃ isayo sādhurūpā;
analyzed: koṇḍañña pañhāni viyākarohi yācanti tam isayo sādhu rūpā

original: Koṇḍañña eso manujesu dhammo, yaṃ vuddhamāgacchati esa bhāro”ti.
analyzed: koṇḍaññaḥ esaḥ manujesu dhammaḥ yam vuddham āgacchati esa bhāraḥ ti

original: Tattha koṇḍaññāti taṃ gottenālapati. Dhammoti sabhāvo. Yaṃ vuddhanti yaṃ paññāya
analyzed: tattha koṇḍaññā iti tam gottena ālapati dhammo ti sabhāvaḥ yam vuddhanti yam paññāya

original: vuddhaṃ purisaṃ esa pañhānaṃ vissajjanabhāro nāma āgacchati, eso manujesu sabhāvo,
analyzed: vuddham purisam esa pañhānam vissajjana bhāraḥ nāma āgacchati esaḥ manujesu sabhāvaḥ

original: tasmā candimasūriyasahassaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya pākaṭaṃ katvā devarañño pañhe kathehīti.
analyzed: tasmā candima sūriya sahassam uṭṭhāpentaḥ viya pākaṭam katvā deva rañño pañhe kathehi iti

original: Tato mahāpuriso okāsaṃ karonto anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
analyzed: tatas mahā purisaḥ okāsam karontaḥ anantaram gātham āha

original: “Katāvakāsā pucchantu bhonto, yaṃ kiñci pañhaṃ manasābhipatthitaṃ;
analyzed: kata avakāsā pucchantu bhontaḥ yam kiñci pañham manasā abhipatthitam

original: Ahañhi taṃ taṃ vo viyākarissaṃ, ñatvā sayaṃ lokamimaṃ parañcā”ti.
analyzed: ahan hi tam tam vaḥ viyākarissam ñatvā sayam lokam imam param ca ati

original: Tattha yaṃ kiñcīti na kevalaṃ tumhākaṃyeva, atha kho sadevakassapi lokassa yaṃ manasābhipatthitaṃ,
analyzed: tattha yam kiñci iti na kevalam tumhākam yeva atha kho sa devakassa api lokassa yam manasā abhipatthitam

original: taṃ maṃ bhavanto pucchantu. Ahañhi vo idhalokanissitaṃ vā paralokanissitaṃ vā sabbaṃ
analyzed: tam mama bhavantaḥ pucchantu aham hi vaḥ idha loka nissitam vā para loka nissitam vā sabbam

original: pañhaṃ imañca parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ paññāya sacchikatvā kathessāmīti sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ sampavāresi.
analyzed: pañham iman ca paran ca lokam sayam paññāya sacchikatvā kathessāmi iti sabbaññu pavāraṇam sampavāresi

original: Evaṃ tena okāse kate sakko attanā abhisaṅkhataṃ pañhaṃ pucchi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
analyzed: evam tena okāse kate sakkaḥ attanā abhisaṅkhatam pañham pucchi tam attham pakāsento satthā āha

original: “Tato ca maghavā sakko, atthadassī purindado;
analyzed: tato ca maghavā sakkaḥ attha dassī purindadaḥ

original: Apucchi paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ, yañcāsi abhipatthitaṃ.
analyzed: apucchi paṭhamam pañham yat ca asi abhipatthitam

original: “Kiṃ sū vadhitvā na kadāci socati, kissappahānaṃ isayo vaṇṇayanti;
analyzed: kim su vadhitvā na kadāci socati isayaḥ vaṇṇayanti

original: Kassīdha vuttaṃ pharusaṃ khametha, akkhāhi me koṇḍañña etamattha”nti.
analyzed: kassi idha vuttam pharusam khametha akkhāhi me koṇḍañña etam attham ti

original: Tattha yañcāsīti yaṃ tassa manasā abhipatthitaṃ āsi, taṃ pucchīti attho. Etanti etaṃ mayā pucchitamatthaṃ akkhāhi meti ekagāthāya tayo pañhe pucchi.
analyzed: tattha yat ca asi iti yam tassa manasā abhipatthitam āsi tam pucchi iti attho etat ti etam mayā pucchitam attham akkhāhi mā iti eka gāthāya tayo pañhe pucchi

original: Tato paraṃ byākaronto āha –
analyzed: tatas param byākarontaḥ āha

original: “Kodhaṃ vadhitvā na kadāci socati, makkhappahānaṃ isayo vaṇṇayanti;
analyzed: kodham vadhitvā na kadāci socati makkha ppahānam isayaḥ vaṇṇayanti

original: Sabbesaṃ vuttaṃ pharusaṃ khametha, etaṃ khantiṃ uttamamāhu santo”ti.
analyzed: sabbesam vuttam pharusam khametha etam khantim uttamam āhu santaḥ ti

original: Tattha kodhaṃ vadhitvāti kodhaṃ māretvā chaḍḍetvā. Socanto hi paṭighacitteneva socati,
analyzed: tattha kodham vadhitvā ati kodham māretvā chaḍḍetvā socantaḥ hi paṭigha cittena iva socati

original: kodhābhāvā kuto soko. Tena vuttaṃ “na kadāci socatī”ti. Makkhappahānanti parehi attano
analyzed: kodha abhāvā kutas sokaḥ tena vuttam na kadāci socati iti makkha ppahānam ti parehi attanaḥ

original: kataguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇassa akataññubhāvasaṅkhātassa makkhassa pahānaṃ isayo vaṇṇayanti.
analyzed: kataguṇa makkhana lakkhaṇassa akataññu bhāva saṅkhātassa makkhassa pahānam isayaḥ vaṇṇayanti

original: Sabbesanti hīnamajjhimukkaṭṭhānaṃ sabbesampi pharusaṃ vacanaṃ khametha. Santoti porāṇakā
analyzed: sabbesam ti hīna majjhima ukka ṭṭhānam sabbesam pi pharusam vacanam khametha santo ti porāṇakā

original: paṇḍitā evaṃ kathenti.
analyzed: paṇḍitāḥ evam kathenti

original: Sakko āha –
analyzed: sakkaḥ āha

original: “Sakkā ubhinnaṃ vacanaṃ titikkhituṃ, sadisassa vā seṭṭhatarassa vāpi;
analyzed: sakkā ubhinnam vacanam titikkhitum sadisassa vā seṭṭhatarassa vā api

original: Kathaṃ nu hīnassa vaco khametha, akkhāhi me koṇḍañña etamattha”nti.
analyzed: katham nu hīnassa vacaḥ khametha akkhāhi me koṇḍañña etamattham ti

original: Sarabhaṅgo āha –
analyzed: sarabhaṅgaḥ āha

original: “Bhayā hi seṭṭhassa vaco khametha, sārambhahetū pana sādisassa;
analyzed: bhayā hi seṭṭhassa vacaḥ khametha sa ārambha hetū pana sādisassa

original: Yo cīdha hīnassa vaco khametha, etaṃ khantiṃ uttamamāhu santo”ti. –
analyzed: yaḥ ci idha hīnassa vacaḥ khametha etam khantim uttamam āhu santaḥ iti

original: Evamādīnaṃ gāthānaṃ vacanappaṭivacanavasena sambandho veditabbo.
analyzed: evamādīnam gāthānam vacana paṭivacana vasena sambandhaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Tattha akkhāhi meti, bhante koṇḍañña, tumhehi dve pañhā sukathitā, eko me cittaṃ
analyzed: tattha akkhāhi mā iti bhante koṇḍañña tumhehi dve pañhā su kathitā ekaḥ me cittam

original: na gaṇhāti, kathaṃ sakkā attano hīnatarassa vacanaṃ adhivāsetuṃ, taṃ mama akkhāhīti
analyzed: na gaṇhāti katham sakkā attanaḥ hīnatarassa vacanam adhivāsetum tam mama akkhāhi iti

original: pucchanto evamāha. Etaṃ khantinti yadetaṃ jātigottādihīnassa vacanaṃ khamanaṃ, etaṃ
analyzed: pucchantaḥ evam āha etam khantin ti yat etam jāti gotta ādi hīnassa vacanam khamanam etam

original: khantiṃ uttamanti porāṇakapaṇḍitā vadanti. Yaṃ panetaṃ jātiādīhi seṭṭhassa bhayena,
analyzed: khantim uttamanti porāṇaka paṇḍitāḥ vadanti yam pana itam jāti ādīhi seṭṭhassa bhayena

original: sadisassa karaṇuttariyalakkhaṇe sārambhe ādīnavadassanena khamanaṃ, nesā adhivāsanakhanti nāmāti attho.
analyzed: sadisassa karaṇa uttariya lakkhaṇe sa ārambhe ādīnava dassanena khamanam na isā adhivāsanakhanti nāma ati attho

original: Evaṃ vutte sakko mahāsattaṃ āha – “bhante, paṭhamaṃ tumhe ‘sabbesaṃ vuttaṃ pharusaṃ
analyzed: evam vutte sakkaḥ mahāsattam āha bhante paṭhamam tumhe sabbesam vuttam pharusam

original: khametha, etaṃ khantiṃ uttamamāhu santo’ti vatvā idāni ‘yo cīdha hīnassa vaco khametha,
analyzed: khametha etam khantim uttamam āhu santo ti vatvā idāni yaḥ ci idha hīnassa vacaḥ khametha

original: etaṃ khantiṃ uttamamāhu santo’ti vadatha, na vo purimena pacchimaṃ sametī”ti. Atha
analyzed: etam khantim uttamam āhu santaḥ iti vadatha na vaḥ purimena pacchimam sameti iti atha

original: naṃ mahāsatto, “sakka, pacchimaṃ mayā ‘ayaṃ hīno’ti ñatvā pharusavacanaṃ adhivāsentassa
analyzed: nam mahāsatto sakka pacchimam mayā ayam hīnaḥ iti ñatvā pharusa vacanam adhivāsentassa

original: vasena vuttaṃ, yasmā pana na sakkā rūpadassanamattena sattānaṃ seṭṭhādibhāvo ñātuṃ,
analyzed: vasena vuttam yasmā pana na sakkā rūpa dassana mattena sattānam seṭṭha ādi bhāvaḥ ñātum

original: tasmā purimaṃ vutta”nti vatvā sattānaṃ aññatra saṃvāsā rūpadassanamattena seṭṭhādibhāvassa
analyzed: tasmā purimam vutta nti vatvā sattānam aññatra saṃvāsāḥ rūpa dassana mattena seṭṭha ādi bhāvassa

original: duviññeyyataṃ pakāsento gāthamāha –
analyzed: duviññeyya tam pakāsentaḥ gātham āha

original: “Kathaṃ vijaññā catupattharūpaṃ, seṭṭhaṃ sarikkhaṃ athavāpi hīnaṃ;
analyzed: katham vijaññā catu pattha rūpam seṭṭham sa rikkham athavā api hīnam

original: Virūparūpena caranti santo, tasmā hi sabbesaṃ vaco khamethā”ti.
analyzed: virūpa rūpena caranti santaḥ tasmā hi sabbesam vacaḥ khametha ati

original: Tattha catupattharūpanti catūhi iriyāpathehi paṭicchannasabhāvaṃ. Virūparūpenāti
analyzed: tattha catu pattha rūpam ti catūhi iriyāpathehi paṭicchanna sabhāvam virūpa rūpena ati

original: virūpānaṃ lāmakapuggalānaṃ rūpena uttamaguṇā santopi vicaranti. Imasmiṃ panatthe
analyzed: virūpānam lāmaka puggalānam rūpena uttama guṇā santaḥ api vicaranti imasmin pana atthe

original: majjhantikattherassa vatthu kathetabbaṃ.
analyzed: majjhantika therassa vatthu kathetabbam

original: Taṃ sutvā sakko nikkaṅkho hutvā, “bhante, etāya no khantiyā ānisaṃsaṃ kathehī”ti yāci. Athassa mahāsatto gāthamāha –
analyzed: tam sutvā sakkaḥ nikkaṅkhaḥ hutvā bhante etāya naḥ khantiyai ānisaṃsam kathehi iti yāci athassa mahāsatto gātham āha

original: “Na hetamatthaṃ mahatīpi senā, sarājikā yujjhamānā labhetha;
analyzed: na mahatī ipi senā sa rājikā yujjhamānā labhetha

original: Yaṃ khantimā sappuriso labhetha, khantībalassūpasamanti verā”ti.
analyzed: yam khantimā sappurisaḥ labhetha khantī balassu upasamanti

original: Tattha etamatthanti etaṃ veravūpasamanippaṭighasabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ.
analyzed: tattha etam attham ti etam vera vūpa sama nippaṭigha sabhāva saṅkhātam attham

original: Evaṃ mahāsattena khantiguṇe kathite te rājāno cintayiṃsu – “sakko attanova pañhe
analyzed: evam mahāsattena khanti guṇe kathite te rājānaḥ cintayiṃsu sakko attanā uva pañhe

original: pucchati, amhākaṃ pucchanokāsaṃ na dassatī”ti. Atha nesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā sakko
analyzed: pucchati amhākam pucchana ukāsam na dassati iti atha na isam ajjhāsayam viditvā sakkaḥ

original: attanā abhisaṅkhate cattāro pañhe ṭhapetvāva tesaṃ kaṅkhaṃ pucchanto gāthamāha –
analyzed: cattāro pañhe ṭhapetvā ava tesam kaṅkham pucchantaḥ gātham āha

original: “Subhāsitaṃ te anumodiyāna, aññaṃ taṃ pucchāmi tadiṅgha brūhi;
analyzed: su bhāsitam te anumodiyāna aññam tam pucchāmi tat iṅgha brūhi

original: Yathā ahuṃ daṇḍakī nāḷikero, athajjuno kalābu cāpi rājā;
analyzed: yathā daṇḍakī nāḷikeraḥ kalābu ca api rājā

original: Tesaṃ gatiṃ brūhi supāpakamminaṃ, katthūpapannā isīnaṃ viheṭhakā”ti.
analyzed: tesam gatim brūhi su pāpa kamminam katthu upapannāḥ isīnam viheṭhakā ati

original: Tattha anumodiyānāti idaṃ mayā puṭṭhānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pañhānaṃ vissajjanasaṅkhātaṃ tava
analyzed: tattha anumodiyānā ti idam mayā puṭṭhānam tiṇṇam pañhānam vissajjana saṅkhātam tava

original: subhāsitaṃ anumoditvā. Yathā ahunti yathā cattāro janā ahesuṃ. Kalābu cāti kalāburājā
analyzed: subhāsitam anumoditvā yathā ahunti yathā cattāraḥ janāḥ ahesum kalābu ca ati kalābu rājā

original: ca. Athajjunoti atha ajjunarājā.
analyzed: ca athajjunoti atha ajjuna rājā

original: Athassa vissajjento mahāsatto pañca gāthāyo abhāsi –
analyzed: athassa vissajjentaḥ mahāsatto pañca gāthāyaḥ abhāsi

original: “Kisañhi vacchaṃ avakiriya daṇḍakī, ucchinnamūlo sajano saraṭṭho;
analyzed: kisan hi vaccham daṇḍakī ucchinna mūlaḥ sa janaḥ sa raṭṭho

original: Kukkuḷanāme nirayamhi paccati, tassa phuliṅgāni patanti kāye.
analyzed: kukkuḷa nāme nirayamhi tassa phuliṅgāni patanti kāye

original: “Yo saññate pabbajite aheṭhayi, dhammaṃ bhaṇante samaṇe adūsake;
analyzed: yaḥ saññate pabbajite aheṭhayi dhammam bhaṇante samaṇe adūsake

original: Taṃ nāḷikeraṃ sunakhā parattha, saṅgamma khādanti viphandamānaṃ.
analyzed: tam nāḷikeram su nakhā parattha saṅgamma khādanti viphandamānam

original: “Athajjuno niraye sattisūle, avaṃsiro patito uddhaṃpādo;
analyzed: niraye satti sūle avaṃsiraḥ patitaḥ uddhaṃpādaḥ

original: Aṅgīrasaṃ gotamaṃ heṭhayitvā, khantiṃ tapassiṃ cirabrahmacāriṃ.
analyzed: aṅgīrasam gotamam heṭhayitvā khantim tapassim cira brahmacārim

original: “Yo khaṇḍaso pabbajitaṃ achedayi, khantiṃ vadantaṃ samaṇaṃ adūsakaṃ;
analyzed: yaḥ khaṇḍasas pabbajitam achedayi khantim vadantam samaṇam adūsakam

original: Kalābuvīciṃ upapajja paccati, mahāpatāpaṃ kaṭukaṃ bhayānakaṃ.
analyzed: kalābu vīcim upapajja paccati mahā patāpam kaṭukam bhayānakam

original: “Etāni sutvā nirayāni paṇḍito, aññāni pāpiṭṭhatarāni cettha;
analyzed: etāni sutvā nirayāni paṇḍitaḥ aññāni pāpiṭṭhatarāni ca ittha

original: Dhammaṃ care samaṇabrāhmaṇesu, evaṃkaro saggamupeti ṭhāna”nti.
analyzed: dhammam care samaṇa brāhmaṇesu evaṃkaro saggam upeti

original: Tattha kisanti appamaṃsalohitattā kisasarīraṃ. Avakiriyāti avakiritvā niṭṭhubhanadantakaṭṭhapātanena
analyzed: tattha kisanti appa maṃsa lohita ttā kisa sarīram avakiriyā ti avakiritvā niṭṭhubhana danta kaṭṭha pātanena

original: tassa sarīre kaliṃ pavāhetvā. Ucchinnamūloti ucchinnamūlo hutvā. Sajanoti sapariso.
analyzed: tassa sarīre kalim pavāhetvā ucchinna mūlaḥ uti ucchinna mūlaḥ hutvā sa janaḥ ti sa parisaḥ

original: Kukkuḷanāme nirayamhīti yojanasatappamāṇe kappasaṇṭhite uṇhachārikaniraye. Phuliṅgānīti
analyzed: kukkuḷa nāme nirayamhi iti yojana sata ppamāṇe kappa saṇṭhite uṇhachārika niraye phuliṅgāni iti

original: vītaccitaṅgārā. Tassa kira tattha uṇhakukkuḷe nimuggassa navahi vaṇamukhehi uṇhā
analyzed: tassa kira tattha uṇha kukkuḷe nimuggassa navahi vaṇa mukhehi uṇhā

original: chārikā pavisanti, sīse mahantamahantā aṅgārā patanti. Tesaṃ pana patanakāle sakalasarīraṃ
analyzed: chārikā pavisanti sīse mahanta mahantāḥ aṅgārāḥ patanti tesam pana patana kāle sakala sarīram

original: dīparukkho viya jalati, balavavedanā vattanti. So adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto mahāviravaṃ
analyzed: dīpa rukkhaḥ viya jalati balava vedanāḥ vattanti saḥ adhivāsetum a sakkontaḥ mahā viravam

original: ravati. Sarabhaṅgasatthā pathaviṃ bhinditvā taṃ tattha tathāpaccamānaṃ dassesi, mahājano
analyzed: ravati sarabhaṅga satthā pathavim bhinditvā tam tattha tathāpaccamānam dassesi mahājanaḥ

original: bhayasantāsamāpajji. Tassa ativiya bhītabhāvaṃ ñatvā mahāsatto taṃ nirayaṃ antaradhāpesi.
analyzed: bhaya santāsam āpajji tassa bhīta bhāvam ñatvā mahāsatto tam nirayam antaradhāpesi

original: Dhammaṃ bhaṇanteti dasakusalakammapathadhammaṃ bhāsante. Samaṇeti samitapāpe. Adūsaketi
analyzed: dhammam bhaṇantā iti dasa kusala kammapatha dhammam bhāsante samaṇa iti samita pāpe adūsaka iti

original: niraparādhe. Nāḷikeranti evaṃnāmakaṃ rājānaṃ. Paratthāti paraloke niraye nibbattaṃ.
analyzed: niraparādhe evaṃnāmakam rājānam paratthā ati para loke niraye nibbattam

original: Saṅgammāti ito cito ca samāgantvā chinditvā mahantamahantā sunakhā khādanti. Tasmiṃ
analyzed: saṅgammā ati itas citas ca samāgantvā chinditvā mahanta mahantā su nakhā khādanti tasmin

original: kira kaliṅgaraṭṭhe dantapuranagare nāḷikere nāma raññe rajjaṃ kārayamāne eko mahātāpaso
analyzed: kira kaliṅga raṭṭhe dantapura nagare nāḷikere nāma raññe rajjam kārayamāne ekaḥ mahā tāpasaḥ

original: pañcasatatāpasaparivuto himavantā āgamma rājuyyāne vāsaṃ kappetvā mahājanassa dhammaṃ
analyzed: pañca sata tāpasa parivutaḥ himavantaḥ āgamma rājuyyāne vāsam kappetvā mahājanassa dhammaṃ

original: desesi. “Dhammikatāpaso uyyāne vasatī”ti raññopi ārocayiṃsu. Rājā pana adhammiko
analyzed: desesi dhammika tāpasaḥ uyyāne vasati iti raññaḥ api ārocayiṃsu rājā pana adhammiko

original: adhammena rajjaṃ kāresi. So amaccesu tāpasaṃ pasaṃsantesu “ahampi dhammaṃ suṇissāmī”ti
analyzed: adhammena rajjam kāresi saḥ amaccesu tāpasam pasaṃsantesu aham pi dhammam suṇissāmi iti

original: uyyānaṃ gantvā tāpasaṃ vanditvā nisīdi. Tāpaso raññā saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karonto
analyzed: uyyānam gantvā tāpasam vanditvā nisīdi tāpasaḥ raññā saddhim paṭisanthāram karonto

original: “kiṃ, mahārāja, dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi, janaṃ na pīḷesī”ti āha. So tassa kujjhitvā
analyzed: kim mahā rāja dhammena rajjam kāresi janam na pīḷesi iti āha saḥ tassa kujjhitvā

original: “ayaṃ kūṭajaṭilo ettakaṃ kālaṃ nāgarānaṃ santike mamaññeva aguṇaṃ kathesi maññe,
analyzed: ayam kūṭajaṭilaḥ ettakam kālam nāgarānam santike mamaññā iva aguṇam kathesi maññe

original: hotu jānissāmī”ti cintetvā “sve amhākaṃ gharadvāraṃ āgaccheyyāthā”ti nimantetvā punadivase
analyzed: hotu jānissāmi iti cintetvā sve amhākam ghara dvāram āgaccheyyātha ati nimantetvā puna divase

original: purāṇagūthassa cāṭiyo paripūrāpetvā tāpasesu āgatesu tesaṃ bhikkhābhājanāni gūthassa
analyzed: purāṇa gūthassa cāṭiyaḥ paripūrāpetvā tāpasesu āgatesu tesam bhikkhā bhājanāni gūthassa

original: pūrāpetvā dvāraṃ pidahāpetvā musalāni ca lohadaṇḍe ca gāhāpetvā isīnaṃ sīsāni bhindāpetvā
analyzed: pūrāpetvā dvāram pidahāpetvā musalāni ca loha daṇḍe ca gāhāpetvā isīnam sīsāni bhindāpetvā

original: jaṭāsu gāhāpetvā kaḍḍhāpetvā sunakhehi khādāpetvā tattheva bhinnaṃ pathaviṃ pavisitvā
analyzed: jaṭāsu gāhāpetvā kaḍḍhāpetvā su nakhehi khādāpetvā tattha iva bhinnam pathavim pavisitvā

original: sunakhamahāniraye nibbattati, tatrassa tigāvutappamāṇasarīraṃ ahosi. Atha naṃ mahantamahantā
analyzed: sunakha mahāniraye nibbattati tatrassa ahosi atha nam mahanta mahantā

original: mahāhatthippamāṇā pañcavaṇṇā sunakhā anubandhitvā ḍaṃsitvā navayojanāya jalitaayapathaviyā
analyzed: mahā hatthippamāṇā pañcavaṇṇā su nakhā anubandhitvā ḍaṃsitvā nava yojanāya jalita aya pathaviyā

original: pātetvā mukhapūraṃ luñcantā vipphandamānaṃ khādiṃsu. Mahāsatto pathaviṃ dvidhā bhinditvā
analyzed: mukha pūram luñcantā vipphandamānam khādiṃsu mahāsatto pathavim dvidhā bhinditvā

original: taṃ nirayaṃ dassetvā mahājanassa bhītabhāvaṃ ñatvā antaradhāpesi.
analyzed: tam nirayam dassetvā mahā janassa bhīta bhāvam ñatvā antaradhāpesi

original: Athajjunoti sahassabāhurājā. Aṅgīrasanti aṅgehi raṃsīnaṃ niccharaṇato evaṃladdhanāmaṃ.
analyzed: sahassabāhu rājā aṅgīrasanti aṅgehi raṃsīnam niccharaṇataḥ evaṃladdhanāmam

original: Heṭhayitvāti viheṭhetvā visapītakaṇḍena vijjhitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā. So kira
analyzed: heṭhayitvā iti viheṭhetvā visa pīta kaṇḍena vijjhitvā jīvita khayam pāpetvā saḥ kira

original: ajjuno nāma rājā mahisakaraṭṭhe ketakarājadhāniyaṃ rajjaṃ kārento migavaṃ gantvā
analyzed: ajjunaḥ nāma rājā mahisakaraṭṭhe ketaka rājadhāniyam rajjam kārentaḥ migavam gantvā

original: mige vadhitvā aṅgārapakkamaṃsaṃ khādanto vicari. Athekadivasaṃ migānaṃ āgamanaṭṭhāne
analyzed: mige vadhitvā aṅgāra pakka maṃsam khādantaḥ atha eka divasam migānam āgamana ṭṭhāne

original: koṭṭhakaṃ katvā mige olokayamāno aṭṭhāsi. Tadā so tāpaso tassa rañño avidūre ekaṃ
analyzed: koṭṭhakam katvā mige olokayamāno aṭṭhāsi tadā so tāpaso tassa rañño avidūre ekam

original: kārarukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā phalāni ocinanto ocinitaphalasākhaṃ muñci. Tassā vissaṭṭhāya
analyzed: kāra rukkham abhiruhitvā phalāni ocinantaḥ ocinita phala sākham muñci tassā vissaṭṭhāya

original: saddena taṃṭhānaṃ pattā migā palāyiṃsu. Rājā kujjhitvā tāpasaṃ visamissitena sallena
analyzed: saddena taṃ ṭhānam pattāḥ migāḥ palāyiṃsu rājā kujjhitvā tāpasam visa missitena sallena

original: vijjhi. So parigalitvā patanto matthakena khadirakhāṇukaṃ āsādetvā sūlaggeyeva kālamakāsi.
analyzed: vijjhi saḥ parigalitvā patantaḥ matthakena khadirakhāṇukam āsādetvā kālam akāsi

original: Rājā taṅkhaṇeyeva dvidhā bhinnaṃ pathaviṃ pavisitvā sattisūlaniraye nibbatti, tigāvutappamāṇaṃ
analyzed: rājā taṅkhaṇeya iva dvidhā bhinnam pathavim pavisitvā satti sūla niraye nibbatti tiga avuta ppamāṇam

original: sarīraṃ ahosi. Tatra taṃ nirayapālā jalitehi āvudhehi koṭṭetvā jalitaṃ ayapabbataṃ
analyzed: sarīram tatra tam niraya pālāḥ jalitehi āvudhehi koṭṭetvā jalitam aya pabbatam

original: āropenti. Pabbatamatthake ṭhitakāle vāto paharati, so vātappahārena parigalitvā patati.
analyzed: āropenti pabbata matthake ṭhita kāle vātaḥ paharati saḥ vāta ppahārena parigalitvā patati

original: Tasmiṃ khaṇe heṭṭhā navayojanāya jalitaayapathaviyā mahātālakkhandhappamāṇaṃ jalitaṃ
analyzed: tasmin khaṇe heṭṭhā nava yojanāya jalita aya pathaviyā mahā tāla khandha ppamāṇam jalitam

original: ayasūlaṃ uṭṭhahati. So sūlaggamatthakeyeva āsādetvā sūlāvuto tiṭṭhati. Tasmiṃ khaṇe
analyzed: aya sūlam uṭṭhahati saḥ āsādetvā tiṭṭhati tasmin khaṇe

original: pathavī jalati, sūlaṃ jalati, tassa sarīraṃ jalati. So tattha mahāravaṃ ravanto paccati.
analyzed: pathavī jalati sūlam jalati tassa sarīram jalati so tattha mahā ravam ravanto paccati

original: Mahāsatto pathaviṃ dvidhā katvā taṃ nirayaṃ dassetvā mahājanassa bhītabhāvaṃ ñatvā antaradhāpesi.
analyzed: mahāsatto pathavim dvidhā katvā tam nirayam dassetvā mahā janassa bhīta bhāvam ñatvā antaradhāpesi

original: Khaṇḍasoti cattāro hatthapāde kaṇṇanāsañca khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ katvā. Adūsakanti niraparādhaṃ.
analyzed: khaṇḍaso ti cattāraḥ hattha pāde kaṇṇa nāsam ca khaṇḍākhaṇḍam katvā adūsakanti niraparādham

original: Tathā chedāpetvā dvīhi kasāhi pahārasahassehi tāḷāpetvā jaṭāsu gahetvā ākaḍḍhāpetvā
analyzed: tathā chedāpetvā dvīhi kasāhi pahāra sahassehi tāḷāpetvā jaṭāsu gahetvā ākaḍḍhāpetvā

original: paṭikujjaṃ nipajjāpetvā piṭṭhiyaṃ paṇhiyā paharitvā mahādukkhasamappitaṃ akāsi. Kalābuvīcinti
analyzed: paṭikujjam nipajjāpetvā piṭṭhiyam paṇhiyā paharitvā mahā dukkha samappitam akāsi kalābu vīciṃ ti

original: kalābu avīciṃ. Kaṭukanti tikhiṇavedanaṃ, evarūpaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjitvā channaṃ jālānaṃ
analyzed: kalābu avīcim kaṭukanti tikhiṇa vedanam evarūpam nirayam upapajjitvā channam jālānam

original: antare paccati. Vitthārato pana kalāburañño vatthu khantivādijātake kathitameva.
analyzed: antare paccati vitthārato pana kalāburañño vatthu khanti vādi jātake kathitam eva

original: Aññāni pāpiṭṭhatarāni cetthāti etehi nirayehi pāpiṭṭhatarāni ca aññāni nirayāni sutvā.
analyzed: aññāni pāpiṭṭhatarāni ca itthā ati etehi nirayehi pāpiṭṭhatarāni ca aññāni nirayāni sutvā

original: Dhammaṃ careti, sakka devarāja, paṇḍito kulaputto na kevalaṃ eteyeva cattāro nirayā,
analyzed: dhammam careti sakka devarāja paṇḍito kula putto na kevalam cattāro nirayā

original: eteyeva ca rājāno nerayikā, atha kho aññepi nirayā, aññepi ca rājāno nirayesu uppannāti
analyzed: ete iya iva ca rājānaḥ nerayikāḥ atha kho aññe pi nirayāḥ aññe api ca rājānaḥ nirayesu uppannā ati

original: viditvā catupaccayadānadhammikārakkhāvaraṇasaṃvidhānasaṅkhātaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇesu dhammaṃ careyyāti.
analyzed: viditvā catu paccaya dāna dhammika ārakkha āvaraṇa saṃvidhāna saṅkhātam samaṇa brāhmaṇesu dhammam careyya ati

original: Evaṃ mahāsattena catunnaṃ rājūnaṃ nibbattaṭṭhāne dassite tayo rājāno nikkaṅkhā ahesuṃ. Tato sakko avasese cattāro pañhe pucchanto gāthamāha –
analyzed: evam mahāsattena catunnam rājūnam nibbatta ṭṭhāne dassite tayo rājāno nikkaṅkhāḥ ahesuṃ tatas sakkaḥ avasese cattāro pañhe pucchantaḥ gātham āha

original: “Subhāsitaṃ te anumodiyāna, aññaṃ taṃ pucchāmi tadiṅgha brūhi;
analyzed: su bhāsitam te anumodiyāna aññam tam pucchāmi tat iṅgha brūhi

original: Kathaṃvidhaṃ sīlavantaṃ vadanti, kathaṃvidhaṃ paññavantaṃ vadanti;
analyzed: kathaṃvidham sīlavantam vadanti kathaṃvidham paññavantam vadanti

original: Kathaṃvidhaṃ sappurisaṃ vadanti, kathaṃvidhaṃ no siri no jahātī”ti.
analyzed: kathaṃvidham sappurisam vadanti kathaṃvidham no siri no jahāti iti

original: Tattha kathaṃvidhaṃ no siri no jahātīti kathaṃvidhaṃ nu purisaṃ paṭiladdhasirī na jahātīti.
analyzed: tattha kathaṃvidham no siri no jahāti iti kathaṃvidham nu purisam paṭiladdha sirī na jahāti iti

original: Athassa vissajjento mahāsatto catasso gāthāyo abhāsi –
analyzed: athassa vissajjentaḥ mahāsatto catassaḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsi

original: “Kāyena vācāya ca yodha saññato, manasā ca kiñci na karoti pāpaṃ;
analyzed: kāyena vācāya ca yodha saññataḥ manasā ca kiñci na karoti pāpam

original: Na attahetū alikaṃ bhaṇeti, tathāvidhaṃ sīlavantaṃ vadanti.
analyzed: na atta hetū alikam bhaṇa iti tathāvidham sīlavantam vadanti

original: “Gambhīrapañhaṃ manasābhicintayaṃ, nāccāhitaṃ kamma karoti luddaṃ;
analyzed: gambhīra pañham manasā abhicintayan na accāhitam kamma karoti luddam

original: Kālāgataṃ atthapadaṃ na riñcati, tathāvidhaṃ paññavantaṃ vadanti.
analyzed: kālāgatam attha padam na riñcati tathāvidham paññavantam vadanti

original: “Yo ve kataññū katavedi dhīro, kalyāṇamitto daḷhabhatti ca hoti;
analyzed: yaḥ ve kataññū kata vedi dhīro kalyāṇa mittaḥ daḷha bhatti ca hoti

original: Dukhitassa sakkacca karoti kiccaṃ, tathāvidhaṃ sappurisaṃ vadanti.
analyzed: dukhitassa sakkacca karoti kiccam tathāvidham sappurisam vadanti

original: “Etehi sabbehi guṇehupeto, saddho mudū saṃvibhāgī vadaññū;
analyzed: etehi sabbehi guṇehi upetaḥ saddhaḥ mudū saṃvibhāgī vadaññū

original: Saṅgāhakaṃ sakhilaṃ saṇhavācaṃ, tathāvidhaṃ no siri no jahātī”ti.
analyzed: saṅgāhakam sa khilam saṇha vācam tathāvidham no siri no jahāti iti

original: Tattha “kāyenā”tiādīni padāni tividhasucaritadvāravasena vuttāni. Na attahetūti desanāsīsamevetaṃ,
analyzed: tattha kāyena ati ādīni padāni tividha sucarita dvāra vasena vuttāni na atta hetū ti desanā sīsam eva etam

original: attahetu vā parahetu vā yasahetu vā dhanahetu vā lābhahetu vā āmisakiñcikkhahetu
analyzed: atta hetu vā para hetu vā yasa hetu vā dhana hetu vā lābha hetu vā āmisa kiñcikkha hetu

original: vā alikaṃ na kathetīti attho. Kāmañcesa attho “vācāya saññato”ti imināva siddho,
analyzed: vā alikam na katheti iti attho kāmañca isa attho vācāya saññato ti iminā ava siddho

original: musāvādino pana akattabbaṃ pāpaṃ nāma natthīti garubhāvadīpanatthaṃ puna evamāhāti
analyzed: musāvādinaḥ pana akattabbam pāpam nāma natthi iti garu bhāva dīpana tham puna evam āha ati

original: veditabbo. Taṃ puggalaṃ sīlavantaṃ vadanti.
analyzed: veditabbaḥ tam puggalam sīlavantam vadanti

original: Gambhīrapañhanti atthato ca pāḷito ca gambhīraṃ guḷhaṃ paṭicchannaṃ sattubhastajātaka-
analyzed: gambhīra pañhanti atthato ca pāḷito ca gambhīram guḷham paṭicchannam

original: sambhavajātaka- mahāumaṅgajātakesu āgatasadisaṃ pañhaṃ. Manasābhicintayanti manasā
analyzed: sambhava jātaka mahāumaṅga jātakesu āgata sadisam pañham manasā abhicintayanti manasā

original: abhicintento atthaṃ paṭivijjhitvā candasahassaṃ sūriyasahassaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya pākaṭaṃ
analyzed: abhicintentaḥ attham paṭivijjhitvā canda sahassam sūriya sahassam uṭṭhāpentaḥ viya pākaṭam

original: katvā yo kathetuṃ sakkotīti attho. Nāccāhitanti na atiahitaṃ, hitātikkantaṃ luddaṃ
analyzed: katvā yaḥ kathetum sakkoti iti atthaḥ na accāhitam ti na ati ahitam hita atikkantam luddam

original: pharusaṃ sāhasikakammañca yo na karotīti attho. Imassa panatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ –
analyzed: pharusam sāhasika kammam ca yaḥ na karoti iti atthaḥ imassa pana atthassa āvi bhāva attham

original: “Na paṇḍitā attasukhassa hetu, pāpāni kammāni samācaranti;
analyzed: na paṇḍitāḥ atta sukhassa hetu pāpāni kammāni samācaranti

original: Dukkhena phuṭṭhā piḷitāpi santā, chandā dosā ca na jahanti dhamma”nti. –
analyzed: dukkhena phuṭṭhā piḍitā api santā chandā dosā ca na jahanti dhammanti

original: Bhūripañho kathetabbo.
analyzed: bhūri pañhaḥ kathetabbo

original: Kālāgatanti ettha dānaṃ dātabbakāle, sīlaṃ rakkhaṇakāle, uposathaṃ upavāsakāle, saraṇesu
analyzed: kālāgatam ti ettha dānam dātabba kāle sīlam rakkhaṇa kāle uposatham upavāsa kāle saraṇesu

original: patiṭṭhānakāle, pabbajitakāle, samaṇadhammakaraṇakāle, vipassanācārasmiṃ yuñjanakāle
analyzed: patiṭṭhāna kāle pabbajita kāle samaṇa dhamma karaṇa kāle vipassanā ācārasmim yuñjana kāle

original: cāti imāni dānādīni sampādento kālāgataṃ atthapadaṃ na riñcati na hāpeti na gaḷāpeti
analyzed: ca ati imāni dāna ādīni sampādento kālāgatam attha padam na riñcati na hāpeti na gaḷāpeti

original: nāma. Tathāvidhanti sakka sabbaññubuddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca bodhisattā ca paññavantaṃ
analyzed: nāma tathāvidhanti sakka sabbaññu buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca bodhisattā ca paññavantam

original: kathentā evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ kathenti.
analyzed: kathentāḥ evarūpam puggalam kathenti

original: “Yo ve”ti gāthāya parena attano kataguṇaṃ jānātīti kataññū. Evaṃ ñatvā pana yenassa
analyzed: yaḥ vā iti gāthāya parena attano kataguṇam jānāti iti kataññuḥ evam ñatvā pana yenassa

original: guṇo kato, tassa guṇaṃ paṭikaronto katavedī nāma. Dukhitassāti attano sahāyassa dukkhappattassa
analyzed: guṇo kato tassa guṇam paṭikaronto katavedī nāma dukhitassa ati attanaḥ sahāyassa dukkha ppattassa

original: dukkhaṃ attani āropetvā yo tassa uppannakiccaṃ sahatthena sakkaccaṃ karoti, buddhādayo

original: vatvā “purāṇadutiyikāyā”ti vutte “bhikkhu esā itthī tuyhaṃ anatthakārikā, tvaṃ etaṃ
analyzed: vatvā purāṇadutiyikāya iti vutte bhikkhu esā itthī tuyham anattha kārikā tvam etam

original: nissāya jhānaṃ nāsetvā tīṇi saṃvaccharāni mūḷho visaññī nipajjitvā uppannāya saññāya
analyzed: nissāya jhānam nāsetvā tīṇi saṃvaccharāni mūḷhaḥ visaññī nipajjitvā uppannāya saññāya

original: mahāparidevaṃ paridevī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
analyzed: mahā paridevam paridevī iti vatvā atītam āhari

original: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kāsiraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
analyzed: atīte bārāṇasiyam brahmadatte rajjam kārente bodhisatto kāsiraṭṭhe brāhmaṇa kule nibbattitvā

original: vayappatto sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññāyatane vanamūlaphalāhāro
analyzed: vaya pattaḥ sabba sippesu nipphattim patvā isipabbajjam pabbajitvā arañña āyatane vana mūla phala āhāraḥ

original: yāpesi. Athekā migī tassa passāvaṭṭhāne sambhavamissakaṃ tiṇaṃ khāditvā udakaṃ pivi.
analyzed: atha ekā migī tassa passa avaṭṭhāne sambhava missakam tiṇam khāditvā udakam

original: Ettakeneva ca tasmiṃ paṭibaddhacittā gabbhaṃ paṭilabhitvā tato paṭṭhāya katthaci
analyzed: ettakena iva ca tasmin paṭibaddha cittā gabbham paṭilabhitvā tatas paṭṭhāya katthaci

original: agantvā tattheva tiṇaṃ khāditvā assamassa sāmanteyeva vicarati. Mahāsatto pariggaṇhanto
analyzed: a gantvā tattha iva tiṇam khāditvā assamassa sāmanteya iva vicarati mahāsattaḥ pariggaṇhantaḥ

original: taṃ kāraṇaṃ aññāsi. Sā aparabhāge manussadārakaṃ vijāyi. Mahāsatto taṃ puttasinehena
analyzed: tam kāraṇam aññāsi sā aparabhāge manussa dārakam mahāsatto tam putta sinehena

original: paṭijaggi, “isisiṅgo”tissa nāmaṃ akāsi. Atha naṃ mahāsatto viññutappattaṃ pabbājetvā
analyzed: paṭijaggi isisiṅga utissa nāmam akāsi atha nam mahāsattaḥ viññu tappattam pabbājetvā

original: attano mahallakakāle taṃ ādāya nārivanaṃ nāma gantvā, “tāta, imasmiṃ himavante imehi
analyzed: mahallaka kāle tam ādāya nārivanam nāma gantvā tāta imasmin himavante imehi

original: pupphehi sadisā itthiyo nāma honti, tā attano vasaṃ gate mahāvināsaṃ pāpenti, na
analyzed: pupphehi sadisāḥ itthiyaḥ nāma honti tāḥ attanaḥ vasam gate mahā vināsam pāpenti na

original: tāsaṃ vasaṃ nāma gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ovaditvā aparabhāge brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
analyzed: tāsam vasam nāma gantum vaṭṭati iti ovaditvā aparabhāge brahma loka parāyaṇaḥ ahosi

original: Isisiṅgopi jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷanto himavantappadese vāsaṃ kappesi. Ghoratapo paramadhitindriyo
analyzed: isisiṅgaḥ upi jhāna kīḷam kīḷantaḥ himavanta ppadese vāsam kappesi ghora tapo

original: ahosi. Athassa sīlatejena sakkassa bhavanaṃ kampi, sakko āvajjento taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā
analyzed: ahosi athassa sīla tejena sakkassa bhavanam kampi sakkaḥ tam kāraṇam ñatvā

original: “ayaṃ maṃ sakkattā cāveyya, ekaṃ accharaṃ pesetvā sīlamassa bhindāpessāmī”ti sakaladevalokaṃ
analyzed: ayam mam sakkattā cāveyyaḥ ekam accharam pesetvā sīlam assa bhindāpessāmi iti sakala deva lokam

original: upaparikkhanto attano aḍḍhateyyakoṭisaṅkhānaṃ paricārikānaṃ majjhe ekaṃ alambusaṃ
analyzed: upaparikkhantaḥ attanaḥ aḍḍhateyya koṭi saṅkhānam paricārikānam majjhe ekam alambusaṃ

original: nāma accharaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ tassa sīlaṃ bhindituṃ samatthaṃ adisvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā
analyzed: nāma accharam ṭhapetvā aññam tassa sīlam bhinditum samattham a disvā tam pakkosāpetvā

original: tassa sīlabhedaṃ kātuṃ āṇāpesi. Tamatthaṃ āvikaronto satthā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
analyzed: tassa sīlabhedam kātum āṇāpesi tam attham āvikarontaḥ satthā paṭhamam gātham āha

original: “Athabravi brahā indo, vatrabhū jayataṃ pitā;
analyzed: athabravi brahāḥ indo vatrabhū jayatam pitā

original: Devakaññaṃ parābhetvā, sudhammāyaṃ alambusa”nti.
analyzed: deva kaññam parābhetvā sudhammāyam alambusanti

original: Tattha brahāti mahā. Vatrabhūti vatrassa nāma asurassa abhibhavitā. Jayataṃ pitāti
analyzed: tattha mahā vatrabhūti vatrassa nāma asurassa abhibhavitā jayatam pitā ati

original: jayantānaṃ jayappattānaṃ sesānaṃ tettiṃsāya devaputtānaṃ pitukiccasādhanena pitā.
analyzed: jayantānam jayappattānam sesānam tettiṃsāya deva puttānam pitu kicca sādhanena pitā

original: Parābhetvāti hadayaṃ bhinditvā olokento viya taṃ “paṭibalā aya”nti ñatvāti attho.
analyzed: parābhetvā iti hadayam bhinditvā olokentaḥ viya tam paṭibalāḥ ayanti ñatvā iti attho

original: Sudhammāyanti sudhammāyaṃ devasabhāyaṃ.
analyzed: sudhammāyanti sudhammāyam deva sabhāyam

original: Paṇḍukambalasilāsane nisinno taṃ alambusaṃ pakkosāpetvā idamāha –
analyzed: paṇḍu kambala silā āsane nisinnaḥ tam alambusam pakkosāpetvā idam āha

original: “Misse devā taṃ yācanti, tāvatiṃsā saindakā;
analyzed: misse devā tam yācanti tāvatiṃsā saindakā

original: Isippalobhane gaccha, isisiṅgaṃ alambuse”ti.
analyzed: isippalobhane gaccha isisiṅgam alambusā iti

original: Tattha misseti taṃ ālapati, idañca tassā nāmaṃ, sabbā panitthiyo purise kilesamissanena
analyzed: tattha missā iti tam ālapati idam ca tassāḥ nāmam sabbā purise kilesa missanena

original: missanato “missā”ti vuccanti, tena sādhāraṇena guṇanāmenālapanto evamāha. Isippalobhaneti
analyzed: missanataḥ missā ati vuccanti tena sādhāraṇena guṇa nāmena ālapantaḥ evam āha isippa lobhana iti

original: isīnaṃ palobhanasamatthe. Isisiṅganti tassa kira matthake migasiṅgākārena dve cūḷā
analyzed: isīnam palobhana samatthe isisiṅganti tassa kira matthake migasiṅga ākārena dve cūḷā

original: uṭṭhahiṃsu, tasmā evaṃ vuccati.
analyzed: uṭṭhahiṃsu tasmai evam vuccati

original: Iti sakko “gaccha isisiṅgaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano vasaṃ ānetvā sīlamassa bhindā”ti alambusaṃ āṇāpesi.
analyzed: iti sakkaḥ gacchaḥ isisiṅgam upasaṅkamitvā attanaḥ vasam ānetvā sīlam assa bhindāti alambusam āṇāpesi

original: “Purāyaṃ amhe acceti, vattavā brahmacariyavā;
analyzed: purā ayam amhe accā iti vattavā brahmacariyavā

original: Nibbānābhirato vuddho, tassa maggāni āvarā”ti. – vacanaṃ āha;
analyzed: nibbāna abhirataḥ vuddhaḥ tassa maggāni āvarāti vacanam āha

original: Tattha purāyanti ayaṃ tāpaso vattasampanno ca brahmacariyavā ca, so panesa dīghāyukatāya
analyzed: tattha purā āyanti ayam tāpasaḥ vatta sampanno ca brahmacariyavā ca saḥ pana isa dīgha āyuka tāya

original: nibbānasaṅkhāte magge abhirato guṇavuddhiyā ca vuddho. Tasmā yāva esa amhe nātikkamati,
analyzed: nibbāna saṅkhāte magge abhirataḥ guṇa vuddhiyā ca vuddhaḥ tasmā yāva esa amhe na atikkamati

original: na abhibhavitvā imamhā ṭhānā cāveti, tāvadeva tvaṃ gantvā tassa devalokagamanāni
analyzed: na abhibhavitvā imamhā ṭhānā tāvat eva tvam gantvā tassa deva loka gamanāni

original: maggāni āvara, yathā idha nāgacchati, evaṃ karohīti attho.
analyzed: maggāni āvara yathā idha na āgacchati evam karohi iti attho

original: Taṃ sutvā alambusā gāthādvayamāha –
analyzed: tam sutvā alambusā gāthā dvayam āha

original: “Devarāja kimeva tvaṃ, mameva tuvaṃ sikkhasi;
analyzed: devarāja kim eva tvam mama iva tuvam sikkhasi

original: Isippalobhane gaccha, santi aññāpi accharā.
analyzed: isippalobhane gaccha santi aññā api accharā

original: “Mādisiyo pavarā ceva, asoke nandane vane;
analyzed: mādisiyaḥ pavarā ca iva asoke nandane vane

original: Tāsampi hotu pariyāyo, tāpi yantu palobhanā”ti.
analyzed: tāsampi hotu tā api yantu

original: Tattha kimeva tvanti kiṃ nāmetaṃ tvaṃ karosīti dīpeti. Mameva tuvaṃ sikkhasīti imasmiṃ
analyzed: tattha kim eva tvam ti kim nāma etam tvam karosi iti dīpeti mama eva tuvam sikkhasi iti imasmin

original: sakaladevaloke mameva tuvaṃ ikkhasi, aññaṃ na passasīti adhippāyena vadati. Sa-kāro
analyzed: sakala deva loke mama eva tuvam ikkhasi aññam na passasi iti adhippāyena vadati sakāro

original: panettha byañjanasandhikaro. Isippalobhane gacchāti kiṃkāraṇā maññeva evaṃ vadesīti
analyzed: pana ittha byañjana sandhi karaḥ isippalobhane gacchāti kiṃkāraṇā maññā iva evam vadesi iti

original: adhippāyo. Pavarā cevāti mayā uttaritarā ceva. Asoketi sokarahite. Nandaneti nandijanake.
analyzed: adhippāyo pavarā ca iva ati mayā uttaritarā ca iva asokā iti soka rahite nandanā iti nandi janake

original: Pariyāyoti gamanavāro.
analyzed: gamana vāraḥ

original: Tato sakko tisso gāthāyo abhāsi –
analyzed: tatas sakkaḥ tissaḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsi

original: “Addhā hi saccaṃ bhaṇasi, santi aññāpi accharā;
analyzed: addhā hi saccam bhaṇasi santi aññā api accharā

original: Tādisiyo pavarā ceva, asoke nandane vane.
analyzed: tādisiyā pavarā ca iva asoke nandane vane

original: “Na tā evaṃ pajānanti, pāricariyaṃ pumaṃ gatā;
analyzed: na tāḥ evam pajānanti pāricariyam gatāḥ

original: Yādisaṃ tvaṃ pajānāsi, nāri sabbaṅgasobhane.
analyzed: yādisam tvam pajānāsi nāri sabbaṅga sobhane

original: “Tvameva gaccha kalyāṇi, itthīnaṃ pavarā casi;
analyzed: tvam eva gaccha kalyāṇi itthīnam pavarā casi

original: Taveva vaṇṇarūpena, savasamānayissasī”ti.
analyzed: tava iva vaṇṇa rūpena savasam ānayissasi iti

original: Tattha pumaṃ gatāti purisaṃ upasaṅkamantā samānā purisapalobhinipāricariyaṃ na jānanti.
analyzed: tattha purisam upasaṅkamantā samānā purisa palobhini pāricariyam na jānanti

original: Vaṇṇarūpenāti sarīravaṇṇena ceva rūpasampattiyā ca. Savasamānayissasīti taṃ tāpasaṃ
analyzed: vaṇṇa rūpena ati sarīra vaṇṇena ca iva rūpa sampattiyā ca savasam ānayissasi iti tam tāpasam

original: attano vasaṃ ānessasīti.
analyzed: attanaḥ vasam ānessasi iti

original: Taṃ sutvā alambusā dve gāthā abhāsi –
analyzed: tam sutvā alambusā dve gāthāḥ abhāsi

original: “Na vāhaṃ na gamissāmi, devarājena pesitā;
analyzed: na vā aham na gamissāmi devarājena pesitā

original: Vibhemi cetaṃ āsāduṃ, uggatejo hi brāhmaṇo.
analyzed: vibhemi āsādum ugga tejaḥ hi brāhmaṇaḥ

original: “Aneke nirayaṃ pattā, isimāsādiyā janā;
analyzed: aneke nirayam pattāḥ isi māsa ādiyāḥ janāḥ

original: Āpannā mohasaṃsāraṃ, tasmā lomāni haṃsaye”ti.
analyzed: āpannāḥ moha saṃsāram tasmai lomāni haṃsaya iti

original: Tattha na vāhanti na ve ahaṃ. Vibhemīti bhāyāmi. Āsādunti āsādituṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
analyzed: tattha na vā aham iti na aham vibhemi iti bhāyāmi āsādum ti āsāditum idam vuttam hoti

original: – nāhaṃ, deva, tayā pesitā na gamissāmi, apicāhaṃ taṃ isiṃ sīlabhedanatthāya allīyituṃ
analyzed: na aham deva tayā pesitā na gamissāmi api ca aham tam isim sīla bhedana tthāya allīyitum

original: bhāyāmi, uggatejo hi soti. Āsādiyāti āsādetvā. Mohasaṃsāranti mohena saṃsāraṃ, mohena
analyzed: bhāyāmi ugga tejaḥ hi saḥ ti āsādiya ati āsādetvā moha saṃsāranti mohena saṃsāram mohena

original: isiṃ palobhetvā saṃsāraṃ āpannā vaṭṭadukkhe patiṭṭhitā sattā gaṇanapathaṃ atikkantā.
analyzed: isim palobhetvā saṃsāram āpannā vaṭṭa dukkhe patiṭṭhitā sattā gaṇana patham atikkantā

original: Tasmāti tena kāraṇena. Lomāni haṃsayeti ahaṃ lomāni uṭṭhapemi, “tassa kirāhaṃ sīlaṃ
analyzed: tasmā ati tena kāraṇena lomāni haṃsaya iti aham lomāni uṭṭhapemi tassa kira aham sīlam

original: bhindissāmī”ti cintayamānāya me lomāni pahaṃsantīti vadati.
analyzed: bhindissāmi iti cintayamānāya me lomāni pahaṃsanti iti vadati

original: “Idaṃ vatvāna pakkāmi, accharā kāmavaṇṇinī;
analyzed: idam vatvāna accharā kāma vaṇṇinī

original: Missā missitumicchantī, isisiṅgaṃ alambusā.
analyzed: missā missitum icchantī isisiṅgam alambusā

original: “Sā ca taṃ vanamogayha, isisiṅgena rakkhitaṃ;
analyzed: sā ca tam isisiṅgena rakkhitam

original: Bimbijālakasañchannaṃ, samantā addhayojanaṃ.
analyzed: bimbi jālaka sañchannam samantā addha yojanam

original: “Pātova pātarāsamhi, udaṇhasamayaṃ pati;
analyzed: udaṇha samayam

original: Aggiṭṭhaṃ parimajjantaṃ, isisiṅgaṃ upāgamī”ti. – imā abhisambuddhagāthā;
analyzed: aggiṭṭham parimajjantam isisiṅgam upāgami iti imāḥ abhisambuddha gāthāḥ

original: Tattha pakkāmīti tena hi, devarāja, āvajjeyyāsi manti attano sayanagabbhaṃ pavisitvā
analyzed: tattha pakkāmī iti tena hi devarājaḥ āvajjeyyāsi attanaḥ sayanagabbham pavisitvā

original: alaṅkaritvā isisiṅgaṃ kilesena missituṃ icchantī pakkāmi, bhikkhave, sā accharā tassa
analyzed: alaṅkaritvā isisiṅgam kilesena missitum icchantī pakkāmi bhikkhave sā accharā tassa

original: assamaṃ gatāti. Bimbijālakasañchannanti rattaṅkuravanena sañchannaṃ. Pātova pātarāsamhīti,
analyzed: assamam gatā ati bimbi jālaka sañchannam ti ratta aṅkura vanena sañchannam

original: bhikkhave, pātarāsavelāya pātova pageyeva atipageva. Udaṇhasamayaṃ patīti sūriyuggamanavelāyameva.
analyzed: bhikkhave pātarāsa velāya pātova atipagā iva udaṇha samayam pati iti sūri yuj gamana velāyam eva

original: Aggiṭṭhanti aggisālaṃ. Rattiṃ padhānamanuyuñjitvā pātova nhatvā udakakiccaṃ katvā
analyzed: aggiṭṭhanti aggi sālam rattim padhānam anuyuñjitvā pātova nhatvā udaka kiccam katvā

original: paṇṇasālāyaṃ thokaṃ jhānasukhena vītināmetvā nikkhamitvā aggisālaṃ sammajjantaṃ taṃ
analyzed: paṇṇasālāyam thokam jhāna sukhena vītināmetvā nikkhamitvā aggi sālam sammajjantam tam

original: isisiṅgaṃ sā upāgami, itthivilāsaṃ dassentī tassa purato aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: isisiṅgam sā upāgami itthi vilāsam dassentī tassa puratas aṭṭhāsi

original: Atha naṃ tāpaso pucchanto āha –
analyzed: atha nam tāpasaḥ pucchantaḥ āha

original: “Kā nu vijjurivābhāsi, osadhī viya tārakā;
analyzed: kā nu vijjuḥ iva ābhāsi osadhī tārakā

original: Vicittahatthābharaṇā, āmuttamaṇikuṇḍalā.
analyzed: vicitta hattha ābharaṇā āmutta maṇi kuṇḍalā

original: “Ādiccavaṇṇasaṅkāsā, hemacandanagandhinī;
analyzed: ādicca vaṇṇa saṅkāsā hema candana gandhinī

original: Saññatūrū mahāmāyā, kumārī cārudassanā.
analyzed: saññatūrū mahāmāyā kumārī cārudassanā

original: “Vilaggā mudukā suddhā, pādā te suppatiṭṭhitā;
analyzed: vilaggā mudukā suddhā pādā te su patiṭṭhitā

original: Gamanā kāmanīyā te, harantiyeva me mano.
analyzed: gamanā kāmanīyā te harantiyā iva me mano

original: “Anupubbā ca te ūrū, nāganāsasamūpamā;
analyzed: anupubbā ca te ūrū nāga nāsa samūpamā

original: Vimaṭṭhā tuyhaṃ sussoṇī, akkhassa phalakaṃ yathā.
analyzed: vimaṭṭhā tuyham sussoṇī akkhassa phalakam yathā

original: “Uppalasseva kiñjakkhā, nābhi te sādhusaṇṭhitā;
analyzed: uppalassa iva kiñjakkhā nā abhi te sādhu saṇṭhitā

original: Purā kaṇhañjanasseva, dūrato patidissati.
analyzed: purā kaṇhañjanassa iva dūratas patidissati

original: “Duvidhā jātā urajā, avaṇṭā sādhupaccudā;
analyzed: duvidhā jātā urajā avaṇṭā sādhupaccudā

original: Payodharā apatitā, aḍḍhalābusamā thanā.
analyzed: payodharāḥ a patitāḥ aḍḍha alābu samā thanā

original: “Dīghā kambutalābhāsā, gīvā eṇeyyakā yathā;
analyzed: dīghā kambu tala ābhāsā gīvā eṇeyyakā yathā

original: Paṇḍarāvaraṇā vaggu, catutthamanasannibhā.
analyzed: paṇḍara āvaraṇā

original: “Uddhaggā ca adhaggā ca, dumaggaparimajjitā;
analyzed: uddhaggā ca adhaggā ca dumagga parimajjitā

original: Duvijā nelasambhūtā, dantā tava sudassanā.
analyzed: duvijā nelasambhūtā dantā tava sudassanā

original: “Apaṇḍarā lohitantā, jiñjūkaphalasannibhā;
analyzed: apaṇḍarā lohi tantā jiñjūka phala sannibhā

original: Āyatā ca visālā ca, nettā tava sudassanā.
analyzed: āyatā ca visālā ca nettā tava su dassanā

original: “Nātidīghā susammaṭṭhā, kanakabyāsamocitā;
analyzed: na ati dīghā su sammaṭṭhā kanaka byāsama ucitā

original: Uttamaṅgaruhā tuyhaṃ, kesā candanagandhikā.
analyzed: kesā candana gandhikā

original: “Yāvatā kasigorakkhā, vāṇijānañca yā gati;
analyzed: yāvatā kasi gorakkhā vāṇijānam ca yā gati

original: Isīnañca parakkantaṃ, saññatānaṃ tapassinaṃ.
analyzed: isīnam ca parakkantam saññatānam tapassinam

original: “Na te samasamaṃ passe, asmiṃ pathavimaṇḍale;
analyzed: na te samasamam passe asmim pathavi maṇḍale

original: Ko vā tvaṃ kassa vā putto, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya”nti.
analyzed: kaḥ vā tvam kassa vā putto katham jānemu tam mayanti

original: Tattha vicittahatthābharaṇāti vicittehi hatthābharaṇehi samannāgatā. Hemacandanagandhinīti
analyzed: tattha vicitta hattha ābharaṇā ati vicittehi hattha ābharaṇehi samannāgatā hema candana gandhinī iti

original: suvaṇṇavaṇṇacandanagandhavilepanā. Saññatūrūti suvaṭṭitaghanaūru sampannaūrulakkhaṇā.
analyzed: suvaṇṇa vaṇṇa candana gandha vilepanā su vaṭṭita ghana ūru sampanna ūru lakkhaṇā

original: Vilaggāti saṃkhittamajjhā. Mudukāti mudu sukhumālā. Suddhāti nimmalā. Suppatiṭṭhitāti
analyzed: vilaggā ati saṃkhitta majjhā mudukā ati mudu sukhu mālā suddhā ati nimmalā su patiṭṭhitā ati

original: samaṃ pathaviṃ phusantā suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitā. Gamanāti gacchamānā. Kāmanīyāti kantā
analyzed: samam pathavim phusantā suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitā gamanā ati gacchamānā kāmanīyā ati kantā

original: kāmitabbayuttakā. Harantiyeva me manoti ete evarūpena paramena itthivilāsena caṅkamantiyā
analyzed: kāmitabba yuttakā harantiyā iva me manaḥ ete evarūpena paramena itthi vilāsena caṅkamantiyā

original: tava pādā mama cittaṃ harantiyeva. Vimaṭṭhāti visālā. Sussoṇīti sundarasoṇī. Akkhassāti
analyzed: tava pādāḥ mama cittam harantiyā iva vimaṭṭhā ati visālā sussoṇī iti sundarasoṇī akkhassā ati

original: sundaravaṇṇassa akkhassa suvaṇṇaphalakaṃ viya visālā te soṇīti vadati. Uppalasseva
analyzed: sundara vaṇṇassa akkhassa suvaṇṇa phalakam viya visālā te soṇī iti vadati uppalassa iva

original: kiñjakkhāti nīluppalakaṇṇikā viya. Kaṇhañjanassevāti sukhumakaṇhalomacittattā evamāha.
analyzed: kiñjakkhā ati nīla uppala kaṇṇikā viya sukhuma kaṇha loma citta ttā evam āha

original: “Duvidhā”tigāthaṃ thane vaṇṇayanto āha. Te hi dve hutvā ure jātā vaṇṭassa abhāvā
analyzed: duvidha atigātham thane vaṇṇayantaḥ āha te hi dve hutvā jātā vaṇṭassa abhāvā

original: avaṇṭā, ure laggā eva hutvā suṭṭhu nikkhantattā sādhupaccudā, payassa dhāraṇato payodharā,
analyzed: avaṇṭā ure laggā eva hutvā suṭṭhu nikkhanta ttā sādhu paccudā payassa dhāraṇato payodharā

original: apatitāti na patitā, amilātatāya vā alambanatāya vā na anto paviṭṭhāti apatitā, suvaṇṇaphalake
analyzed: a patitā ati na patitā a milāta tāya vā a lambana tāya vā na antar paviṭṭhā ati a patitā suvaṇṇa phalake

original: ṭhapitasuvaṇṇamayavaṭṭaalābuno aḍḍhena sadisatāya aḍḍhalābusamā thanā. Eṇeyyakā yathāti
analyzed: ṭhapita suvaṇṇa maya vaṭṭa alābunaḥ aḍḍhena sadisa tāya aḍḍha lābu samā thanā eṇeyyakā yathā iti

original: eṇīmigassa hi dīghā ca vaṭṭā ca gīvā sobhati yathā, evaṃ tava gīvā thokaṃ dīghā.
analyzed: eṇīmigassa hi dīghā ca vaṭṭā ca gīvā sobhati yathā evam tava gīvā thokam dīghā

original: Kambutalābhāsāti suvaṇṇāliṅgatalasannibhā gīvāti attho. Paṇḍarāvaraṇāti dantāvaraṇā.
analyzed: kambu tala ābhāsā ati suvaṇṇa āliṅga tala sannibhā gīvā ati attho paṇḍara āvaraṇā ati danta āvaraṇā

original: Catutthamanasannibhāti catutthamano vuccati catutthamanavatthubhūtā jivhā. Abhirattabhāvena
analyzed: catuttha mana sannibhā ati catuttha manaḥ vuccati catuttha mana vatthu bhūtā jivhā abhiratta bhāvena

original: jivhāsadisaṃ te oṭṭhapariyosānanti vadati. Uddhaggāti heṭṭhimadantā. Adhaggāti uparimadantā.
analyzed: jivhā sadisam te oṭṭha pariyosānam ti vadati uddhaggā ati heṭṭhima dantā adhaggā ati uparima dantā

original: Dumaggaparimajjitāti dantakaṭṭhaparimajjitā parisuddhā. Duvijāti dvijā. Nelasambhūtāti
analyzed: du magga parimajjitā ati danta kaṭṭha parimajjitā parisuddhā duvijā ati dvijā na ilasambhūtā ati

original: niddosesu hanumaṃsapariyosānesu sambhūtā.
analyzed: niddosesu hanu maṃsa pariyosānesu sambhūtā

original: Apaṇḍarāti kaṇhā. Lohitantāti rattapariyantā. Jiñjūkaphalasannibhāti rattaṭṭhāne
analyzed: apaṇḍarā ati kaṇhā lohitantā ati ratta pariyantā jiñjūka phala sannibhā ati ratta ṭṭhāne

original: jiñjukaphalasadisā. Sudassanāti passantānaṃ atittikarā pañcapasādasamannāgatā. Nātidīghāti
analyzed: jiñjuka phala sadisā su dassanā ati passantānam a tittikarā pañca pasāda samannāgatā na ati dīghā ati

original: pamāṇayuttā. Susammaṭṭhāti suṭṭhu sammaṭṭhā. Kanakabyāsamocitāti kanakabyā vuccati
analyzed: pamāṇa yuttā su sammaṭṭhā ati suṭṭhu sammaṭṭhā kanaka byā sama ucitā iti kanaka byā vuccati

original: suvaṇṇaphaṇikā, tāya gandhatelaṃ ādāya paharitā suracitā. Kasigorakkhāti iminā kasiñca
analyzed: suvaṇṇa phaṇikā tāya gandha telam ādāya paharitā su racitā kasi gorakkhāti iminā kasin ca

original: gorakkhañca nissāya jīvanakasatte dasseti. Yā gatīti yattakā nipphatti. Parakkantanti
analyzed: gorakkhañca nissāya jīvanaka satte dasseti yā gatī iti yattakā nipphatti

original: yattakaṃ isīnaṃ parakkantaṃ, vitthārīkatā imasmiṃ himavante yattakā isayo vasantīti
analyzed: yattakam isīnam parakkantam vitthārīkatā imasmin himavante yattakāḥ isayaḥ vasanti iti

original: attho. Na te samasamanti tesu sabbesu ekampi rūpalīḷāvilāsādisamatāya tayā samānaṃ
analyzed: atthaḥ na te samasamanti tesu sabbesu ekam pi rūpa līḷā vilāsa ādi sama tāya tayā samānam

original: na passāmi. Ko vā tvanti idaṃ tassā itthibhāvaṃ jānanto purisavohāravasena pucchati.
analyzed: na passāmi kaḥ vā tvanti idam tassā itthi bhāvam jānanto purisa vohāra vasena pucchati

original: Evaṃ pādato paṭṭhāya yāva kesā attano vaṇṇaṃ bhāsante tāpase alambusā tuṇhī hutvā tassā kathāya yathānusandhiṃ gatāya tassa sammūḷhabhāvaṃ ñatvā gāthamāha –
analyzed: evam pādataḥ paṭṭhāya yāva kesāḥ attanaḥ vaṇṇam bhāsante tāpase alambusā tuṇhī hutvā tassā kathāya yathā anusandhim gatāya tassa sammūḷha bhāvam ñatvā gātham āha

original: “Na pañhakālo bhaddante, kassapevaṃ gate sati;
analyzed: na pañha kālaḥ bhaddante kassapa ivam gate sati

original: Ehi samma ramissāma, ubho asmākamassame;
analyzed: ehi samma ramissāmaḥ ubho asmākam assame

original: Ehi taṃ upagūhissaṃ, ratīnaṃ kusalo bhavā”ti.
analyzed: ehi tam upagūhissam ratīnam kusalaḥ bhavāti

original: Tattha kassapevaṃ gate satīti kassapagotta evaṃ tava citte pavatte sati pañhakālo na hoti. Sammāti vayassa, piyavacanālapanametaṃ. Ratīnanti pañcakāmaguṇaratīnaṃ.
analyzed: tattha kassapa ivam gate sati iti kassapa gotte evam tava citte pavatte sati pañha kālaḥ na hoti sammā iti vayassa piya vacana ālapanam etam ratīnam ti pañca kāmaguṇa ratīnam

original: Evaṃ vatvā alambusā cintesi – “nāyaṃ mayi ṭhitāya hatthapāsaṃ āgamissati, gacchantī
analyzed: evam vatvā alambusā cintesi na ayam mayi ṭhitāya hattha pāsam āgamissati gacchantī

original: viya bhavissāmī”ti. Sā itthimāyākusalatāya tāpasaṃ anupasaṅkamitvā āgatamaggābhimukhī
analyzed: viya bhavissāmi iti sā itthi māyā kusala tāya tāpasam an upasaṅkamitvā āgata magga abhimukhī

original: pāyāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
analyzed: pāyāsi tam attham pakāsentaḥ satthā āha

original: “Idaṃ vatvāna pakkāmi, accharā kāmavaṇṇinī;
analyzed: idam vatvāna accharā kāma vaṇṇinī

original: Missā missitumicchantī, isisiṅgaṃ alambusā”ti.
analyzed: missā missitum icchantī isisiṅgam alambusāti

original: Atha naṃ tāpaso gacchantiṃ disvā “ayaṃ gacchatī”ti attano dandhaparakkamaṃ mandagamanaṃ chinditvā vegena dhāvitvā kesesu hatthena parāmasi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
analyzed: atha nam tāpasaḥ gacchantim disvā ayam gacchati iti attanaḥ dandha parakkamam manda gamanam chinditvā vegena dhāvitvā kesesu hatthena parāmasi tam attham pakāsentaḥ satthā āha

original: “So ca vegena nikkhamma, chetvā dandhaparakkamaṃ;
analyzed: so ca vegena nikkhamma chetvā dandha parakkamam

original: Tamuttamāsu veṇīsu, ajjhappatto parāmasi.
analyzed: tam uttamāsu veṇīsu ajjhappattaḥ parāmasi

original: “Tamudāvatta kalyāṇī, palissaji susobhanā;
analyzed: tam udāvatta kalyāṇī su sobhanā

original: Cavitamhi brahmacariyā, yathā taṃ atha tositā.
analyzed: cavitamhi brahmacariyā yathā taṃ atha tositā

original: “Manasā agamā indaṃ, vasantaṃ nandane vane;
analyzed: manasā agamaḥ indam vasantam nandane vane

original: Tassā saṅkappamaññāya, maghavā devakuñjaro.
analyzed: tassā saṅkappam aññāya maghavā deva kuñjaraḥ

original: “Pallaṅkaṃ pahiṇī khippaṃ, sovaṇṇaṃ sopavāhanaṃ;
analyzed: pallaṅkam pahiṇī khippam sovaṇṇam sa upavāhanam

original: Sauttaracchadapaññāsaṃ, sahassapaṭiyatthataṃ.
analyzed: sa uttaracchada paññāsam

original: “Tamenaṃ tattha dhāresi, ure katvāna sobhanā;
analyzed: tam enam tattha dhāresi ure katvāna sobhanā

original: Yathā ekamuhuttaṃva, tīṇi vassāni dhārayi.
analyzed: yathā eka muhuttam iva tīṇi vassāni

original: “Vimado tīhi vassehi, pabujjhitvāna brāhmaṇo;
analyzed: vimadaḥ tīhi vassehi pabujjhitvāna brāhmaṇaḥ

original: Addasāsi haritarukkhe, samantā aggiyāyanaṃ.
analyzed: addasāsi harita rukkhe samantā aggiyāyanam

original: “Navapattavanaṃ phullaṃ, kokilaggaṇaghositaṃ;
analyzed: nava patta vanam phullam kokila ggaṇa ghositam

original: Samantā paviloketvā, rudaṃ assūni vattayi.
analyzed: samantā paviloketvā rudam assūni

original: “Na juhe na jape mante, aggihuttaṃ pahāpitaṃ;
analyzed: na juhe na jape mante aggi huttam pahāpitam

original: Ko nu me pāricariyāya, pubbe cittaṃ palobhayi.
analyzed: kaḥ nu me pāricariyāya pubbe cittam palobhayi

original: “Araññe me viharato, yo me tejā ha sambhutaṃ;
analyzed: araññe me viharataḥ yaḥ me ha

original: Nānāratanaparipūraṃ, nāvaṃva gaṇhi aṇṇave”ti.

original: Tattha ajjhappattoti sampatto. Tamudāvatta kalyāṇīti taṃ kese parāmasitvā ṭhitaṃ
analyzed: tattha ajjhappattaḥ ti sampattaḥ tam udāvatta kalyāṇī iti tam kese parāmasitvā ṭhitam

original: isiṃ udāvattitvā nivattitvā kalyāṇadassanā sā suṭṭhu sobhanā. Palissajīti āliṅgi.
analyzed: isim udāvattitvā nivattitvā kalyāṇa dassanā sā suṭṭhu sobhanā palissajī iti āliṅgi

original: Cavitamhi brahmacariyā, yathā taṃ atha tositāti, bhikkhave, tassa isino tāvadeva
analyzed: cavitamhi brahmacariyā yathā taṃ atha bhikkhave tassa isino tāvat eva

original: jhānaṃ antaradhāyi. Tasmiṃ tamhā jhānā brahmacariyā cavite yathā taṃ sakkena patthitaṃ,
analyzed: jhānam antaradhāyi tasmin tamhā jhānā brahmacariyā cavite yathā tam sakkena patthitam

original: tatheva ahosi. Atha sakkassa patthanāya samiddhabhāvaṃ viditvā sā devakaññā tositā,
analyzed: tathā iva ahosi atha sakkassa patthanāya samiddha bhāvam viditvā sā deva kaññā tositā

original: tassa tena brahmacariyavināsena sañjanitapītipāmojjāti attho.
analyzed: tassa tena brahmacariya vināsena sañjanita pīti pāmojjā ati attho

original: Manasā agamāti sā taṃ āliṅgitvā ṭhitā “aho vata sakko pallaṅkaṃ me peseyyā”ti evaṃ
analyzed: manasā agamā ati sā tam āliṅgitvā ṭhitā aho vata sakko pallaṅkam me peseyya ati evam

analyzed: pavattena manasā indam agamā nandane vane iti nandi janana samattha tāya nandana vana saṅkhāte

original: tāvatiṃsabhavane vasantaṃ. Devakuñjaroti devaseṭṭho. Pahiṇīti pesesi. “Pāhiṇī”tipi
analyzed: tāvatiṃsa bhavane vasantam deva kuñjaro ti deva seṭṭhaḥ pahiṇī iti pesesi

original: pāṭho. Sopavāhananti saparivāraṃ. Sauttaracchadapaññāsanti paññāsāya uttaracchadehi
analyzed: sa upavāhananti sa parivāram sa uttaracchada paññāsanti paññāsāyaḥ uttaracchadehi

original: paṭicchāditaṃ. Sahassapaṭiyatthatanti sahassadibbakojavatthataṃ. Tamenaṃ tatthāti
analyzed: paṭicchāditam sahassa paṭiyatthatanti sahassa dibba kojava tthatam tam enam tattha ati

original: taṃ isisiṅgaṃ tattha dibbapallaṅke nisinnā sā ure katvā dhāresi. Tīṇi vassānīti ekamuhuttaṃ
analyzed: tam isisiṅgam tattha dibba pallaṅke nisinnā sā ure katvā dhāresi tīṇi vassāni iti eka muhuttam

original: viya manussagaṇanāya tīṇi vassāni taṃ ure nipajjāpetvā tattha nisinnā dhāresi.
analyzed: viya manussa gaṇanāya tīṇi vassāni tam tattha nisinnā dhāresi

original: Vimadoti nimmado vigatasaññabhāvo. So hi tīṇi saṃvaccharāni visañño sayitvā pacchā
analyzed: vimado ti nimmadaḥ vigata sañña bhāvo so hi tīṇi saṃvaccharāni visaññaḥ sayitvā pacchā

original: paṭiladdhasañño pabujjhi. Tasmiṃ pabujjhamāne hatthādiphandanaṃ disvāva alambusā

original: tassa pabujjhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā pallaṅkaṃ antaradhāpetvā sayampi antarahitā aṭṭhāsi.

original: Addasāsīti so assamapadaṃ olokento “kena nu khomhi sīlavināsaṃ pāpito”ti cintetvā
analyzed: addasāsi iti saḥ assama padam olokento kena nu kho mhi sīla vināsam pāpito ti cintetvā

original: mahantena saddena paridevamāno addasāsi. Haritarukkheti aggiyāyanasaṅkhātaṃ aggisālaṃ

original: samantā parivāretvā ṭhite haritapattarukkhe. Navapattavananti taruṇehi navapattehi
analyzed: samantā parivāretvā ṭhite harita patta rukkhe taruṇehi nava pattehi

original: sañchannaṃ vanaṃ. Rudanti paridevanto.
analyzed: sañchannam vanam rudanti paridevantaḥ

original: Na juhe na jape manteti ayamassa paridevanagāthā. Pahāpitanti hāpitaṃ, pa-kāro upasaggamattaṃ.
analyzed: na juhe na jape mantā iti ayam assa paridevana gāthā pahāpitam ti hāpitam pakāraḥ upasagga mattam

original: Pāricariyāyāti ko nu kilesapāricariyāya ito pubbe mama cittaṃ palobhayīti paridevati.
analyzed: pāricariyāya ati kaḥ nu kilesa pāricariyāya itas pubbe mama cittam palobhayi iti paridevati

original: Yo me tejā ha sambhutanti ha-kāro nipātamattaṃ. Yo mama samaṇatejena sambhūtaṃ jhānaguṇaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ me hakāraḥ nipāta mattam yaḥ mama samaṇa tejena sambhūtam jhāna guṇam

original: nānāratanaparipuṇṇaṃ mahantaṃ mahaṇṇave nāvaṃ viya gaṇhi, vināsaṃ pāpesi, ko nāmesoti paridevatīti.
analyzed: nānā ratana paripuṇṇam mahantam nāvam viya gaṇhi vināsam pāpesi kaḥ nāma isaḥ iti paridevati iti

original: Taṃ sutvā alambusā cintesi – “sacāhaṃ na kathessāmi, ayaṃ me abhisapissati, handassa kathessāmī”ti. Sā dissamānena kāyena ṭhatvā gāthamāha –
analyzed: tam sutvā alambusā cintesi sacā aham na kathessāmi ayam me abhisapissati handassa kathessāmi iti sā dissamānena kāyena ṭhatvā gātham āha

original: “Ahaṃ te pāricariyāya, devarājena pesitā;
analyzed: aham te pāricariyāya devarājena pesitā

original: Avadhiṃ cittaṃ cittena, pamādo tvaṃ na bujjhasī”ti.
analyzed: avadhim cittam cittena pamādaḥ tvam na bujjhasi iti

original: So tassā kathaṃ sutvā pitarā dinnaovādaṃ saritvā “pitu vacanaṃ akatvā mahāvināsaṃ pattomhī”ti paridevanto catasso gāthāyo abhāsi –
analyzed: saḥ tassā katham sutvā pitarā dinnaovādam saritvā pitu vacanam a katvā mahā vināsam patto mhi iti paridevantaḥ catassaḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsi

original: “Imāni kira maṃ tāto, kassapo anusāsati;
analyzed: imāni kira mama tātaḥ kassapaḥ anusāsati

original: Kamalāsadisitthiyo, tāyo bujjhesi māṇava.
analyzed: kamalā sadisā itthiyaḥ tāyaḥ bujjhesi māṇava

original: “Uregaṇḍāyo bujjhesi, tāyo bujjhesi māṇava;
analyzed: uregaṇḍāyaḥ bujjhesi tāyaḥ bujjhesi māṇava

original: Iccānusāsi maṃ tāto, yathā maṃ anukampako.
analyzed: mam tātaḥ yathā mam anukampakaḥ

original: “Tassāhaṃ vacanaṃ nākaṃ, pitu vuddhassa sāsanaṃ;
analyzed: tassa aham vacanam nākam pitu vuddhassa sāsanam

original: Araññe nimmanussamhi, svajja jhāyāmi ekako.
analyzed: araññe nimmanussamhi svajja jhāyāmi ekakaḥ

original: “Sohaṃ tathā karissāmi, dhiratthu jīvitena me;
analyzed: sā uham tathā karissāmi jīvitena me

analyzed: puna vā tādisaḥ hessam maraṇam me bhavissati iti

original: Tattha imānīti imāni vacanāni. Kamalāsadisitthiyoti kamalā vuccati nāripupphalatā,
analyzed: tattha imāni iti imāni vacanāni kamalā sadisa itthiyaḥ ti kamalā vuccati nāri puppha latā

original: tāsaṃ pupphasadisā itthiyo. Tāyo bujjhesi māṇavāti māṇava tvaṃ tāyo jāneyyāsi, ñatvā
analyzed: tāsam puppha sadisāḥ itthiyaḥ tāyaḥ bujjhesi māṇava ati māṇava tvam tāyaḥ jāneyyāsi ñatvā

original: dassanapathaṃ agantvā palāpeyyāsīti yāni evarūpāni vacanāni tadā maṃ tāto anusāsati,

original: imāni kira tānīti. Uregaṇḍāyoti uramhi dvīhi gaṇḍehi samannāgatā. Tāyo bujjhesi,
analyzed: imāni kira tāni iti uregaṇḍāya iti uramhi dvīhi gaṇḍehi samannāgatā tāyaḥ bujjhesi

original: māṇavāti, māṇava, tāyo attano vasaṃ gate vināsaṃ pāpentīti tvaṃ jāneyyāsi. Nākanti

analyzed: āḷāraḥ nāga bhavane eka vassam vasitvā dibba kāme paribhuñjitvā icchāmaham samma pabbajitunti

original: nāgarājassa kathetvā pabbajitaparikkhāre gahetvā nāgabhavanato himavantappadesaṃ
analyzed: nāga rājassa kathetvā pabbajita parikkhāre gahetvā nāga bhavanataḥ himavanta ppadesam

original: gantvā pabbajitvā tattha ciraṃ vasitvā aparabhāge cārikaṃ caranto bārāṇasiṃ patvā
analyzed: gantvā pabbajitvā tattha ciram vasitvā aparabhāge cārikam carantaḥ bārāṇasim patvā

original: rājuyyāne vasitvā punadivase bhikkhāya nagaraṃ pavisitvā rājadvāraṃ agamāsi. Atha
analyzed: rāja uyyāne vasitvā puna divase bhikkhāya nagaram pavisitvā rājadvāram agamāsi atha

original: naṃ bārāṇasirājā disvā iriyāpathe pasīditvā pakkosāpetvā paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā
analyzed: nam bārāṇasi rājā disvā iriyāpathe pasīditvā pakkosāpetvā paññatta āsane nisīdāpetvā

original: nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhojetvā aññatarasmiṃ nīce āsane nisinno vanditvā tena saddhiṃ
analyzed: nānagga rasa bhojanam bhojetvā aññatarasmin nīce āsane nisinnaḥ vanditvā tena saddhim

original: sallapanto paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
analyzed: paṭhamam gātham āha

original: “Ariyāvakāsosi pasannanetto, maññe bhavaṃ pabbajito kulamhā;
analyzed: ariya avakāso asi pasanna nettaḥ maññe bhavam pabbajitaḥ kulamhā

original: Kathaṃ nu vittāni pahāya bhoge, pabbaji nikkhamma gharā sapaññā”ti.
analyzed: katham nu vittāni pahāya bhoge pabbaji nikkhamma gharā sa paññā ati

original: Tattha ariyāvakāsosīti niddosasundarasarīrāvakāsosi, abhirūposīti attho. Pasannanettoti
analyzed: tattha ariya avakāso asi iti niddosa sundara sarīra avakāso asi abhirūpaḥ usi iti attho pasanna netto ti

original: pañcahi pasādehi yuttanetto. Kulamhāti khattiyakulā vā brāhmaṇakulā vā seṭṭhikulā
analyzed: pañcahi pasādehi kulamhā ati khattiya kulā vā brāhmaṇa kulā vā seṭṭhi kulā

original: vā pabbajitosīti maññāmi. Kathaṃ nūti kena kāraṇena kiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā dhanañca
analyzed: vā pabbajito asi iti maññāmi katham nu iti kena kāraṇena kim ārammaṇam katvā dhanam ca

original: upabhoge ca pahāya gharā nikkhamitvā pabbajitosi sapañña paṇḍitapurisāti pucchati.
analyzed: upabhoge ca pahāya gharā nikkhamitvā pabbajitaḥ asi sa pañña paṇḍita purisa ati pucchati

original: Tato paraṃ tāpasassa ca rañño ca vacanappaṭivacanavasena gāthānaṃ sambandho veditabbo –
analyzed: tato param tāpasassa ca rañño ca vacana paṭivacana vasena gāthānam sambandhaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: “Sayaṃ vimānaṃ naradeva disvā, mahānubhāvassa mahoragassa;
analyzed: sayam vimānam naradeva disvā mahā anubhāvassa mahā uragassa

original: Disvāna puññāna mahāvipākaṃ, saddhāyahaṃ pabbajitomhi rāja.
analyzed: disvāna puññāna mahā vipākam saddhā ayam aham pabbajitaḥ amhi rāja

original: “Na kāmakāmā na bhayā na dosā, vācaṃ musā pabbajitā bhaṇanti;
analyzed: na kāma kāmāḥ na bhayāḥ na dosāḥ vācam musā pabbajitāḥ bhaṇanti

original: Akkhāhi me pucchito etamatthaṃ, sutvāna me jāyihitippasādo.
analyzed: akkhāhi me pucchitaḥ etam attham sutvāna me

original: “Vāṇijja raṭṭhādhipa gacchamāno, pathe addasāsimhi bhojaputte;
analyzed: vāṇijja raṭṭha adhipa gacchamāno pathe addasā asimhi bhoja putte

original: Pavaḍḍhakāyaṃ uragaṃ mahantaṃ, ādāya gacchante pamodamāne.
analyzed: pavaḍḍha kāyam uragam mahantam ādāya gacchante pamodamāne

original: “Sohaṃ samāgamma janinda tehi, pahaṭṭhalomo avacamhi bhīto;
analyzed: saḥ aham samāgamma janinda tehi pahaṭṭha lomaḥ bhīto

original: Kuhiṃ ayaṃ nīyati bhīmakāyo, nāgena kiṃ kāhatha bhojaputtā.
analyzed: kuhim ayam bhīma kāyaḥ nāgena kim bhoja puttā

original: “Nāgo ayaṃ nīyati bhojanatthā, pavaḍḍhakāyo urago mahanto;
analyzed: nāgaḥ ayam nīyati bhojanatthā pavaḍḍha kāyaḥ uragaḥ mahanto

original: Sāduñca thūlañca muduñca maṃsaṃ, na tvaṃ rasaññāsi videhaputta.
analyzed: sādum ca thūlam ca mudum ca maṃsam na tvam rasaññā asi videha putta

original: “Ito mayaṃ gantvā sakaṃ niketaṃ, ādāya satthāni vikopayitvā;
analyzed: itas mayam gantvā sakam niketam ādāya satthāni vikopayitvā

original: Maṃsāni bhokkhāma pamodamānā, mayañhi ve sattavo pannagānaṃ.
analyzed: maṃsāni bhokkhāma pamodamānāḥ mayan hi ve sattavaḥ pannagānam

original: “Sace ayaṃ nīyati bhojanatthā, pavaḍḍhakāyo urago mahanto;
analyzed: sace ayam nīyati bhojanatthā pavaḍḍha kāyaḥ uragaḥ mahanto

original: Dadāmi vo balibaddāni soḷasa, nāgaṃ imaṃ muñcatha bandhanasmā.
analyzed: dadāmi vaḥ balibaddāni soḷasa nāgam imam muñcatha bandhanasmā

original: “Addhā hi no bhakkho ayaṃ manāpo, bahū ca no uragā bhuttapubbā;
analyzed: addhā hi naḥ bhakkhaḥ ayam manāpaḥ bahū ca naḥ uragāḥ bhutta pubbā

original: Karoma te taṃ vacanaṃ aḷāra, mittañca no hohi videhaputta.
analyzed: karoma te tam vacanam aḷāra mittam ca naḥ hohi videha putta

original: “Tadāssu te bandhanā mocayiṃsu, yaṃ natthuto paṭimokkassa pāse;
analyzed: te bandhanā mocayiṃsu yam natthu tassa paṭimokkassa pāse

original: Mutto ca so bandhanā nāgarājā, pakkāmi pācīnamukho muhuttaṃ.
analyzed: mutto ca saḥ bandhanā nāga rājā pakkāmi pācīnamukhaḥ muhuttam

original: “Gantvāna pācīnamukho muhuttaṃ, puṇṇehi nettehi palokayī maṃ;
analyzed: gantvāna pācīna mukhaḥ muhuttam puṇṇehi nettehi palokayī mam

original: Tadāssahaṃ piṭṭhito anvagacchiṃ, dasaṅguliṃ añjaliṃ paggahetvā.
analyzed: piṭṭhitaḥ anvagacchim dasa aṅgulim añjalim paggahetvā

original: “Gaccheva kho tvaṃ taramānarūpo, mā taṃ amittā punaraggahesuṃ;
analyzed: gaccha iva khalu tvam taramāna rūpaḥ mā tam amittāḥ punar aggahesum

original: Dukkho hi luddehi punā samāgamo, adassanaṃ bhojaputtāna gaccha.
analyzed: dukkhaḥ hi luddehi punā samāgamaḥ adassanam bhoja puttāna gaccha

original: “Agamāsi so rahadaṃ vippasannaṃ, nīlobhāsaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ sutitthaṃ;
analyzed: agamāsi saḥ rahadam vippasannam nīla ubhāsam ramaṇīyam su tittham

original: Samotataṃ jambuhi vetasāhi, pāvekkhi nittiṇṇabhayo patīto.
analyzed: samotatam jambuhi vetasāhi nittiṇṇa bhayaḥ patītaḥ

original: “So taṃ pavissa nacirassa nāgo, dibbena me pāturahū janinda;
analyzed: saḥ tam pavissa nacirassa nāgaḥ dibbena me pāturahū janinda

original: Upaṭṭhahī maṃ pitaraṃva putto, hadayaṅgamaṃ kaṇṇasukhaṃ bhaṇanto.
analyzed: upaṭṭhahī mam pitaram va puttaḥ hadayaṅgamam kaṇṇa sukham bhaṇantaḥ

original: “Tvaṃ mesi mātā ca pitā aḷāra, abbhantaro pāṇadado sahāyo;
analyzed: tvam mā isi mātā ca pitā aḷāraḥ abbhantaraḥ pāṇadadaḥ sahāyaḥ

original: Sakañca iddhiṃ paṭilābhakosmi, aḷāra passa me nivesanāni;
analyzed: sakañca iddhim paṭilābhakaḥ asmi aḷāra passa me nivesanāni

original: Pahūtabhakkhaṃ bahuannapānaṃ, masakkasāraṃ viya vāsavassā”ti.
analyzed: pahūta bhakkham bahu anna pānam masakka sāram viya vāsavassa ati

original: Tattha vimānanti saṅkhapālanāgarañño anekasatanāṭakasampattisampannaṃ kañcanamaṇivimānaṃ.
analyzed: tattha vimānam ti saṅkhapāla nāga raññaḥ aneka sata nāṭaka sampatti sampannam kañcana maṇi vimānam

original: Puññānanti tena katapuññānaṃ mahantaṃ vipākaṃ disvā kammañca phalañca paralokañca
analyzed: puññānam ti tena kata puññānam mahantam vipākam disvā kammañca phalañca para lokañca

original: saddahitvā pavattāya saddhāya ahaṃ pabbajito. Na kāmakāmāti na vatthukāmenapi bhayenapi
analyzed: saddahitvā pavattāya saddhāya aham pabbajitaḥ na kāma kāma ati na vatthu kāmena api bhayena api

original: dosenapi musā bhaṇanti. Jāyihitīti, bhante, tumhākaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā mayhampi pasādo
analyzed: dosena api musā bhaṇanti bhante tumhākam vacanam sutvā mayhampi pasādaḥ

original: somanassaṃ jāyissati. Vāṇijjanti vāṇijjakammaṃ karissāmīti gacchanto. Pathe addasāsimhīti
analyzed: somanassam jāyissati vāṇijjanti vāṇijja kammam karissāmi iti gacchantaḥ pathe addasāsimhi iti

original: pañcannaṃ sakaṭasatānaṃ purato sukhayānake nisīditvā gacchanto mahāmagge janapadamanusse
analyzed: pañcannam sakaṭa satānam puratas sukha yānake nisīditvā gacchantaḥ mahā magge janapada manusse

original: addasaṃ. Pavaḍḍhakāyanti vaḍḍhitakāyaṃ. Ādāyāti aṭṭhahi kājehi gahetvā. Avacamhīti
analyzed: addasam pavaḍḍhakāyanti vaḍḍhita kāyam ādāya ati aṭṭhahi kājehi gahetvā avacamhi iti

original: abhāsiṃ. Bhīmakāyoti bhayajanakakāyo. Bhojaputtāti luddaputtake piyasamudācārenālapati.
analyzed: abhāsim bhīma kāyaḥ ti bhaya janaka kāyaḥ bhojaputta ati ludda puttake piya samudācārena alapati

original: Videhaputtāti videharaṭṭhavāsitāya āḷāraṃ ālapiṃsu. Vikopayitvāti chinditvā. Mayañhi
analyzed: videha puttā ati videha raṭṭha vāsitāya āḷāram vikopayitvā iti chinditvā mayan hi

original: vo sattavoti mayaṃ pana nāgānaṃ verino nāma. Bhojanatthāti bhojanatthāya. Mittañca
analyzed: vaḥ sattavaḥ ti mayam pana nāgānam verinaḥ nāma bhojanatthā ati bhojanatthāya mittam ca

original: no hohīti tvaṃ amhākaṃ mitto hohi, kataguṇaṃ jāna.
analyzed: no hohi iti tvam amhākam mittaḥ hohi kata guṇam jāna

original: Tadāssu teti, mahārāja, tehi bhojaputtehi evaṃ vutte ahaṃ tesaṃ soḷasa vāhagoṇe nivāsanapārupanāni
analyzed: tadā assu te iti mahā rāja tehi bhoja puttehi evam vutte aham tesam soḷasa vāha goṇe nivāsana pārupanāni

original: pasataṃ pasataṃ suvaṇṇamāsake bhariyānañca nesaṃ vatthālaṅkāraṃ adāsiṃ, atha te saṅkhapālanāgarājānaṃ
analyzed: pasatam pasatam suvaṇṇa māsake bhariyānam ca nesam vattha alaṅkāram adāsim atha te saṅkhapāla nāga rājānam

analyzed: bhūmiyam nipajjāpetvā attanaḥ kakkhaḷa tāya sa kaṇṭaka kāḷa vetta latāya koṭiyam gahetvā

analyzed: ākaḍḍhitum ārabhiṃsu atha aham nāga rājānam kilamantam disvā a kilamenta uva asinā

analyzed: nīharim tasmin kāle te bhoja puttāḥ yam bandhanam pavesetvā pāse paṭimokkam

analyzed: tasmai bandhanā tam uragam mocayiṃsu tassa nāsataḥ saha pāsena tam rajjukam nīhariṃsu iti
