analyzed: dīpeti iti te uragam vissajjetvā thokam gantvā ayam uragaḥ dubbalaḥ mata kāle

original: gahetvā gamissāmā”ti nilīyiṃsu.
analyzed: gahetvā gamissāma ati nilīyiṃsu

original: Puṇṇehīti sopi muhuttaṃ pācīnābhimukho gantvā assupuṇṇehi nettehi maṃ palokayi. Tadāssahanti
analyzed: puṇṇehi iti saḥ api muhuttam pācīna abhimukhaḥ gantvā assu puṇṇehi nettehi mama

original: tadā assa ahaṃ. Gacchevāti evaṃ taṃ avacanti vadati. Rahadanti kaṇṇaveṇṇadahaṃ. Samotatanti
analyzed: tadā assa aham gaccheva iti evam tam avacanti vadati kaṇṇa veṇṇa daham samotatanti

original: ubhayatīresu jamburukkhavetasarukkhehi otataṃ vitataṃ. Nittiṇṇabhayo patītoti so
analyzed: ubhaya tīresu jambu rukkha vetasa rukkhehi otatam vitatam nittiṇṇa bhayaḥ patītaḥ iti so

original: kira taṃ dahaṃ pavisanto āḷārassa nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā yāva naṅguṭṭhā otari, udake
analyzed: kira tam daham pavisantaḥ āḷārassa nipaccakāram dassetvā yāva naṅguṭṭhāḥ udake

original: paviṭṭhaṭṭhānamevassa nibbhayaṃ ahosi, tasmā nittiṇṇabhayo patīto haṭṭhatuṭṭho pāvekkhīti.
analyzed: paviṭṭha ṭṭhānam eva assa nibbhayam ahosi tasmā nittiṇṇa bhayaḥ patītaḥ haṭṭha tuṭṭhaḥ pāvekkhi iti

original: Pavissāti pavisitvā. Dibbena meti nāgabhavane pamādaṃ anāpajjitvā mayi kaṇṇaveṇṇatīraṃ
analyzed: pavissāti pavisitvā dibbena mā iti nāga bhavane pamādam an āpajjitvā mayi kaṇṇa veṇṇa tīram

original: anatikkanteyeva dibbena parivārena mama purato pāturahosi. Upaṭṭhahīti upāgami. Abbhantaroti
analyzed: an atikkantā iya iva dibbena parivārena mama puratas pāturahosi upaṭṭhahi iti upāgami abbhantarā uti

original: hadayamaṃsasadiso. Tvaṃ mama bahupakāro, sakkāraṃ te karissāmi. Passa me nivesanānīti
analyzed: hadayam aṃsa sadisaḥ tvam mama bahu pakāro sakkāram te karissāmi passa me nivesanāni iti

original: mama nāgabhavanaṃ passa. Masakkasāraṃ viyāti masakkasāro vuccati osakkanaparisakkanābhāvena
analyzed: mama nāga bhavanam passa masakka sāram viyā ati masakka sāraḥ vuccati osakkana parisakkanā bhāvena

original: ghanasāratāya ca sinerupabbatarājā. Ayaṃ tattha māpitaṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ sandhāyevamāha.
analyzed: ghanasāratāya ca sineru pabbata rājā ayam tattha māpitam tāvatiṃsa bhavanam sandhāya ivam āha

original: Mahārāja! Evaṃ vatvā so nāgarājā uttari attano nāgabhavanaṃ vaṇṇento gāthādvayamāha –
analyzed: mahā rājaḥ evam vatvā saḥ nāga rājā uttari attanaḥ nāga bhavanam vaṇṇentaḥ gāthā dvayam āha

original: “Taṃ bhūmibhāgehi upetarūpaṃ, asakkharā ceva mudū subhā ca;
analyzed: tam bhūmi bhāgehi upeta rūpam asakkharā ca iva mudū subhā ca

original: Nīcattiṇā apparajā ca bhūmi, pāsādikā yattha jahanti sokaṃ.
analyzed: nīcattiṇā apparajā ca bhūmi pāsādikāḥ yattha jahanti sokam

original: “Anāvakulā veḷuriyūpanīlā, catuddisaṃ ambavanaṃ surammaṃ;
analyzed: catuddisam ambavanam su rammam

original: Pakkā ca pesī ca phalā suphullā, niccotukā dhārayantī phalānī”ti.
analyzed: pakkā ca pesī ca phalā su phullā niccotukā dhārayantī phalāni iti

original: Tattha asakkharāti yā tattha bhūmi pāsāṇasakkhararahitā mudu subhā kañcanarajatamaṇimayā
analyzed: tattha asakkharā ti yā tattha bhūmi pāsāṇa sakkhara rahitā subhā kañcana rajata maṇi mayā

original: sattaratanavālukākiṇṇā. Nīcattiṇāti indagopakapiṭṭhisadisavaṇṇehi nīcatiṇehi samannāgatā.
analyzed: satta ratana vālukā kiṇṇā nīca tiṇā ati inda gopaka piṭṭhi sadisa vaṇṇehi nīca tiṇehi samannāgatā

original: Apparajāti paṃsurahitā. Yattha jahanti sokanti yattha paviṭṭhamattāva nissokā honti.
analyzed: apparajāti yattha jahanti yattha nissokāḥ honti

original: Anāvakulāti na avakulā akhāṇumā upari ukkulavikulabhāvarahitā vā samasaṇṭhitā. Veḷuriyūpanīlāti
analyzed: na avakulā upari ukkula vikula bhāva rahitā vā sama saṇṭhitā

original: veḷuriyena upanīlā, tasmiṃ nāgabhavane veḷuriyamayā pasannasalilā nīlobhāsā anekavaṇṇakamaluppalasañchannā
analyzed: veḷuriyena upanīlā tasmim nāga bhavane veḷuriya mayā pasanna salilā nīla ubhāsā aneka vaṇṇa kamala uppala sañchannā

original: pokkharaṇīti attho. Catuddisanti tassā pokkharaṇiyā catūsu disāsu. Pakkā cāti tasmiṃ
analyzed: pokkharaṇī iti attho catuddisanti tassā pokkharaṇiyā catūsu disāsu pakkā ca ati tasmin

original: ambavane ambarukkhā pakkaphalā ca aḍḍhapakkaphalā ca taruṇaphalā ca phullitāyevāti
analyzed: amba vane amba rukkhā pakka phalā ca aḍḍha pakka phalā ca taruṇa phalā ca phullitāya iva ati

original: attho. Niccotukāti channampi utūnaṃ anurūpehi pupphaphalehi samannāgatāti.
analyzed: attho niccotukā ti channam pi utūnam anurūpehi puppha phalehi samannāgatā ti

original: Tesaṃ vanānaṃ naradeva majjhe, nivesanaṃ bhassarasannikāsaṃ;
analyzed: tesam vanānam naradeva majjhe nivesanam bhassara sannikāsam

original: Rajataggaḷaṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ uḷāraṃ, obhāsatī vijjurivantalikkhe.
analyzed: rajataggaḷam sovaṇṇa mayam uḷāram obhāsatī

original: “Maṇīmayā soṇṇamayā uḷārā, anekacittā satataṃ sunimmitā;
analyzed: maṇī mayā soṇṇa mayā uḷārā aneka cittā satatam su nimmitā

original: Paripūrā kaññāhi alaṅkatāhi, suvaṇṇakāyūradharāhi rāja.
analyzed: paripūrā kaññāhi alaṅkatāhi suvaṇṇa kāyūra dharāhi rāja

original: “So saṅkhapālo taramānarūpo, pāsādamāruyha anomavaṇṇo;
analyzed: saḥ saṅkha pālaḥ taramāna rūpaḥ pāsādam āruyha anoma vaṇṇaḥ

original: Sahassathambhaṃ atulānubhāvaṃ, yatthassa bhariyā mahesī ahosi.
analyzed: sahassa thambham atula anubhāvam yattha assa bhariyā mahesī ahosi

original: “Ekā ca nārī taramānarūpā, ādāya veḷuriyamayaṃ mahagghaṃ;
analyzed: ekā ca nārī taramāna rūpā ādāya veḷuriya mayam mahaggham

original: Subhaṃ maṇiṃ jātimantūpapannaṃ, acoditā āsanamabbhihāsi.
analyzed: subham maṇim jātimantu upapannam a coditā āsanam abbhihāsi

original: “Tato maṃ urago hatthe gahetvā, nisīdayī pāmukhaāsanasmiṃ;
analyzed: tatas mam uragaḥ hatthe gahetvā nisīdayī

original: Idamāsanaṃ atra bhavaṃ nisīdatu, bhavañhi me aññataro garūnaṃ.
analyzed: idam āsanam atra bhavam nisīdatu bhavan hi me aññataraḥ

original: “Aññā ca nārī taramānarūpā, ādāya vāriṃ upasaṅkamitvā;
analyzed: aññā ca nārī taramāna rūpā ādāya vārim upasaṅkamitvā

original: Pādāni pakkhālayī me janinda, bhariyāva bhattū patino piyassa.
analyzed: pādāni me janinda bhariyāva bhattū patinaḥ piyassa

original: “Aparā ca nārī taramānarūpā, paggayha sovaṇṇamayāya pātiyā;
analyzed: aparā ca nārī taramāna rūpā paggayha sovaṇṇa mayāya pātiyā

original: Anekasūpaṃ vividhaṃ viyañjanaṃ, upanāmayī bhatta manuññarūpaṃ.
analyzed: aneka sūpam vividham viyañjanam upanāmayī bhatta manuñña rūpam

original: “Turiyehi maṃ bhārata bhuttavantaṃ, upaṭṭhahuṃ bhattu mano viditvā;
analyzed: turiyehi mam bhārata bhuttavantam upaṭṭhahum bhattu manaḥ viditvā

original: Tatuttariṃ maṃ nipatī mahantaṃ, dibbehi kāmehi anappakehī”ti.
analyzed: tatuttarim mam nipatī mahantam dibbehi kāmehi anappakehi iti

original: Tattha nivesananti pāsādo. Bhassarasannikāsanti pabhassaradassanaṃ. Rajataggaḷanti
analyzed: tattha nivesananti pāsādaḥ bhassara sannikāsanti pabhassara dassanam rajataggaḷanti

original: rajatadvārakavāṭaṃ. Maṇīmayāti evarūpā tattha kūṭāgārā ca gabbhā ca. Paripūrāti sampuṇṇā.
analyzed: rajata dvāra kavāṭam evarūpā tattha kūṭāgārā ca gabbhā ca sampuṇṇā

original: So saṅkhapāloti, mahārāja, ahaṃ evaṃ tasmiṃ nāgabhavanaṃ vaṇṇente taṃ daṭṭhukāmo
analyzed: saḥ saṅkhapālaḥ iti mahā rāja aham evam tasmin nāga bhavanam vaṇṇente tam daṭṭhu kāmo

original: ahosiṃ, atha maṃ tattha netvā so saṅkhapālo hatthe gahetvā taramāno veḷuriyathambhehi
analyzed: ahosim atha mam tattha netvā saḥ saṅkha pālaḥ hatthe gahetvā taramānaḥ veḷuriya thambhehi

original: sahassathambhaṃ pāsādaṃ āruyha yasmiṃ ṭhāne assa mahesī ahosi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ netīti
analyzed: sahassa thambham pāsādam āruyha yasmin ṭhāne assa mahesī ahosi tam ṭhānam neti iti

original: dīpeti. Ekā cāti mayi pāsādaṃ abhiruḷhe ekā itthī aññehi maṇīhi jātimahantehi upetaṃ
analyzed: dīpeti ekā ca ati mayi pāsādam abhiruḷhe ekā itthī aññehi maṇīhi jāti mahantehi upetam

original: subhaṃ veḷuriyāsanaṃ tena nāgarājena avuttāva. Abbhihāsīti abhihari, attharīti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: subham veḷuriya āsanam tena nāga rājena abbhihāsī iti abhihari atthari iti vuttam hoti

original: Pāmukhaāsanasminti pamukhāsanasmiṃ, uttamāsane nisīdāpesīti attho. Garūnanti mātāpitūnaṃ
analyzed: pāmukha āsanasmin ti pamukha āsanasmin uttama āsane atthaḥ garūnam ti mātā pitūnam

original: me tvaṃ aññataroti evaṃ vatvā nisīdāpesi. Vividhaṃ viyañjananti vividhaṃ byañjanaṃ.
analyzed: me tvam aññatarā ti evam vatvā nisīda apesi vividham viyañjananti vividham byañjanam

original: Bhatta manuññarūpanti bhattaṃ manuññarūpaṃ. Bhāratāti rājānaṃ ālapati. Bhuttavantanti
analyzed: bhatta manuñña rūpam ti bhattam manuñña rūpam bhārata ati rājānam ālapati bhuttavantam ti

original: bhuttāviṃ katabhattakiccaṃ. Upaṭṭhahunti anekasatehi turiyehi gandhabbaṃ kurumānā
analyzed: bhutta avim kata bhatta kiccam upaṭṭhahunti aneka satehi turiyehi gandhabbam kurumānāḥ

original: upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Bhattu mano viditvāti attano patino cittaṃ jānitvā. Tatuttarinti tato
analyzed: upaṭṭhahiṃsu bhattu manaḥ viditvā ati attanaḥ patino cittam jānitvā tato

original: gandhabbakaraṇato uttariṃ. Maṃ nipatīti so nāgarājā maṃ upasaṅkami. Mahantaṃ dibbehīti
analyzed: gandhabba karaṇataḥ uttarim mam nipati iti saḥ nāga rājā mam upasaṅkami mahantam dibbehi iti

original: mahantehi uḷārehi dibbehi kāmehi tehi ca anappakehi.
analyzed: mahantehi uḷārehi dibbehi kāmehi tehi ca anappakehi

original: Evaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ca pana gāthamāha –
analyzed: evam upasaṅkamitvā ca pana gātham āha

original: “Bhariyā mametā tisatā aḷāra, sabbattamajjhā padumuttarābhā;
analyzed: bhariyā mametā tisatā aḷāra padumuttara ābhā

original: Aḷāra etāssu te kāmakārā, dadāmi te tā paricārayassū”ti.
analyzed: aḷāre etāssu te kāmakārāḥ dadāmi te tā paricārayassu iti

original: Tattha sabbattamajjhāti sabbā attamajjhā, pāṇinā gahitappamāṇamajjhāti attho. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: tattha sabbattamajjhā iti sabbā attamajjhā pāṇinā gahita ppamāṇamajjhā iti atthaḥ aṭṭhakathāyam

original: pana “sumajjhā”ti pāṭho. Padumuttarābhāti padumavaṇṇauttarābhā, padumavaṇṇauttaracchaviyoti
analyzed: pana sumajjhā iti pāṭho padumuttarābhā ati padumavaṇṇā auttarābhā

original: attho. Paricārayassūti tā attano pādaparicārikā karohīti vatvā tīhi itthisatehi saddhiṃ
analyzed: attho paricārayassu iti tāḥ attano pāda paricārikā karohi iti vatvā tīhi itthi satehi saddhiṃ

original: mahāsampattiṃ mayhaṃ adāsi.
analyzed: mahā sampattim mayham adāsi

original: So āha –
analyzed: sā u āha

original: “Saṃvaccharaṃ dibbarasānubhutvā, tadāssuhaṃ uttarimajjhabhāsiṃ;
analyzed: saṃvaccharam uttari majjha bhāsim

original: Nāgassidaṃ kinti kathañca laddhaṃ, kathajjhagamāsi vimānaseṭṭhaṃ.
analyzed: kinti kathan ca laddham vimāna seṭṭham

original: “Adhiccaladdhaṃ pariṇāmajaṃ te, sayaṃkataṃ udāhu devehi dinnaṃ;
analyzed: pariṇāma jam te sayaṃkatam udāhu devehi dinnam

original: Pucchāmi taṃ nāgarājetamatthaṃ, kathajjhagamāsi vimānaseṭṭha”nti.
analyzed: pucchāmi tam nāga rāja itam attham kathajjhagamāsi vimānaseṭṭhanti

original: Tattha dibbarasānubhutvāti dibbe kāmaguṇarase anubhavitvā. Tadāssuhanti tadā assu
analyzed: tattha dibba rasa anubhutvā iti dibbe kāma guṇa rase anubhavitvā tadā

original: ahaṃ. Nāgassidanti bhadramukhassa saṅkhapālanāgarājassa idaṃ sampattijātaṃ kinti
analyzed: aham bhadramukhassa saṅkhapāla nāga rājassa idam sampatti jātam kinti

original: kiṃ nāma kammaṃ katvā kathañca katvā laddhaṃ, kathametaṃ vimānaseṭṭhaṃ tvaṃ ajjhagamāsi,
analyzed: kim nāma kammam katvā kathañca katvā laddham katham etam vimāna seṭṭham tvam ajjhagamāsi

original: iti naṃ ahaṃ pucchiṃ. Adhiccaladdhanti ahetunā laddhaṃ. Pariṇāmajaṃ teti kenaci tava
analyzed: iti nam aham pucchim ahetunā laddham pariṇāma jam te iti kenacid tava

original: atthāya pariṇāmitattā pariṇāmato jātaṃ. Sayaṃkatanti kārake pakkosāpetvā ratanāni datvā kāritanti.
analyzed: atthāya pariṇāmita ttā pariṇāmataḥ jātam sayaṃkatanti kārake pakkosāpetvā ratanāni da tvā kāritanti

original: Tato parā dvinnampi vacanappaṭivacanagāthāva –
analyzed: tato parā

original: “Nādhiccaladdhaṃ na pariṇāmajaṃ me, na sayaṃkataṃ nāpi devehi dinnaṃ;
analyzed: na adhicca laddham na pariṇāma jam me na sayaṃkatam na api deva ihi dinnam

original: Sakehi kammehi apāpakehi, puññehi me laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ.
analyzed: sakehi kammehi a pāpakehi puññehi me laddham idam vimānam

original: “Kiṃ te vataṃ kiṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, kissa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
analyzed: kim te vatam kim pana brahmacariyam kissa su ciṇṇassa ayam vipākaḥ

original: Akkhāhi me nāgarājetamatthaṃ, kathaṃ nu te laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ.
analyzed: akkhāhi me nāga rāja itam attham katham nu te laddham idam vimānam

original: “Rājā ahosiṃ magadhānamissaro, duyyodhano nāma mahānubhāvo;
analyzed: rājā ahosim magadhānamissaraḥ duyyodhanaḥ nāma mahā anubhāvaḥ

original: So ittaraṃ jīvitaṃ saṃviditvā, asassataṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ.
analyzed: saḥ ittaram jīvitam saṃviditvā a sassatam vipariṇāma dhammam

original: “Annañca pānañca pasannacitto, sakkacca dānaṃ vipulaṃ adāsiṃ;
analyzed: annam ca pānam ca pasanna cittaḥ sakkacca dānam vipulam adāsim

original: Opānabhūtaṃ me gharaṃ tadāsi, santappitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca.
analyzed: opāna bhūtam me gharam santappitā samaṇa brāhmaṇā ca

original: “Mālañca gandhañca vilepanañca, padīpiyaṃ yānamupassayañca;
analyzed: mālañca gandhañca vilepanañca padīpiyam yānam upassayañca

original: Acchādanaṃ sayanamathannapānaṃ, sakkacca dānāni adamha tattha.
analyzed: acchādanam sayanam athanna pānam sakkacca dānāni adamha tattha

original: “Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, tassa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
analyzed: tam me vatam tam pana brahmacariyam tassa su ciṇṇassa ayam vipāko

original: Teneva me laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ, pahūtabhakkhaṃ bahuannapānaṃ;
analyzed: tena iva me laddham idam vimānam pahūta bhakkham bahu anna pānam

original: Naccehi gītehi cupetarūpaṃ, ciraṭṭhitikaṃ na ca sassatāyaṃ.
analyzed: naccehi gītehi cupeta rūpam cira ṭṭhitikam na ca

original: “Appānubhāvā taṃ mahānubhāvaṃ, tejassinaṃ hanti atejavanto;
analyzed: tam mahā anubhāvam tejassinam hanti a tejavantaḥ

original: Kimeva dāṭhāvudha kiṃ paṭicca, hatthattamāgacchi vanibbakānaṃ.
analyzed: kim eva dāṭhāvudha kim paṭicca hatthattam āgacchi vanibbakānam

original: “Bhayaṃ nu te anvagataṃ mahantaṃ, tejo nu te nānvagaṃ dantamūlaṃ;
analyzed: bhayam nu te anvagatam mahantam tejaḥ nu te na anvagam danta mūlam

original: Kimeva dāṭhāvudha kiṃ paṭicca, kilesamāpajji vanibbakānaṃ.
analyzed: kim eva dāṭhāvudha kim paṭicca kilesam āpajji

original: “Na me bhayaṃ anvagataṃ mahantaṃ, tejo na sakkā mama tehi hantuṃ;
analyzed: na me bhayam anvagatam mahantam tejaḥ na sakkā mama tehi hantum

original: Satañca dhammāni sukittitāni, samuddavelāva duraccayāni.
analyzed: satañca dhammāni su kittitāni samudda velā va duraccayāni

original: “Cātuddasiṃ pañcadasiṃ aḷāra, uposathaṃ niccamupāvasāmi;
analyzed: cātuddasim pañcadasim aḷāre uposatham niccam upāvasāmi

original: Athāgamuṃ soḷasa bhojaputtā, rajjuṃ gahetvāna daḷhañca pāsaṃ.
analyzed: atha agamum soḷasa bhoja puttāḥ rajjum gahetvāna daḷham ca pāsam

original: “Bhetvāna nāsaṃ atikassa rajjuṃ, nayiṃsu maṃ samparigayha luddā;
analyzed: bhetvāna nāsam atikassa rajjum nayiṃsu mam samparigayha luddā

original: Etādisaṃ dukkhamahaṃ titikkhaṃ, uposathaṃ appaṭikopayanto.
analyzed: etādisam dukkham aham titikkham uposatham a paṭikopayantaḥ

original: “Ekāyane taṃ pathe addasaṃsu, balena vaṇṇena cupetarūpaṃ;
analyzed: eka ayane tam pathe addasaṃsu balena vaṇṇena cupeta rūpam

original: Siriyā paññāya ca bhāvitosi, kiṃ patthayaṃ nāga tapo karosi.
analyzed: siriyā paññāya ca bhāvitosi kim patthayam nāga tapo karosi

original: “Na puttahetū na dhanassa hetū, na āyuno cāpi aḷāra hetu;
analyzed: na putta hetū na dhanassa hetū na āyuno ca api aḷāra hetu

original: Manussayoniṃ abhipatthayāno, tasmā parakkama tapo karomi.
analyzed: manussa yonim abhipatthayānaḥ tasmai parakkama tapaḥ karomi

original: “Tvaṃ lohitakkho vihatantaraṃso, alaṅkato kappitakesamassu;
analyzed: tvam lohitakkhaḥ vihatanta raṃsaḥ alaṅkataḥ kappita kesa massu

original: Surosito lohitacandanena, gandhabbarājāva disā pabhāsasi.
analyzed: surā usitaḥ lohita candanena gandhabbarājā ava disā pabhāsasi

original: “Deviddhipattosi mahānubhāvo, sabbehi kāmehi samaṅgibhūto;
analyzed: deviddhipatto asi mahā anubhāvaḥ sabbehi kāmehi samaṅgi bhūtaḥ

original: Pucchāmi taṃ nāgarājetamatthaṃ, seyyo ito kena manussaloko.
analyzed: pucchāmi tam nāga rāja itamattham itas kena manussa lokaḥ

original: “Aḷāra nāññatra manussalokā, suddhīva saṃvijjati saṃyamo vā;
analyzed: aḷāra na aññatra manussa lokā suddhī iva saṃvijjati saṃyamaḥ vā

original: Ahañca laddhāna manussayoniṃ, kāhāmi jātimaraṇassa antaṃ.
analyzed: aham ca manussa yonim jāti maraṇassa antam

original: “Saṃvaccharo me vasato tavantike, annena pānena upaṭṭhitosmi;
analyzed: saṃvaccharaḥ me vasato tava antike annena pānena upaṭṭhitaḥ asmi

original: Āmantayitvāna palemi nāga, cirappavuṭṭhosmi ahaṃ janinda.
analyzed: āmantayitvāna nāga cira ppavuṭṭhaḥ asmi aham janinda

original: “Puttā ca dārā anujīvino ca, niccānusiṭṭhā upatiṭṭhathetaṃ;
analyzed: puttā ca dārā anujīvino ca nicca anusiṭṭhāḥ upatiṭṭhatha itam

original: Kaccinnu taṃ nābhisapittha koci, piyañhi me dassanaṃ tuyhaṃ aḷāra.
analyzed: kaccit nu tam na abhisapittha koci piyam hi me dassanam tuyham aḷāra

original: “Yathāpi mātū ca pitū agāre, putto piyo paṭivihito vaseyya;
analyzed: yathā api mātū ca pitū agāre putto piyaḥ paṭivihitaḥ vaseyya

original: Tatopi mayhaṃ idhameva seyyo, cittañhi te nāga mayī pasannaṃ.
analyzed: tatas api mayham cittam hi te nāga mayī pasannam

original: “Maṇī mamaṃ vijjati lohitaṅko, dhanāharo maṇiratanaṃ uḷāraṃ;
analyzed: maṇī vijjati lohitaṅkaḥ dhana āharaḥ maṇi ratanam uḷāram

original: Ādāya tvaṃ gaccha sakaṃ niketaṃ, laddhā dhanaṃ taṃ maṇimossajassū”ti.
analyzed: ādāya tvam gaccha sakam niketam laddhā dhanam tam maṇim ossajassu iti

original: Tattha kiṃ te vatanti kiṃ tava vatasamādānaṃ. Brahmacariyanti seṭṭhacariyaṃ. Opānabhūtanti
analyzed: tattha kim te vatanti kim tava vata samādānam brahmacariyanti seṭṭha cariyam

original: catumahāpathe khatapokkharaṇī viya dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjitabbavibhavaṃ.
analyzed: catu mahāpathe khata pokkharaṇī viya dhammika samaṇa brāhmaṇānam yathāsukham paribhuñjitabba vibhavam

original: Na ca sassatāyanti ciraṭṭhitikaṃ samānampi ce taṃ mayhaṃ sassataṃ na hotīti me katheti.
analyzed: na ca sassatāyanti cira ṭṭhitikam samānam pi ce tam mayham sassatam na hoti iti me kathā iti

original: Appānubhāvāti bhojaputte sandhāyāha. Hantīti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu sūlehi vijjhantā kiṃkāraṇā
analyzed: appa anubhāvā ti bhojaputte sandhāya āha hanti iti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu sūlehi vijjhantā kiṃkāraṇā

original: haniṃsu. Kiṃ paṭiccāti kiṃ sandhāya tvaṃ tadā tesaṃ hatthattaṃ āgacchi vasaṃ upagato.
analyzed: haniṃsu kim paṭicca ati kim sandhāya tvam tadā tesam hatthattam āgacchi vasam upagataḥ

original: Vanibbakānanti bhojaputtā idha “vanibbakā”ti vuttā. Tejo nu te nānvagaṃ dantamūlanti
analyzed: bhoja puttāḥ idha vanibbaka ati vuttā tejaḥ nu te na anvagam danta mūlanti

original: kiṃ nu tava tejo bhojaputte disvā tadā bhayaṃ mahantaṃ anvagataṃ, udāhu visaṃ dantamūlaṃ
analyzed: kim nu tava tejaḥ bhojaputte disvā tadā bhayam mahantam anvagatam udāhu visam danta mūlam

original: na anvagataṃ. Kilesanti dukkhaṃ. Vanibbakānanti bhojaputtānaṃ santike, bhojaputte nissāyāti attho.
analyzed: na anvagatam kilesanti dukkham vanibbakānam ti bhoja puttānam santike bhoja putte nissāya ati attho

original: Tejo na sakkā mama tehi hantunti mama visatejo aññassa tejena abhihantumpi na sakkā.
analyzed: tejaḥ na sakkā mama tehi hantunti mama visa tejaḥ aññassa tejena abhihantum pi na sakkā

original: Satanti buddhādīnaṃ. Dhammānīti sīlasamādhipaññākhantianuddayamettābhāvanāsaṅkhātāni
analyzed: buddha ādīnam dhammāni iti sīla samādhi paññā khanti anuddaya mettā bhāvanā saṅkhātāni

original: dhammāni. Sukittitānīti suvaṇṇitāni sukathitāni. Kinti katvā? Samuddavelāva duraccayānīti
analyzed: dhammāni su kittitāni iti su vaṇṇitāni su kathitāni kinti katvā samudda velā iva duraccayāni iti

original: tehi samuddavelā viya sappurisehi jīvitatthampi duraccayānīti vaṇṇitāni, tasmā ahaṃ
analyzed: tehi samudda velā viya sappurisehi jīvita attham pi duraccayāni iti vaṇṇitāni tasmai aham

original: sīlabhedabhayena khantimettādisamannāgato hutvā mama kopassa sīlavelantaṃ atikkamituṃ na adāsinti āha.
analyzed: sīlabheda bhayena khanti mettā ādi samannāgataḥ hutvā mama kopassa atikkamitum na adāsin ti āha

original: “Imissā pana saṅkhapāladhammadesanāya dasapi pāramiyo labbhanti. Tadā hi mahāsattena
analyzed: imissā pana saṅkhapāla dhamma desanāya dasa api pāramiyaḥ labbhanti tadā hi mahāsattena

original: sarīrassa pariccattabhāvo dānapāramī nāma hoti, tathārūpenāpi visatejena sīlassa
analyzed: sarīrassa pariccatta bhāvaḥ dānapāramī nāma hoti tathārūpena api visa tejena sīlassa

original: abhinnatā sīlapāramī, nāgabhavanato nikkhamitvā samaṇadhammakaraṇaṃ nekkhammapāramī,
analyzed: abhinna tā sīla pāramī nāga bhavanataḥ nikkhamitvā samaṇa dhamma karaṇam nekkhamma pāramī

original: ‘idañcidañca kātuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti saṃvidahanaṃ paññāpāramī, adhivāsanavīriyaṃ vīriyapāramī,
analyzed: idam ca idam ca kātum vaṭṭati iti saṃvidahanam paññāpāramī adhivāsana vīriyam vīriya pāramī

original: adhivāsanakhanti khantipāramī, saccasamādānaṃ saccapāramī, ‘mama sīlaṃ na bhindissāmī’ti
analyzed: adhivāsana khanti khanti pāramī sacca samādānam sacca pāramī mama sīlam na bhindissāmi iti

original: Athāgamunti athekadivasaṃ vammikamatthake nipannaṃ disvā soḷasa bhojaputtā khararajjuñca

analyzed: tasmai vīriyena parakkamitvā tapo kammam karomi

original: Surositoti suṭṭhu manulitto. Itoti imamhā nāgabhavanā manussaloko kena uttaritaro.

original: ca atthaṃ pakāsento tisso gāthā abhāsi –

original: “Tañca disvāna āyantiṃ, āmuttamaṇikuṇḍalaṃ;
analyzed: tat ca disvānaḥ āyantim āmutta maṇi kuṇḍalam

original: Isisiṅgo pāvisi bhīto, assamaṃ paṇṇachādanaṃ.
analyzed: isisiṅgaḥ pāvisi bhītaḥ assamam paṇṇa chādanam

original: “Assamassa ca sā dvāre, geṇḍukenassa kīḷati;
analyzed: assamassa ca sā dvāre geṇḍukenassa kīḷati

original: Vidaṃsayantī aṅgāni, guyhaṃ pakāsitāni ca.
analyzed: vidaṃsayantī aṅgāni guyham pakāsitāni ca

original: “Tañca disvāna kīḷantiṃ, paṇṇasālagato jaṭī;
analyzed: tam ca disvāna kīḷantim paṇṇa sāla gataḥ jaṭī

original: Assamā nikkhamitvāna, idaṃ vacanamabravī”ti.
analyzed: assamā nikkhamitvānaḥ idam vacanam abravīti

original: Tattha geṇḍukenassāti assa isisiṅgassa assamadvāre geṇḍukena kīḷati. Vidaṃsayantīti
analyzed: tattha assa isisiṅgassa assama dvāre geṇḍukena kīḷati vidaṃsayanti iti

original: dassentī. Guyhaṃ pakāsitāni cāti guyhañca rahassaṅgaṃ pakāsitāni ca pākaṭāni mukhahatthādīni.
analyzed: dassentī guyham pakāsitāni ca ati guyham ca rahassaṅgam pakāsitāni ca pākaṭāni mukha hattha ādīni

original: Abravīti so kira paṇṇasālāya ṭhatvā cintesi – “sacāyaṃ yakkho bhaveyya, paṇṇasālaṃ
analyzed: abravīti saḥ kira paṇṇasālāya ṭhatvā cintesi sacā ayam yakkhaḥ bhaveyya paṇṇasālam

original: pavisitvā maṃ murumurāpetvā khādeyya, nāyaṃ yakkho, tāpaso bhavissatī”ti assamā nikkhamitvā
analyzed: pavisitvā mam murumurāpetvā khādeyya na ayam yakkhaḥ tāpasaḥ bhavissati iti assamā nikkhamitvā

original: pucchanto gāthamāha –
analyzed: pucchantaḥ gātham āha

original: “Ambho ko nāma so rukkho, yassa tevaṃgataṃ phalaṃ;
analyzed: ambho kaḥ nāma saḥ rukkhaḥ yassa tevaṃgatam phalam

original: Dūrepi khittaṃ pacceti, na taṃ ohāya gacchatī”ti.
analyzed: dūre pi khittam pacceti na tam ohāya gacchati iti

original: Tattha yassa tevaṃgataṃ phalanti yassa tava rukkhassa evaṃgatikaṃ manoramaṃ phalaṃ.
analyzed: tattha yassa tevaṃgatam phalanti yassa tava rukkhassa evaṃgatikam manoramam phalam

original: Ko nāma so rukkhoti citrageṇḍukassa adiṭṭhapubbattā “rukkhaphalena tena bhavitabba”nti
analyzed: kaḥ nāma saḥ rukkhaḥ ti citrageṇḍukassa a diṭṭha pubba ttā rukkha phalena tena bhavitabbanti

original: maññamāno evaṃ pucchati.
analyzed: maññamānaḥ evam pucchati

original: Athassa sā rukkhaṃ ācikkhantī gāthamāha –
analyzed: atha assa sā rukkhaṃ ācikkhantī gātham āha

original: “Assamassa mama brahme, samīpe gandhamādane;
analyzed: assamassa mama brahme samīpe gandhamādane

original: Bahavo tādisā rukkhā, yassa tevaṃgataṃ phalaṃ;
analyzed: bahavaḥ tādisāḥ rukkhāḥ yassa tevaṃgatam phalam

original: Dūrepi khittaṃ pacceti, na maṃ ohāya gacchatī”ti.
analyzed: dūre pi khittam pacceti na mama ohāya gacchati iti

original: Tattha samīpe gandhamādaneti gandhamādanapabbate mama assamassa samīpe. Yassa tevaṃgatanti yassa evaṃgataṃ, ta-kāro byañjanasandhikaroti.
analyzed: tattha samīpe gandhamādana iti gandhamādana pabbate mama assam assa samīpe yassa tevaṃgatam ti yassa evaṃgatam takāraḥ byañjana sandhi karoti

original: Iti sā musāvādaṃ abhāsi. Itaropi saddahitvā “tāpaso eso”ti saññāya paṭisanthāraṃ karonto gāthamāha –
analyzed: iti sā musāvādam abhāsi itaraḥ api saddahitvā tāpasaḥ esaḥ iti saññāya paṭisanthāram karontaḥ gātham āha

original: “Etū bhavaṃ assamimaṃ adetu, pajjañca bhakkhañca paṭiccha dammi;
analyzed: etu bhavam assam imam adetu pajjam ca bhakkhañca paṭiccha dammi

original: Idamāsanaṃ atra bhavaṃ nisīdatu, ito bhavaṃ mūlaphalāni bhuñjatū”ti.
analyzed: idam āsanam atra bhavam nisīdatu itas bhavam mūla phalāni bhuñjatu iti

original: Tattha assamimanti assamaṃ imaṃ bhavaṃ pavisatu. Adetūti yathāsannihitaṃ āhāraṃ paribhuñjatu.
analyzed: tattha assamimanti assamam imam bhavam pavisatu adetu iti yathā sannihitam āhāram paribhuñjatu

original: Pajjanti pādabbhañjanaṃ. Bhakkhanti madhuraphalāphalaṃ. Paṭicchāti paṭiggaṇha. Idamāsananti
analyzed: pajjanti pāda bbhañjanam bhakkhanti madhura phala aphalam paṭicchāti paṭiggaṇhe idam āsanam ti

original: paviṭṭhakāle evamāha.
analyzed: paviṭṭha kāle evam āha

original: Tassā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā kaṭṭhattharaṇe nisīdantiyā suvaṇṇacīrake dvidhā gate sarīraṃ
analyzed: tassā paṇṇa sālam pavisitvā kaṭṭhattharaṇe nisīdantiyā suvaṇṇa cīrake dvidhā gate sarīram

original: appaṭicchannaṃ ahosi. Tāpaso mātugāmasarīrassa adiṭṭhapubbattā taṃ disvā “vaṇṇo eso”ti saññāya evamāha –
analyzed: appaṭicchannam ahosi tāpasaḥ mātu gāma sarīrassa a diṭṭha pubba ttā tam disvā vaṇṇaḥ esaḥ iti saññāya evam āha

original: “Kiṃ te idaṃ ūrūnamantarasmiṃ, supicchitaṃ kaṇharivappakāsati;
analyzed: kim te idam su picchitam

original: Akkhāhi me pucchito etamatthaṃ, kose nu te uttamaṅgaṃ paviṭṭha”nti.
analyzed: akkhāhi me pucchitaḥ etam attham kose nu te uttamaṅgam paviṭṭhanti

original: Tattha supicchitanti dvinnaṃ ūrūnaṃ samāgamakāle suphusitaṃ sippipuṭamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: tattha su picchitanti dvinnam samāgama kāle su phusitam sippi puṭa mukha saṇṭhānam

original: Subhalakkhaṇena hi asamannāgatāya taṃ ṭhānaṃ āvāṭadhātukaṃ hoti, samannāgatāya abbhunnataṃ
analyzed: subha lakkhaṇena hi a samannāgatāya tam ṭhānam āvāṭa dhātukam hoti samannāgatāya abbhunnatam

original: sippipuṭamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ. Kaṇharivappakāsatīti ubhosu passesu kāḷakaṃ viya khāyati.
analyzed: sippi puṭa mukha saṇṭhānam ubhosu passesu kāḷakam viya khāyati

original: Kose nu te uttamaṅgaṃ paviṭṭhanti tava uttamaṅgaṃ liṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ na paññāyati, kiṃ
analyzed: kose nu te uttamaṅgam paviṭṭhanti tava uttamaṅgam liṅga saṇṭhānam na paññāyati kim

original: nu taṃ tava sarīrasaṅkhāte kose paviṭṭhanti pucchati.
analyzed: nu tam tava sarīra saṅkhāte kose paviṭṭhanti pucchati

original: Atha naṃ sā vañcayantī gāthādvayamāha –
analyzed: atha nam sā vañcayantī gāthā dvayam āha

original: “Ahaṃ vane mūlaphalesanaṃ caraṃ, āsādayiṃ acchaṃ sughorarūpaṃ;
analyzed: aham vane mūla phala isanam caram āsādayim accham su ghora rūpam

original: So maṃ patitvā sahasājjhapatto, panujja maṃ abbahi uttamaṅgaṃ.
analyzed: saḥ mam patitvā sahasā ajjha pattaḥ panujja mam ap bahi uttamaṅgam

original: “Svāyaṃ vaṇo khajjati kaṇḍuvāyati, sabbañca kālaṃ na labhāmi sātaṃ;
analyzed: svāyam vaṇaḥ khajjati kaṇḍuvāyati sabbañca kālam na labhāmi sātam

original: Paho bhavaṃ kaṇḍumimaṃ vinetuṃ, kurutaṃ bhavaṃ yācito brāhmaṇattha”nti.
analyzed: paho bhavam kaṇḍum imam vinetum kurutam bhavam yācitaḥ

original: Tattha āsādayinti ghaṭṭesiṃ, āgacchantaṃ disvā leḍḍunā paharinti attho. Patitvāti
analyzed: tattha āsādayinti ghaṭṭesim āgacchantam disvā leḍḍunā paharinti attho patitvā iti

original: upadhāvitvā. Sahasājjhappattoti mamaṃ sahasā ajjhappatto sampatto. Panujjāti atha
analyzed: upadhāvitvā sahasā ajjhappatto ti sahasā ajjhappattaḥ sampattaḥ panujjāti atha

original: maṃ potetvā. Abbahīti mukhena mama uttamaṅgaṃ luñcitvā pakkāmi, tato paṭṭhāya imasmiṃ
analyzed: mam potetvā abbahi iti mukhena mama uttamaṅgam luñcitvā pakkāmi tatas paṭṭhāya imasmin

original: ṭhāne vaṇo jāto. Svāyanti so ayaṃ tato paṭṭhāya mayhaṃ vaṇo khajjati ceva kaṇḍuvañca
analyzed: ṭhāne vaṇaḥ jātaḥ su āyanti saḥ ayam tatas paṭṭhāya mayham vaṇaḥ khajjati ca iva kaṇḍu vat ca

original: karoti, tappaccayā sāhaṃ sabbakālaṃ kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ na labhāmi. Pahoti pahu
analyzed: karoti tad paccayā sā aham sabbakālam kāyika cetasika sukham na labhāmi

original: samattho. Brāhmaṇatthanti bhavaṃ mayā yācito imaṃ brāhmaṇassa atthaṃ karotu, idaṃ
analyzed: samatthaḥ brāhmaṇatthanti bhavam mayā yācitaḥ imam brāhmaṇassa attham karotu idam

original: me dukkhaṃ harāhīti vadati.
analyzed: me dukkham harāhi iti vadati

original: So tassā musāvādaṃ “sabhāvo”ti saddahitvā “sace te evaṃ sukhaṃ hoti, karissāmī”ti taṃ padesaṃ oloketvā anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
analyzed: saḥ tassāḥ musāvādam sabhāvo ti saddahitvā sace te evam sukham hoti karissāmi iti tam padesam oloketvā anantaram gātham āha

original: “Gambhīrarūpo te vaṇo salohito, apūtiko vaṇagandho mahā ca;
analyzed: gambhīra rūpaḥ te vaṇaḥ sa lohitaḥ a pūtikaḥ vaṇa gandhaḥ mahā ca

original: Karomi te kiñci kasāyayogaṃ, yathā bhavaṃ paramasukhī bhaveyyā”ti.
analyzed: karomi te kiñci kasāya yogam yathā bhavam parama sukhī bhaveyya ati

original: Tattha salohitoti rattobhāso. Apūtikoti pūtimaṃsarahito. Vaṇagandhoti thokaṃ duggandho. Kasāyayoganti ahaṃ keci rukkhakasāye gahetvā tava ekaṃ kasāyayogaṃ karomīti.
analyzed: tattha sa lohitaḥ ti ratta ubhāsaḥ apūtikaḥ ti pūti maṃsa rahitaḥ vaṇa gandho ti thokam duggandho kasāya yogam ti aham keci rukkha kasāye gahetvā tava ekam kasāya yogam karomi iti

original: Tato niḷinikā gāthamāha
analyzed: tatas niḷinikā gātham āha

original: “Na mantayogā na kasāyayogā, na osadhā brahmacāri kamanti;
analyzed: na manta yogāḥ na kasāya yogāḥ na osadhāḥ brahmacāri kamanti

original: Yaṃ te mudu tena vinehi kaṇḍuṃ, yathā ahaṃ paramasukhī bhaveyya”nti.
analyzed: yam te mudu tena vinehi kaṇḍum yathā aham parama sukhī

original: Tattha kamantīti, bho brahmacāri, imasmiṃ mama vaṇe neva mantayogā, na kasāyayogā,
analyzed: tattha kamanti iti bho brahmacāri imasmin mama vaṇe na iva manta yogāḥ na kasāya yogā

original: na pupphaphalādīni osadhāni kamanti, anekavāraṃ katehipi tehi etassa phāsukabhāvo
analyzed: na puppha phala ādīni osadhāni kamanti aneka vāram katehi pi tehi etassa phāsuka bhāvaḥ

original: na bhūtapubbo. Yaṃ pana te etaṃ mudu aṅgajātaṃ, tena ghaṭṭiyamānasseva tassa kaṇḍu
analyzed: na bhūta pubbaḥ yam pana te etam mudu aṅga jātam tena ghaṭṭiyamānassa iva tassa kaṇḍu

original: na hoti, tasmā tena vinehi kaṇḍunti.
analyzed: na hoti tasmā tena vinehi kaṇḍunti

original: So “saccaṃ eso bhaṇatī”ti sallakkhetvā “methunasaṃsaggena sīlaṃ bhijjati, jhānaṃ
analyzed: so saccam esaḥ bhaṇati iti sat lakkhetvā methuna saṃsaggena sīlam bhijjati jhānam

original: antaradhāyatī”ti ajānanto mātugāmassa adiṭṭhapubbattā methunadhammassa ca ajānanabhāvena
analyzed: antaradhāyati iti a jānantaḥ mātugāmassa a diṭṭha pubba ttā methuna dhammassa ca a jānana bhāvena

original: “bhesajja”nti vadantiyā tāya methunaṃ paṭisevi. Tāvadevassa sīlaṃ bhijji, jhānaṃ
analyzed: bhesajjanti vadantiyā tāya methunam paṭisevi tāva devassa sīlam bhijji jhānam

original: parihāyi. So dve tayo vāre saṃsaggaṃ katvā kilanto hutvā nikkhamitvā saraṃ oruyha
analyzed: saḥ dve tayaḥ vāre saṃsaggam katvā kilantaḥ hutvā nikkhamitvā saram oruyha

original: nhatvā paṭippassaddhadaratho āgantvā paṇṇasālāyaṃ nisīditvā punapi taṃ “tāpaso”ti
analyzed: nhatvā āgantvā paṇṇa sālāyam nisīditvā puna api tam tāpasa iti

original: maññamāno vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchanto gāthamāha –
analyzed: maññamānaḥ vasana ṭṭhānam pucchantaḥ gātham āha

original: “Ito nu bhoto katamena assamo, kacci bhavaṃ abhiramasi araññe;
analyzed: itas nu bhoto katamena assamaḥ kacci bhavam abhiramasi araññe

original: Kacci nu te mūlaphalaṃ pahūtaṃ, kacci bhavantaṃ na vihiṃsanti vāḷā”ti.
analyzed: kacci nu te mūla phalam kacci bhavantam na vihiṃsanti

original: Tattha katamenāti ito katamena disābhāgena bhoto assamo. Bhavanti ālapanametaṃ.
analyzed: tattha katamena ati itas katamena disābhāgena bhoto assamaḥ bhavanti ālapanam etam

original: Tato niḷinikā catasso gāthāyo abhāsi –
analyzed: tatas niḷinikā catassaḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsi

original: “Ito ujuṃ uttarāyaṃ disāyaṃ, khemā nadī himavatā pabhāvī;
analyzed: itas ujum uttarāyam disāyam khemā nadī himavatā pabhāvī

original: Tassā tīre assamo mayha rammo, aho bhavaṃ assamaṃ mayhaṃ passe.
analyzed: tassā tīre assamaḥ mayha rammaḥ aho bhavam assamam mayham passe

original: “Ambā ca sālā tilakā ca jambuyo, uddālakā pāṭaliyo ca phullā;
analyzed: ambā ca sālā tilakā ca uddālakā pāṭaliyā ca phullā

original: Samantato kimpurisābhigītaṃ, aho bhavaṃ assamaṃ mayhaṃ passe.
analyzed: samantataḥ kimpurisa abhigītam aho bhavam assamam mayham passe

original: “Tālā ca mūlā ca phalā ca mettha, vaṇṇena gandhena upetarūpaṃ;
analyzed: tālā ca mūlā ca phalā ca mā ittha vaṇṇena gandhena upeta rūpam

original: Taṃ bhūmibhāgehi upetarūpaṃ, aho bhavaṃ assamaṃ mayhaṃ passe.
analyzed: tam bhūmi bhāgehi upeta rūpam aho bhavam assamam mayham passe

original: “Phalā ca mūlā ca pahūtamettha, vaṇṇena gandhena rasenupetā;
analyzed: ca mūlā ca pahūtam ettha vaṇṇena gandhena rasena upetā

original: Āyanti ca luddakā taṃ padesaṃ, mā me tato mūlaphalaṃ ahāsu”nti.
analyzed: āyanti ca tam padesam mā me tatas mūla phalam

original: Tattha uttarāyanti uttarāya. Khemāti evaṃnāmikā nadī. Himavatā pabhāvīti himavantato
analyzed: tattha uttarāyanti uttarāya khemā ati evaṃnāmikā nadī himavatā pabhāvī iti himavantataḥ

original: pavattati. Ahoti patthanatthe nipāto. Uddālakāti vātaghātakā. Kimpurisābhigītanti
analyzed: pavattati aho ti patthana atthe nipātaḥ uddālakā ati vātaghātakā kimpurisa abhigītam ti

original: samantato parivāretvā madhurasaddena gāyantehi kimpurisehi abhigītaṃ. Tālā ca mūlā
analyzed: samantataḥ madhura saddena gāyantehi kimpurisehi abhigītam tālā ca mūlā

original: ca phalā ca metthāti ettha mama assame pāsādikā tālarukkhā ca tesaññeva vaṇṇagandhādisampannā
analyzed: ca phalā ca metthā ati ettha mama assame pāsādikā tālarukkhā ca tesaññeva vaṇṇa gandha ādi sampannā

original: kandasaṅkhātā mūlā ca phalā ca. Pahūtametthāti nānārukkhaphalā ca rukkhavallimūlā
analyzed: kanda saṅkhātā mūlā ca phalā ca pahūtam ettha ati nānā rukkha phalā ca rukkha valli mūlā

original: ca pahūtā ettha. Mā me tatoti taṃ mama assamapadaṃ sambahulā luddakā āgacchanti,
analyzed: ca pahūtāḥ ettha mā me tatoti tam mama assama padam sambahulāḥ luddakāḥ āgacchanti

original: mayā cettha āharitvā ṭhapitaṃ bahu madhurasamūlaphalāphalaṃ atthi, te mayi cirāyante
analyzed: mayā ca itthā āharitvā ṭhapitam bahu madhu rasa mūla phala aphalam atthi te mayi cirāyante

original: mūlaphalāphalaṃ hareyyuṃ. Te tato mama mūlaphalāphalaṃ mā hariṃsu, tasmā sacepi mayā
analyzed: mūla phala aphalam hareyyum te tatas mama mūla phala aphalam mā hariṃsu tasmai sacepi mayā

original: saddhiṃ āgantukāmo, ehi, no ce, ahaṃ gamissāmīti āha.
analyzed: saddhim āgantu kāmaḥ ehi no ce aham gamissāmi iti āha

original: Taṃ sutvā tāpaso yāva pitu āgamanā adhivāsāpetuṃ gāthamāha –
analyzed: tam sutvā tāpasaḥ gātham āha

original: “Pitā mamaṃ mūlaphalesanaṃ gato, idāni āgacchati sāyakāle;
analyzed: pitā mamam mūla phala isanam gataḥ idāni āgacchati sāya kāle

original: Ubhova gacchāmase assamaṃ taṃ, yāva pitā mūlaphalato etū”ti.
analyzed: ubhā uva gacchāmase assamam tam yāva pitā mūla phalataḥ etu uti

original: Tattha ubhova gacchāmaseti mama pitu ārocetvā ubhova gamissāma.
analyzed: tattha ubhau uva gacchāmasa iti mama pitu ārocetvā ubhau uva gamissāma

original: Tato sā cintesi – “ayaṃ tāva araññeva vaḍḍhitabhāvena mama itthibhāvaṃ na jānāti,
analyzed: tatas sā cintesi ayam tāva araññā iva vaḍḍhita bhāvena mama itthi bhāvam na jānāti

original: pitā panassa maṃ disvāva jānitvā ‘tvaṃ idha kiṃ karosī’ti kājakoṭiyā paharitvā sīsampi
analyzed: pitā panassa mam disvā ava jānitvā tvam idha kim karosi iti kāja koṭiyā paharitvā sīsam pi

original: me bhindeyya, tasmiṃ anāgateyeva mayā gantuṃ vaṭṭati, āgamanakammampi me niṭṭhita”nti.
analyzed: me bhindeyya tasmin anāgateya iva mayā gantum vaṭṭati āgamana kammam pi me niṭṭhitan ti

original: Sā tassa āgamanūpāyaṃ ācikkhantī itaraṃ gāthamāha –
analyzed: sā tassa āgamana upāyam ācikkhantī itaram gātham āha

original: “Aññe bahū isayo sādhurūpā, rājīsayo anumagge vasanti;
analyzed: aññe bahū isayo sādhu rūpāḥ rājīsayo anumagge vasanti

original: Teyeva pucchesi mamassamaṃ taṃ, te taṃ nayissanti mamaṃ sakāse”ti.
analyzed: teyeva pucchesi mamassamam tam te tam nayissanti mamam sakāsā iti

original: Tattha rājīsayoti, samma, mayā na sakkā cirāyituṃ, aññe pana sādhusabhāvā rājisayo
analyzed: tattha rājīsayo ti samma mayā na sakkā cirāyitum aññe pana sādhu sabhāvāḥ

original: ca brāhmaṇisayo ca anumagge mama assamamaggapasse vasanti, ahaṃ tesaṃ ācikkhitvā
analyzed: ca brāhmaṇi sayo ca anumagge mama assama magga passe vasanti aham tesam ācikkhitvā

original: gamissāmi, tvaṃ te puccheyyāsi, te taṃ mama santikaṃ nayissantīti.
analyzed: gamissāmi tvam te puccheyyāsi te tam mama santikam nayissanti iti

original: Evaṃ sā attano palāyanūpāyaṃ katvā paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā taṃ olokentameva “tvaṃ
analyzed: evam sā attano palāyana upāyam katvā paṇṇa sālataḥ nikkhamitvā tam olokentam eva tvam

original: nivattā”ti vatvā āgamanamaggeneva amaccānaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi. Te taṃ gahetvā khandhāvāraṃ
analyzed: nivattā ati vatvā āgamana maggena iva amaccānam santikam agamāsi te tam gahetvā khandhāvāram

original: gantvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Sakkopi taṃ divasameva tussitvā sakalaraṭṭhe
analyzed: gantvā anupubbena bārāṇasim pāpuṇiṃsu sakkaḥ api tam divasam eva tussitvā sakala raṭṭhe

original: devaṃ vassāpesi, tato subhikkhaṃ janapadaṃ ahosi. Isisiṅgatāpasassapi tāya pakkantamattāya
analyzed: devam tatas subhikkham janapadam ahosi isisiṅga tāpasassa api tāya pakkanta mattāya

original: eva kāye ḍāho uppajji. So kampanto paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā vākacīraṃ pārupitvā socanto
analyzed: eva kāye ḍāhaḥ uppajji saḥ kampantaḥ paṇṇa sālam pavisitvā vāka cīram pārupitvā socantaḥ

original: nipajji. Bodhisatto sāyaṃ āgantvā puttaṃ apassanto “kahaṃ nu kho gato”ti kājaṃ otāretvā
analyzed: nipajji bodhisatto sāyam āgantvā puttam a passanto kaham nu kho gataḥ iti kājam otāretvā

original: paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā taṃ nipannakaṃ disvā “tāta, kiṃ karosī”ti piṭṭhiṃ parimajjanto
analyzed: paṇṇasālam pavisitvā tam nipannakam disvā tāta kim karosi iti piṭṭhim parimajjantaḥ

original: tisso gāthā abhāsi –
analyzed: tissaḥ gāthāḥ abhāsi

original: “Na te kaṭṭhāni bhinnāni, na te udakamābhataṃ;
analyzed: na te kaṭṭhāni bhinnāni na te udakam ābhatam

original: Aggīpi te na hāpito, kiṃ nu mandova jhāyasi.
analyzed: aggīpi te na hāpitaḥ kim nu mandā uva jhāyasi

original: “Bhinnāni kaṭṭhāni huto ca aggi, tapanīpi te samitā brahmacārī;
analyzed: bhinnāni kaṭṭhāni hutaḥ ca aggi tapanīpi te samitā brahmacārī

original: Pīṭhañca mayhaṃ udakañca hoti, ramasi tuvaṃ brahmabhūto puratthā.
analyzed: pīṭham ca mayham udakam ca hoti ramasi tuvam brahma bhūtaḥ puratthā

original: “Abhinnakaṭṭhosi anābhatodako, ahāpitaggīsi asiddhabhojano;
analyzed: a bhinna kaṭṭhaḥ asi an ābhata udakaḥ a siddha bhojanaḥ

original: Na me tuvaṃ ālapasī mamajja, naṭṭhaṃ nu kiṃ cetasikañca dukkha”nti.
analyzed: na me tuvam ālapasī mamajja naṭṭham nu kim cetasikam ca dukkhanti

original: Tattha bhinnānīti araññato uddhaṭāni. Na hāpitoti na jalito. Bhinnānīti pubbe tayā
analyzed: tattha bhinnāni iti araññataḥ uddhaṭāni na hāpito ti na jalitaḥ bhinnāni iti pubbe tayā

original: mamāgamanavelāya kaṭṭhāni uddhaṭāneva honti. Huto ca aggīti aggi ca huto hoti. Tapanīti
analyzed: mama āgamana velāya kaṭṭhāni honti hutaḥ ca aggi iti aggi ca hutaḥ hoti tapanī iti

original: visibbanaaggisaṅkhātā tapanīpi te samitāva sayameva saṃvidahitāva hoti. Pīṭhanti
analyzed: visibbana aggi saṅkhātā te samitā ava sayam eva saṃvidahitā ava hoti pīṭhanti

original: mama āsanatthāya pīṭhañca paññattameva hoti. Udakañcāti pādadhovanaudakampi upaṭṭhāpitameva
analyzed: mama āsana tthāya pīṭhañca paññattam eva hoti udakam ca ati pāda dhovana odakam pi upaṭṭhāpitam eva

original: hoti. Brahmabhūtoti tuvampi ito puratthā seṭṭhabhūto imasmiṃ assame abhiramasi. Abhinnakaṭṭhosīti
analyzed: hoti brahma bhūto ti tuvam pi itas puratthā seṭṭha bhūto imasmin assame abhiramasi abhinna kaṭṭhaḥ asi iti

original: so dāni ajja anuddhaṭakaṭṭhosi. Asiddhabhojanoti na te kiñci amhākaṃ kandamūlaṃ vā
analyzed: saḥ dāni ajja anuddhaṭa kaṭṭhaḥ asi na te kiñci amhākam kanda mūlam vā

original: paṇṇaṃ vā seditaṃ. Mamajjāti, mama putta, ajja na me tvaṃ ālapasi. Naṭṭhaṃ nu kinti
analyzed: paṇṇam vā seditam mamajja ati mama putta ajja na me tvam ālapasi naṭṭham nu kinti

original: kiṃ nu te naṭṭhaṃ vā, kiṃ cetasikaṃ vā dukkhaṃ, akkhāhi me nipannakāraṇanti pucchati.
analyzed: kim nu te naṭṭham vā kim cetasikam vā dukkham akkhāhi me nipanna kāraṇam ti pucchati

original: So pitu vacanaṃ sutvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ kathento āha –
analyzed: saḥ pitu vacanam sutvā tam kāraṇam kathentaḥ āha

original: “Idhāgamā jaṭilo brahmacārī, sudassaneyyo sutanū vineti;
analyzed: idha āgamā jaṭilaḥ brahmacārī sudassaneyyaḥ su tanū vinā iti

original: Nevātidīgho na panātirasso, sukaṇhakaṇhacchadanehi bhoto.
analyzed: na iva ati dīghaḥ na pana ati rassaḥ su kaṇha kaṇha chadanehi bhoto

original: “Amassujāto apurāṇavaṇṇī, ādhārarūpañca panassa kaṇṭhe;
analyzed: a massu jātaḥ a purāṇa vaṇṇī ādhāra rūpam ca panassa kaṇṭhe

original: Dve yamā gaṇḍā ure sujātā, suvaṇṇatindukanibhā pabhassarā.
analyzed: dve yamā gaṇḍā ure su jātā suvaṇṇa tinduka nibhā pabhassarā

original: “Mukhañca tassa bhusadassaneyyaṃ, kaṇṇesu lambanti ca kuñcitaggā;
analyzed: mukham ca tassa bhusa dassaneyyam kaṇṇesu lambanti ca kuñcitaggā

original: Te jotare carato māṇavassa, suttañca yaṃ saṃyamanaṃ jaṭānaṃ.
analyzed: te jotare carataḥ māṇavassa suttam ca yam saṃyamanam

original: “Aññā ca tassa saṃyamāni catasso, nīlā pītā lohitikā ca setā;
analyzed: aññā ca tassa saṃyamāni catassaḥ nīlā pītā lohitikā ca setā

original: Tā piṃsare carato māṇavassa, tiriṭisaṅghāriva pāvusamhi.
analyzed: tā piṃsare carataḥ māṇavassa pāvusamhi

original: “Na mikhalaṃ muñjamayaṃ dhāreti, na santhare no pana pabbajassa;
analyzed: na mikhalam muñja mayam dhāreti na santhare no pana pabbajassa

original: Tā jotare jaghanantare vilaggā, sateratā vijjurivantalikkhe.
analyzed: tā vilaggā

original: “Akhīlakāni ca avaṇṭakāni, heṭṭhā nabhyā kaṭisamohitāni;
analyzed: a khīlakāni ca a vaṇṭakāni heṭṭhā kaṭi samohitāni

original: Aghaṭṭitā niccakīḷaṃ karonti, haṃ tāta kiṃrukkhaphalāni tāni.
analyzed: a ghaṭṭitāḥ nicca kīḷam karonti ham tāta kiṃrukkha phalāni tāni

original: “Jaṭā ca tassa bhusadassaneyyā, parosataṃ vellitaggā sugandhā;
analyzed: jaṭā ca tassa bhusa dassaneyyā velli taggā sugandhā

original: Dvedhā siro sādhu vibhattarūpo, aho nu kho mayha tathā jaṭāssu.
analyzed: dvedhā sādhu aho nu tathā

original: “Yadā ca so pakirati tā jaṭāyo, vaṇṇena gandhena upetarūpā;
analyzed: yadā ca saḥ pakirati tā jaṭāyo vaṇṇena gandhena upeta rūpā

original: Nīluppalaṃ vātasameritaṃva, tatheva saṃvāti panassamo ayaṃ.
analyzed: nīluppalam vāta sameritam va tathā iva saṃvāti panassamaḥ ayam

original: “Paṅko ca tassa bhusadassaneyyo, netādiso yādiso mayhaṃ kāye;
analyzed: paṅko ca tassa bhusa dassaneyyaḥ netādisaḥ yādisaḥ mayham kāye

original: So vāyati erito mālutena, vanaṃ yathā aggagimhe suphullaṃ.
analyzed: saḥ vāyati eritaḥ mālutena vanam yathā aggagimhe su phullam

original: “Nihanti so rukkhaphalaṃ pathabyā, sucittarūpaṃ ruciraṃ dassaneyyaṃ;
analyzed: nihanti saḥ rukkha phalam pathabyā su citta rūpam ruciram dassaneyyam

original: Khittañca tassa punarehi hatthaṃ, haṃ tāta kiṃrukkhaphalaṃ nu kho taṃ.
analyzed: khittam ca tassa punar ehi hattham ham tāta kiṃrukkha phalam nu kho tam

original: “Dantā ca tassa bhusadassaneyyā, suddhā samā saṅkhavarūpapannā;
analyzed: dantā ca tassa bhusa dassaneyyā suddhā samā saṅkha vara upapannā

original: Mano pasādenti vivariyamānā, na hi nūna so sākamakhādi tehi.
analyzed: manaḥ pasādenti vivariyamānāḥ na hi nūna saḥ sākamakhādi tehi

original: “Akakkasaṃ aggaḷitaṃ muhuṃ muduṃ, ujuṃ anuddhataṃ acapalamassa bhāsitaṃ;
analyzed: a kakkasam aggaḷitam muhum mudum ujum an uddhatam a capalam assa bhāsitam

original: Rudaṃ manuññaṃ karavīkasussaraṃ, hadayaṅgamaṃ rañjayateva me mano.
analyzed: rudam manuññam karavīka sussaram hadayaṅgamam rañjayatā iva me manaḥ

original: “Bindussaro nātivisaṭṭhavākyo, na nūna sajjhāyamatippayutto;
analyzed: bindussaraḥ na ati visaṭṭha vākyaḥ na nūna sajjhāya mati ppayuttaḥ

original: Icchāmi bho taṃ punadeva daṭṭhuṃ, mitto hi me māṇavohu puratthā.
analyzed: icchāmi bho tam punadeva daṭṭhum mittaḥ hi me puratthā

original: “Susandhi sabbattha vimaṭṭhimaṃ vaṇaṃ, puthū sujātaṃ kharapattasannibhaṃ;
analyzed: su sandhi sabbattha su jātam khara patta sannibham

original: Teneva maṃ uttariyāna māṇavo, vivaritaṃ ūruṃ jaghanena piḷayi.
analyzed: tena iva mam uttariyāna māṇavaḥ ūrum jaghanena piḷayi

original: “Tapanti ābhanti virocare ca, sateratā vijjurivantalikkhe;
analyzed: tapanti ābhanti virocare ca

original: Bāhā mudū añjanalomasādisā, vicitravaṭṭaṅgulikāssa sobhare.
analyzed: bāhā mudū sobhare

original: “Akakkasaṅgo na ca dīghalomo, nakhāssa dīghā api lohitaggā;
analyzed: a kakkasaṅgaḥ na ca dīgha lomaḥ nakhā assa dīghāḥ api lohitaggā

original: Mudūhi bāhāhi palissajanto, kalyāṇarūpo ramayaṃ upaṭṭhahi.
analyzed: mudūhi bāhāhi palissajantaḥ kalyāṇa rūpaḥ ramayan upaṭṭhahi

original: “Dumassa tūlūpanibhā pabhassarā, suvaṇṇakambutalavaṭṭasucchavi;
analyzed: dumassa tūlūpa nibhā pabhassarā suvaṇṇa kambu tala vaṭṭa su chavi

original: Hatthā mudū tehi maṃ samphusitvā, ito gato tena maṃ dahanti tāta.
analyzed: hatthāḥ mudū tehi mam samphusitvā itas gataḥ tena mam dahanti tāta

original: “Na nūna so khārividhaṃ ahāsi, na nūna so kaṭṭhāni sayaṃ abhañji;
analyzed: na nūna saḥ khārividham ahāsi na nūna saḥ kaṭṭhāni sayam abhañji

original: Na nūna so hanti dume kuṭhāriyā, na hissa hatthesu khilāni atthi.
analyzed: na nūna saḥ hanti dume kuṭhāriyā na hissa hatthesu khilāni atthi

original: “Accho ca kho tassa vaṇaṃ akāsi, so maṃbravi ‘sukhitaṃ maṃ karohi’;
analyzed: acchas ca kho tassa vaṇam akāsi saḥ maṃbravi sukhitam mama karohi

original: Tāhaṃ kariṃ tena mamāsi sokhyaṃ, so cabravi ‘sukhitosmī’ti brahme.
analyzed: tā aham tena mama asi sokhyam saḥ sukhitaḥ asmi iti

original: “Ayañca te māluvapaṇṇasanthatā, vikiṇṇarūpāva mayā ca tena ca;
analyzed: ayam ca te māluva paṇṇa santhatā mayā ca tena ca

original: Kilantarūpā udake ramitvā, punappunaṃ paṇṇakuṭiṃ vajāma.
analyzed: kilanta rūpāḥ udake ramitvā punappunam paṇṇa kuṭim vajāma

original: “Na majja mantā paṭibhanti tāta, na aggihuttaṃ napi yaññatantaṃ;
analyzed: na majja mantā paṭibhanti tāta na aggi huttam

original: Na cāpi te mūlaphalāni bhuñje, yāva na passāmi taṃ brahmacāriṃ.
analyzed: na ca api te mūla phalāni bhuñje yāva na passāmi tam brahmacāriṃ

original: “Addhā pajānāsi tuvampi tāta, yassaṃ disaṃ vasate brahmacārī;
analyzed: addhā pajānāsi tuvam pi tāta yassam disam vasate brahmacārī

original: Taṃ maṃ disaṃ pāpaya tāta khippaṃ, mā te ahaṃ amarimassamamhi.
analyzed: tam mama disam pāpaya tāta khippam mā te aham

original: “Vicitraphullañhi vanaṃ sutaṃ mayā, dijābhighuṭṭhaṃ dijasaṅghasevitaṃ;
analyzed: vicitra phullam hi vanam sutam mayā dija abhighuṭṭham dija saṅgha sevitam

original: Taṃ maṃ vanaṃ pāpaya tāta khippaṃ, purā te pāṇaṃ vijahāmi assame”ti.
analyzed: tam mama vanam pāpaya tāta khippam purā te pāṇam vijahāmi

original: Tattha idhāgamāti, tāta, imaṃ assamapadaṃ āgato. Sudassaneyyoti suṭṭhu dassaneyyo.
analyzed: tattha idha agamā ti tāta imam assama padam āgato su dassaneyyaḥ ti suṭṭhu dassaneyyaḥ

original: Sutanūti suṭṭhu tanuko nātikiso nātithūlo. Vinetīti attano sarīrappabhāya assamapadaṃ
analyzed: su tanū ti suṭṭhu tanukaḥ na ati kisaḥ na ati thūlaḥ vineti iti attano sarīra ppabhāya assama padam

original: ekobhāsaṃ viya vineti pūreti. Sukaṇhakaṇhacchadanehi bhototi, tāta, tassa bhoto sukaṇhehi
analyzed: ekobhāsam viya vineti pūreti su kaṇha kaṇha chadanehi bhoto ti tāta tassa bhoto su kaṇhehi

original: kaṇhacchadanehi bhamaravaṇṇehi kesehi sukaṇhasīsaṃ sumajjitamaṇimayaṃ viya khāyati.
analyzed: kaṇha chadanehi bhamara vaṇṇehi kesehi su kaṇha sīsam su majjita maṇi mayam viya khāyati

original: Amassūjātoti na tāvassa massu jāyati, taruṇoyeva. Apurāṇavaṇṇīti acirapabbajito.
analyzed: a massūjātaḥ ti na tāva assa massu jāyati taruṇaḥ yā iva a purāṇa vaṇṇī ti acira pabbajitaḥ

original: Ādhārarūpañca panassa kaṇṭheti kaṇṭhe ca panassa amhākaṃ bhikkhābhājanaṭṭhapanaṃ
analyzed: ādhāra rūpam ca panassa kaṇṭhe iti kaṇṭhe ca panassa amhākam bhikkhā bhājana ṭṭhapanam

original: pattādhārasadisaṃ piḷandhanaṃ atthīti muttāhāraṃ sandhāya vadati. Gaṇḍāti thane sandhāyāha.
analyzed: patta ādhāra sadisam piḷandhanam atthi iti mutta āhāram sandhāya vadati thane sandhāya āha

original: Ure sujātāti uramhi sujātā. “Urato”tipi pāṭho. Pabhassarāti pabhāsampannā. “Pabhāsare”tipi
analyzed: ure su jātā ati uramhi su jātā urataḥ iti pāṭhaḥ pabhassarā ati pabhā sampannā pabhāsarā iti pi

original: pāṭho, obhāsantīti attho.
analyzed: pāṭhaḥ attho

original: Bhusadassaneyyanti ativiya dassanīyaṃ. Kuñcitaggāti sīhakuṇḍalaṃ sandhāya vadati.
analyzed: bhusa dassaneyyanti ativiya dassanīyam kuñcita ggā ati sīha kuṇḍalam sandhāya vadati

original: Suttañcāti yaṃ tassa jaṭābandhanasuttaṃ, tampi jotati pabhaṃ muñcati. “Saṃyamāni
analyzed: suttam ca ati yam tassa jaṭā bandhana suttam tam pi jotati pabham muñcati saṃyamāni

original: catasso”ti iminā maṇisuvaṇṇapavāḷarajatamayāni cattāri piḷandhanāni dasseti. Tā piṃsareti
analyzed: catasso ti iminā maṇi suvaṇṇa pavāḷa rajata mayāni cattāri piḷandhanāni dasseti tā

original: tāni piḷandhanāni pāvusamhi pavuṭṭhe deve tiriṭisaṅghā viya viravanti. Mikhalanti
analyzed: tāni piḷandhanāni pāvusamhi pavuṭṭhe deve tiriṭi saṅghāḥ viya viravanti mikhalanti

original: mekhalaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Idaṃ nivatthakañcanacīrakaṃ sandhāyāha. Na santhareti
analyzed: ayam eva vā pāṭhaḥ idam sandhāya āha na santharā iti

original: na vāke. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – tāta, yathā mayaṃ tiṇamayaṃ vā vākamayaṃ vā cīrakaṃ dhārema,
analyzed: na vāke idam vuttam hoti tāta yathā mayam tiṇa mayam vā vāka mayam vā cīrakam dhārema

original: na tathā so, so pana suvaṇṇacīrakaṃ dhāretīti. Akhīlakānīti atacāni nippaṇṇāni. Kaṭisamohitānīti
analyzed: na tathā saḥ saḥ pana suvaṇṇa cīrakam dhāreti iti a khīlakāni iti a tacāni nippaṇṇāni kaṭi samohitāni iti

original: kaṭiyaṃ baddhāni. Niccakīḷaṃ karontīti aghaṭṭitānipi niccakālaṃ kīḷāyanti. Haṃ, tātāti
analyzed: kaṭiyam baddhāni nicca kīḷam karonti iti a ghaṭṭitāni api nicca kālam kīḷāyanti haṃ tāta ati

original: hambho, tāta. Kiṃ rukkhaphalāni tānīti tāni tassa māṇavassa suttāruḷhāni kaṭiyaṃ
analyzed: hambho tāta kim rukkha phalāni tāni iti tāni tassa māṇavassa sutta āruḷhāni kaṭiyam

original: baddhāni katararukkhaphalāni nāmāti maṇisaṅghāṭiṃ sandhāyāha.
analyzed: baddhāni katara rukkha phalāni nāma ati maṇi saṅghāṭim sandhāya āha

original: Jaṭāti jaṭāmaṇḍalākārena baddharatanamissakakesavaṭṭiyo sandhāyāha. Vellitaggāti
analyzed: jaṭā iti jaṭā maṇḍala ākārena sandhāya āha velli taggā iti

original: kuñcitaggā. Dvedhāsiroti tassa sīsaṃ dvedhā katvā baddhānaṃ jaṭānaṃ vasena suṭṭhu
analyzed: kuñcita aggā tassa sīsam dvedhā katvā baddhānam jaṭānam vasena suṭṭhu

original: vibhattarūpaṃ. Tathāti yathā tassa māṇavassa jaṭā, tathā tumhehi mama na baddhā,
analyzed: vibhatta rūpam tathā ati yathā tassa māṇavassa jaṭā tathā tumhehi mama na baddhā

original: aho vata mamapi tathā assūti patthento āha. Upetarūpāti upetasabhāvā. Vātasameritaṃvāti
analyzed: aho vata mama api tathā patthentaḥ āha upeta rūpā ati upeta sabhāvā

original: yathā nāma nīluppalaṃ vātena samīritaṃ, tatheva ayaṃ imasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe assamo saṃvāti.
analyzed: yathā nāma nīluppalam vātena samīritam tathā iva ayam imasmin vana saṇḍe assamaḥ saṃvāti

original: Netādisoti, tāta, yādiso mama kāye paṅko, netādiso tassa sarīre. So hi dassanīyo
analyzed: netādiso ti tāta yādisaḥ mama kāye paṅkaḥ netādiso tassa sarīre saḥ hi dassanīyaḥ

original: ceva sugandho ca. Aggagimheti vasantasamaye.
analyzed: ca iva sugandho ca aggagimha iti vasanta samaye

original: Nihantīti paharati. Kiṃ rukkhaphalaṃ nu kho tanti katararukkhassa nu kho taṃ phalaṃ.
