original: Tattha matyā ca petyā cāti mātarā ca pitarā ca. Mayhanti upayogatthe sampadānavacanaṃ. Avalokayantīti mayā avalokitā sayampi maṃ avalokayantī maṃ ummattakaṃ akāsīti attho.
analyzed: tattha matyā ca petyā ca ati mātarā ca pitarā ca upayoga atthe sampadāna vacanam avalokayanti iti mayā avalokitā sayam pi mam avalokayantī mam ummattakam akāsi iti attho

original: Sā tassa kampitabhāvaṃ ñatvā vātapānaṃ thaketvā sirigabbhameva agamāsi. Raññopi tassā
analyzed: sā tassa kampita bhāvam ñatvā vāta pānam thaketvā sirigabbham eva agamāsi raññaḥ upi tassā

original: diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya nagaraṃ padakkhiṇakaraṇe cittameva nāhosi. So sārathiṃ āmantetvā,
analyzed: diṭṭha kālataḥ paṭṭhāya nagaram padakkhiṇa karaṇe cittam eva na ahosi so sārathim āmantetvā

original: “samma sunanda, rathaṃ nivattehi, ayaṃ chaṇo amhākaṃ nānucchaviko, abhipārakassa
analyzed: samma su nanda ratham nivattehi ayam chaṇaḥ amhākam na anucchavikaḥ abhipārakassa

original: senāpatissevānucchaviko, rajjampi tassevānucchavika”nti rathaṃ nivattāpetvā pāsādaṃ
analyzed: senāpatiḥ seva anucchavikaḥ rajjam pi tassa iva anucchavikam ti ratham nivattāpetvā pāsādam

original: abhiruyha sirisayane nipajjitvā vippalapanto āha –
analyzed: abhiruyha siri sayane nipajjitvā vippalapantaḥ āha

original: “Yā puṇṇamāse migamandalocanā, upāvisi puṇḍarīkattacaṅgī;
analyzed: yā puṇṇamāse miga manda locanā upāvisi puṇḍarī katta caṅgī

original: Dve puṇṇamāyo tadahū amaññahaṃ, disvāna pārāvatarattavāsiniṃ.
analyzed: dve puṇṇamāyo tad ahū amaññaham disvāna pārāvata ratta vāsinim

original: “Aḷārapamhehi subhehi vaggubhi, palobhayantī maṃ yadā udikkhati;
analyzed: aḷāra pamhehi subhehi vaggubhi palobhayantī mam yadā udikkhati

original: Vijambhamānā harateva me mano, jātā vane kimpurisīva pabbate.
analyzed: vijambhamānā haratā iva me manaḥ jātā vane kimpurisī iva pabbate

original: “Tadā hi brahatī sāmā, āmuttamaṇikuṇḍalā;
analyzed: tadā hi brahatī sāmā āmutta maṇi kuṇḍalā

original: Ekaccavasanā nārī, migī bhantāvudikkhati.
analyzed: ekacca vasanā nārī migī bhantau udikkhati

original: “Kadāssu maṃ tambanakhā sulomā, bāhā mudū candanasāralittā;
analyzed: kadā assu mam tamba nakhā su lomā bāhā mudū candana sāra littā

original: Vaṭṭaṅgulī sannatadhīrakuttiyā, nārī upaññissati sīsato subhā.
analyzed: vaṭṭaṅgulī sannata dhīra kuttiyā nārī upaññissati sīsataḥ subhā

original: “Kadāssu maṃ kañcanajāluracchadā, dhītā tirīṭissa vilaggamajjhā;
analyzed: kadā assu mam kañcana jāluracchadā dhītā vilagga majjhā

original: Mudūhi bāhāhi palissajissati, brahāvane jātadumaṃva māluvā.
analyzed: mudūhi bāhāhi palissajissati brahā vane jātadumam iva māluvā

original: “Kadāssu lākhārasarattasucchavī, bindutthanī puṇḍarīkattacaṅgī;
Mukhaṃ mukhena upanāmayissati, soṇḍova soṇḍassa surāya thālaṃ.
analyzed: mukham mukhena upanāmayissati soṇḍā uva soṇḍassa surāya thālam

original: “Yadāddasaṃ taṃ tiṭṭhantiṃ, sabbabhaddaṃ manoramaṃ;
analyzed: tam tiṭṭhantim sabbabhaddam manoramam

original: Tato sakassa cittassa, nāvabodhāmi kañcinaṃ.
analyzed: tatas sakassa cittassa na avabodhāmi

original: “Ummādantimahaṃ daṭṭhā, āmuttamaṇikuṇḍalaṃ;
analyzed: daṭṭhā āmutta maṇi kuṇḍalam

original: Na supāmi divārattiṃ, sahassaṃva parājito.
analyzed: na supāmi divārattim sahassam va parājitaḥ

original: “Sakko ce me varaṃ dajjā, so ca labbhetha me varo;
analyzed: sakkaḥ ce me varam dajjā saḥ ca labbhetha me varo

original: Ekarattaṃ dirattaṃ vā, bhaveyyaṃ abhipārako;
analyzed: eka rattam dirattam vā bhaveyyam abhipārakaḥ

original: Ummādantyā ramitvāna, sivirājā tato siya”nti.
analyzed: ramitvāna sivi rājā

original: Tattha puṇṇamāseti puṇṇacandāya rattiyā. Migamandalocanāti kaṇḍasantāsena palāyitvā
analyzed: tattha puṇṇa māse iti puṇṇa candāya rattiyā miga manda locanā ati kaṇḍa santāsena palāyitvā

original: vanantare ṭhatvā luddaṃ olokentiyā migiyā viya mandāni locanāni assāti migamandalocanā.
analyzed: luddaṃ olokentiyā migiyā viya mandāni locanāni assāti miga manda locanā

original: Upāvisīti padumavaṇṇena karatalena pupphāni khipitvā maṃ olokentī vātapāne nisīdi.
analyzed: upāvisi iti paduma vaṇṇena kara talena pupphāni khipitvā mama olokentī vātapāne nisīdi

original: Puṇḍarīkattacaṅgīti rattapadumavaṇṇasarīrā. Dve puṇṇamāyoti ahaṃ tadahu tasmiṃ chaṇadivase
analyzed: ratta paduma vaṇṇa sarīrā dve aham tasmin chaṇa divase

original: taṃ pārāvatapādasamānavaṇṇarattavatthanivatthaṃ disvā tassā mukhasobhaṃ olokento
analyzed: tam pārāvata pāda samāna vaṇṇa rattavattha nivattham disvā tassāḥ mukha sobham olokentaḥ

original: ekassa pācīnalokadhātuto ekassa abhipārakassa senāpatino nivesaneti dvinnaṃ puṇṇacandānaṃ
analyzed: ekassa pācīna lokadhātutaḥ ekassa abhipārakassa senāpatino nivesane iti dvinnam puṇṇa candānam

original: uggatattā dve puṇṇamāyo amaññiṃ. Aḷārapamhehīti visālapakhumehi. Subhehīti parisuddhehi.
analyzed: uggata ttā dve puṇṇamāyo amaññim aḷāra pamhehi iti visāla pakhumehi subhehi iti parisuddhehi

original: Vaggubhīti madhurākārehi. Udikkhatīti evarūpehi nettehi yasmiṃ khaṇe oloketi. Pabbateti
analyzed: vaggubhi iti madhura ākārehi udikkhati iti evarūpehi nettehi yasmin khaṇe oloketi pabbata iti

original: yathā himavantapabbate supupphitavane vīṇaṃ ādāya tantissarena attano saraṃ saṃsandantī
analyzed: yathā himavanta pabbate su pupphita vane vīṇam ādāya tantissarena attano saram saṃsandantī

original: kimpurisī kimpurisassa manaṃ harati, evaṃ harateva me manoti vippalapati.
analyzed: kimpurisī kimpurisassa manam harati evam haratā iva me manaḥ ti vippalapati

original: Brahatīti uḷārā. Sāmāti suvaṇṇavaṇṇasāmā. Ekaccavasanāti ekaccikavasanā, ekavatthanivatthāti
analyzed: brahatī iti uḷārā sāmā ati suvaṇṇa vaṇṇa sāmā ekacca vasanā ati ekaccika vasanā ekavattha nivatthā iti

original: attho. Bhantāvudikkhatīti saṇhakesā puthunalāṭā āyatabhamū visālakkhī tuṅganāsā rattoṭṭhā
analyzed: atthaḥ bhantau udikkhati iti saṇha kesā puthuna lāṭā āyata bhamū visa alakkhī tuṅga nāsā ratta uṭṭhā

original: setadantā tikhiṇadāṭhā suvaṭṭitagīvā sutanubāhu susaṇṭhitapayodharā karamitamajjhā
analyzed: seta dantā tikhiṇa dāṭhā su vaṭṭita gīvā su tanu bāhu su saṇṭhita payodharā kara mita majjhā

original: visālasoṇī suvaṇṇakadalisamānoru sā uttamitthī tasmiṃ khaṇe maṃ udikkhantī bhayena
analyzed: visāla soṇī suvaṇṇa kadali samāna ūru sā utta mitthī tasmin khaṇe mam udikkhantī bhayena

original: vanaṃ pavisitvā puna nivattitvā luddaṃ udikkhantī bhantā migīva maṃ udikkhatīti vadati.
analyzed: vanam pavisitvā puna nivattitvā luddam udikkhantī bhantā migī iva mama udikkhati iti vadati

original: Bāhāmudūti mudubāhā. Sannatadhīrakuttiyāti suphusitachekakaraṇā. Upaññissati manti
analyzed: mudu bāhā sannata dhīra kuttiyā ati su phusita cheka karaṇā upaññissati

original: sā subhā nārī kadā nu maṃ tehi tambanakhehi sīsato paṭṭhāya sannatena dhīrena karaṇena
analyzed: sā subhā nārī kadā nu mam tehi tamba nakhehi sīsataḥ paṭṭhāya sannatena dhīrena karaṇena

original: paritosessatīti patthento vilapati.
analyzed: paritosessati iti patthentaḥ vilapati

original: Kañcanajāluracchadāti kañcanamayauracchadālaṅkārā. Vilaggamajjhāti vilaggasarīrā
analyzed: kañcana jāluracchadā ati kañcana maya oracchada alaṅkārā vilagga majjhā ati vilagga sarīrā

original: tanumajjhimā. Brahāvaneti mahāvane. Lākhārasarattasucchavīti hatthapādatalaagganakhaoṭṭhamaṃsesu
analyzed: tanu majjhimā brahā vanā iti mahā vane lākhā rasa ratta su chavī iti hattha pāda tala agga nakha oṭṭha maṃsesu

original: lākhārasarattamaṇipavālavaṇṇā. Bindutthanīti udakapupphuḷaparimaṇḍalatthanī. Tatoti
analyzed: lākhā rasa rattamaṇi pavāla vaṇṇā bindutthanī ti udaka pupphuḷa parimaṇḍalatthanī

original: yadā taṃ tiṭṭhantiṃ addasaṃ, tato paṭṭhāya. Sakassa cittassāti attano cittassa anissaro
analyzed: yadā tam tiṭṭhantim addasam tatas paṭṭhāya sakassa cittassa ati attanaḥ cittassa anissaro

original: jātomhīti adhippāyo. Kañcinanti kañci “ayaṃ asuko nāmā”ti na jānāmi, ummattako jātomhīti
analyzed: jātaḥ amhi iti adhippāyaḥ ayam asukaḥ nāma ati na jānāmi ummattakaḥ jātaḥ amhi iti

original: vadati. Daṭṭhāti disvā. Na supāmīti neva rattiṃ, na divā niddaṃ labhāmi. So ca labbhethāti
analyzed: vadati daṭṭhāti disvā na supāmi iti na iva rattim na divā niddam labhāmi saḥ ca labbhetha ati

original: yaṃ me sakko varaṃ dadeyya, so ca me varo labbhetha, labheyyāhaṃ taṃ varanti attho.
analyzed: yam me sakkaḥ varam dadeyya saḥ ca me varaḥ labbhetha labheyya aham tam varanti attho

original: Atha te amaccā abhipārakassapi ārocayiṃsu – “sāmi rājā, nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karonto
analyzed: atha te amaccāḥ abhipārakassa api ārocayiṃsu sāmi rājā nagaram padakkhiṇam karontaḥ

original: tumhākaṃ gharadvāraṃ patvā nivattitvā pāsādaṃ abhiruhī”ti. So attano gehaṃ gantvā
analyzed: tumhākam ghara dvāram patvā nivattitvā pāsādam abhiruhi iti saḥ attanaḥ geham gantvā

original: ummādantiṃ āmantetvā “bhadde, kacci rañño attānaṃ dassesī”ti pucchi. “Sāmi, eko mahodaro
analyzed: ummādantim āmantetvā bhadde kacci raññaḥ attānam dassesi iti pucchi sāmi ekaḥ mahodaro

original: mahādāṭhiko rathe ṭhatvā āgato puriso atthi, ahaṃ taṃ rājā vā arājā vāti na jānāmi,
analyzed: mahā dāṭhikaḥ rathe ṭhatvā āgato puriso atthi aham tam rājā vā a rājā vā ati na jānāmi

original: eko issaroti pana vutte vātapāne ṭhatvā pupphāni khipiṃ, so tāvadeva nivattitvā gato”ti.
analyzed: ekaḥ issaraḥ ti pana vutte vāta pāne ṭhatvā pupphāni khipim so tāvat eva nivattitvā gataḥ ti

original: So taṃ sutvā “nāsitomhi tayā”ti punadivase pātova rājanivesanaṃ āruyha sirigabbhadvāre
analyzed: saḥ tam sutvā puna divase rāja nivesanam āruyha sirigabbha dvāre

original: ṭhatvā rañño ummādantiṃ nissāya vippalāpaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ ummādantiyā paṭibaddhacitto
analyzed: ṭhatvā raññaḥ ummādantim nissāya vippalāpam sutvā ayam ummādantiyā paṭibaddha citto

original: jāto, taṃ alabhanto marissati, rañño ca mama ca aguṇaṃ mocetvā imassa mayā jīvitaṃ
analyzed: jātaḥ tam a labhantaḥ marissati rañño ca mama ca aguṇam mocetvā imassa mayā jīvitam

original: dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti attano nivesanaṃ gantvā ekaṃ daḷhamantaṃ upaṭṭhākaṃ pakkosāpetvā,
analyzed: dātum vaṭṭati iti attanaḥ nivesanam gantvā ekam daḷhamantam upaṭṭhākam pakkosāpetvā

original: “tāta, asukaṭṭhāne susiracetiyarukkho atthi, tvaṃ kañci ajānāpetvā atthaṅgate sūriye
analyzed: tāta asuka ṭṭhāne susira cetiya rukkho atthi tvam kañci a jānāpetvā atthaṅgate sūriye

original: tattha gantvā antorukkhe nisīda, ahaṃ tattha balikammaṃ karonto taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā
analyzed: tattha gantvā antorukkhe nisīda aham tattha bali kammam karontaḥ tam ṭhānam patvā

original: devatā namassanto, ‘sāmi devarāja, amhākaṃ rājā nagaramhi chaṇe vattamāne akīḷitvā
analyzed: devatāḥ namassantaḥ sāmi devarāja amhākam rājā nagaramhi chaṇe vattamāne a kīḍitvā

original: sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā vippalapantova nipanno, mayaṃ tattha kāraṇaṃ na jānāma, rājā
analyzed: siri gabbham pavisitvā vippalapanto iva nipannaḥ mayam tattha kāraṇam na jānāma rājā

original: devatānaṃ bahūpakāro, anusaṃvaccharaṃ sahassaṃ vissajjetvā balikammaṃ karoti, idaṃ
analyzed: devatānam bahu upakāraḥ anusaṃvaccharam sahassam vissajjetvā bali kammam karoti idam

original: nāma nissāya rājā vippalapatīti ācikkhatha, rañño no jīvitadānaṃ dethā’ti yācissāmi,
analyzed: nāma nissāya rājā vippalapati iti ācikkhatha raññaḥ naḥ jīvita dānam detha ati yācissāmi

original: tvaṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe saddaṃ parivattitvā, ‘senāpati, tumhākaṃ rañño byādhi nāma natthi,
analyzed: tvam tasmin khaṇe saddam parivattitvā senāpati tumhākam raññaḥ byādhi nāma natthi

original: so pana tava bhariyāya ummādantiyā paṭibaddhacitto. Sace naṃ labhissati, jīvissati,
analyzed: saḥ pana tava bhariyāya ummādantiyā paṭibaddha citto sace nam labhissati jīvissati

original: no ce, marissati. Sace tassa jīvitaṃ icchasi, ummādantimassa dehī’ti vadeyyāsī”ti
analyzed: no ce marissati sace tassa jīvitam icchasi ummādantimassa dehi iti vadeyyāsi iti

original: evaṃ taṃ uggaṇhāpetvā uyyojesi.
analyzed: evam tam uggaṇhāpetvā uyyojesi

original: So gantvā tasmiṃ rukkhe nisīditvā punadivase senāpatinā amaccagaṇaparivutena taṃ
analyzed: saḥ gantvā tasmin rukkhe nisīditvā puna divase senāpatinā amacca gaṇa parivutena tam

original: ṭhānaṃ gantvā yācito tathā abhāsi. Senāpati “sādhū”ti vatvā devataṃ vanditvā amacce
analyzed: ṭhānam gantvā tathā senāpati sādhu iti vatvā devatam vanditvā

original: jānāpetvā nagaraṃ pavisitvā rājanivesanaṃ āruyha sirigabbhadvāraṃ ākoṭesi. Rājā satiṃ
analyzed: jānā apetvā nagaram pavisitvā rāja nivesanam āruyha sirigabbha dvāram ākoṭesi rājā satim

original: upaṭṭhapetvā “ko eso”ti pucchi. Ahaṃ, deva, abhipārakoti. Athassa rājā dvāraṃ vivari.
analyzed: upaṭṭhapetvā kaḥ esaḥ ti pucchi aham deva abhipārakaḥ ti athassa rājā dvāram

original: So pavisitvā rājānaṃ vanditvā gāthamāha –
analyzed: saḥ pavisitvā rājānam vanditvā gātham āha

original: “Bhūtāni me bhūtapatī namassato, āgamma yakkho idametadabravi;
analyzed: bhūtāni me bhūta patī namassataḥ āgamma yakkhaḥ idam etat abravi

original: Rañño mano ummadantyā niviṭṭho, dadāmi te taṃ paricārayassū”ti.
analyzed: raññaḥ manaḥ ummadantyā niviṭṭhaḥ dadāmi te tam paricārayassu iti

original: Tattha namassatoti tumhākaṃ vippalāpakāraṇajānanatthaṃ balikammaṃ katvā namassantassa. Tanti ahaṃ taṃ ummādantiṃ tumhākaṃ paricārikaṃ katvā dadāmīti.
analyzed: tattha namassatoti tumhākam vippalāpa kāraṇa jānana attham bali kammam katvā namassantassa tanti aham tam ummādantim tumhākam paricārikam katvā dadāmi iti

original: Atha naṃ rājā, “samma abhipāraka, mama ummādantiyā paṭibaddhacittatāya vippalapitabhāvaṃ
analyzed: atha nam rājā samma abhipāraka mama ummā dantiyā paṭibaddha citta tāya vippalapita bhāvam

original: yakkhāpi jānantī”ti pucchi. Āma, devāti. So “sabbalokena kira me lāmakabhāvo ñāto”ti
analyzed: yakkhā api jānanti iti pucchi āma deva ati saḥ sabba lokena kira me lāmaka bhāvaḥ ñāto ti

original: lajjidhamme patiṭṭhāya anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
analyzed: lajji dhamme patiṭṭhāya anantaram gātham āha

original: “Puññā ca dhaṃse amaro na camhi, jano ca me pāpamidañca jaññā;
analyzed: puññā ca dhaṃse amaraḥ na camhi jano ca me pāpam idam ca jaññā

original: Bhuso ca tyassa manaso vighāto, datvā piyaṃ ummadantiṃ adaṭṭhā”ti.
analyzed: bhuso ca tyassa manasaḥ vighātaḥ da tvā piyam ummadantim

original: Tattha dhaṃseti, samma abhipāraka, ahaṃ tāya saddhiṃ kilesavasena paricārento puññato
analyzed: tattha dhaṃsa iti samma abhipāraka aham tāya saddhim kilesa vasena paricārento puññatas

original: ca dhaṃseyyaṃ, tāya saddhiṃ paricāritamattena amaro ca na homi, mahājano ca me imaṃ
analyzed: ca dhaṃseyyam tāya saddhim paricārita mattena amaraḥ ca na homi mahājanaḥ ca me imaṃ

original: lāmakabhāvaṃ jāneyya, tato “ayuttaṃ raññā kata”nti garaheyya, tañca mama datvā pacchā
analyzed: lāmaka bhāvam jāneyya tatas ayuttam raññā katanti garaheyya tat ca mama da tvā pacchā

original: piyabhariyaṃ adaṭṭhā tava manaso vighāto cassāti attho.
analyzed: piya bhariyam adaṭṭhā tava manasaḥ vighātaḥ cassa ati attho

original: Sesā ubhinnampi vacanapaṭivacanagāthā honti –
analyzed: sesāḥ ubhinnam pi vacana paṭivacana gāthāḥ honti

original: “Janinda nāññatra tayā mayā vā, sabbāpi kammassa katassa jaññā;
analyzed: janinda na aññatra tayā mayā vā sabbā api kammassa katassa jaññā

original: Yaṃ te mayā ummadantī padinnā, bhusehi rājā vanathaṃ sajāhi.
analyzed: yam te mayā ummadantī padinnā bhusehi rājā vanatham sajāhi

original: “Yo pāpakaṃ kammakaraṃ manusso, so maññati māyida maññiṃsu aññe;
analyzed: yaḥ pāpakam kamma karam manussaḥ saḥ maññati māyida maññiṃsu aññe

original: Passanti bhūtāni karontametaṃ, yuttā ca ye honti narā pathabyā.
analyzed: passanti bhūtāni karontam etam yuttā ca ye honti narā pathabyā

original: “Añño nu te koci naro pathabyā, saddheyya lokasmi na me piyāti;
analyzed: aññaḥ nu te koci naro pathabyā saddheyya lokasmi na me piyāti

original: Bhuso ca tyassa manuso vighāto, datvā piyaṃ ummadantiṃ adaṭṭhā.
analyzed: bhuso ca tyassa manusaḥ vighātaḥ da tvā piyam ummadantim adaṭṭhā

original: “Addhā piyā mayha janinda esā, na sā mamaṃ appiyā bhūmipāla;
analyzed: addhā piyā janinda esā na sā mamam appiyā bhūmipāla

original: Gaccheva tvaṃ ummadantiṃ bhadante, sīhova selassa guhaṃ upeti.
analyzed: gaccha iva tvam ummadantim bhadante sīhaḥ uva selassa guham upeti

original: “Na pīḷitā attadukhena dhīrā, sukhapphalaṃ kamma pariccajanti;
analyzed: na pīḍitāḥ atta dukhena dhīrā sukha pphalam kamma pariccajanti

original: Sammohitā vāpi sukhena mattā, na pāpakammañca samācaranti.
analyzed: sammohitāḥ vā api sukhena mattāḥ na pāpa kammañca samācaranti

original: “Tuvañhi mātā ca pitā ca mayhaṃ, bhattā patī posako devatā ca;
analyzed: tuvan hi mātā ca pitā ca mayham bhattā patī posakaḥ devatā ca

original: Dāso ahaṃ tuyha saputtadāro, yathāsukhaṃ sāmi karohi kāmaṃ.
analyzed: dāsaḥ aham sa putta dāraḥ yathāsukham sāmi karohi kāmam

original: “Yo ‘issaromhī’ti karoti pāpaṃ, katvā ca so nuttasate paresaṃ;
analyzed: yaḥ issaromhi iti karoti pāpam katvā ca saḥ nuttasate paresam

original: Na tena so jīvati dīghamāyu, devāpi pāpena samekkhare naṃ.
analyzed: na tena saḥ jīvati dīgha māyu pāpena

original: “Aññātakaṃ sāmikehī padinnaṃ, dhamme ṭhitā ye paṭicchanti dānaṃ;
analyzed: aññātakam sāmikehī padinnam dhamme ṭhitāḥ ye paṭicchanti dānam

original: Paṭicchakā dāyakā cāpi tattha, sukhapphalaññeva karonti kammaṃ.
analyzed: paṭicchakāḥ dāyakā ca api tattha sukha pphalam eva karonti kammaṃ

original: “Añño nu te koci naro pathabyā, saddheyya lokasmi na me piyāti;
analyzed: aññaḥ nu te koci naro pathabyā saddheyya lokasmi na me piyāti

original: Bhuso ca tyassa manaso vighāto, datvā piyaṃ ummadantiṃ adaṭṭhā.
analyzed: bhuso ca tyassa manasaḥ vighātaḥ da tvā piyam ummadantim adaṭṭhā

original: “Addhā piyā mayha janinda esā, na sā mamaṃ appiyā bhūmipāla;
analyzed: addhā piyā janinda esā na sā mamam appiyā bhūmipāla

original: Yaṃ te mayā ummadantī padinnā, bhusehi rājā vanathaṃ sajāhi.
analyzed: yam te mayā ummadantī padinnā bhusehi rājā vanatham sajāhi

original: “Yo attadukkhena parassa dukkhaṃ, sukhena vā attasukhaṃ dahāti;
analyzed: yaḥ atta dukkhena parassa dukkham sukhena vā atta sukham dahāti

original: Yathevidaṃ mayha tathā paresaṃ, yo evaṃ jānāti sa vedi dhammaṃ.
analyzed: yathā iva idam tathā paresam yaḥ evam jānāti sa vedi dhammaṃ

original: “Añño nu te koci naro pathabyā, saddheyya lokasmi na me piyāti;
analyzed: aññaḥ nu te koci naro pathabyā saddheyya lokasmi na me piyāti

original: Bhuso ca tyassa manaso vighāto, datvā piyaṃ ummadantiṃ adaṭṭhā.
analyzed: bhuso ca tyassa manasaḥ vighātaḥ da tvā piyam ummadantim adaṭṭhā

original: “Janinda jānāsi piyā mamesā, na sā mamaṃ appiyā bhūmipāla;
analyzed: janinda jānāsi piyā mama isā na sā mamam appiyā bhūmipāla

original: Piyena te dammi piyaṃ janinda, piyadāyino deva piyaṃ labhanti.
analyzed: piyena te dammi piyam janinda piya dāyinaḥ deva piyam labhanti

original: “So nūnāhaṃ vadhissāmi, attānaṃ kāmahetukaṃ;
analyzed: saḥ nūna aham vadhissāmi attānam kāma hetukam

original: Na hi dhammaṃ adhammena, ahaṃ vadhitumussahe.
analyzed: na hi dhammam adhammena aham vadhitum ussahe

original: “Sace tuvaṃ mayha satiṃ janinda, na kāmayāsi naravīra seṭṭha;
analyzed: sace tuvam satim janinda na kāmayāsi nara vīra seṭṭha

original: Cajāmi naṃ sabbajanassa sibyā, mayā pamuttaṃ tato avhayesi naṃ.
analyzed: cajāmi nam sabba janassa sibyā mayā pamuttam tatas avhayesi nam

original: “Adūsiyaṃ ce abhipāraka tvaṃ, cajāsi katte ahitāya tyassa;
analyzed: a dūsiyam ce abhipāraka tvam cajāsi katte ahitāya tyassa

original: Mahā ca te upavādopi assa, na cāpi tyassa nagaramhi pakkho.
analyzed: mahā ca te upavādaḥ assa na ca api tyassa nagaramhi pakkho

original: “Ahaṃ sahissaṃ upavādametaṃ, nindaṃ pasaṃsaṃ garahañca sabbaṃ;
analyzed: aham sahissam upavādam etam nindam pasaṃsam garahan ca sabbam

original: Mametamāgacchatu bhūmipāla, yathāsukhaṃ sivi karohi kāmaṃ.
analyzed: mama etam āgacchatu bhūmipāla yathāsukham sivi karohi kāmam

original: “Yo neva nindaṃ na panappasaṃsaṃ, ādiyati garahaṃ nopi pūjaṃ;
analyzed: yaḥ na iva nindam na panappasaṃsam ādiyati garaham na upi pūjam

original: Sirī ca lakkhī ca apeti tamhā, āpo suvuṭṭhīva yathā thalamhā.
analyzed: sirī ca lakkhī ca apeti tamhā āpaḥ yathā thalamhā

original: “Yaṃ kiñci dukkhañca sukhañca etto, dhammātisārañca manovighātaṃ;
analyzed: yam kiñci dukkham ca sukham ca ettas dhamma atisāram ca manaḥ vighātam

original: Urasā ahaṃ paccuttarissāmi sabbaṃ, pathavī yathā thāvarānaṃ tasānaṃ.
analyzed: urasā aham paccuttarissāmi sabbam pathavī yathā thāvarānam tasānam

original: “Dhammātisārañca manovighātaṃ, dukkhañca nicchāmi ahaṃ paresaṃ;
analyzed: dhamma atisāram ca manaḥ vighātam dukkham ca nicchāmi aham paresam

original: Ekovimaṃ hārayissāmi bhāraṃ, dhamme ṭhito kiñci ahāpayanto.
analyzed: ekovimam hārayissāmi bhāram dhamme ṭhito kiñci a hāpayantaḥ

original: “Saggūpagaṃ puññakammaṃ janinda, mā me tuvaṃ antarāyaṃ akāsi;
analyzed: saggu upagam puñña kammam janinda mā me tuvam antarāyam akāsi

original: Dadāmi te ummadantiṃ pasanno, rājāva yaññe dhanaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ.
analyzed: dadāmi te ummadantim pasannaḥ rājā ava yaññe dhanam brāhmaṇānam

original: “Addhā tuvaṃ katte hitesi mayhaṃ, sakhā mamaṃ ummadantī tuvañca;
analyzed: addhā tuvam katte hitā isi mayham sakhā mamam ummadantī tuvam ca

original: Nindeyyu devā pitaro ca sabbe, pāpañca passaṃ abhisamparāyaṃ.
analyzed: nindeyyu devā pitaro ca sabbe pāpam ca passam abhisamparāyam

original: “Na hetadhammaṃ sivirāja vajjuṃ, sanegamā jānapadā ca sabbe;
analyzed: na hetadhammam sivi rāja vajjum sanegamā jānapadā ca sabbe

original: Yaṃ te mayā ummadantī padinnā, bhusehi rājā vanathaṃ sajāhi.
analyzed: yam te mayā ummadantī padinnā bhusehi rājā vanatham sajāhi

original: “Addhā tuvaṃ katte hitesi mayhaṃ, sakhā mamaṃ ummadantī tuvañca;
analyzed: addhā tuvam katte hitā isi mayham sakhā mamam ummadantī tuvam ca

original: Satañca dhammāni sukittitāni, samuddavelāva duraccayāni.
analyzed: satañca dhammāni su kittitāni samudda velā va duraccayāni

original: “Āhuneyyo mesi hitānukampī, dhātā vidhātā casi kāmapālo;
analyzed: āhuneyyaḥ mā asi hita anukampī dhātā vidhātā casi kāma pālaḥ

original: Tayī hutā rāja mahapphalā hi, kāmena me ummadantiṃ paṭiccha.
analyzed: tayī hutā rāja mahapphalā hi kāmena me ummadantim paṭiccha

original: “Addhā hi sabbaṃ abhipāraka tvaṃ, dhammaṃ acārī mama kattuputta;
analyzed: addhā hi sabbam abhipāraka tvam dhammam acārī mama kattu putta

original: Añño nu te ko idha sotthikattā, dvipado naro aruṇe jīvaloke.
analyzed: aññaḥ nu te kaḥ idha sotthikattā dvipadaḥ naraḥ aruṇe jīva loke

original: “Tuvaṃ nu seṭṭho tvamanuttarosi, tvaṃ dhammagutto dhammavidū sumedho;
analyzed: tuvam nu seṭṭhaḥ tvam anuttaraḥ asi tvam dhamma guttaḥ dhamma vidū sumedho

original: So dhammagutto cirameva jīva, dhammañca me desaya dhammapāla.
analyzed: so dhamma guttaḥ ciram eva jīva dhammam ca me desaya dhammapāla

original: “Tadiṅgha abhipāraka, suṇohi vacanaṃ mama;
analyzed: tad iṅgha abhipāraka suṇohi vacanam mama

original: Dhammaṃ te desayissāmi, sataṃ āsevitaṃ ahaṃ.
analyzed: dhammam te desayissāmi satam āsevitam aham

original: “Sādhu dhammarucī rājā, sādhu paññāṇavā naro;
analyzed: sādhu dhammaruciḥ rājā sādhu paññāṇavā naraḥ

original: Sādhu mittānamaddubbho, pāpassākaraṇaṃ sukhaṃ.
analyzed: sādhu pāpassa a karaṇam sukham

original: “Akkodhanassa vijite, ṭhitadhammassa rājino;
analyzed: akkodhanassa vijite ṭhita dhammassa rājinaḥ

original: Sukhaṃ manussā āsetha, sītacchāyāya saṅghare.
analyzed: sukham manussāḥ āsetha sīta chāyāya saṅghare

original: “Na cāhametaṃ abhirocayāmi, kammaṃ asamekkhakataṃ asādhu;
analyzed: na ca aham etam abhirocayāmi kammam a samekkha katam asādhu

original: Ye vāpi ñatvāna sayaṃ karonti, upamā imā mayhaṃ tuvaṃ suṇohi.
analyzed: ye vā api sayam karonti upamāḥ imāḥ mayham tuvam suṇohi

original: “Gavaṃ ce taramānānaṃ, jimhaṃ gacchati puṅgavo;
analyzed: gavam ce taramānānam jimham gacchati puṅgavaḥ

original: Sabbā tā jimhaṃ gacchanti, nette jimhaṃ gate sati.
analyzed: sabbā tāḥ jimham gacchanti na id te jimham gate sati

original: “Evameva manussesu, yo hoti seṭṭhasammato;
analyzed: evam eva manussesu yaḥ hoti seṭṭha sammataḥ

original: So ce adhammaṃ carati, pageva itarā pajā;
analyzed: saḥ ce adhammam carati pagā iva itarā pajā

original: Sabbaṃ raṭṭhaṃ dukhaṃ seti, rājā ce hoti adhammiko.
analyzed: sabbam raṭṭham dukham seti rājā ce hoti adhammikaḥ

original: “Gavaṃ ce taramānānaṃ, ujuṃ gacchati puṅgavo;
analyzed: gavam ce taramānānam ujum gacchati puṅgavaḥ

original: Sabbā gāvī ujuṃ yanti, nette ujuṃ gate sati.
analyzed: sabbā gāvī ujum yanti na id te ujum gate sati

original: “Evameva manussesu, yo hoti seṭṭhasammato;
analyzed: evam eva manussesu yaḥ hoti seṭṭha sammataḥ

original: So sace dhammaṃ carati, pageva itarā pajā;
analyzed: so sace dhammam carati pagā iva itarā pajā

original: Sabbaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sukhaṃ seti, rājā ce hoti dhammiko.
analyzed: sabbam raṭṭham sukham seti rājā ce hoti dhammikaḥ

original: “Na cāpāhaṃ adhammena, amarattamabhipatthaye;
analyzed: na ca apa aham adhammena amarattam abhipatthaye

original: Imaṃ vā pathaviṃ sabbaṃ, vijetuṃ abhipāraka.
analyzed: imam vā pathavim sabbam vijetum abhipāraka

original: “Yañhi kiñci manussesu, ratanaṃ idha vijjati;
analyzed: yat hi kiñci manussesu ratanam idha vijjati

original: Gāvo dāso hiraññañca, vatthiyaṃ haricandanaṃ.
analyzed: gāvaḥ dāsaḥ hiraññañca vatthiyam hari candanam

original: “Assitthiyo ratanaṃ maṇikañca, yañcāpi me candimasūriyā abhipālayanti;
analyzed: assitthiyaḥ ratanam maṇikañca yat ca api me candima sūriyāḥ abhipālayanti

original: Na tassa hetu visamaṃ careyyaṃ, majjhe sivīnaṃ usabhomhi jāto.
analyzed: na tassa hetu visamam careyyam majjhe sivīnam usabhomhi jātaḥ

original: “Netā hitā uggato raṭṭhapālo, dhammaṃ sivīnaṃ apacāyamāno;
analyzed: netā hitā uggataḥ raṭṭha pālaḥ dhammam sivīnam apacāyamānaḥ

original: So dhammamevānuvicintayanto, tasmā sake cittavase na vatto.
analyzed: saḥ dhammam eva anuvicintayantaḥ tasmai sake citta vase na vatto

original: “Addhā tuvaṃ mahārāja, niccaṃ abyasanaṃ sivaṃ;
analyzed: addhā tuvam mahā rāja niccam a byasanam sivam

original: Karissasi ciraṃ rajjaṃ, paññā hi tava tādisī.
analyzed: karissasi ciram rajjam paññā hi tava tādisī

original: “Etaṃ te anumodāma, yaṃ dhammaṃ nappamajjasi;
analyzed: etam te anumodāma yam dhammam na ppamajjasi

original: Dhammaṃ pamajja khattiyo, raṭṭhā cavati issaro.
analyzed: dhammam pamajja khattiyaḥ raṭṭhā cavati issaraḥ

original: “Dhammaṃ cara mahārāja, mātāpitūsu khattiya;
analyzed: dhammam cara mahā rāja mātā pitūsu khattiya

original: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
analyzed: idha dhammam caritvāna rāja saggam gamissasi

original: “Dhammaṃ cara mahārāja, puttadāresu khattiya;
analyzed: dhammam cara mahā rāja putta dāresu khattiya

original: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
analyzed: idha dhammam caritvāna rāja saggam gamissasi

original: “Dhammaṃ cara mahārāja, mittāmaccesu khattiya;
analyzed: dhammam cara mahā rāja mittāmaccesu khattiya

original: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
analyzed: idha dhammam caritvāna rāja saggam gamissasi

original: “Dhammaṃ cara mahārāja, vāhanesu balesu ca;
analyzed: dhammam cara mahā rāja vāhanesu balesu ca

original: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
analyzed: idha dhammam caritvāna rāja saggam gamissasi

original: “Dhammaṃ cara mahārāja, gāmesu nigamesu ca;
analyzed: dhammam cara mahā rāja gāmesu nigamesu ca

original: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
analyzed: idha dhammam caritvāna rāja saggam gamissasi

original: “Dhammaṃ cara mahārāja, raṭṭhesu janapadesu ca;
analyzed: dhammam cara mahā rāja raṭṭhesu janapadesu ca

original: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
analyzed: idha dhammam caritvāna rāja saggam gamissasi

original: “Dhammaṃ cara mahārāja, samaṇabrāhmaṇesu ca;
analyzed: dhammam cara mahā rāja samaṇa brāhmaṇesu ca

original: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
analyzed: idha dhammam caritvāna rāja saggam gamissasi

original: “Dhammaṃ cara mahārāja, migapakkhīsu khattiya;
analyzed: dhammam cara mahā rāja miga pakkhīsu khattiya

original: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
analyzed: idha dhammam caritvāna rāja saggam gamissasi

original: “Dhammaṃ cara mahārāja, dhammo ciṇṇo sukhāvaho;
analyzed: dhammam cara mahā rāja dhammaḥ ciṇṇaḥ sukha āvahaḥ

original: Idha dhammaṃ caritvāna, rāja saggaṃ gamissasi.
analyzed: idha dhammam caritvāna rāja saggam gamissasi

original: “Dhammaṃ cara mahārāja, saindā devā sabrahmakā;
analyzed: dhammam cara mahā rāja saindā devā sa brahmakā

original: Suciṇṇena divaṃ pattā, mā dhammaṃ rāja pāmado”ti.
analyzed: su ciṇṇena divam pattāḥ mā dhammam rāja pāmada uti

original: Tattha sabbāpīti, janinda, ahametaṃ ekakova paṭicchādetvā ānessāmi, tasmā ṭhapetvā
analyzed: tattha sabbā api iti janinda aham etam ekakaḥ iva paṭicchādetvā ānessāmi tasmai ṭhapetvā

original: mamañca tuvañca aññā sabbāpi pajā imassa katassa ākāramattampi na jaññā na jānissanti.
analyzed: aññā sabbā api pajā imassa katassa ākāra mattam pi na jaññā na jānissanti

original: Bhusehīti tāya saddhiṃ abhiramanto attano taṇhāvanathaṃ bhusaṃ karohi vaḍḍhehi manorathaṃ
analyzed: bhusehi iti tāya saddhim abhiramantaḥ attanaḥ taṇhā vanatham bhusam karohi vaḍḍhehi manoratham

original: pūrehi. Sajāhīti manorathaṃ pana pūretvā sace te na ruccati, atha naṃ sajāhi mayhameva
analyzed: pūrehi sajāhi iti manoratham pana pūretvā sace te na ruccati atha nam sajāhi mayham eva

original: paṭidehi. Kammakaranti, samma abhipāraka, yo manusso pāpakaṃ kammaṃ karonto, so pacchā
analyzed: paṭidehi kamma karanti samma abhipāraka yaḥ manusso pāpakam kammam karontaḥ so pacchā

original: mā idha aññe idaṃ pāpakammaṃ maññiṃsu mā jānantūti maññati cinteti, ducintitametaṃ
analyzed: mā idha aññe idam pāpa kammam maññiṃsu mā jānantu uti maññati cintā iti du cintitam etam

original: tassa. Kiṃkāraṇā? Passanti bhūtāni karontametanti ye ca buddhā paccekabuddhā buddhaputtā
analyzed: tassa kiṃkāraṇā passanti bhūtāni karontam etat ti ye ca buddhā paccekabuddhāḥ buddha puttā

original: iddhiyā yuttā, te ca naṃ passantiyeva. Na me piyāti, samma abhipāraka, añño nu te
analyzed: iddhiyā yuttā te ca nam passantiyā iva na me piyā ati samma abhipāraka aññaḥ nu te

original: koci “idha lokasmiṃ sakalāyapi pathaviyā na me ummādantī piyā”ti evaṃ saddaheyya.
analyzed: koci lokasmin pathaviyā na me ummādantī evam sat daheyya

original: Sīhova selassa guhanti, mahārāja, sace tvaṃ taṃ idha na ānesi, atha yathā sīho kilesapariḷāhe
analyzed: sīhaḥ uva selassa mahā rāja sace tvam tam idha naḥ ānesi atha yathā sīhaḥ kilesa pariḷāhe

original: uppanne sīhapotikāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ maṇiguhaṃ upeti, evaṃ tassā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gaccha,
analyzed: uppanne sīha potikāya vasana ṭṭhānam maṇi guham upeti evam tassāḥ vasana ṭṭhānam gaccha

original: tattha attano patthanaṃ pūrehīti. Sukhapphalanti, samma abhipāraka, paṇḍitā attano
analyzed: tattha attano patthanam pūrehi iti sukha pphalanti samma abhipāraka paṇḍitāḥ attano

original: dukkhena phuṭṭhā samānā na sukhavipākadāyakakammaṃ pariccajanti, sammohitā vāpi hutvā
analyzed: dukkhena phuṭṭhā samānā na sukha vipāka dāyaka kammam pariccajanti sammohitāḥ vā api hutvā

original: mohena mūḷhā sukhena mattā pāpakammaṃ nāma na samācaranti. Yathāsukhaṃ, sāmi, karohi
analyzed: mohena mūḍhā sukhena mattā pāpa kammam nāma na samācaranti yathāsukham sāmi karohi

original: kāmanti, sāmi sivirāja, attano dāsiṃ paricārentassa garahā nāma natthi, tvaṃ yathāsukhaṃ
analyzed: kāmanti sāmi sivi rāja attanaḥ dāsim paricārentassa garahā nāma natthi tvam yathāsukham

original: yathājjhāsayaṃ kāmaṃ karohi, attano icchaṃ pūrehīti. Na tena so jīvatīti, samma abhipāraka,
analyzed: yathā ajjhāsayam kāmam karohi iccham pūrehi iti na tena saḥ jīvati iti samma abhipāraka

original: yo “issaromhī”ti pāpaṃ karoti, katvā ca kiṃ maṃ devamanussā vakkhantīti na uttasati
analyzed: yaḥ issaromhi iti pāpam karoti katvā ca kim mama deva manussāḥ vakkhanti iti na uttasati

original: na ottappati, so tena kammena na ca dīghakālaṃ jīvati, khippameva marati, devatāpi
analyzed: na ottappati saḥ tena kammena na ca dīgha kālam jīvati khippam eva marati devatā api

original: pana “kiṃ imassa pāparañño rajjena, varamassa vāḷukaghaṭaṃ gale bandhitvā maraṇa”nti
analyzed: pana kim imassa pāpa raññaḥ rajjena varamassa vāḷuka ghaṭam gale bandhitvā

original: lāmakena cakkhunā olokenti.
analyzed: lāmakena cakkhunā olokenti

original: Aññātakanti, mahārāja, aññesaṃ santakaṃ tehi sāmikehi padinnaṃ dānaṃ ye attano dhamme
analyzed: aññātakam ti mahā rāja aññesam santakam tehi sāmikehi padinnam dānam ye attanaḥ dhamme

original: ṭhitā paṭicchanti, te tattha paṭicchakā ca dāyakā ca sabbepi sukhapphalameva kammaṃ
analyzed: ṭhitā paṭicchanti te tattha paṭicchakā ca dāyakā ca sabbe pi sukha pphalam eva kammaṃ

original: karonti. Paṭiggāhake hi paṭiggaṇhante taṃ dānaṃ dāyakassa mahantaṃ vipākaṃ detīti.

analyzed: atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo pāpa tthā ati papatitaḥ yathā dubbalako iti yathā dubbalakaḥ pateyya

original: tatheva patito. Susūti susunāmakā caṇḍamacchā. Pasayhakārāti anicchamānakaṃyeva balakkārena.

original: Vipakkhakanti viddhastapakkhakaṃ.
analyzed: vipakkhakam ti viddha sta pakkhakam

original: Giddhā ce na vamissantīti yadi giddhā hutvā kāme na vamissanti, na chaḍḍessanti.

original: Kākapaññāva teti kākassa samānapaññā iti te buddhādayo paṇḍitā vidū vidanti, jānantīti
analyzed: kāka paññā va te iti kākassa samāna paññāḥ iti te buddha ādayaḥ paṇḍitāḥ vidū vidanti jānanti iti

original: attho. Atthasandassanīti atthappakāsikā. Tvañca paññāyaseti tvañca paññāyissasi.
analyzed: atthaḥ attha sandassanī iti attha ppakāsikā tvam ca paññāyase iti tvam ca paññāyissasi

analyzed: dassitaḥ samudda majjhe kākassa hatthi kuṇape patiṭṭham a labhitvā vināsam patta kālaḥ

analyzed: viya saṃsāre pañca kāma guṇā kākaḥ viya bāla puthujjanaḥ kākassa kuṇapam khāditvā pānīya pivana kālaḥ

analyzed: māretvā appamattakam yā iva kālam rajja sukham anubhavitvā tatas paṭṭhāya bhīto citta ssādam

original: alabhanto niraye kammakaraṇappatto viya ahosi. So bodhisattaṃ anussaritvā “sahāyo
analyzed: a labhantaḥ niraye kamma karaṇa ppatto viya ahosi saḥ bodhisattam anussaritvā sahāyaḥ

original: me ‘pitughātakammaṃ bhāriyaṃ, mā karī’ti paṭisedhetvā maṃ attano kathaṃ gāhāpetuṃ

original: asakkonto attānaṃ niddosaṃ katvā palāyi. Sace so idha abhavissa, na me pitughātakammaṃ
analyzed: a sakkontaḥ attānam niddosam katvā palāyi sace saḥ idha abhavissa na me pitu ghāta kammam

original: kātuṃ adassa, idampi me bhayaṃ hareyya, kahaṃ nu kho so etarahi viharati. Sace tassa
analyzed: kātum adassaḥ idam pi me bhayam hareyya kaham nu kho saḥ etarahi viharati sace tassa

original: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ jāneyyaṃ, pakkosāpeyyaṃ, ko nu kho me tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āroceyyā”ti
analyzed: vasana ṭṭhānam jāneyyam pakkosāpeyyam kaḥ nu kho me tassa vasana ṭṭhānam āroceyya ati

original: cintesi. So tato paṭṭhāya antepure ca rājasabhāyañca bodhisattasseva vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
analyzed: cintesi saḥ tatas paṭṭhāya antepure ca rāja sabhāyam ca bodhisattassa iva vaṇṇam bhāsati

original: Evaṃ addhāne gate bodhisatto “rājā maṃ sarati, mayā tattha gantvā tassa dhammaṃ desetvā
analyzed: evam addhāne gate bodhisatto rājā mam sarati mayā tattha gantvā tassa dhammam desetvā

original: taṃ nibbhayaṃ katvā āgantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti paṇṇāsa vassāni himavante vasitvā pañcasatatāpasaparivuto
analyzed: tam nibbhayam katvā āgantum vaṭṭati iti paṇṇāsa vassāni himavante vasitvā pañca sata tāpasa parivutaḥ

original: ākāsenāgantvā dāyapasse nāma uyyāne otaritvā isigaṇaparivuto silāpaṭṭe nisīdi. Uyyānapālo
analyzed: ākāsena āgantvā dāyapasse nāma uyyāne otaritvā isi gaṇa parivutaḥ silā paṭṭe nisīdi uyyāna pālaḥ

original: taṃ disvā “bhante, gaṇasatthā konāmo”ti pucchitvā “saṃkiccapaṇḍito nāmā”ti ca sutvā
analyzed: tam disvā bhante gaṇasatthā ko nāmā iti pucchitvā saṃkicca paṇḍitaḥ nāma ati ca sutvā

original: sayampi sañjānitvā “bhante, yāvāhaṃ rājānaṃ ānemi, tāva idheva hotha, amhākaṃ rājā
analyzed: sayam pi sañjānitvā bhante yāva aham rājānam ānemi tāva idha iva hotha amhākam rājā

original: tumhe daṭṭhukāmo”ti vatvā vegena rājakulaṃ gantvā tassa āgatabhāvaṃ rañño ārocesi.
analyzed: tumhe daṭṭhu kāmaḥ iti vatvā vegena rājakulam gantvā tassa āgata bhāvam raññaḥ ārocesi

original: Rājā tassa santikaṃ gantvā kattabbayuttakaṃ upahāraṃ katvā pañhaṃ pucchi. Tamatthaṃ
analyzed: rājā tassa santikam gantvā kattabba yuttakam upahāram katvā pañham pucchi tam attham

original: pakāsento satthā āha –
analyzed: pakāsentaḥ satthā āha

original: “Disvā nisinnaṃ rājānaṃ, brahmadattaṃ rathesabhaṃ;

analyzed: athassa paṭivedesi yassa asi anukampakaḥ

analyzed: mitta amacca paribyūḍhaḥ agamāsi rathesabhaḥ

original: Vālabījanimuṇhīsaṃ, khaggaṃ chattañcupāhanaṃ.

analyzed: paṭivedesi yassa asi iti vadantaḥ ārocesi iti atthaḥ yassa asi iti mahā rāja yassa tvam

original: Tatoti, bhikkhave, so rājā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā tato tassa vacanato anantarameva.

analyzed: nikkhippa ti nikkhipitvā tassa kira uyyāna dvāram patvā ava etat ahosi pabbajitā nāma

analyzed: garu ṭhāniyā saṃkicca tāpasassa santikam uddhata vesena gantum ayuttam ti saḥ maṇi citta suvaṇṇa daṇḍam

analyzed: paṭicchadanti tam eva rāja kakudha bhaṇḍam ṭhapayitvā bhaṇḍāgārikassa hatthe da tvā

original: Dāyapassasminti evaṃnāmake uyyāne. Atha kālaṃ amaññathāti atha so idāni me pañhaṃ
analyzed: dāyapassasmin ti evaṃnāmake uyyāne atha kālam amaññathāti atha saḥ idāni me pañham

analyzed: pucchitum pāḷiyam pana yathākālam ti āgatam tassa kāla anurūpena pañha pucchanam

analyzed: amaññatha ati attho paṭipajjatha ati paṭipajji pecca ati paṭigantvā para lokassa vā nāma etam

analyzed: tam sutvā bodhisatto tena hi mahā rāja suṇohi iti vatvā ovādam tāva adāsi satthā tam attham pakāsentaḥ āha

original: “Isī avaca saṃkicco, kāsīnaṃ raṭṭhavaḍḍhanaṃ;

original: Āsīnaṃ dāyapassasmiṃ, mahārāja suṇohi me.

original: “Uppathena vajantassa, yo maggamanusāsati;

analyzed: tassa ce vacanam kayirā na assa maggeyya kaṇṭakaḥ

analyzed: adhammam paṭipannassa yaḥ dhammam anusāsati

analyzed: tassa ce vacanam kayirā na saḥ gaccheyya duggatin ti

original: Tattha uppathenāti corehi pariyuṭṭhitamaggena. Maggamanusāsatīti khemamaggaṃ akkhāti.

original: Yo dhammanti yo sucaritadhammaṃ. Na soti so puriso nirayādibhedaṃ duggatiṃ na gaccheyya.

original: Uppathasadiso hi, mahārāja, adhammo, khemamaggasadiso sucaritadhammo, tvaṃ pana pubbe

analyzed: pitaram ghātetvā idāni socasi paṇḍitānam ovādam a karontaḥ nāma cora magga paṭipanno

analyzed: mahā byasanam pāpuṇāti iti

original: “Adhammacārino rāja, narā visamajīvino;

analyzed: yam gatim pa id ca gacchanti niraye te suṇohi me

original: Athāparo mahāvīci, tāpano ca patāpano.

original: Ākiṇṇā luddakammehi, paccekā soḷasussadā.

original: Samantā yojanasataṃ, phuṭā tiṭṭhanti sabbadā.
analyzed: samantā yojana satam phuṭā tiṭṭhanti sabbadā

analyzed: ete patanti niraye uddhaṃpādāḥ avaṃsirā

original: Isīnaṃ ativattāro, saññatānaṃ tapassinaṃ.

original: Saṃvacchare asaṅkheyye, narā kibbisakārino.

original: Nirayā nādhigacchanti, dvāraṃ nikkhamanesino.

original: “Puratthimena dhāvanti, tato dhāvanti pacchato;
analyzed: puratthimena dhāvanti tatas dhāvanti pacchatas

analyzed: uttarena api dhāvanti tatas dhāvanti dakkhiṇam

original: Yaṃ yañhi dvāraṃ gacchanti, taṃ tadeva pidhīyare.

original: “Āsīvisaṃva kupitaṃ, tejassiṃ duratikkamaṃ;

original: “Atikāyo mahissāso, ajjuno kekakādhipo;

original: Sahassabāhu ucchinno, isimāsajja gotamaṃ.
analyzed: sahassa bāhuḥ ucchinnaḥ isim āsajja gotamam

original: “Arajaṃ rajasā vacchaṃ, kisaṃ avakiriya daṇḍakī;

analyzed: aññoññam musalāḥ hantvā sampattāḥ yama sādhanam

original: “Athāyaṃ isinā satto, antalikkhacaro pure;

original: Pāvekkhi pathaviṃ cecco, hīnatto pattapariyāyaṃ.
analyzed: pāvekkhi pathavim ca iccaḥ hīnatto patta pariyāyam

original: Aduṭṭhacitto bhāseyya, giraṃ saccūpasaṃhitaṃ.
analyzed: a duṭṭha cittaḥ bhāseyya giram saccu upasaṃhitam

original: “Manasā ce paduṭṭhena, yo naro pekkhate muniṃ;

original: Vijjācaraṇasampannaṃ, gantā so nirayaṃ adho.
analyzed: vijjā ācaraṇa sampannam gantā saḥ nirayam adhas

original: Anapaccā adāyādā, tālavatthu bhavanti te.

original: Sa kāḷasutte niraye, cirarattāya paccati.
analyzed: sa kāḷasutte niraye cira rattāya paccati

original: Tāpayitvā janapadaṃ, tāpane pecca paccati.
analyzed: tāpayitvā janapadam tāpane pecca paccati

original: “So ca vassasahassāni, sataṃ dibbāni paccati;

analyzed: mayā ca tuyham kathitā porāṇakehi ca kathitāya iva ākiṇṇā ati paripuṇṇā paccekā soḷasussadā ati

original: etesaṃ nirayānaṃ ekekassa catūsu dvāresu ekekasmiṃ cattāro cattāro katvā soḷasa soḷasa
analyzed: etesam nirayānam ekekassa catūsu dvāresu ekekasmin cattāraḥ cattāraḥ katvā soḷasa soḷasa

original: ussadanirayāti sabbepi sataṃ aṭṭhavīsati ca ussadanirayā aṭṭha ca mahānirayāti chattiṃsanirayasataṃ.
analyzed: ussada nirayā ti sabbe pi satam aṭṭhavīsati ca ussada nirayāḥ aṭṭha ca mahānirayā ti chattiṃsa niraya satam

original: Kadariyatāpanāti sabbete kadariyānaṃ tāpanā. Balavadukkhatāya ghorā. Kammanibbattānaṃ
analyzed: kadariya tāpanā ati sabbe ete kadariyānam tāpanāḥ balava dukkha tāya ghorāḥ kamma nibbattānam

original: accīnaṃ atthitāya accimanto. Bhayassa mahantatāya mahabbhayā. Diṭṭhamattā vā sutamattā
analyzed: accīnam atthitāya accimantaḥ bhayassa mahantatāya mahabbhayāḥ diṭṭha mattā vā suta mattā

original: vā lomāni haṃsantīti lomahaṃsanarūpā ca. Bhīsanatāya bhesmā. Bhayajananatāya paṭibhayā.
analyzed: vā lomāni haṃsanti iti loma haṃsana rūpā ca bhīsa natāya bhesmā bhaya janana tāya paṭibhayā

original: Sukhābhāvena dukhā. Catukkaṇṇāti sabbepi caturassamañjūsasadisā. Vibhattāti catudvāravasena
analyzed: sukha abhāvena dukhā catukkaṇṇā ti sabbe pi catu rassa mañjūsa sadisā vibhattā ati catu dvāra vasena

original: vibhattā. Bhāgaso mitāti dvāravīthīnaṃ vasena koṭṭhāse ṭhapetvā mitā. Ayasā paṭikujjitāti
analyzed: vibhattā bhāgasaḥ mitā ati dvāra vīthīnam vasena koṭṭhāse ṭhapetvā mitā ayasā paṭikujjitā ati

original: sabbepi navayojanikena ayakapālena paṭicchannā. Phuṭā tiṭṭhantīti sabbepi ettakaṃ
analyzed: sabbe api nava yojanikena aya kapālena paṭicchannā phuṭā tiṭṭhanti iti sabbe pi ettakam

original: ṭhānaṃ anupharitvā tiṭṭhanti.
analyzed: ṭhānam anupharitvā tiṭṭhanti

original: Uddhaṃpādā avaṃsirāti evaṃ tesu tesu nirayesu samparivattitvā punappunaṃ patamāne
analyzed: uddhaṃpādāḥ evam tesu tesu nirayesu samparivattitvā punappunam patamāne

original: sandhāyāha. Ativattāroti pharusavācāhi atikkamitvā vattāro. Mahānirayesu kira yebhuyyena
analyzed: sandhāya āha ativattāraḥ iti pharusa vācāhi atikkamitvā vattāraḥ mahānirayesu kira yebhuyyena

original: dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇesu katāparādhāva paccanti, tasmā evamāha. Te bhūnahunoti te
analyzed: dhammika samaṇa brāhmaṇesu kata aparādhā ava paccanti tasmai evam āha te te

original: isīnaṃ ativattāro attano vuḍḍhiyā hatattā bhūnahuno koṭṭhāsakatā macchā viya paccanti.
analyzed: isīnam ativattāraḥ attanaḥ vuḍḍhiyā hata ttāḥ bhūnahunaḥ koṭṭhāsa katāḥ macchāḥ viya paccanti

original: Asaṅkheyyeti gaṇetuṃ asakkuṇeyye. Kibbisakārinoti dāruṇakammakārino. Nikkhamanesinoti
analyzed: asaṅkheyye iti gaṇetum a sakkuṇeyye kibbisa kārinaḥ ti dāruṇa kamma kārinaḥ nikkhamanesinaḥ ti

original: nirayā nikkhamanaṃ esantāpi gavesantāpi nikkhamanadvāraṃ nādhigacchanti. Puratthimenāti
analyzed: nirayāḥ nikkhamanam esantā api gavesantā api nikkhamana dvāram na adhigacchanti puratthimena ati

original: yadā taṃ dvāraṃ apārutaṃ hoti, atha tadabhimukhā dhāvanti, tesaṃ tattha chaviādīni
analyzed: yadā tam dvāram a pārutam hoti atha tad abhimukhāḥ dhāvanti tesam tattha chavi ādīni

original: jhāyanti. Dvārasamīpaṃ pattānañca tesaṃ taṃ pidhīyati, pacchimadvāraṃ apārutaṃ viya
analyzed: jhāyanti dvāra samīpam pattānam ca tesam tam pidhīyati pacchima dvāram a pārutam viya

original: khāyati. Esa nayo sabbattha. Na sādhurūpeti vuttappakāraṃ sappaṃ viya sādhurūpe isayo
analyzed: khāyati esa nayo sabbattha na sādhu rūpā iti vutta ppakāram sappam viya sādhu rūpe

original: na āsīde, na pharusavacanena kāyakammena vā ghaṭṭento upagaccheyya. Kiṃkāraṇā? Saññatānaṃ
analyzed: na āsīde na pharusa vacanena kāya kammena vā ghaṭṭentaḥ upagaccheyya kiṃkāraṇā saññatānam

original: tapassīnaṃ āsāditattā aṭṭhasu mahānirayesu mahādukkhassa anubhavitabbattā.
analyzed: tapassīnam āsādita ttā aṭṭhasu mahānirayesu mahā dukkhassa anubhavitabba ttā

original: Idāni ye rājāno tathārūpe āsādetvā taṃ dukkhaṃ pattā, te dassetuṃ “atikāyo”tiādimāha.
analyzed: idāni ye rājānaḥ tathārūpe āsādetvā tam dukkham pattā te dassetuṃ atikāya iti ādim āha

original: Tattha atikāyoti balasampanno mahākāyo. Mahissāsoti mahādhanuggaho. Kekakādhipoti
analyzed: tattha atikāyaḥ ti bala sampannaḥ mahā kāyaḥ mahissāsaḥ ti mahā dhanuggaho kekaka adhipo ti

original: kekakaraṭṭhādhipati. Sahassabāhūti pañcahi dhanuggahasatehi bāhusahassena āropetabbaṃ
analyzed: kekakaraṭṭha adhipati sahassabāhu uti pañcahi dhanuggaha satehi bāhu sahassena āropetabbam

original: dhanuṃ āropanasamatthatāya sahassabāhu. Vibhavaṅgatoti vināsaṃ patto. Vatthūni pana
analyzed: dhanum āropana samattha tāya sahassa bāhu vibha vaṅgato ti vināsam pattaḥ vatthūni pana

original: sarabhaṅgajātake vitthāritāni. Upahacca mananti attano cittaṃ padūsetvā. Mātaṅgasminti
analyzed: sarabhaṅga jātake vitthāritāni upahacca mananti attanaḥ cittam padūsetvā mātaṅgasmin ti

original: mātaṅgapaṇḍite. Vatthu mātaṅgajātake vaṇṇitaṃ. Kaṇhadīpāyanāsajjāti kaṇhadīpāyanaṃ
analyzed: mātaṅga paṇḍite vatthu mātaṅga jātake vaṇṇitam kaṇhadīpāyana asajjāti kaṇhadīpāyanam

original: āsajja. Yamasādhananti nirayapālakarañño āṇāpavattaṭṭhānaṃ. Vatthu ghaṭapaṇḍitajātake
analyzed: āsajja yama sādhanam ti niraya pāla karaññaḥ āṇāpa vatta ṭṭhānam vatthu ghaṭa paṇḍita jātake

original: vitthāritaṃ. Isināti kapilatāpasena. Pāvekkhīti paviṭṭho. Ceccoti cetiyarājā. Hīnattoti
analyzed: vitthāritam isinā ati kapila tāpasena pāvekkhi iti paviṭṭhaḥ cecco ti cetiya rājā

original: parihīnattabhāvo antarahitaiddhi. Pattapariyāyanti pariyāyaṃ maraṇakālaṃ patvā. Vatthu
analyzed: parihīna atta bhāvaḥ pariyāyam maraṇa kālam patvā vatthu

original: cetiyajātake kathitaṃ.
analyzed: cetiya jātake kathitam

original: Tasmā hīti yasmā cittavasiko hutvā isīsu aparajjhitvā aṭṭhasu mahānirayesu paccati,
analyzed: tasmai hi iti yasmai cittavasikaḥ hutvā isīsu aparajjhitvā aṭṭhasu mahānirayesu paccati

original: tasmā hi. Chandāgamananti chandādicatubbidhampi agatigamanaṃ. Paduṭṭhenāti kuddhena.
analyzed: tasmā hi chanda āgamanam ti chanda ādi catubbidham pi agati gamanam paduṭṭhena ati kuddhena

original: Gantā so nirayaṃ adhoti so tena adhogamaniyena kammena adhonirayameva gacchati. Pāḷiyaṃ
analyzed: gantā saḥ nirayam adha iti saḥ tena adhogamaniyena kammena adhas nirayam eva gacchati pāḷiyam

original: pana “nirayussada”nti likhitaṃ, tassa ussadanirayaṃ gacchatīti attho. Vuḍḍheti vayovuḍḍhe
analyzed: pana niraya ussadanti likhitam tassa ussada nirayam gacchati iti atthaḥ vuḍḍhā iti vayaḥ vuḍḍhe

original: ca guṇavuḍḍhe ca. Anapaccāti bhavantarepi apaccaṃ vā dāyādaṃ vā na labhantīti attho.
analyzed: ca guṇa vuḍḍhe ca bhavantare pi apaccam vā dāyādam vā na labhanti iti attho

original: Tālavatthūti diṭṭhadhammepi chinnamūlatālo viya mahāvināsaṃ patvā niraye nibbattanti.
analyzed: tāla vatthu uti diṭṭhadhamme pi chinna mūla tālaḥ viya mahā vināsam patvā niraye nibbattanti

original: Yo ca pabbajitaṃ hantīti yo bālajano samaṇaṃ hanati. Cirarattāyāti ciraṃ kālaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ ca pabbajitam hanti iti yaḥ bāla janaḥ samaṇam hanati cira rattāya ati ciram kālam

original: Evaṃ mahāsatto isiviheṭhakānaṃ paccananiraye dassetvā upari adhammikarājūnaṃ paccananiraye
analyzed: evam mahāsattaḥ isi viheṭhakānam paccana niraye dassetvā upari adhammika rājūnam paccana niraye

original: dassento “yo cā”tiādimāha. Tattha raṭṭhaviddhaṃsanoti chandādivasena gantvā raṭṭhassa
analyzed: dassentaḥ yaḥ ca ati ādim āha tattha chanda ādi vasena gantvā raṭṭhassa

original: viddhaṃsano. Accisaṅghaparetoti accisamūhaparikkhitto. Tejobhakkhassāti aggimeva
analyzed: viddhaṃsanaḥ acci saṅgha paretaḥ iti acci samūha parikkhitto tejobhakkhassa ati aggim eva

original: khādantassa. Gattānīti tigāvute sarīre sabbaṅgapaccaṅgāni. Lomehi ca nakhehi cāti
analyzed: khādantassa gattāni iti tiga avute sarīre sabbaṅga paccaṅgāni lomehi ca nakhehi ca ati

original: etehi saddhiṃ sabbāni ekajālāni honti. Tuttaṭṭītoti āneñjakāraṇaṃ kāriyamāno tuttehi
analyzed: etehi saddhim sabbāni eka jālāni honti āneñja kāraṇam kāriyamānaḥ tuttehi

original: viddho nāgo yathā nadati.
analyzed: viddhaḥ nāgaḥ yathā nadati

original: Evaṃ mahāsatto adhammikarājūnaṃ paccananiraye dassetvā idāni pitughātakādīnaṃ paccananiraye
analyzed: evam mahāsattaḥ adhammika rājūnam paccana niraye dassetvā idāni pitu ghātaka ādīnam paccana niraye

original: dassetuṃ “yo lobhā”tiādimāha. Tattha lobhāti yasadhanalobhena. Dosā vāti duṭṭhacittatāya
analyzed: dassetum yaḥ lobha ati ādim āha tattha lobhā ati yasa dhana lobhena dosā vāti duṭṭha citta tāya

original: vā. Nittacanti lohakumbhiyaṃ bahūni vasasahassāni pakkaṃ nīharitvā tigāvutamassa
analyzed: vā lohakumbhiyam bahūni vasa sahassāni pakkam nīharitvā tigāvutamassa

analyzed: sarīram nittacam katvā jalitāya loha pathaviyam pātetvā tiṇhehi aya sūlehi koṭṭetvā

original: cuṇavicuṇṇaṃ karonti. Andhaṃ karitvāti, mahārāja, taṃ pitughātakaṃ nirayapālā jalitalohapathaviyaṃ
analyzed: cuṇa vicuṇṇam karonti andham karitvā ati mahā rāja tam pitu ghātakam niraya pālāḥ

analyzed: uttānam pātetvā jalitehi aya sūlehi akkhīni bhinditvā andham karitvā mukhe uṇham mutta karīsam

analyzed: pakkhipitvā palāla pīṭham viya nam parivattetvā kappena saṇṭhite khāre loha odake

original: Tattaṃ pakkuthitamayoguḷañcāti puna pakkuthitaṃ gūthakalalañceva jalitaayoguḷañca
analyzed: tat tam pakkuthitam ayaḥ guḷam ca ati punar pakkuthitam gūtha kalalam ca iva jalita ayaḥ guḷam ca

original: khādāpenti. So pana taṃ āhariyamānaṃ disvā mukhaṃ pidheti. Athassa dīghe ciratāpite
analyzed: khādāpenti saḥ pana tam āhariyamānam disvā mukham pidheti athassa dīghe cira tāpite

original: jalamāne phāle ādāya mukhaṃ vikkhambhetvā vivaritvā rajjubaddhaṃ ayabalisaṃ khipitvā
analyzed: jalamāne phāle ādāya mukham vikkhambhetvā vivaritvā rajju baddham aya balisam khipitvā

original: jivhaṃ nīharitvā tasmiṃ vivaṭe mukhe taṃ ayoguḷaṃ sampavisanti pakkhipanti. Rakkhasāti nirayapālā.
analyzed: jivham nīharitvā tasmin vivaṭe mukhe tam ayaḥ guḷam sampavisanti pakkhipanti niraya pālā

original: Sāmā cāti, mahārāja, tassa pitughātakassa jivhaṃ balisena nikkaḍḍhitvā ayasaṅkūhi
analyzed: sāmā ca ati mahā rāja tassa pitu ghātakassa jivham balisena nikkaḍḍhitvā

original: pathaviyaṃ nīhataṃ jivhaṃ sāmā soṇā sabalavaṇṇā sunakhā ca lohatuṇḍā gijjhā ca kākolasaṅghā
analyzed: pathaviyam nīhatam jivham sāmā soṇā sabalavaṇṇā sunakhā ca lohatuṇḍā gijjhā ca kākolasaṅghā

original: ca aññe ca nānappakārā sakuṇā samāgantvā āvudhehi chindantā viya vibhajja kākapadākārena
analyzed: ca aññe ca nānappakārā sakuṇā samāgantvā āvudhehi chindantā viya vibhajja kākapada ākārena

original: koṭṭhāse katvā vipphandamānaṃ salohitaṃ vighāsaṃ khādantā viya satte bhakkhayantīti
analyzed: koṭṭhāse katvā vipphandamānam sa lohitam vighāsam khādantāḥ viya satte bhakkhayanti iti

original: attho. Taṃ daḍḍhatālanti taṃ pitughātakaṃ jhāyamānatālaṃ viya jalitasarīraṃ. Paribhinnagattanti
analyzed: attho tam daḍḍha tālanti tam pitu ghātakam jhāyamāna tālam viya jalita sarīram paribhinna gattanti

original: tattha tattha paribhinnagattaṃ. Nippothayantāti jalitehi ayamuggarehi paharantā.
analyzed: tattha tattha paribhinna gattam nippothayantā ati jalitehi aya muggarehi paharantā

original: Ratī hi tesanti tesaṃ nirayapālānaṃ sā rati kīḷā hoti. Dukhino panītareti itare pana
analyzed: ratī hi tesanti tesam niraya pālānam sā rati kīḍā hoti itare pana

original: nerayikasattā dukkhitā honti. Pettighātinoti pitughātakā. Iti imaṃ pitughātakānaṃ
analyzed: nerayika sattāḥ dukkhitāḥ honti petti ghātinaḥ ti pitu ghātakāḥ iti imam pitu ghātakānam

original: paccananirayaṃ disvā rājā bhītatasito ahosi.
analyzed: disvā rājā bhīta tasitaḥ ahosi

original: Atha naṃ mahāsatto samassāsetvā mātughātakānaṃ paccananirayaṃ dassesi. Yamakkhayanti
analyzed: atha nam mahāsattaḥ samassāsetvā mātu ghātakānam paccana nirayam dassesi yam akkhayanti

original: yamanivesanaṃ, nirayanti attho. Attakammaphalūpagoti attano kammaphalena upagato.
analyzed: yama nivesanam nirayanti attho atta kamma phala upago ti attano kamma phalena upagato

original: Amanussāti nirayapālā. Hantāraṃ janayantiyāti mātughātakaṃ. Vālehīti ayamakacivālehi
analyzed: niraya pālāḥ hantāram janayantiyā ati mātu ghātakam vālehi iti ayamaka civālehi

original: veṭhetvā ayayantena pīḷayanti. Tanti taṃ mātughātakaṃ. Pāyentīti tassa pīḷiyamānassa
analyzed: veṭhetvā pīḷayanti tam mātughātakam pāyenti iti tassa pīḷiyamānassa

original: ruhiraṃ gaḷitvā ayakapallaṃ pūreti. Atha naṃ yantato nīharanti, tāvadevassa sarīraṃ
analyzed: ruhiram gaḷitvā ayaka pallam pūreti atha nam yantataḥ nīharanti tāva devassa sarīram

original: pākatikaṃ hoti. Taṃ pathaviyaṃ uttānaṃ nipajjāpetvā vilīnaṃ tambalohaṃ viya pakkuthitaṃ
analyzed: pākatikam hoti tam pathaviyam uttānam nipajjāpetvā vilīnam tamba loham viya pakkuthitam

original: lohitaṃ pāyenti. Ogayha tiṭṭhatīti taṃ bahūni vassasahassāni ayayantehi pīḷetvā jegucche
analyzed: lohitam pāyenti ogayha tiṭṭhati iti tam bahūni vassa sahassāni pīḷetvā jegucche

original: duggandhe paṭikūle mahante gūthakalalaāvāṭe khipanti, so taṃ rahadaṃ ogayha ogāhitvā
analyzed: duggandhe paṭikūle mahante gūtha kalala āvāṭe khipanti saḥ tam rahadam ogayhaḥ ogāhitvā

original: tiṭṭhati. Atikāyāti ekadoṇikanāvappamāṇasarīrā. Ayomukhāti ayasūcimukhā. Chaviṃ bhetvānāti
analyzed: tiṭṭhati atikāyā ati eka doṇika nāvappamāṇa sarīrā ayaḥ mukhā ati ayasūci mukhā chavim bhetvā anāti

original: chavimādiṃ katvā yāva aṭṭhimpi bhetvā aṭṭhimiñjampi khādanti. Saṃgiddhāti gadhitā
analyzed: chavim ādim katvā yāva aṭṭhimpi bhetvā aṭṭhimiñjampi khādanti saṃgiddhā ati gadhitā

original: mucchitā. Na kevalañca khādanteva, adhomaggādīhi pana pavisitvā mukhādīhi nikkhamanti,
analyzed: mucchitāḥ na kevalam ca khādantā iva adhas magga ādīhi pana pavisitvā mukha ādīhi nikkhamanti

original: vāmapassādīhi pavisitvā dakkhiṇapassādīhi nikkhamanti, sakalampi sarīraṃ chiddāvachiddaṃ
analyzed: vāma passa ādīhi pavisitvā dakkhiṇa passa ādīhi nikkhamanti sakalam pi sarīram chidda avachiddam

original: karonti, so tattha atidukkhapareto viravanto paccati. So cāti so mātughātako ca taṃ
analyzed: karonti saḥ tattha ati dukkha paretaḥ viravantaḥ paccati so ca ati so mātu ghātako ca tam

original: sataporisaṃ nirayaṃ patto sasīsako nimuggova hoti, tañca kuṇapaṃ samantā yojanasataṃ
analyzed: sata porisam nirayam patto sa sīsakaḥ nimuggaḥ iva hoti tat ca kuṇapam samantā yojana satam

original: pūtikaṃ hutvā vāyati. Mātughoti mātughātako.
analyzed: pūtikam hutvā vāyati mātughātakaḥ

original: Evaṃ mahāsatto mātughātakānaṃ paccananirayaṃ dassetvā puna gabbhapātakānaṃ paccananirayaṃ
analyzed: evam mahāsattaḥ mātu ghātakānam paccana nirayam dassetvā puna gabbha pātakānam paccana nirayam

original: dassento gāthamāha. Khuradhāramanukkammāti khuradhāranirayaṃ atikkamitvā. Tattha
analyzed: dassentaḥ gātham āha khura dhāram anukkamma ati khura dhāra nirayam atikkamitvā tattha

original: kira nirayapālā mahantamahante khure upari dhāre katvā santharanti, tato yāhi gabbhapātanakharabhesajjāni
analyzed: kira niraya pālāḥ mahanta mahante khure upari dhāre katvā santharanti tatas yāhi gabbha pātana khara bhesajjāni

original: pivitvā gabbhā pātitā, tā gabbhapātiniyo itthiyo jalitehi āvudhehi pothentā anubandhanti,
analyzed: pivitvā gabbhā pātitā tāḥ gabbha pātiniyaḥ itthiyaḥ jalitehi āvudhehi pothentāḥ anubandhanti

original: aparampi suṇohi me, ito paṭṭhāyāhaṃ puna tuyhaṃ appiyaṃ na karissāmi. Evaṃ ceti sace

original: Taṃ sutvā rājā “sacāhaṃ ‘imaṃ tvañceva jānissasī’ti vakkhāmi, hadayamassā phalissati, assāsessāmi na”nti cintetvā āha –

original: “Evaṃ te yācamānāya, kiṃ na kāhāmi te vaco;

original: “Sabbaṃ te paṭijānāmi, rājaputti suṇohi me;

original: “Idaṃ vatvāna pakkāmi, taramāno mahāisi;
