original: Vehāse antalikkhasmiṃ, anusāsitvāna khattiye.
analyzed: vehāse antalikkhasmiṃ anusāsitvāna khattiye

original: “Assamaṃ parimajjitvā, paññāpetvāna āsanaṃ;
analyzed: assamam parimajjitvā paññāpetvāna āsanam

original: Paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā, pitaraṃ patibodhayi.
analyzed: paṇṇasālam pavisitvā pitaram pati bodhayi

original: “Ime āyanti rājāno, abhijātā yasassino;
analyzed: ime āyanti rājānaḥ abhijātāḥ yasassinaḥ

original: Assamā nikkhamitvāna, nisīda tvaṃ mahāise.
analyzed: assamā nikkhamitvāna nisīda tvam mahāise

original: “Tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, taramāno mahāisi;
analyzed: tassa tam vacanam sutvā taramānaḥ

original: Assamā nikkhamitvāna, sadvāramhi upāvisī”ti. – imā abhisambuddhagāthā;
analyzed: assamā nikkhamitvāna sa dvāramhi upāvisi iti imāḥ abhisambuddha gāthāḥ

original: Tattha pakkāmīti anotattaṃ agamāsi. Assamaṃ parimajjitvāti, bhikkhave, so isi vegena
analyzed: tattha pakkāmi iti anotattam agamāsi assamam parimajjitvā ati bhikkhave saḥ isi vegena

original: anotattaṃ gantvā pānīyaṃ ādāya tesu rājūsu assamaṃ asampattesuyeva āgantvā pānīyaghaṭe
analyzed: anotattam gantvā pānīyam ādāya tesu rājūsu assamam āgantvā pānīya ghaṭe

original: pānīyamāḷake ṭhapetvā “mahājano pivissatī”ti vanakusumehi vāsetvā sammajjaniṃ ādāya
analyzed: pānīya māḷake ṭhapetvā mahājanaḥ pivissati iti vana kusumehi vāsetvā sammajjanim ādāya

original: assamaṃ sammajjitvā paṇṇasāladvāre pitu āsanaṃ paññāpetvā pavisitvā pitaraṃ jānāpesīti
analyzed: assamam sammajjitvā paṇṇa sāla dvāre pitu āsanam paññāpetvā pavisitvā pitaram jānāpesi iti

original: attho. Upāvisīti uccāsane nisīdi.
analyzed: upāvisi iti ucca āsane nisīdi

original: Bodhisattassa mātā pana tassa pacchato nīcaṭṭhāne ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Mahāsatto nīcāsane
analyzed: bodhisattassa mātā pana tassa pacchatas nīca ṭṭhāne ekamantam nisīdi mahāsattaḥ nīca āsane

original: nisīdi. Nandapaṇḍitopi bodhisattassa anotattato pānīyaṃ ādāya assamaṃ āgatakāle rañño
analyzed: nisīdi nanda paṇḍitaḥ api bodhisattassa pānīyam ādāya assamam āgata kāle rañño

original: santikaṃ āgantvā assamassa avidūre khandhāvāraṃ nivāsesi. Atha rājā nhatvā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito
analyzed: santikam āgantvā assamassa avidūre khandhāvāram nivāsesi atha rājā nhatvā sabba alaṅkāra paṭimaṇḍitaḥ

original: ekasatarājaparivuto nandapaṇḍitaṃ gahetvā mahantena sirisobhaggena bodhisattaṃ khamāpetuṃ
analyzed: eka sata rāja parivutaḥ nanda paṇḍitam gahetvā mahantena siri sobhaggena bodhisattam khamāpetum

original: assamaṃ pāvisi. Atha naṃ tathā āgacchantaṃ bodhisattassa pitā disvā bodhisattaṃ pucchi,
analyzed: assamam pāvisi atha nam tathā āgacchantam bodhisattassa pitā disvā bodhisattam pucchi

original: sopissa ācikkhi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
analyzed: saḥ upissa ācikkhi tam attham pakāsentaḥ satthā āha

original: “Tañca disvāna āyantaṃ, jalantaṃriva tejasā;
analyzed: tat ca disvānaḥ āyantam jalantam iva tejasā

original: Khatyasaṅghaparibyūḷhaṃ, kosiyo etadabravi.
analyzed: khatya saṅgha paribyūḍham kosiyaḥ etat abravi

original: “Kassa bherī mudiṅgā ca, saṅkhā paṇavadindimā;
analyzed: kassa bherī mudiṅgā ca saṅkhā paṇava dindimā

original: Purato paṭipannāni, hāsayantā rathesabhaṃ.
analyzed: puratas paṭipannāni hāsayantā rathesabham

original: “Kassa kañcanapaṭṭena, puthunā vijjuvaṇṇinā;
analyzed: kassa kañcana paṭṭena puthunā vijju vaṇṇinā

original: Yuvā kalāpasannaddho, ko eti siriyā jalaṃ.
analyzed: yuvā kalā apasannaddhaḥ kaḥ eti siriyā jalam

original: “Ukkāmukhapahaṭṭhaṃva, khadiraṅgārasannibhaṃ;
analyzed: khadira aṅgāra sannibham

original: Mukhañca rucirā bhāti, ko eti siriyā jalaṃ.
analyzed: mukham ca rucirā bhāti kaḥ eti siriyā jalam

original: “Kassa paggahitaṃ chattaṃ, sasalākaṃ manoramaṃ;
analyzed: kassa paggahitam chattam sa salākam manoramam

original: Ādiccaraṃsāvaraṇaṃ, ko eti siriyā jalaṃ.
analyzed: kaḥ eti siriyā jalam

original: “Kassa aṅgaṃ pariggayha, vālabījanimuttamaṃ;
analyzed: kassa aṅgam pariggayha

original: Caranti varapuññassa, hatthikkhandhena āyato.
analyzed: caranti vara puññassa hatthi kkhandhena āyataḥ

original: “Kassa setāni chattāni, ājānīyā ca vammitā;
analyzed: kassa setāni chattāni ājānīyā ca vammitā

original: Samantā parikīrenti, ko eti siriyā jalaṃ.
analyzed: samantā parikīrenti kaḥ eti siriyā jalam

original: “Kassa ekasataṃ khatyā, anuyantā yasassino;
analyzed: kassa eka satam khatyāḥ anuyantāḥ yasassinaḥ

original: Samantānupariyanti, ko eti siriyā jalaṃ.
analyzed: samantā anupariyanti kaḥ eti siriyā jalam

original: “Hatthiassarathapatti, senā ca caturaṅginī;
analyzed: senā ca caturaṅginī

original: Samantānupariyanti, ko eti siriyā jalaṃ.
analyzed: samantā anupariyanti kaḥ eti siriyā jalam

original: “Kassesā mahatī senā, piṭṭhito anuvattati;
analyzed: kassa isā mahatī senā piṭṭhitaḥ anuvattati

original: Akkhobhaṇī apariyantā, sāgarasseva ūmiyo.
analyzed: akkhobhaṇī apariyantā sāgarassa iva ūmiyaḥ

original: “Rājābhirājā manojo, indova jayataṃ pati;
analyzed: rājā abhirājā manaḥ jaḥ indo uva jayatam pati

original: Nandassajjhāvaraṃ eti, assamaṃ brahmacārinaṃ.
analyzed: eti assamam brahmacārinam

original: “Tassesā mahatī senā, piṭṭhito anuvattati;
analyzed: tassa isā mahatī senā piṭṭhitaḥ anuvattati

original: Akkhobhaṇī apariyantā, sāgarasseva ūmiyo”ti.
analyzed: akkhobhaṇī apariyantā sāgarassa iva ūmiyā ti

original: Tattha jalantaṃrivāti jalantaṃ viya. Paṭipannānīti etāni tūriyāni kassa purato āgacchantīti
analyzed: tattha jalantaṃriva ati jalantam viya paṭipannāni iti etāni tūriyāni kassa puratas āgacchanti iti

original: attho. Hāsayantāti tosentā. Kañcanapaṭṭenāti, tāta, kassa kañcanamayena vijjuvaṇṇena
analyzed: attho hāsayantā ati tosentā kañcana paṭṭena ati tāta kassa kañcana mayena vijju vaṇṇena

original: uṇhīsapaṭṭena nalāṭanto parikkhittoti pucchati. Yuvāti taruṇo. Kalāpasannaddhoti
analyzed: uṇhīsa paṭṭena nalāṭanto parikkhitto ti pucchati yuvā ati taruṇaḥ kalāpa sannaddho ti

original: sannaddhasaratūṇīro. Ukkāmukhapahaṭṭhaṃ vāti kammārānaṃ uddhane pahaṭṭhaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ
analyzed: sannaddha sara tūṇīraḥ ukkā mukha pahaṭṭham vāti uddhane pahaṭṭham suvaṇṇam

original: viya. Khadiraṅgārasannibhanti vītaccitakhadiraṅgāravaṇṇaṃ. Ādiccaraṃsāvaraṇantiādiccaraṃsīnaṃ
analyzed: viya khadiḥ aṅgāra sannibhanti vīta cita khadira aṅgāra vaṇṇam

original: āvaraṇaṃ. Aṅgaṃ pariggayhāti aṅgaṃ pariggahetvā, sarīraṃ parikkhipitvāti attho. Vālabījanimuttamanti
analyzed: āvaraṇam aṅgam pariggayha ati aṅgam pariggahetvā sarīram parikkhipitvā iti atthaḥ vāla bīja nimuttamanti

original: vālabījaniṃ uttamaṃ. Carantīti sañcaranti. Chattānīti ājānīyapiṭṭhe nisinnānaṃ dhāritachattāni.
analyzed: vālabījanim uttamam caranti iti sañcaranti chattāni iti ājānīya piṭṭhe dhārita chattāni

original: Parikīrentīti tassa samantā sabbadisābhāgesu parikīrayanti. Caturaṅginīti etehi hatthiādīhi
analyzed: parikīrenti iti tassa samantā sabba disā bhāgesu parikīrayanti caturaṅginī iti etehi hatthi ādīhi

original: catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā. Akkhobhaṇīti khobhetuṃ na sakkā. Sāgarassevāti sāgarassa
analyzed: catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā akkhobhaṇī iti khobhetum na sakkā sāgarassa iva ati sāgarassa

original: ūmiyo viya apariyantā. Rājābhirājāti ekasatarājūnaṃ pūjito, tesaṃ vā adhiko rājāti
analyzed: rājā abhirājā ati eka sata rājūnam pūjitaḥ tesam vai adhikaḥ rājā ati

original: rājābhirājā. Jayataṃ patīti jayappattānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ jeṭṭhako. Ajjhāvaranti mamaṃ
analyzed: rājā abhirājā jayatam patī iti jaya ppattānam tāvatiṃsānam jeṭṭhakaḥ

original: khamāpanatthāya nandassa parisabhāvaṃ upagantvā eti.
analyzed: khamāpana atthāya nandassa parisa bhāvam upagantvā eti

original: Satthā āha –
analyzed: satthā āha

original: “Anulittā candanena, kāsikuttamadhārino;
analyzed: anulittāḥ candanena kāsi kuttama dhārino

original: Sabbe pañjalikā hutvā, isīnaṃ ajjhupāgamu”nti.
analyzed: sabbe pañjalikāḥ hutvā isīnam ajjhupāgamunti

original: Tattha isīnaṃ ajjhupāgamunti, bhikkhave, sabbepi te rājāno surabhicandanena anulittā uttamakāsikavatthadhārino sirasi patiṭṭhāpitaañjalī hutvā isīnaṃ santikaṃ upagatā.
analyzed: tattha isīnam ajjhupāgamunti bhikkhave sabbe api te rājānaḥ surabhi candanena anulittāḥ uttama kāsika vattha dhārino sirasi patiṭṭhāpita añjalī hutvā isīnam santikam upagatāḥ

original: Tato manojo rājā taṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno paṭisanthāraṃ karonto gāthādvayamāha –
analyzed: tatas manojaḥ rājā tam vanditvā ekamantam nisinnaḥ paṭisanthāram karontaḥ gāthā dvayam āha

original: “Kacci nu bhoto kusalaṃ, kacci bhoto anāmayaṃ;
analyzed: kacci nu bhotaḥ kusalam kacci bhotaḥ anāmayam

original: Kacci uñchena yāpetha, kacci mūlaphalā bahū.
analyzed: kacci uñchena yāpetha kacci mūla phalā

original: “Kacci ḍaṃsā makasā ca, appameva sarīsapā;
analyzed: kacci ḍaṃsā makasā ca appamā iva sarīsapā

original: Vane vāḷamigākiṇṇe, kacci hiṃsā na vijjatī”ti.
analyzed: vane kacci hiṃsā na vijjati iti

original: Tato paraṃ ubhinnaṃ tesaṃ vacanapaṭivacanavasena kathitagāthā honti –
analyzed: tatas param ubhinnam tesam vacana paṭivacana vasena kathita gāthāḥ honti

original: “Kusalañceva no rāja, atho rāja anāmayaṃ;
analyzed: kusalam ca iva naḥ rāja atha u rāja anāmayam

original: Atho uñchena yāpema, atho mūlaphalā bahū.
analyzed: atha u uñchena yāpema atha u mūla phalā

original: “Atho ḍaṃsā makasā ca, appameva sarīsapā;
analyzed: atho ḍaṃsā makasā ca appamā iva sarīsapā

original: Vane vāḷamigākiṇṇe, hiṃsā mayhaṃ na vijjati.
analyzed: vane vāḷamiga ākiṇṇe hiṃsā mayham na vijjati

original: “Bahūni vassapūgāni, assame sammataṃ idha;
analyzed: bahūni vassa pūgāni assame sammatam idha

original: Nābhijānāmi uppannaṃ, ābādhaṃ amanoramaṃ.
analyzed: na abhijānāmi uppannam ābādham amanoramam

original: “Svāgataṃ te mahārāja, atho te adurāgataṃ;
analyzed: svāgatam te mahā rāja atho te adurāgatam

original: Issarosi anuppatto, yaṃ idhatthi pavedaya.
analyzed: issarā asi an uppattaḥ yam idha atthi pavedaya

original: “Tindukāni piyālāni, madhuke kāsumāriyo;
analyzed: tindukāni piyālāni madhuke

original: Phalāni khuddakappāni, bhuñja rāja varaṃ varaṃ.
analyzed: phalāni khudda kappāni bhuñja rāja varam varam

original: “Idampi pānīyaṃ sītaṃ, ābhataṃ girigabbharā;
analyzed: idam pi pānīyam giri gabbharā

original: Tato piva mahārāja, sace tvaṃ abhikaṅkhasi.
analyzed: tatas piva mahā rāja sace tvam abhikaṅkhasi

original: “Paṭiggahitaṃ yaṃ dinnaṃ, sabbassa agghiyaṃ kataṃ;
analyzed: paṭiggahitam yam dinnam sabbassa agghiyam katam

original: Nandassāpi nisāmetha, vacanaṃ so pavakkhati.
analyzed: nandassa api nisāmetha vacanam so pavakkhati

original: “Ajjhāvaramhā nandassa, bhoto santikamāgatā;
analyzed: nandassa bhoto santikam āgatā

original: Suṇātu bhavaṃ vacanaṃ, nandassa parisāya cā”ti.
analyzed: suṇātu bhavam vacanam nandassa parisāya ca ati

original: Imā yebhuyyena pākaṭasambandhāyeva, yaṃ panettha apākaṭaṃ, tadeva vakkhāma. Pavedayāti
analyzed: imāḥ yebhuyyena pākaṭa sambandhāya iva yam pana ittha apākaṭam tat eva vakkhāma pavedayāti

original: yaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne tava abhirucitaṃ atthi, taṃ no kathehīti vadati. Khuddakappānīti
analyzed: yam imasmin ṭhāne tava abhirucitam atthi tam no kathehi iti vadati khudda kappāni iti

original: etāni nānārukkhaphalāni khuddakamadhupaṭibhāgāni madhurāni. Varaṃ varanti ito uttamuttamaṃ
analyzed: etāni nānā rukkha phalāni khuddaka madhu paṭibhāgāni madhurāni varam varanti itas uttamuttamam

original: gahetvā bhuñja. Girigabbharāti anotattato. Sabbassa agghiyanti yena mayaṃ āpucchitā,
analyzed: gahetvā bhuñja giri gabbha rāti sabbassa agghiyanti yena mayam āpucchitā

original: taṃ amhehi paṭiggahitaṃ nāma tumhehi ca dinnameva nāma, ettāvatā imassa janassa sabbassa
analyzed: tam amhehi paṭiggahitam nāma tumhehi ca dinnam eva nāma ettāvatā imassa janassa sabbassa

original: agghiyaṃ tumhehi kataṃ. Nandassāpīti amhākaṃ tāva sabbaṃ kataṃ, idāni pana nandapaṇḍito
analyzed: agghiyam tumhehi katam nandassa api iti amhākam tāva sabbam katam idāni pana nanda paṇḍito

original: kiñci vattukāmo, tassapi tāva vacanaṃ suṇātha. Ajjhāvaramhāti mayañhi na aññena kammena
analyzed: kiñci vattu kāmo tassa api tāva vacanam suṇātha mayan hi na aññena kammena

original: āgatā, nandassa pana parisā hutvā tumhākaṃ khamāpanatthāya āgatāti vadati. Bhavanti
analyzed: āgatā nandassa pana parisā hutvā tumhākam khamāpana atthāya āgatā ati vadati bhavanti

original: bhavaṃ soṇapaṇḍito suṇātu.
analyzed: bhavam soṇa paṇḍitaḥ suṇātu

original: Evaṃ vutte nandapaṇḍito uṭṭhāyāsanā mātāpitaro ca bhātarañca vanditvā sakaparisāya saddhiṃ sallapanto āha –
analyzed: evam vutte nanda paṇḍitaḥ uṭṭhāya āsanā mātā pitaro ca bhātaram ca vanditvā saka parisāya saddhim sallapantaḥ āha

original: “Parosataṃ jānapadā, mahāsālā ca brāhmaṇā;
analyzed: parosatam jānapadā mahā sālā ca brāhmaṇā

original: Ime ca khattiyā sabbe, abhijātā yasassino;
analyzed: ime ca khattiyā sabbe abhijātāḥ yasassinaḥ

original: Bhavañca rājā manojo, anumaññantu me vaco.
analyzed: bhavañca rājā manojaḥ anumaññantu me vacaḥ

original: “Ye ca santi samītāro, yakkhāni idha massame;
analyzed: ye ca santi samītāraḥ yakkhāni idha massame

original: Araññe bhūtabhabyāni, suṇantu vacanaṃ mama.
analyzed: araññe bhūta bhabyāni suṇantu vacanam mama

original: “Namo katvāna bhūtānaṃ, isiṃ vakkhāmi subbataṃ;
analyzed: namaḥ katvāna bhūtānam isim vakkhāmi subbatam

original: So tyāhaṃ dakkhiṇā bāhu, tava kosiya sammato.
analyzed: so tyā aham dakkhiṇā bāhu tava kosiya sammato

original: “Pitaraṃ me janettiñca, bhattukāmassa me sato;
analyzed: pitaram me janettim ca bhattu kāmassa me sataḥ

original: Vīra puññamidaṃ ṭhānaṃ, mā maṃ kosiya vāraya.
analyzed: vīra puññam idam ṭhānam mā mama kosiya vāraya

original: “Sabbhi hetaṃ upaññātaṃ, mametaṃ upanissaja;
analyzed: sabbhi ha etam upaññātam mama etam upanissaja

original: Uṭṭhānapāricariyāya, dīgharattaṃ tayā kataṃ;
analyzed: uṭṭhāna pāricariyāya dīgharattam tayā katam

original: Dhātāpitūsu puññāni, mama lokadado bhava.
analyzed: dhātā pitūsu puññāni mama loka dadaḥ bhava

original: “Tatheva santi manujā, dhamme dhammapadaṃ vidū;
analyzed: tathā iva santi manujāḥ dhamme dhamma padam vidū

original: Maggo saggassa lokassa, yathā jānāsi tvaṃ ise.
analyzed: maggaḥ saggassa lokassa yathā jānāsi tvam ise

original: “Uṭṭhānapāricariyāya, mātāpitusukhāvahaṃ;
analyzed: uṭṭhāna pāricariyāya mātā pitu sukha āvaham

original: Taṃ maṃ puññā nivāreti, ariyamaggāvaro naro”ti.
analyzed: tam mama puññā nivāreti ariya magga avaraḥ

original: Tattha anumaññantūti anubujjhantu, sādhukaṃ sutvā paccakkhaṃ karontūti attho. Samītāroti
analyzed: tattha anumaññantu uti anubujjhantu sādhukam sutvā paccakkham karontu iti attho samītāro ti

original: samāgatā. Araññe bhūtabhabyānīti asmiṃ himavantāraññe yāni bhūtāni ceva vuḍḍhimariyādappattāni
analyzed: samāgatā araññe bhūta bhabyāni iti asmin himavanta araññe yāni bhūtāni ca iva vuḍḍhi mariyāda pattāni

original: bhabyāni ca taruṇadevatāni, tānipi sabbāni mama vacanaṃ suṇantūti attho. “Namo katvānā”ti
analyzed: ca taruṇa devatāni tāni api sabbāni mama vacanam suṇantu iti attho

original: idaṃ so parisāya saññaṃ datvā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe nibbattadevatānaṃ namakkāraṃ katvā
analyzed: idam saḥ parisāya saññam da tvā tasmim vana saṇḍe nibbatta devatānam namakkāram katvā

original: āha. Tassattho – ajja bahūhi devatāhi mama bhātikassa dhammakathāsavanatthaṃ āgatāhi
analyzed: āha tassa atthaḥ ajja bahūhi devatāhi mama bhātikassa dhamma kathā savana ttham āgatāhi

original: bhavitabbaṃ, ahaṃ vo namakkāro, tumhepi mayhaṃ sahāyā hothāti. So devatānaṃ añjaliṃ
analyzed: bhavitabbam aham vaḥ namakkāro tumhe pi mayham sahāyāḥ hotha ati saḥ devatānam añjalim

original: paggahetvā parisaṃ jānāpetvā “isiṃ vakkhāmī”tiādimāha. Tattha isinti soṇapaṇḍitaṃ
analyzed: paggahetvā parisam jānāpetvā isim vakkhāmi itiādim āha tattha isim ti soṇa paṇḍitam

original: sandhāya vadati. Sammatoti bhātaro nāma aṅgasamā honti, tasmā so te ahaṃ dakkhiṇā
analyzed: sandhāya vadati sammatoti bhātaraḥ nāma aṅga samāḥ honti tasmā so te aham dakkhiṇā

original: bāhūti sammato. Tena me khamituṃ arahathāti dīpeti.
analyzed: tena me khamitum arahatha ati dīpa iti

original: Vīrāti vīriyavanta mahāparakkama. Puññamidaṃ ṭhānanti idaṃ mātāpituupaṭṭhānaṃ nāma
analyzed: vīra ati vīriyavanta mahā parakkama puññam idam ṭhānam ti idam mātā pitu upaṭṭhānam nāma

original: puññaṃ saggasaṃvattanikakāraṇaṃ, taṃ karontaṃ maṃ mā vārayāti vadati. Sabbhi hetanti
analyzed: puññam sagga saṃvattanika kāraṇam tam karontam mam mā vāraya ati vadati sabbhi hetanti

original: etañhi mātāpituupaṭṭhānaṃ nāma paṇḍitehi upaññātaṃ upagantvā ñātañceva vaṇṇitañca.
analyzed: etat hi mātā pitu upaṭṭhānam nāma paṇḍitehi upaññātam upagantvā ñātam ca iva vaṇṇitam ca

original: Mametaṃ upanissajāti idaṃ tvaṃ mayhaṃ nissaja vissajjehi dehi. Uṭṭhānapāricariyāyāti
analyzed: mama etam upanissajāti idam tvam mayham nissaja vissajjehi dehi uṭṭhāna pāricariyāya ati

original: uṭṭhānena ca pāricariyāya ca. Katanti dīgharattaṃ tayā kusalaṃ kataṃ. Puññānīti idāni
analyzed: uṭṭhānena ca pāricariyāya ca katanti dīgharattam tayā kusalam katam puññāni iti idāni

original: ahaṃ mātāpitūsu puññāni kattukāmo. Mama lokadadoti tassa mama tvaṃ saggalokadado
analyzed: aham mātā pitūsu puññāni kattu kāmaḥ mama loka dado ti tassa mama tvam sagga loka dado

original: hoti, ahañhi tesaṃ vattaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ katvā devaloke aparimāṇaṃ yasaṃ labhissāmi,
analyzed: hoti aham hi tesam vattam upaṭṭhānam katvā deva loke aparimāṇam yasam labhissāmi

original: tassa me tvaṃ dāyako hohīti vadati.
analyzed: tassa me tvam dāyakaḥ hohi iti vadati

original: Tathevāti yathā tvaṃ jānāsi, tatheva aññepi manujā imissaṃ parisāyaṃ santi, te nānappakāre
analyzed: tathā iva ati yathā tvam jānāsi tathā iva aññe pi manujāḥ imissam parisāyam santi te nānappakāre

original: dhamme idaṃ jeṭṭhāpacāyikabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ dhammakoṭṭhāsaṃ vadanti. Kinti? Maggo saggassa
analyzed: dhamme idam jeṭṭha apacāyika bhāva saṅkhātam dhamma koṭṭhāsam vadanti kinti maggo saggassa

original: lokassāti. Sukhāvahanti uṭṭhānena ca pāricariyāya ca mātāpitūnaṃ sukhāvahaṃ. Taṃ
analyzed: lokassa ati sukha āvahanti uṭṭhānena ca pāricariyāya ca mātā pitūnam sukha āvaham tam

original: manti taṃ maṃ evaṃ sammāpaṭipannampi bhātā soṇapaṇḍito tamhā puññā abhivāreti. Ariyamaggāvaroti
analyzed: tam mam evam sammā paṭipannam pi bhātā soṇa paṇḍito tamhā puññā abhivāreti ariya magga āvaraḥ ti

original: so evaṃ vārento ayaṃ naro mama piyadassanatāya ariyasaṅkhātassa vedalokassa maggāvaraṇo nāma hotīti.
analyzed: saḥ evam vārentaḥ ayam naraḥ mama piya dassana tāya ariya saṅkhātassa veda lokassa maggāvaraṇaḥ nāma hoti iti

original: Evaṃ nandapaṇḍitena vutte mahāsatto “imassa tāva tumhehi vacanaṃ sutaṃ, idāni mamapi suṇāthā”ti sāvento āha –
analyzed: evam nanda paṇḍitena vutte mahāsattaḥ imassa tāva tumhehi vacanam sutam idāni mama api suṇātha ati sāventaḥ āha

original: “Suṇantu bhonto vacanaṃ, bhāturajjhāvarā mama;
analyzed: suṇantu bhontaḥ vacanam bhātuḥ ajjhāvarāḥ mama

original: Kulavaṃsaṃ mahārāja, porāṇaṃ parihāpayaṃ;
analyzed: kula vaṃsam mahā rāja porāṇam

original: Adhammacārī jeṭṭhesu, nirayaṃ sopapajjati.
analyzed: a dhamma cārī jeṭṭhesu nirayam saḥ upapajjati

original: “Ye ca dhammassa kusalā, porāṇassa disampati;
analyzed: ye ca dhammassa kusalā porāṇassa disampati

original: Cārittena ca sampannā, na te gacchanti duggatiṃ.
analyzed: cārittena ca sampannāḥ na te gacchanti duggatim

original: “Mātā pitā ca bhātā ca, bhaginī ñāti bandhavā;
analyzed: mātā pitā ca bhātā ca bhaginī ñāti bandhavā

original: Sabbe jeṭṭhassa te bhārā, evaṃ jānāhi bhāradha.
analyzed: sabbe jeṭṭhassa te bhārāḥ evam jānāhi bhāradha

original: “Ādiyitvā garuṃ bhāraṃ, nāviko viya ussahe;
analyzed: ādiyitvā garum bhāram nāvikaḥ viyas ussahe

original: Dhammañca nappamajjāmi, jeṭṭho casmi rathesabhā”ti.
analyzed: dhammañca na ppamajjāmi jeṭṭhaḥ ca asmi

original: Tattha bhāturajjhāvarāti mama bhātu parisā hutvā āgatā bhonto sabbepi rājāno mamapi
analyzed: tattha mama bhātu parisā hutvā āgatāḥ bhontaḥ sabbe pi rājānaḥ

original: tāva vacanaṃ suṇantu. Parihāpayanti parihāpento. Dhammassāti jeṭṭhāpacāyanadhammassa
analyzed: tāva vacanam suṇantu parihāpayanti parihāpentaḥ dhammassa ati jeṭṭha apacāyana dhammassa

original: paveṇīdhammassa. Kusalāti chekā. Cārittena cāti ācārasīlena sampannā. Bhārāti sabbe
analyzed: paveṇī dhammassa kusalā ati chekā cārittena ca ati ācāra sīlena sampannā bhārā ati sabbe

original: ete jeṭṭhena vahitabbā paṭijaggitabbāti tassa bhārā nāma. Nāviko viyāti yathā nāvāya
analyzed: ete jeṭṭhena vahitabbā paṭijaggitabbā ati tassa bhārā nāma nāvikaḥ viyāti yathā nāvāya

original: garuṃ bhāraṃ ādiyitvā samuddamajjhe nāvaṃ sotthinā netuṃ nāviko ussaheti vāyamati,
analyzed: garum bhāram ādiyitvā samudda majjhe nāvam sotthinā netum nāvikaḥ ussaheti vā āyamati

original: saha nāvāya sabbabhaṇḍañca jano ca tasseva bhāro hoti, tathā mameva sabbe ñātakā
analyzed: saha nāvāya sabba bhaṇḍam ca janaḥ ca tassa iva bhāraḥ hoti tathā mama iva sabbe ñātakā

original: bhāroti, ahañca te ussahāmi paṭijaggituṃ sakkomi, tañca jeṭṭhāpacāyanadhammaṃ nappamajjāmi,
analyzed: bhāro ti aham ca te ussahāmi paṭijaggitum sakkomi tam ca jeṭṭha apacāyana dhammam na ppamajjāmi

original: na kevalañca etesaññeva, sakalassapi lokassa jeṭṭho ca asmi, tasmā ahameva saddhiṃ
analyzed: na kevalam ca etesam na eva sakalassa api lokassa jeṭṭhaḥ ca asmi tasmai aham eva saddhim

original: nandena paṭijaggituṃ yuttoti.
analyzed: nandena paṭijaggitum yuttā iti

original: Taṃ sutvā sabbepi te rājāno attamanā hutvā “jeṭṭhabhātikassa kira avasesā bhārāti
analyzed: tam sutvā sabbe api te rājānaḥ attamanāḥ hutvā jeṭṭha bhātikassa kira avasesāḥ bhārā ati

original: ajja amhehi ñāta”nti nandapaṇḍitaṃ pahāya mahāsattaṃ sannissitā hutvā tassa thutiṃ
analyzed: ajja amhehi ñātanti nanda paṇḍitam pahāya mahāsattam sannissitāḥ hutvā tassa thutiṃ

original: karontā dve gāthā abhāsiṃsu –
analyzed: karontā dve gāthāḥ abhāsiṃsu

original: “Adhigamā tame ñāṇaṃ, jālaṃva jātavedato;
analyzed: adhigamā tame ñāṇam jālam vai jātavedato

original: Evameva no bhavaṃ dhammaṃ, kosiyo pavidaṃsayi.
analyzed: evam eva naḥ bhavam dhammam kosiyo pavidaṃsayi

original: “Yathā udayamādicco, vāsudevo pabhaṅkaro;
analyzed: yathā udayam ādiccaḥ vāsudevaḥ pabhaṅkaro

original: Pāṇīnaṃ pavidaṃseti, rūpaṃ kalyāṇapāpakaṃ;
analyzed: rūpam kalyāṇa pāpakam

original: Evameva no bhavaṃ dhammaṃ, kosiyo pavidaṃsayī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva naḥ bhavam dhammam kosiyo pavidaṃsayi iti

original: Tattha adhigamāti mayaṃ ito pubbe jeṭṭhāpacāyanadhammapaṭicchādake tame vattamānā
analyzed: tattha adhigamā ti mayam itas pubbe jeṭṭha apacāyana dhamma paṭicchādake tame vattamānā

original: na jānāma, ajja jātavedato jālaṃva ñāṇaṃ adhigatā. Evameva noti yathā mahandhakāre
analyzed: na jānāma ajja jātavedataḥ ñāṇam adhigatāḥ evam eva yathā mahandhakāre

original: pabbatamatthake jalito jātavedo samantā ālokaṃ pharanto rūpāni dasseti, tathā no
analyzed: pabbata matthake jalitaḥ jātavedo samantā ālokam pharantaḥ rūpāni dasseti tathā no

original: bhavaṃ kosiyagotto dhammaṃ pavidaṃsayīti attho. Vāsudevoti vasudevo vasujotano, dhanapakāsanoti attho.
analyzed: bhavam kosiya gottaḥ dhammam pavidaṃsayīti attho vāsudevaḥ iti vasudevaḥ vasujotanaḥ dhana pakāsanaḥ iti attho

original: Iti mahāsatto ettakaṃ kālaṃ nandapaṇḍitassa pāṭihāriyāni disvā tasmiṃ pasannacitte
analyzed: iti mahāsattaḥ ettakam kālam nanda paṇḍitassa pāṭihāriyāni disvā tasmin pasanna citte

original: te rājāno ñāṇabalena tasmiṃ pasādaṃ bhinditvā attano kathaṃ gāhāpetvā sabbeva attano
analyzed: te rājānaḥ ñāṇa balena tasmin pasādam bhinditvā attano katham gāhāpetvā sabbe iva attano

original: mukhaṃ ullokite akāsi. Atha nandapaṇḍito “bhātā me paṇḍito byatto dhammakathiko sabbepime
analyzed: mukham ullokite akāsi atha nanda paṇḍitaḥ bhātā me paṇḍitaḥ byattaḥ dhamma kathiko sabbe pi me

original: rājāno bhinditvā attano pakkhe kari, ṭhapetvā imaṃ añño mayhaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ natthi,
analyzed: rājāno bhinditvā attanaḥ pakkhe kari ṭhapetvā imam aññaḥ mayham paṭisaraṇam natthi

original: imameva yācissāmī”ti cintetvā gāthamāha –
analyzed: imam eva yācissāmi iti cintetvā gātham āha

original: “Evaṃ me yācamānassa, añjaliṃ nāvabujjhatha;
analyzed: evam me yācamānassa añjalim na avabujjhatha

original: Tava baddhacaro hessaṃ, vuṭṭhito paricārako”ti.
analyzed: tava baddha caraḥ hessam vuṭṭhito paricārako ti

original: Tassatthā – sace tumhe mama evaṃ yācamānassa khamāpanatthāya paggahitaṃ añjaliṃ nāvabujjhatha
analyzed: tassatthā sace tumhe mama evam yācamānassa khamāpana tthāya paggahitam añjalim na avabujjhatha

original: na paṭiggaṇhatha, tumheva mātāpitaro upaṭṭhahatha, ahaṃ pana tumhākaṃ baddhacaro
analyzed: na paṭiggaṇhatha tumhā iva mātā pitaraḥ upaṭṭhahatha aham pana tumhākam baddha caro

original: veyyāvaccakaro hessaṃ, rattindivaṃ analasabhāvena vuṭṭhito paricārako ahaṃ tumhe paṭijaggissāmīti.
analyzed: veyyāvaccakaraḥ hessam rattindivam analasa bhāvena vuṭṭhitaḥ paricārako aham tumhe paṭijaggissāmi iti

original: Mahāsattassa pakatiyāpi nandapaṇḍite doso vā veraṃ vā natthi, atithaddhaṃ vacanaṃ
analyzed: mahāsattassa pakatiyā api nanda paṇḍite doso vā veram vā natthi atithaddham vacanam

original: kathentassa panassa mānahāpanatthaṃ niggahavasena tathā katvā idānissa vacanaṃ sutvā
analyzed: kathentassa panassa māna hāpana attham niggaha vasena tathā katvā idānissa vacanam sutvā

original: tuṭṭhacitto tasmiṃ pasādaṃ uppādetvā “idāni te khamāmi, mātāpitaro ca paṭijaggituṃ
analyzed: tuṭṭha cittaḥ tasmin pasādam uppādetvā idāni te khamāmi mātā pitaro ca paṭijaggitum

original: labhissasī”ti tassa guṇaṃ pakāsento āha –
analyzed: labhissasi iti tassa guṇam pakāsentaḥ āha

original: “Addhā nanda vijānāsi, saddhammaṃ sabbhi desitaṃ;
analyzed: addhā nanda vijānāsi saddhammam sabbhi desitam

original: Ariyo ariyasamācāro, bāḷhaṃ tvaṃ mama ruccasi.
analyzed: ariyaḥ ariya samācāraḥ bāḷham tvam mama ruccasi

original: “Bhavantaṃ vadāmi bhotiñca, suṇātha vacanaṃ mama;
analyzed: bhavantam vadāmi suṇātha vacanam mama

original: Nāyaṃ bhāro bhāramato, ahu mayhaṃ kudācanaṃ.
analyzed: na ayam bhāraḥ bhāram atas ahu mayham kudācanam

original: “Taṃ maṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ santaṃ, mātāpitu sukhāvahaṃ;
analyzed: tam mam upaṭṭhitam santam mātā pitu sukha āvaham

original: Nando ajjhāvaraṃ katvā, upaṭṭhānāya yācati.
analyzed: nandaḥ ajjhāvaram katvā upaṭṭhānāya yācati

original: “Yo ve icchati kāmena, santānaṃ brahmacārinaṃ;
analyzed: yaḥ ve icchati kāmena santānam brahmacārinam

original: Nandaṃ vo varatha eko, kaṃ nando upatiṭṭhatū”ti.
analyzed: nandam vaḥ varatha ekaḥ kam nandaḥ upatiṭṭhatu iti

original: Tattha ariyoti sundaro. Ariyasamācāroti sundarasamācāropi jāto. Bāḷhanti idāni tvaṃ
analyzed: tattha ariyaḥ ti sundaraḥ ariya samācāraḥ iti sundara samācāraḥ api jātaḥ idāni tvam

original: mama ativiya ruccasi. Suṇāthāti amma tātā tumhe mama vacanaṃ suṇātha. Nāyaṃ bhāroti
analyzed: mama ruccasi suṇātha ati amma tātā tumhe mama vacanam suṇātha na ayam

original: ayaṃ tumhākaṃ paṭijagganabhāro na kadāci mama bhāramato ahu. Taṃ manti taṃ bhāroti
analyzed: ayam tumhākam paṭijaggana bhāraḥ na kadācid mama tam tam

original: amaññitvāva maṃ tumhe upaṭṭhitaṃ samānaṃ. Upaṭṭhānāya yācatīti tumhe upaṭṭhātuṃ maṃ
analyzed: a maññitvā ava mam tumhe upaṭṭhitam samānam upaṭṭhānāya yācati iti tumhe upaṭṭhātum mam

original: yācati. Yo ve icchatīti mayhañhi tvaṃ me mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā upaṭṭhahāti vattuṃ
analyzed: yācati yaḥ ve icchati iti mayhan hi tvam me mātaram vā pitaram vā upaṭṭhaha ati vattum

original: na yuttaṃ, tumhākaṃ pana santānaṃ brahmacārīnaṃ yo eko icchati, taṃ vadāmi kāmena
analyzed: na yuttam tumhākam pana santānam brahmacārīnam yaḥ ekaḥ icchati tam vadāmi kāmena

original: nandaṃ vo varatha, taṃ mama kaniṭṭhaṃ nandaṃ rocetha, tumhesu kaṃ esa upaṭṭhātu,
analyzed: nandam vaḥ varatha tam mama kaniṭṭham nandam rocetha tumhesu kam esaḥ upaṭṭhātu

original: ubhopi hi mayaṃ tumhākaṃ puttāyevāti.
analyzed: ubho api hi mayam tumhākam puttāya iva ati

original: Athassa mātā āsanā vuṭṭhāya, “tāta soṇapaṇḍita, cirappavuttho te kaniṭṭho, evaṃ cirāgatampi
analyzed: atha assa mātā āsanā vuṭṭhāya tāta soṇa paṇḍita cira ppavutthaḥ te kaniṭṭhaḥ evam cira āgatam pi

original: taṃ yācituṃ na visahāmi, mayañhi taṃ nissitā, idāni pana tayā anuññātā ahaṃ etaṃ
analyzed: tam yācitum na visahāmi mayan hi tam nissitā idāni pana tayā anuññātā aham etam

original: brahmacārinaṃ bāhāhi upagūhitvā sīse upasiṅghāyituṃ labheyya”nti imamatthaṃ pakāsentī gāthamāha –
analyzed: brahmacārinam upagūhitvā sīse upasiṅghāyitum labheyyanti imam attham pakāsentī gātham āha

original: “Tayā tāta anuññātā, soṇa taṃ nissitā mayaṃ;
analyzed: tayā tāta anuññātā soṇa tam nissitā mayam

original: Upaghātuṃ labhe nandaṃ, muddhani brahmacārina”nti.
analyzed: upaghātum labhe nandam muddhani

original: Atha mahāsatto “tena hi, amma, anujānāmi, tvaṃ gaccha, puttaṃ nandaṃ āliṅgitvā sīse
analyzed: atha mahāsatto tena hi amma anujānāmi tvam gaccha puttam nandam āliṅgitvā sīse

original: ghāyitvā cumbitvā tava hadaye sokaṃ nibbāpehī”ti āha. Sā tassa santikaṃ gantvā nandapaṇḍitaṃ
analyzed: ghāyitvā cumbitvā tava hadaye sokam nibbāpehi iti āha sā tassa santikam gantvā nanda paṇḍitam

original: parisamajjheyeva āliṅgitvā sīsaṃ ghāyitvā cumbitvā hadaye sokaṃ nibbāpetvā mahāsattena
analyzed: āliṅgitvā sīsam ghāyitvā cumbitvā hadaye sokam nibbāpetvā mahāsattena

original: saddhiṃ sallapantī āha –
analyzed: saddhim sat lapantī āha

original: “Assatthasseva taruṇaṃ, pavāḷaṃ māluteritaṃ;
analyzed: taruṇam pavāḷam māluta īritam

original: Cirassaṃ nandaṃ disvāna, hadayaṃ me pavedhati.
analyzed: cirassam nandam disvāna hadayam me pavedhati

original: “Yadā suttāpi supine, nandaṃ passāmi āgataṃ;
analyzed: yadā suttā api supine nandam passāmi āgatam

original: Udaggā sumanā homi, nando no āgato ayaṃ.
analyzed: udaggā sumanāḥ homi nandaḥ naḥ āgataḥ ayam

original: “Yadā ca paṭibujjhitvā, nandaṃ passāmi nāgataṃ;
analyzed: yadā ca paṭibujjhitvā nandam passāmi nāgatam

original: Bhiyyo āvisatī soko, domanassañcanappakaṃ.
analyzed: bhiyyas āvisati sokaḥ domanassam ca nappakam

original: “Sāhaṃ ajja cirassampi, nandaṃ passāmi āgataṃ;
analyzed: sā aham ajja cirassam pi nandam passāmi āgatam

original: Bhattucca mayhañca piyo, nando no pāvisī gharaṃ.
analyzed: bhattucca mayhañca piyaḥ nandaḥ naḥ pāvisī gharam

original: “Pitupi nando suppiyo, yaṃ nando nappavase gharā;
analyzed: pitupi nandaḥ su piyaḥ yam nandaḥ nappavase gharā

original: Labhatū tāta nando taṃ, maṃ nando upatiṭṭhatū”ti.
analyzed: labhatu tāta nandaḥ tam mama nandaḥ upatiṭṭhatu iti

original: Tattha māluteritanti yathā vātāhataṃ assatthassa pallavaṃ kampati, evaṃ cirassaṃ
analyzed: tattha māluta īritam ti yathā vāta āhatam assatthassa pallavam kampati evam cirassam

original: nandaṃ disvā ajja mama hadayaṃ kampatīti vadati. Suttāti, tāta soṇa, yadāhaṃ suttāpi
analyzed: nandam disvā ajja mama hadayam kampati iti vadati tāta soṇa yadā aham

original: supine nandaṃ āgataṃ passāmi, tadāpi udaggā homi. Bhattuccāti sāmikassa ca me mayhañca
analyzed: supine nandam āgatam passāmi tadā api udaggā homi sāmikassa ca me mayham ca

original: piyo. Nando no pāvisī gharanti, tāta, putto no nando paṇṇasālaṃ pavisatu. Yanti yasmā
analyzed: piyaḥ nandaḥ naḥ pāvisī tāta putto naḥ nandaḥ paṇṇasālam pavisatu yanti yasmai

original: pitupi suṭṭhu piyo, tasmā puna imamhā gharā na vippavaseyya. Nando tanti, tāta, nando
analyzed: suṭṭhu piyaḥ tasmai puna imamhā gharā na vippavaseyya nando tanti tāta nando

original: yaṃ icchati, taṃ labhatu. Maṃ nandoti, tāta soṇa, tava pitaraṃ tvaṃ upaṭṭhaha, maṃ nando upaṭṭhātu.

original: [533] 1. Cūḷahaṃsajātakavaṇṇanā

original: tvaṃ pāṇaṃ sañcajanto kamatthaṃ joteyyāsīti.
analyzed: tvam pāṇam sañcajantaḥ kamattham joteyyāsi iti

original: Dhammo apacito santoti dhammo pūjito mānito samāno. Atthaṃ dassetīti vuddhiṃ dasseti.
analyzed: dhammo apacitaḥ santoti dhammo pūjitaḥ mānitaḥ samāno attham dasseti iti vuddhim dasseti

original: Apekkhānoti apekkhanto. Dhammā catthanti dhammato ca atthaṃ samuṭṭhitaṃ passanto.
analyzed: apekkhāno ti apekkhantaḥ dhammā catthanti dhammataḥ ca attham samuṭṭhitam passanto

original: Bhattinti sinehaṃ. Sataṃ dhammoti paṇḍitānaṃ sabhāvo. Yo mittoti yo mitto āpadāsu
analyzed: sineham satam paṇḍitānam sabhāvaḥ yaḥ mittaḥ iti yaḥ mittaḥ āpadāsu

original: mittaṃ na caje, tassa acajantassa mittassa esa sabhāvo nāma addhā sataṃ dhammo. Viditāti
analyzed: mittam na caje tassa a cajantassa mittassa esa sabhāvaḥ nāma addhā satam dhammaḥ viditā ati

original: pākaṭā jātā. Kāmaṃ karassūti etaṃ mama kāmaṃ mayā icchitaṃ mama vacanaṃ karassu.
analyzed: pākaṭā jātā kāmam karassu iti etam mama kāmam mayā icchitam mama vacanam karassu

original: Api tvevaṃ gate kāleti api tu evaṃ gate kāle mayi imasmiṃ ṭhāne pāsena baddhe. Paramasaṃvutanti paramaparipuṇṇaṃ.
analyzed: api tu evam gate kāla iti api tu evam gate kāle mayi imasmin ṭhāne pāsena baddhe parama saṃvutam ti parama paripuṇṇam

original: Iccevaṃ mantayantānanti “gaccha, na gacchāmī”ti evaṃ kathentānaṃ ariyānanti ācāraariyānaṃ.
analyzed: id ca ivam gaccha na gacchāmi iti evam kathentānam

original: Paccadissathāti kāsāyāni nivāsetvā rattamālaṃ piḷandhitvā muggaraṃ ādāya āgacchanto

original: adissatha. Āturānanti gilānānaṃ maccu viya. Abhisañcikkhāti, bhikkhave, te ubhopi

original: āsanato na caliṃsu, yathānisinnāva ahesuṃ. Sumukho pana “ayaṃ nesādo āgantvā paharanto
analyzed: āsanataḥ na caliṃsu su mukhaḥ pana ayam nesādaḥ āgantvā paharantaḥ

analyzed: mam paṭhamam paharatu iti cintetvā mahāsattam pacchatas katvā nisīdi

original: Dhataraṭṭheti haṃse. Samuḍḍenteti maraṇabhayena ito cito ca uppatante disvā. Āsajjāti

analyzed: gacchanti avahīyasi iti ohīyasi

analyzed: haṃsesu cāṭi pañjare nisinnaḥ tam ṭhānam gantvā avidūre pañjare

original: attānaṃ paṭicchādetvā chiddena olokento acchi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe mahāsatto navutihaṃsasahassapurakkhato
analyzed: attānam paṭicchādetvā chiddena olokentaḥ acchi tasmin khaṇe mahāsattaḥ navuti haṃsa sahassa purakkhataḥ

original: hiyyo otiṇṇaṭṭhāneyeva otaritvā odhiyaṃ nisīditvā sāliṃ khādanto pāyāsi. Nesādo pañjarachiddena

analyzed: olokento tassa rūpa sobhagga ppattam atta bhāvam disvā ayam haṃsaḥ sakaṭana abhippamāṇa sarīro

original: suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, tīhi rattarājīhi gīvāyaṃ parikkhitto, tisso rājiyo galena otaritvā
analyzed: suvaṇṇa vaṇṇaḥ tīhi ratta rājīhi gīvāyam parikkhittaḥ tissaḥ rājiyaḥ galena otaritvā

original: urantarena gatā, tisso pacchābhāgena nibbijjhitvā gatā, rattakambalasuttasikkāya
analyzed: gatā tissaḥ pacchābhāgena nibbijjhitvā gatā ratta kambala sutta sikkāya

original: ṭhapitakañcanakkhandho viya atirocati, iminā etesaṃ raññā bhavitabbaṃ, imameva gaṇhissāmī”ti
analyzed: ṭhapita kañcana khandhaḥ viya atirocati iminā etesam raññā bhavitabbam imam eva gaṇhissāmi iti

original: cintesi. Haṃsarājāpi bahuṃ gocaraṃ caritvā jalakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā haṃsagaṇaparivuto cittakūṭameva
analyzed: cintesi haṃsa rājā api bahum gocaram caritvā jala kīḷam kīḍitvā haṃsa gaṇa parivutaḥ cittakūṭam eva

original: agamāsi. Iminā niyāmeneva pañca divase gocaraṃ gaṇhi. Chaṭṭhe divase khemako kāḷaassavālamayaṃ
analyzed: agamāsi iminā niyāmena iva pañca divase gocaram chaṭṭhe divase khemakaḥ

original: daḷhaṃ mahārajjuṃ vaṭṭitvā yaṭṭhiyā pāsaṃ katvā “sve haṃsarājā imasmiṃ okāse otarissatī”ti
analyzed: daḷham mahā rajjum vaṭṭitvā yaṭṭhiyā pāsam katvā sve haṃsa rājā imasmin okāse otarissati iti

original: tathato ñatvā antoudake yaṭṭhipāsaṃ oḍḍi.
analyzed: tathatas ñatvā antoudake yaṭṭhi pāsam oḍḍi

original: Punadivase haṃsarājā otaranto pādaṃ pāse pavesantoyeva otari. Athassa pāso pādaṃ
analyzed: puna divase haṃsa rājā otarantaḥ pādam pāse athassa pāsaḥ pādam

original: ayapaṭṭakena kaḍḍhanto viya ābandhitvā gaṇhi. So “chindissāmi na”nti vegaṃ janetvā

original: kaḍḍhitvā pātesi. Paṭhamavāre suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ cammaṃ chijji, dutiyavāre kambalavaṇṇaṃ

analyzed: saḥ cintesi sacā aham baddha ravam ravissāmi ñātakāḥ me hutvā gocaram aggahetvā

analyzed: chāta ajjhattā ava palāyantā dubbala ttā samudde patissanti iti saḥ vedanam adhivāsetvā

original: pāsavase vattetvā sāliṃ khādanto viya hutvā tesaṃ yāvadatthaṃ caritvā haṃsakīḷaṃ
analyzed: pāsa vase vattetvā sālim khādantaḥ viya hutvā tesam yāvadattham caritvā haṃsa kīḷam

original: kīḷanakāle mahantena saddena baddharavaṃ ravi. Taṃ sutvā haṃsā maraṇabhayatajjitā
analyzed: kīḍana kāle mahantena saddena baddha ravam ravi tam sutvā haṃsā maraṇa bhaya tajjitā

original: vaggavaggā cittakūṭābhimukhā purimanayeneva pakkamiṃsu.
analyzed: vagga vaggāḥ cittakūṭa abhimukhāḥ purima nayena iva pakkamiṃsu

original: Sumukhopi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva cintetvā vicinitvā tīsupi koṭṭhāsesu mahāsattaṃ adisvā
analyzed: sumukhaḥ api heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva cintetvā vicinitvā tīsu pi koṭṭhāsesu mahāsattam a disvā

original: “addhā tassevedaṃ bhayaṃ uppanna”nti nivattitvā āgato mahāsattaṃ pāsena baddhaṃ lohitamakkhitaṃ
analyzed: addhā tassa iva idam bhayam uppannanti nivattitvā āgataḥ mahāsattam pāsena baddham lohita makkhitam

original: dukkhāturaṃ paṅkapiṭṭhe nipannaṃ disvā “mā bhāyi, mahārāja, ahaṃ mama jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā
analyzed: dukkha āturam paṅka piṭṭhe nipannam disvā mā bhāyi mahā rāja aham mama jīvitam pariccajitvā

original: tumhe mocessāmī”ti vadanto otaritvā mahāsattaṃ assāsento paṅkapiṭṭhe nisīdi. Mahāsatto
analyzed: tumhe mocessāmi iti vadantaḥ otaritvā mahāsattam assāsento paṅka piṭṭhe nisīdi mahāsatto

original: “navutihaṃsasahassesu maṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyantesu ayaṃ sumukho ekakova āgato, kiṃ nu
analyzed: navuti haṃsa sahassesu mam chaḍḍetvā palāyantesu ayam su mukhaḥ ekakaḥ uva āgataḥ kim nu

original: kho luddaputtassa āgatakāle maṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyissati, udāhu no”ti vīmaṃsanavasena
analyzed: kho ludda puttassa āgata kāle mam chaḍḍetvā palāyissati udāhu no ti vīmaṃsana vasena

original: lohitamakkhito pāsayaṭṭhiyaṃ olambantoyeva tisso gāthā abhāsi –
analyzed: lohita makkhito pāsa yaṭṭhiyam olambanto yeva tissaḥ gāthāḥ abhāsi

original: “Ete haṃsā pakkamanti, vakkaṅgā bhayameritā;
analyzed: ete haṃsā pakkamanti vakkaṅgāḥ bhayam eritā

original: Harittaca hemavaṇṇa, kāmaṃ sumukha pakkama.
analyzed: harittaca hema vaṇṇa kāmam su mukha pakkama

original: “Ohāya maṃ ñātigaṇā, ekaṃ pāsavasaṃ gataṃ;
analyzed: ohāya mam ñāti gaṇāḥ ekam pāsavasam gatam

original: Anapekkhamānā gacchanti, kiṃ eko avahīyasi.
analyzed: an apekkhamānāḥ gacchanti kim ekaḥ avahīyasi

original: “Pateva patataṃ seṭṭha, natthi baddhe sahāyatā;
analyzed: pata iva patatam seṭṭha natthi baddhe sahāya tā

original: Mā anīghāya hāpesi, kāmaṃ sumukha pakkamā”ti.
analyzed: mā anīghāya hāpesi kāmam su mukha pakkamāti

original: Tattha bhayameritāti bhayena eritā bhayaṭṭitā bhayacalitā. Tatiyapade “harī”tipi
analyzed: tattha bhayam eritā iti bhayena eritā bhaya ṭṭitā bhaya calitā tatiya pade

original: “hema”ntipi suvaṇṇasseva nāmaṃ. So ca harittacatāya hemavaṇṇo, tena taṃ evaṃ ālapati.
analyzed: suvaṇṇassa iva nāmam saḥ ca harittacatāya hema vaṇṇaḥ tena tam evam ālapati

original: Sumukhāti sundaramukha. Anapekkhamānāti tava ñātakā maṃ anolokentā nirālayā hutvā.
analyzed: sumukhā ati sundaramukha an apekkhamānā ati tava ñātakāḥ mam nirālayāḥ hutvā

original: Patevāti uppatāhiyeva. Mā anīghāyāti ito gantvā pattabbāya nidukkhabhāvāya vīriyaṃ mā hāpesi.
analyzed: pateva āti uppata ahiyā iva mā anīghāya ati itas gantvā pattabbāya nidukkha bhāvāya vīriyam mā hāpesi

original: Taṃ sutvā sumukho “ayaṃ haṃsarājā mama piyamittabhāvaṃ na jānāti, anuppiyabhāṇī mittoti maṃ sallakkheti, sinehabhāvamassa dassessāmī”ti cintetvā catasso gāthā abhāsi –
analyzed: tam sutvā su mukhaḥ ayam haṃsa rājā mama piya mitta bhāvam na jānāti anuppiya bhāṇī mittaḥ ti mam sallakkha iti sineha bhāvam assa dassessāmi iti cintetvā catassaḥ gāthāḥ abhāsi

original: “Nāhaṃ dukkhaparetopi, dhataraṭṭha tuvaṃ jahe;
analyzed: na aham dukkha paretaḥ api dhataraṭṭha tuvam jahe

original: Jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ vā me, tayā saddhiṃ bhavissati.
analyzed: jīvitam maraṇam vā me tayā saddhim bhavissati

original: “Nāhaṃ dukkhaparetopi, dhataraṭṭha tuvaṃ jahe;
analyzed: na aham dukkha paretaḥ api dhataraṭṭha tuvam jahe

original: Na maṃ anariyasaṃyutte, kamme yojetumarahasi.
analyzed: na mam an ariya saṃyutte kamme yojetum arahasi

original: “Sakumāro sakhātyasmi, sacitte casmi te ṭhito;
analyzed: sa kumāraḥ sakhā atyasmi sa citte ca asmi te ṭhitaḥ

original: Ñāto senāpatī tyāhaṃ, haṃsānaṃ pavaruttama.
analyzed: senāpatī tya aham haṃsānam pavar uttama

original: “Kathaṃ ahaṃ vikattissaṃ, ñātimajjhe ito gato;
analyzed: katham aham vikattissam ñāti majjhe itas gataḥ

original: Taṃ hitvā patataṃ seṭṭha, kiṃ te vakkhāmito gato;
analyzed: tam hitvā patatam seṭṭha kim te gato

original: Idha pāṇaṃ cajissāmi, nānariyaṃ kattumussahe”ti.
analyzed: idha pāṇam cajissāmi na anariyam kattum ussaheti

original: Tattha nāhanti ahaṃ, mahārāja, kāyikacetasikena dukkhena phuṭṭhopi taṃ na jahāmi.
analyzed: tattha aham mahā rāja kāyika cetasikena dukkhena phuṭṭhaḥ api tam na jahāmi

original: Anariyasaṃyutteti mittadubbhīhi ahirikehi kattabbatāya anariyabhāvena saṃyutte. Kammeti
analyzed: anariya saṃyuttā iti mitta dubbhīhi ahirikehi kattabba tāya anariya bhāvena saṃyutte kamme iti

original: taṃ jahitvā pakkamanakamme. Sakumāroti samānakumāro, ekadivaseneva paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā
analyzed: tam jahitvā pakkamana kamme sa kumāraḥ ti samāna kumāraḥ eka divasena iva paṭisandhim gahetvā

original: ekadivase aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā ekato vaḍḍhitakumāroti attho. Sakhātyasmīti ahaṃ te
analyzed: eka divase aṇḍa kosam padāletvā ekatas sakhāti asmi iti aham te

original: dakkhiṇakkhisamo piyasahāyo. Sacitteti tava sake citte ahaṃ ṭhito tava vase vattāmi,
analyzed: piya sahāyaḥ sa citta iti tava sake citte aham ṭhitaḥ tava vase vattāmi

original: tayi jīvante jīvāmi, na jīvante na jīvāmīti attho. “Saṃcitte”tipi pāṭho, tava citte
analyzed: tayi jīvante jīvāmi na jīvante na jīvāmi iti attho tava citte

original: ahaṃ saṇṭhito suṭṭhu ṭhitoti attho. Ñātoti sabbahaṃsānaṃ antare paññāto. Vikattissanti
analyzed: aham saṇṭhitaḥ suṭṭhu ṭhitaḥ ti atthaḥ ñāto ti sabba haṃsānam antare paññātaḥ vikattissanti

original: “kuhiṃ haṃsarājā”ti pucchito ahaṃ kinti kathessāmi. Kiṃ te vakkhāmīti te tava pavattiṃ
analyzed: kuhim haṃsa rājā ati pucchitaḥ aham kinti kathessāmi kim te vakkhāmi iti te tava pavattim

original: pucchante haṃsagaṇe kiṃ vakkhāmi.
analyzed: pucchante haṃsa gaṇe kim vakkhāmi

original: Evaṃ sumukhena catūhi gāthāhi sīhanāde nadite tassa guṇaṃ pakāsento mahāsatto āha –
analyzed: evam sumukhena catūhi gāthāhi sīha nāde nadite tassa guṇam pakāsentaḥ mahāsattaḥ āha

original: “Eso hi dhammo sumukha, yaṃ tvaṃ ariyapathe ṭhito;
analyzed: esaḥ hi dhammaḥ su mukha yam tvam ariya pathe ṭhitaḥ

original: Yo bhattāraṃ sakhāraṃ maṃ, na pariccattumussahe.
analyzed: yaḥ bhattāram sakhāram mam na pariccattum ussahe

original: “Tañhi me pekkhamānassa, bhayaṃ na tveva jāyati;
analyzed: tat hi me pekkhamānassa bhayam na tu eva jāyati

original: Adhigacchasi tvaṃ mayhaṃ, evaṃbhūtassa jīvita”nti.
analyzed: adhigacchasi tvam mayham evaṃbhūtassa jīvitanti

original: Tattha eso dhammoti esa porāṇakapaṇḍitānaṃ sabhāvo. Bhattāraṃ sakhāraṃ manti sāmikañca
analyzed: tattha esaḥ dhammaḥ ti esa porāṇaka paṇḍitānam sabhāvaḥ bhattāram sakhāram sāmikam ca

original: sahāyañca maṃ. Bhayanti cittutrāso mayhaṃ na jāyati, cittakūṭapabbate haṃsagaṇamajjhe

original: ṭhito viya homi. Mayhanti mama jīvitaṃ tvaṃ labhāpessasi.
analyzed: ṭhitaḥ viya homi mama jīvitam tvam

original: Evaṃ tesaṃ kathentānaññeva luddaputto sarapariyante ṭhito haṃse tīhi khandhehi palāyante
analyzed: evam tesam kathentānam aññā iva ludda putto sara pariyante ṭhitaḥ haṃse tīhi khandhehi palāyante

original: disvā “kiṃ nu kho”ti pāsaṭṭhānaṃ olokento bodhisattaṃ pāsayaṭṭhiyaṃ olambantaṃ disvā
analyzed: disvā kim nu kha iti pāsa ṭṭhānam olokentaḥ bodhisattam pāsa yaṭṭhiyam olambantam disvā

original: sañjātasomanasso kacchaṃ daḷhaṃ bandhitvā muggaraṃ gahetvā kappuṭṭhānaggi viya avattharamāno

original: paṇhiyā akkantakalale uparisīsena gantvā purato patante vegena upasaṅkami. Tamatthaṃ
analyzed: paṇhiyāḥ akkanta kalale upari sīsena gantvā puratas patante vegena upasaṅkami tam attham

original: pakāsento satthā āha –
analyzed: pakāsentaḥ satthā āha

original: “Iccevaṃ mantayantānaṃ, ariyānaṃ ariyavuttinaṃ;
analyzed: icca ivam mantayantānam ariyānam ariya vuttinam

original: Daṇḍamādāya nesādo, āpatī turito bhusaṃ.
analyzed: daṇḍam ādāya nesādaḥ āpatī turitaḥ bhusam

original: “Tamāpatantaṃ disvāna, sumukho atibrūhayi;
analyzed: tam āpatantam disvāna su mukhaḥ atibrūhayi

original: Aṭṭhāsi purato rañño, haṃso vissāsayaṃ byathaṃ.
analyzed: aṭṭhāsi puratas raññaḥ haṃsaḥ vissāsayam byatham

original: “Mā bhāyi patataṃ seṭṭha, na hi bhāyanti tādisā;
analyzed: mā bhāyi patatam seṭṭha na hi bhāyanti tādisā

original: Ahaṃ yogaṃ payuñjissaṃ, yuttaṃ dhammūpasañhitaṃ;
analyzed: aham yogam payuñjissam yuttam dhamma upasañhitam

original: Tena pariyāpadānena, khippaṃ pāsā pamokkhasī”ti.
analyzed: tena pariyāpadānena khippam pāsā pamokkhasi iti

original: Tattha ariyavuttinanti ariyācāre vattamānānaṃ. Bhusanti daḷhaṃ balavaṃ. Atibrūhayīti

original: anantaragāthāya āgataṃ “mā bhāyī”ti vacanaṃ vadanto atibrūhesi mahāsaddaṃ nicchāresi.
analyzed: anantara gāthāya āgatam mā bhāyi iti vacanam vadantaḥ mahā saddam nicchāresi

original: Aṭṭhāsīti sace nesādo rājānaṃ paharissati, ahaṃ pahāraṃ sampaṭicchissāmīti jīvitaṃ

original: pariccajitvā purato aṭṭhāsi. Vissāsayanti vissāsento assāsento. Byathanti byathitaṃ
analyzed: pariccajitvā puratas aṭṭhāsi vissāsayanti vissāsentaḥ assāsentaḥ byathanti byathitam

original: bhītaṃ rājānaṃ “mā bhāyī”ti iminā vacanena vissāsento. Tādisāti tumhādisā ñāṇavīriyasampannā.
analyzed: bhītam rājānam mā bhāyi iti iminā vacanena vissāsento tādisā ati tumhādisā ñāṇa vīriya sampannā

original: Yoganti ñāṇavīriyayogaṃ. Yuttanti anucchavikaṃ. Dhammūpasañhitanti kāraṇanissitaṃ.
analyzed: yogam ti ñāṇa vīriya yogam yuttam ti anucchavikam dhamma upasañhitam ti kāraṇa nissitam

original: Tena pariyāpadānenāti tena mayā payuttena yogena parisuddhena. Pamokkhasīti muccissasi.
analyzed: tena pariyāpadānena ati tena mayā payuttena yogena parisuddhena pamokkhasi iti muccissasi

original: Evaṃ sumukho mahāsattaṃ assāsetvā luddaputtassa santikaṃ gantvā madhuraṃ mānusiṃ
analyzed: evam sumukhaḥ mahāsattam assāsetvā ludda puttassa santikam gantvā madhuram mānusim

original: vācaṃ nicchārento, “samma, tvaṃ konāmosī”ti pucchitvā “suvaṇṇavaṇṇahaṃsarāja, ahaṃ
analyzed: vācam samma tvam konāmā asi iti pucchitvā suvaṇṇa vaṇṇa haṃsa rāja aham

original: khemako nāmā”ti vutte, “samma khemaka, ‘tayā oḍḍitavālapāse yo vā so vā haṃso baddho’ti
analyzed: khemakaḥ nāma ati vutte samma khemaka tayā oḍḍita vāla pāse yaḥ vā saḥ vā haṃsaḥ baddhaḥ ti

original: saññaṃ mā kari, navutiyā haṃsasahassānaṃ pavaro dhataraṭṭhahaṃsarājā te pāse baddho,
analyzed: saññam mā kari navutiyā haṃsa sahassānam pavaraḥ dhataraṭṭha haṃsa rājā te pāse baddhaḥ

original: ñāṇasīlācārasampanno saṅgāhakapakkhe ṭhito, na taṃ māretuṃ yutto, ahaṃ tava iminā
analyzed: ñāṇa sīla ācāra sampanno saṅgāhaka pakkhe ṭhitaḥ na tam māretum yuttaḥ aham tava iminā

original: kattabbakiccaṃ karissāmi, ayampi suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, ahampi tatheva, ahaṃ etassatthāya
analyzed: kattabba kiccam karissāmi ayam pi suvaṇṇa vaṇṇaḥ aham pi tathā iva aham etassa atthāya

original: attano jīvitaṃ pariccajissāmi, sace tvaṃ etassa pattāni gaṇhitukāmosi, mama pattāni
analyzed: attanaḥ jīvitam pariccajissāmi sace tvam etassa pattāni gaṇhitu kāmo asi mama pattāni

original: gaṇha, athopi cammamaṃsanhāruaṭṭhīnamaññataraṃ gaṇhitukāmosi, mameva sarīrato gaṇha,

original: bārāṇasiṃ pāvisi. Acchariyabbhutajātena añjalinā mahājanena anuggacchamāno so rājadvāraṃ
analyzed: bārāṇasim pāvisi acchariya bbhuta jātena añjalinā mahājanena anuggacchamānaḥ saḥ rājadvāram

original: patvā attano āgatabhāvaṃ rañño ārocāpesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
analyzed: patvā attanaḥ āgata bhāvam raññaḥ ārocāpesi tam attham pakāsentaḥ satthā āha

original: “So luddo haṃsakājena, rājadvāraṃ upāgami;
analyzed: saḥ luddaḥ haṃsa kājena rājadvāram upāgami

original: Paṭivedetha maṃ rañño, dhataraṭṭhāyamāgato”ti.
analyzed: paṭivedetha mama raññaḥ dhataraṭṭhāyam āgataḥ ti

original: Tattha paṭivedetha manti khemako āgatoti evaṃ maṃ rañño nivedetha. Dhataraṭṭhāyanti ayaṃ dhataraṭṭho āgatoti paṭivedetha.
analyzed: tattha paṭivedetha manti khemakaḥ āgato ti evam mam raññaḥ nivedetha dhataraṭṭhāyanti ayam dhataraṭṭhaḥ āgataḥ iti paṭivedetha

original: Dovāriko gantvā paṭivedesi. Rājā sañjātasomanasso “khippaṃ āgacchatū”ti vatvā amaccagaṇaparivuto
analyzed: dovārikaḥ gantvā paṭivedesi rājā sañjāta somanassaḥ khippam āgacchatu uti vatvā amacca gaṇa parivutaḥ

original: samussitasetacchatte rājapallaṅke nisinno khemakaṃ haṃsakājaṃ ādāya mahātalaṃ abhiruḷhaṃ
analyzed: samussita seta chatte rāja pallaṅke nisinnaḥ khemakam haṃsa kājam ādāya mahā talam abhiruḷham

original: disvā suvaṇṇavaṇṇe haṃse oloketvā “sampuṇṇo me manoratho”ti tassa kattabbakiccaṃ
analyzed: disvā suvaṇṇa vaṇṇe haṃse oloketvā sampuṇṇaḥ me manorathaḥ iti tassa kattabba kiccam

original: amacce āṇāpesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
analyzed: amacce āṇāpesi tam attham pakāsentaḥ satthā āha

original: “Te disvā puññasaṅkāse, ubho lakkhaṇasammate;
analyzed: te disvā puñña saṅkāse ubho lakkhaṇa sammate

original: Khalu saṃyamano rājā, amacce ajjhabhāsatha.
analyzed: khalu saṃyamanaḥ rājā amacce ajjhabhāsatha

original: “Detha luddassa vatthāni, annaṃ pānañca bhojanaṃ;
analyzed: detha luddassa vatthāni annam pānañca bhojanam

original: Kāmaṃkaro hiraññassa, yāvanto esa icchatī”ti.
analyzed: kāmaṃkaraḥ hiraññassa yāvantaḥ esaḥ icchati iti

original: Tattha puññasaṅkāseti attano puññasadise. Lakkhaṇasammateti seṭṭhasammate abhiññāte.
analyzed: tattha puñña saṅkāse iti attanaḥ puñña sadise lakkhaṇa sammate iti seṭṭha sammate abhiññāte

original: Khalūti nipāto, tassa “te khalu disvā”ti purimapadena sambandho. “Dethā”tiādīni rājā
analyzed: khalu iti nipātaḥ tassa te khalu disvā iti purima padena sambandhaḥ rājā

original: pasannākāraṃ karonto āha. Tattha kāmaṃkaro hiraññassāti hiraññaṃ assa kāmakiriyā
analyzed: pasanna ākāram karontaḥ āha tattha kāmaṃkaraḥ hiraññassa ati hiraññam assa kāma kiriyā

original: atthu. Yāvantoti yattakaṃ esa icchati, tattakaṃ hiraññamassa dethāti attho.
analyzed: atthu yāvanto ti yattakam esaḥ icchati tattakam hiraññam assa detha ati attho

original: Evaṃ pasannākāraṃ kāretvā pītisomanassāsamussahito “gacchatha naṃ alaṅkaritvā ānethā”ti
analyzed: evam pasanna ākāram kāretvā gacchatha nam alaṅkaritvā ānetha ati

original: āha. Atha naṃ amaccā rājanivesanā otāretvā kappitakesamassuṃ nhātānulittaṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
analyzed: āha atha nam amaccā rāja nivesanā otāretvā kappita kesa massum nhāta anulittam sabba alaṅkāra paṭimaṇḍitam

original: katvā rañño dassesuṃ. Athassa rājā saṃvacchare satasahassuṭṭhānake dvādasa gāme ājaññayuttaṃ
analyzed: katvā raññaḥ dassesuṃ athassa rājā saṃvacchare sata sahassu ṭṭhānake dvādasa gāme ājañña yuttam

original: rathaṃ alaṅkatamahāgehañcāti mahantaṃ yasaṃ dāpesi. So mahantaṃ yasaṃ labhitvā attano
analyzed: ratham alaṅkata mahā geham ca ati mahantam yasam dāpesi saḥ mahantam yasam labhitvā

original: kammaṃ pakāsetuṃ “na te, deva, mayā yo vā so vā haṃso ānīto, ayaṃ pana navutiyā haṃsasahassānaṃ
analyzed: kammam pakāsetum na te deva mayā yaḥ vā saḥ vā haṃsaḥ ānītaḥ ayam pana navutiyā haṃsa sahassānam

original: rājā dhataraṭṭho nāma, ayaṃ senāpati sumukho nāmā”ti āha. Atha naṃ rājā “kathaṃ te,
analyzed: rājā dhataraṭṭhaḥ nāma ayam senāpati sumukhaḥ nāma ati āha atha nam rājā katham te

original: samma, ete gahitā”ti pucchi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
analyzed: samma ete gahitā ti pucchi tam attham pakāsentaḥ satthā āha

original: “Disvā luddaṃ pasannattaṃ, kāsirājā tadabravi;
analyzed: disvā luddam pasannattam kāsi rājā tat abravi

original: Yadyāyaṃ samma khemaka, puṇṇā haṃsehi tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: yadi ayam samma khemaka puṇṇā haṃsehi tiṭṭhati

original: “Kathaṃ rucimajjhagataṃ, pāsahattho upāgami;
analyzed: katham rucimajjhagatam pāsa hatthaḥ upāgami

original: Okiṇṇaṃ ñātisaṅghehi, nimmajjhimaṃ kathaṃ gahī”ti.
analyzed: okiṇṇam ñāti saṅghehi nimmajjhimam katham gahi iti

original: Tattha pasannattanti pasannabhāvaṃ somanassappattaṃ. Yadyāyanti, samma khemaka, yadi
analyzed: tattha pasannattanti pasanna bhāvam somanassa ppattam yadi āyanti samma khemaka yadi

original: ayaṃ amhākaṃ pokkharaṇī navutihaṃsasahassehi puṇṇā tiṭṭhati. Kathaṃ rucimajjhagatanti
analyzed: ayam amhākam pokkharaṇī navuti haṃsa sahassehi puṇṇā tiṭṭhati katham

original: evaṃ sante tvaṃ tesaṃ rucīnaṃ piyadassanānaṃ haṃsānaṃ majjhagataṃ etaṃ ñātisaṅghehi
analyzed: evam sante tvam tesam rucīnam piya dassanānam haṃsānam majjha gatam etam ñāti saṅghehi

original: okiṇṇaṃ. Nimmajjhimanti neva majjhimaṃ neva kaniṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ haṃsarājānaṃ kathaṃ
analyzed: okiṇṇam nimmajjhimanti na iva majjhimam na iva kaniṭṭham uttamam haṃsa rājānam katham

original: pāsahattho upāgami kathaṃ gaṇhīti.
analyzed: pāsa hatthaḥ upāgami katham gaṇhi iti

original: So tassa kathento āha –
analyzed: saḥ tassa kathentaḥ āha

original: “Ajja me sattamā ratti, adanāni upāsato;
analyzed: ajja me sattamā ratti adanāni upāsataḥ

original: Padametassa anvesaṃ, appamatto ghaṭassito.
analyzed: padam etassa anvesam appamattaḥ ghaṭa ssitaḥ

original: “Athassa padamaddakkhiṃ, carato adanesanaṃ;
analyzed: athassa carataḥ adana isanam

original: Tatthāhaṃ odahiṃ pāsaṃ, evaṃ taṃ dijamaggahi”nti.
analyzed: tattha aham odahim pāsam evam tam

original: Tattha adanānīti ādānāni, gocaraggahaṇaṭṭhānānīti attho, ayameva vā pāṭho. Upāsatoti
analyzed: tattha adanāni iti ādānāni gocara ggahaṇa ṭṭhānāni iti atthaḥ ayam eva vā pāṭhaḥ upāsato ti

original: upagacchantassa. Padanti gocarabhūmiyaṃ akkantapadaṃ. Ghaṭassitoti cāṭipañjare nissito
analyzed: upagacchantassa padanti gocara bhūmiyam akkanta padam ghaṭassito ti cāṭi pañjare nissitaḥ

original: hutvā. Athassāti atha chaṭṭhe divase etassa adanesanaṃ carantassa padaṃ addakkhiṃ.
analyzed: hutvā athassa ati atha chaṭṭhe divase etassa adanesanam carantassa padam

original: Evaṃ tanti evaṃ taṃ dijaṃ aggahinti sabbaṃ gahitopāyaṃ ācikkhi.
analyzed: evam tam ti evam tam dijam aggahinti sabbam gahita upāyam ācikkhi

original: Taṃ sutvā rājā “ayaṃ dvāre ṭhatvā paṭivedentopi dhataraṭṭhassevāgamanaṃ paṭivedesi, idānipi etaṃ ekameva gaṇhinti vadati, kiṃ nu kho ettha kāraṇa”nti cintetvā gāthamāha –
analyzed: tam sutvā rājā ayam dvāre ṭhatvā paṭivedentaḥ api dhataraṭṭhassa iva āgamanam paṭivedesi etam ekam eva gaṇhinti vadati kim nu kho ettha kāraṇam iti cintetvā gātham āha

original: “Ludda dve ime sakuṇā, atha ekoti bhāsasi;
analyzed: ludda dve ime sakuṇā atha ekoti bhāsasi

original: Cittaṃ nu te vipariyattaṃ, adu kiṃ nu jigīsasī”ti.
analyzed: cittam nu te vipariyattam adu kim nu jigīsasi iti

original: Tattha vipariyattanti vipallatthaṃ. Adu kiṃ nu jigīsasīti udāhu kiṃ nu cintesi, kiṃ itaraṃ gahetvā aññassa dātukāmo hutvā cintesīti pucchati.
analyzed: tattha vipariyattanti vipallattham adu kim nu jigīsasi iti udāhu kim nu cintesi kim itaram gahetvā aññassa dātu kāmaḥ hutvā cintesi iti pucchati

original: Tato luddo “na me, deva, cittaṃ vipallatthaṃ, nāpi ahaṃ itaraṃ aññassa dātukāmo, apica kho pana mayā ohite pāse ekova baddho”ti āvi karonto āha –
analyzed: tatas luddaḥ na me deva cittam vipallattham na api aham itaram aññassa dātu kāmo apica kho pana mayā ohite pāse ekaḥ iva baddhaḥ iti āvi karontaḥ āha

original: “Yassa lohitakā tālā, tapanīyanibhā subhā;
analyzed: yassa lohitakā tālā tapanīya nibhā subhā

original: Uraṃ saṃhacca tiṭṭhanti, so me bandhaṃ upāgami.
analyzed: uram saṃhat ca tiṭṭhanti saḥ me bandham upāgami

original: “Athāyaṃ bhassaro pakkhī, abaddho baddhamāturaṃ;
analyzed: atha ayam bhassaraḥ pakkhī a baddhaḥ baddham āturam

original: Ariyaṃ bruvāno aṭṭhāsi, cajanto mānusiṃ gira”nti.
analyzed: ariyam bruvānaḥ aṭṭhāsi cajantaḥ mānusim giranti

original: Tattha lohitakāti rattavaṇṇā. Lātāti rājiyo. Uraṃ saṃhaccāti uraṃ āhacca. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
analyzed: tattha lohitakā ati ratta vaṇṇā lātā ati rājiyaḥ uram saṃhacca ati uram āhacca idam vuttam

original: hoti – mahārāja, yassetā rattasuvaṇṇasappaṭibhāgā tisso lohitakā rājiyo gīvaṃ parikkhipitvā
analyzed: hoti mahā rāja yassa etāḥ ratta suvaṇṇa sappaṭibhāgāḥ tissaḥ lohitakāḥ rājiyaḥ gīvam parikkhipitvā

original: uraṃ āhacca tiṭṭhanti, so ekova mama pāse bandhaṃ upāgatoti. Bhassaroti parisuddho
analyzed: uram āhacca tiṭṭhanti saḥ ekaḥ iva mama pāse bandham upāgato ti bhassaroti parisuddhaḥ

original: pabhāsampanno. Āturanti gilānaṃ dukkhitaṃ aṭṭhāsīti.
analyzed: pabhā sampannaḥ āturanti gilānam dukkhitam aṭṭhāsi iti

original: Atha dhataraṭṭhassa baddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā nivattitvā etaṃ samassāsetvā mamāgamanakāle
analyzed: atha dhataraṭṭhassa baddha bhāvam ñatvā nivattitvā etam samassāsetvā mama āgamana kāle

analyzed: ca paccuggamanam katvā ākāseya iva mayā saddhim madhura paṭisanthāram katvā manussa bhāsāya

original: dhataraṭṭhassa guṇaṃ kathento aṭṭhāsi, mama hadayaṃ mudukaṃ katvā puna etasseva purato
analyzed: dhataraṭṭhassa guṇam kathentaḥ aṭṭhāsi mama hadayam mudukam katvā punar etassa iva puratas

original: aṭṭhāsi. Athāhaṃ, deva, sumukhassa subhāsitaṃ sutvā pasannacitto dhataraṭṭhaṃ vissajjesiṃ,
analyzed: aṭṭhāsi atha aham deva sumukhassa su bhāsitam sutvā pasanna cittaḥ dhataraṭṭham vissajjesiṃ

original: iti dhataraṭṭhassa pāsato mokkho, ime haṃse ādāya mama idhāgamanañca sumukheneva
analyzed: iti dhataraṭṭhassa pāsatas mokkhaḥ ime haṃse ādāya mama idha āgamanam ca su mukhena iva

original: katanti. Evaṃ so sumukhassa guṇakathaṃ kathesi. Taṃ sutvā rājā sumukhassa dhammakathaṃ
analyzed: katam ti evam saḥ sumukhassa guṇa katham kathesi tam sutvā rājā sumukhassa dhamma katham

original: sotukāmo ahosi. Luddaputtassa sakkāraṃ karontasseva sūriyo atthaṅgato, dīpā pajjalitā,
analyzed: sotu kāmo ahosi ludda puttassa sakkāram karontassa iva sūriyaḥ atthaṅgataḥ dīpā pajjalitā

original: bahū khattiyādayo sannipatitā, khemā devīpi vividhanāṭakaparivārā rañño dakkhiṇapasse
analyzed: bahū khattiya ādayo sannipatitā khemā devī pi vividha nāṭaka parivārā raññaḥ dakkhiṇa passe

original: nisīdi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe rājā sumukhaṃ kathāpetukāmo gāthamāha –
analyzed: tasmin khaṇe rājā su mukham kathā petu kāmaḥ gātham āha

original: “Atha kiṃ dāni sumukha, hanuṃ saṃhacca tiṭṭhasi;
analyzed: atha kim dāni su mukha hanum saṃhacca tiṭṭhasi

original: Adu me parisaṃ patto, bhayā bhīto na bhāsasī”ti.
analyzed: adu me parisam pattaḥ bhayā bhītaḥ na bhāsasi iti

original: Tattha hanuṃ saṃhaccāti madhurakatho kira tvaṃ, atha kasmā idāni mukhaṃ pidhāya tiṭṭhasi. Adūti kacci. Bhayā bhītoti parisasārajjabhayena bhīto hutvā.
analyzed: tattha hanum madhura katho kira tvam atha kasmai idāni mukham pidhāya tiṭṭhasi kacci bhayā bhītā iti parisasāra ja bhayena bhītaḥ hutvā

original: Taṃ sutvā sumukho abhītabhāvaṃ dassento gāthamāha –
analyzed: tam sutvā su mukhaḥ abhīta bhāvam dassentaḥ gātham āha

original: “Nāhaṃ kāsipati bhīto, ogayha parisaṃ tava;

original: Nāhaṃ bhayā na bhāsissaṃ, vākyaṃ atthasmiṃ tādise”ti.
analyzed: na aham bhayā na bhāsissam vākyam atthasmin tādisā iti

original: Tattha tādiseti apica kho pana tathārūpe atthe uppanne vākyaṃ bhāsissāmīti vacanokāsaṃ olokento nisinnomhīti attho.

original: Taṃ sutvā rājā tassa kathaṃ vaḍḍhetukāmatāya parihāsaṃ karonto āha –
analyzed: tam sutvā rājā tassa katham vaḍḍhetu kāma tāya parihāsam karontaḥ āha

original: “Na te abhisaraṃ passe, na rathe napi pattike;
analyzed: na te abhisaram passe na rathe na pi pattike

original: Nāssa cammaṃva kīṭaṃ vā, vammite ca dhanuggahe.
analyzed: na assa cammam iva kīṭam vā vammite ca dhanuggahe

original: “Na hiraññaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ vā, nagaraṃ vā sumāpitaṃ;

original: Okiṇṇaparikhaṃ duggaṃ, daḷhamaṭṭālakoṭṭhakaṃ;
analyzed: okiṇṇa parikham duggam daḷham aṭṭāla koṭṭhakam

original: Yattha paviṭṭho sumukha, bhāyitabbaṃ na bhāyasī”ti.
analyzed: yattha paviṭṭhaḥ su mukha bhāyitabbam na bhāyasi iti

original: Tattha abhisaranti rakkhaṇatthāya parivāretvā ṭhitaṃ āvudhahatthaṃ parisaṃ te na
analyzed: tattha abhisaranti rakkhaṇa atthāya parivāretvā ṭhitam āvudha hattham parisam te na

original: passāmi. Nāssāti ettha assāti nipātamattaṃ. Cammanti saraparittāṇacammaṃ. Kīṭanti
analyzed: passāmi na assa ati ettha assa ati nipāta mattam cammanti sara parittāṇa cammam kīṭanti

original: kīṭaṃ cāṭikapālādi vuccati. Cāṭikapālahatthāpi te santike natthīti dīpeti. Vammiteti

original: cammasannaddhe. Na hiraññanti yaṃ nissāya na bhāyasi, taṃ hiraññampi te na passāmi.
analyzed: camma sannaddhe na hiraññanti yam nissāya na bhāyasi tam hiraññam pi te na passāmi

original: Evaṃ raññā “kiṃ te abhāyanakāraṇa”nti vutte taṃ kathento āha –

original: “Na me abhisarenattho, nagarena dhanena vā;
analyzed: na me abhisarena atthaḥ nagarena dhanena vā

original: Apathena pathaṃ yāma, antalikkhecarā mayaṃ.
analyzed: apathena patham yāma antalikkhe carāḥ mayam

original: “Sutā ca paṇḍitā tyamhā, nipuṇā catthacintakā;
analyzed: sutā ca paṇḍitā nipuṇā cattha cintakā

original: Bhāsematthavatiṃ vācaṃ, sacce cassa patiṭṭhito.
analyzed: bhāsematthavatim vācam sacce ca assa patiṭṭhitaḥ

original: “Kiñca tuyhaṃ asaccassa, anariyassa karissati;
analyzed: kiñca tuyham asaccassa anariyassa karissati

original: Musāvādissa luddassa, bhaṇitampi subhāsita”nti.
analyzed: musāvādissa luddassa bhaṇitam pi su bhāsitanti

original: Tattha abhisarenāti ārakkhaparivārena. Atthoti etena mama kiccaṃ natthi. Kasmā? Yasmā
analyzed: tattha abhisarena āti ārakkha parivārena etena mama kiccam natthi kasmai yasmai

original: apathena tumhādisānaṃ amaggena pathaṃ māpetvā yāma, ākāsacārino mayanti. Paṇḍitā
analyzed: apathena amaggena patham māpetvā yāme ākāsa cārinaḥ paṇḍitā

original: tyamhāti paṇḍitāti tayā sutāmhā, teneva kāraṇena amhākaṃ santikā dhammaṃ sotukāmo
analyzed: paṇḍitā ati tayā sutā amhā tena iva kāraṇena amhākam santikā dhammam sotu kāmo

original: kira no gāhāpesi. Sacce cassāti sace pana tvaṃ sacce patiṭṭhito assa, atthavatiṃ
analyzed: kira naḥ gāhāpesi sacce sacce cassa ati sace pana tvam sacce patiṭṭhitaḥ assa atthavatim

original: kāraṇanissitaṃ vācaṃ bhāseyyāma. Asaccassāti vacīsaccarahitassa tava subhāsitaṃ muṇḍassa
analyzed: kāraṇa nissitam vācam bhāseyyāma asaccassa ati vacī sacca rahitassa tava su bhāsitam muṇḍassa

original: dantasūci viya kiṃ karissati.
analyzed: dantasūci viya kim karissati

original: Taṃ sutvā rājā “kasmā maṃ musāvādī anariyoti vadasi, kiṃ mayā kata”nti āha. Atha naṃ sumukho “tena hi, mahārāja, suṇāhī”ti vatvā āha –
analyzed: tam sutvā rājā kasmai mam musā vādī vadasi kim mayā āha atha nam sumukhaḥ tena hi mahā rāja suṇāhi iti vatvā āha

original: “Taṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ vacanā, imaṃ khemamakārayi;
analyzed: tam brāhmaṇānam vacanā imam khemam akārayi

original: Abhayañca tayā ghuṭṭhaṃ, imāyo dasadhā disā.

original: “Tvaṃ nosi ñāti purimāsu jātisu, so maccharī rosako pāpadhammo;

original: Taveva atthāya idhāgatamhā, mā pāpadhammo nirayaṃ gamitthā”ti.
analyzed: tava iva atthāya mā pāpa dhammo nirayam gamittha ati

original: Tattha soti so tvaṃ. Mā pāpadhammoti ayaṃ amhākaṃ ñāti pāpadhammo mā nirayaṃ agamāti etadatthaṃ āgatamhāti attho.
analyzed: tattha saḥ iti saḥ tvam mā pāpa dhammaḥ ti ayam amhākam ñāti pāpa dhammaḥ mā nirayam agama ati etad attham āgatamhā ati atthaḥ

original: Taṃ sutvā kosiyo “atthakāmā kira me, ete maṃ nirayā uddharitvā sagge patiṭṭhāpetukāmā”ti tuṭṭhacitto āha –
analyzed: tam sutvā kosiyaḥ attha kāmā kira me ete mam nirayāḥ uddharitvā sagge patiṭṭhāpetu kāmā iti tuṭṭha cittaḥ āha

original: “Addhā maṃ vo hitakāmā, yaṃ maṃ samanusāsatha;
analyzed: addhā mam vaḥ hita kāmāḥ yam mama samanusāsatha

original: Sohaṃ tathā karissāmi, sabbaṃ vuttaṃ hitesibhi.
analyzed: sā uham tathā karissāmi sabbam vuttam hita īsibhi

original: “Esāhamajjeva uparamāmi, na cāhaṃ kiñci kareyya pāpaṃ;
analyzed: esā aham ajjā iva uparamāmi na ca aham kiñci kareyya pāpam

original: Na cāpi me kiñci adeyyamatthi, na cāpidatvā udakaṃ pivāmi.
analyzed: na ca api me kiñci adeyyam atthi na ca api datvā udakam pivāmi

original: “Evañca me dadato sabbakālaṃ, bhogā ime vāsava khīyissanti;
analyzed: evam ca me dadataḥ sabbakālam bhogāḥ ime vāsava khīyissanti

original: Tato ahaṃ pabbajissāmi sakka, hitvāna kāmāni yathodhikānī”ti.
analyzed: tatas aham pabbajissāmi sakka hitvāna kāmāni yathā udhikāni iti

original: Tattha manti mama. Voti tumhe. Yaṃ manti yena maṃ samanusāsatha, tena me tumhe hitakāmā.
analyzed: tattha manti mama tumhe yam manti yena mama samanusāsatha tena me tumhe hita kāmā

original: Tathāti yathā vadatha, tatheva karissāmi. Uparamāmīti maccharibhāvato uparamāmi.
analyzed: tathā iti yathā vadatha tathā iva karissāmi uparamāmi iti mad śari bhāvataḥ uparamāmi

original: Adeyyamatthīti ito paṭṭhāya ca mama ālopato upaḍḍhampi adeyyaṃ nāma natthi, na cāpidatvāti
analyzed: adeyyam atthi iti itas paṭṭhāya ca mama ālopataḥ upaḍḍham pi adeyyam nāma natthi na ca api datvā ati

original: udakapasatampi cāhaṃ labhitvā adatvā na pivissāmi. Khīyissantīti vikkhīyissanti.
analyzed: udaka pasatam pi ca aham labhitvā a datvā na pivissāmi khīyissanti iti vikkhīyissanti

original: Yathodhikānīti vatthukāmakilesakāmavasena yathāṭhitakoṭṭhāsāniyeva.
analyzed: yathā udhikāni iti vatthu kāma kilesa kāma vasena

original: Sakko macchariyakosiyaṃ dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā dānaphalaṃ jānāpetvā dhammadesanāya
analyzed: sakkaḥ macchariya kosiyam dametvā nibbisevanam katvā dāna phalam jānāpetvā dhamma desanāya

original: pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā saddhiṃ tehi devanagarameva gato. Macchariyakosiyopi
analyzed: pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā saddhim tehi deva nagaram eva gataḥ macchariya kosiyaḥ pi

original: nagaraṃ pavisitvā rājānaṃ anujānāpetvā “gahitagahitabhājanāni pūretvā gaṇhantū”ti
analyzed: nagaram pavisitvā rājānam anujānāpetvā gahita gahita bhājanāni pūretvā gaṇhantu uti

original: yācakānaṃ dhanaṃ datvā tasmiṃ khīṇe nikkhamma himavantato dakkhiṇapasse gaṅgāya ceva
analyzed: yācakānam dhanam da tvā tasmin khīṇe nikkhamma himavantataḥ dakkhiṇa passe gaṅgāya ca iva

original: ekassa ca jātassarassa antare paṇṇasālaṃ katvā pabbajitvā vanamūlaphalāhāro tattha
analyzed: ekassa ca jāta ssarassa antare paṇṇa sālam katvā pabbajitvā vana mūla phala āhāraḥ tattha

original: ciraṃ vihāsi, jaraṃ pāpuṇi. Tadā sakkassa āsā saddhā sirī hirīti catasso dhītaro
analyzed: ciram vihāsi jaram pāpuṇi tadā sakkassa āsā saddhā sirī hirīti catassaḥ dhītaraḥ

original: honti. Tā bahuṃ dibbagandhamālaṃ ādāya udakakīḷanatthāya anotattadahaṃ gantvā tattha
analyzed: honti tāḥ bahum dibba gandha mālam ādāya udaka kīḷana tthāya gantvā tattha

original: kīḷitvā manosilātale nisīdiṃsu. Tasmiṃ khaṇe nārado nāma brāhmaṇatāpaso tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ
analyzed: kīḷitvā manosilā tale nisīdiṃsu tasmin khaṇe nāradaḥ nāma brāhmaṇa tāpasaḥ

original: divāvihāratthāya gantvā nandanavanacittalatāvanesu divāvihāraṃ katvā pāricchattakapupphaṃ
analyzed: divāvihāra atthāya gantvā nandana vana cittalatā vanesu divāvihāram katvā pāricchattaka puppham

original: chattaṃ viya chāyatthāya dhārayamāno manosilātalamatthakena attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: chattam viya chāyatthāya dhārayamāno manaḥ silā tala matthakena attanaḥ vasana ṭṭhānam

original: kañcanaguhaṃ gacchati. Atha tā tassa hatthe taṃ pupphaṃ disvā yāciṃsu. Tamatthaṃ
analyzed: kañcana guham gacchati atha tā tassa hatthe tam puppham disvā yāciṃsu tam attham

original: pakāsento satthā āha –
analyzed: pakāsentaḥ satthā āha

original: “Naguttame girivare gandhamādane, modanti tā devavarābhipālitā;
analyzed: naga uttame giri vare gandhamādane modanti tāḥ deva vara abhipālitā

original: Athāgamā isivaro sabbalokagū, supupphitaṃ dumavarasākhamādiya.
analyzed: atha agamā isi varaḥ sabba loka gū su pupphitam duma vara sākham ādiya

original: “Suciṃ sugandhaṃ tidasehi sakkataṃ, pupphuttamaṃ amaravarehi sevitaṃ;
analyzed: sucim sugandham tidasehi sakkatam pupphuttamam amara varehi sevitam

original: Aladdha maccehiva dānavehi vā, aññatra devehi tadārahaṃ hidaṃ.
analyzed: aladdha maccehi iva dānavehi vā aññatra devehi hidam

original: “Tato catasso kanakattacūpamā, uṭṭhāya nāriyo pamadādhipā muniṃ;
analyzed: tatas catasso uṭṭhāya nāriyaḥ pamada adhipāḥ munim

original: Āsā ca saddhā ca sirī tato hirī, iccabravuṃ nāradadeva brāhmaṇaṃ.
analyzed: āsā ca saddhā ca brāhmaṇam

original: “Sace anuddiṭṭhaṃ tayā mahāmuni, pupphaṃ imaṃ pārichattassa bramhe;
analyzed: sace an uddiṭṭham tayā mahā muni puppham imam pārichattassa bramhe

original: Dadāhi no sabbā gati te ijjhatu, tuvampi no hohi yatheva vāsavo.
analyzed: dadāhi naḥ sabbā gati te ijjhatu tuvam pi naḥ hohi yathā iva vāsavaḥ

original: “Taṃ yācamānābhisamekkha nārado, iccabravī saṃkalahaṃ udīrayi;
analyzed: tam nāradaḥ saṃkalaham

original: Na mayhamatthatthi imehi koci naṃ, yāyeva vo seyyasi sā piḷandhathā”ti.
analyzed: na mayham atthatthi imehi koci nam vaḥ seyyasi sā piḷandhatha ati

original: Tattha girivareti purimassa vevacanaṃ. Devavarābhipālitāti sakkena rakkhitā. Sabbalokagūti
analyzed: tattha giri vara iti purimassa vevacanam deva vara abhipālitā ati sakkena rakkhitā sabba loka gūti

original: devaloke ca manussaloke ca sabbattha gamanasamattho. Dumavarasākhamādiyāti sākhāya
analyzed: deva loke ca manussa loke ca sabbattha gamana samatthaḥ duma vara sākham ādiyāti sākhāya

original: jātattā dumavarasākhanti laddhanāmaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā. Sakkatanti katasakkāraṃ. Amaravarehīti
analyzed: jāta ttā laddha nāmam puppham gahetvā kata sakkāram amara varehi iti

original: sakkaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Aññatra devehīti ṭhapetvā deve ca iddhimante ca aññehi manussehi
analyzed: sakkam sandhāya vuttam aññatra devehi iti ṭhapetvā deve ca iddhimante ca aññehi manussehi

original: vā yakkhādīhi vā aladdhaṃ. Tadārahaṃ hidanti tesaṃyeva hi taṃ arahaṃ anucchavikaṃ.
analyzed: vā yakkha ādīhi vā a laddham tadā araham hidanti tesam yā iva hi tam araham an ucchavikam

original: Kanakattacūpamāti kanakūpamā tacā. Uṭṭhāyāti ayyo mālāgandhavilepanādipaṭivirato
analyzed: kanaka ttaca upamā ati kanaka upamā tacā uṭṭhāya ati ayyaḥ mālā gandha vilepana ādi paṭivirataḥ

original: pupphaṃ na piḷandhissati, ekasmiṃ padese chaḍḍessati, etha taṃ yācitvā pupphaṃ piḷandhissāmāti
analyzed: puppham na piḷandhissati ekasmin padese chaḍḍessati etha tam yācitvā puppham piḷandhissāma ati

original: hatthe pasāretvā yācamānā ekappahāreneva uṭṭhahitvā. Pamadādhipāti pamadānaṃ uttamā. Muninti isiṃ.
analyzed: hatthe pasāretvā yācamānā eka ppahārena iva uṭṭhahitvā pamada adhipā ati pamadānam uttamā muninti isim

original: Anuddiṭṭhanti “asukassa nāma dassāmī”ti na uddiṭṭhaṃ. Sabbā gati te ijjhatūti sabbā
analyzed: an uddiṭṭhanti asukassa nāma dassāmi iti na uddiṭṭham sabbā gati te ijjhatu uti sabbā

original: te cittagati ijjhatu, patthitapatthitassa lābhī hohīti tassa thulimaṅgalaṃ vadanti.
analyzed: te cittagati ijjhatu patthita patthitassa lābhī hohi iti tassa thulimaṅgalam vadanti

original: Yatheva vāsavoti yathā amhākaṃ pitā vāsavo icchiticchitaṃ deti, tatheva no tvampi
analyzed: yathā iva vāsava iti yathā amhākam pitā vāsavaḥ icchiticchitam deti tathā iva no tvam pi

original: hohīti. Tanti taṃ pupphaṃ. Abhisamekkhāti disvā. Saṃkalahanti nānāgāhaṃ kalahavaḍḍhanaṃ
analyzed: hohi iti tanti tam puppham abhisamekkhāti disvā saṃkalahanti nānāgāham kalaha vaḍḍhanam

original: kathaṃ udīrayi. Imehīti imehi pupphehi nāma mayhaṃ attho natthi, paṭivirato ahaṃ
analyzed: katham udīrayi imehi iti imehi pupphehi nāma mayham atthaḥ natthi paṭivirataḥ aham

original: mālādhāraṇatoti dīpeti. Yāyeva vo seyyasīti yā tumhākaṃ antare jeṭṭhikā. Sā piḷandhathāti
analyzed: dīpeti yāyā iva vaḥ seyyasi iti yā tumhākam antare jeṭṭhikā sā piḷandhatha ati

original: sā etaṃ piḷandhatūti attho.
analyzed: sā etam piḷandhatu iti

original: Tā catassopi tassa vacanaṃ sutvā gāthamāhaṃsu –
analyzed: tāḥ catassaḥ upi tassa vacanam sutvā gātham āhaṃsu

original: “Tvaṃ nottamevābhisamekkha nārada, yassicchasi tassā anuppavecchasu;
analyzed: tvam nārada yassa icchasi tassa

original: Yassā hi no nārada tvaṃ padassasi, sāyeva no hehiti seṭṭhasammatā”ti.
analyzed: hi naḥ nārada tvam padassasi sāyā iva naḥ hehi iti seṭṭha sammatā ti

original: Tattha tvaṃ nottamevāti uttamamahāmuni tvameva no upadhārehi. Tāsaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā nārado tā ālapanto gāthamāha –
analyzed: tattha tvam uttama iva ati uttama mahā muni tvam eva naḥ upadhārehi tāsam vacanam sutvā nāradaḥ tāḥ ālapantaḥ gātham āha

original: “Akallametaṃ vacanaṃ sugatte, ko brāhmaṇo saṃkalahaṃ udīraye;
analyzed: a kallam etam vacanam sugatte kaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ saṃkalaham udīraye

original: Gantvāna bhūtādhipameva pucchatha, sace na jānātha idhuttamādhame”nti.
analyzed: gantvāna bhūta adhipam eva pucchatha sace na jānātha

original: Tassattho – bhadde sugatte, idaṃ tumhehi vuttaṃ vacanaṃ mama ayuttaṃ, evañhi sati
analyzed: tassa atthaḥ bhadde su gatte idam tumhehi vuttam vacanam mama ayuttam evam hi sati

original: mayā tumhesu ekaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, sesā hīnā karontena kalaho vaḍḍhito bhavissati, ko bāhitapāpo
analyzed: mayā tumhesu ekam seṭṭham sesā hīnā karontena kalahaḥ vaḍḍhitaḥ bhavissati kaḥ bāhita pāpo

original: brāhmaṇo kalahaṃ udīraye vaḍḍheyya. Evarūpassa hi kalahavaḍḍhanaṃ nāma ayuttaṃ, tasmā
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ kalaham udīraye vaḍḍheyya evarūpassa hi kalaha vaḍḍhanam nāma ayuttam tasmā

original: ito gatvā attano pitaraṃ bhūtādhipaṃ sakkameva pucchatha, sace attano uttamaṃ adhamañca na jānāthāti.
analyzed: itas gatvā attanaḥ pitaram bhūta adhipam sakkam eva pucchatha sace attanaḥ uttamam adhamañca na jānātha ati

original: Tato satthā gāthamāha –
analyzed: tatas satthā gātham āha

original: “Tā nāradena paramappakopitā, udīritā vaṇṇamadena mattā;
analyzed: tāḥ nāradena udīritāḥ vaṇṇa madena mattā

original: Sakāse gantvāna sahassacakkhuno, pucchiṃsu bhūtādhipaṃ kā nu seyyasī”ti.
analyzed: sakāse gantvāna sahassa cakkhunaḥ pucchiṃsu bhūta adhipam kā nu seyyasi iti

original: Tattha paramappakopitāti pupphaṃ adadantena ativiya kopitā tassa kupitā hutvā. Udīritāti
analyzed: tattha parama ppakopitā ati puppham a dadantena ativiya kopitā tassa kupitā hutvā udīritā ati

original: “bhūtādhipameva pucchathā”ti vuttā. Sahassacakkhunoti sakkassa santikaṃ gantvā. Kā
analyzed: bhūtādhipam eva pucchatha ati vuttā sahassa cakkhuno ti sakkassa santikam gantvā kā

original: nūti amhākaṃ antare katamā uttamāti pucchiṃsu.
analyzed: nu uti amhākam antare katamāḥ uttamāḥ iti pucchiṃsu

original: Evaṃ pucchitvā ṭhitā –
analyzed: evam pucchitvā ṭhitā

original: “Tā disvā āyattamanā purindado, iccabravī devavaro katañjalī;
analyzed: tā disvā āyatta manāḥ purindadaḥ deva varaḥ katañjalī

original: Sabbāva vo hotha sugatte sādisī, koneva bhadde kalahaṃ udīrayī”ti.
analyzed: sabbāva vaḥ hotha su gatte sādisī konā iva bhadde kalaham udīrayi iti

original: Tattha tā disvāti, bhikkhave, catassopi attano santikaṃ āgatā disvā. Āyattamanāti
analyzed: tattha tāḥ disvā ati bhikkhave catassaḥ api attanaḥ santikam āgatāḥ disvā āyatta manā ati

original: ussukkamanā byāvaṭacittā. Katañjalīti namassamānāhi devatāhi paggahitañjalī. Sādisīti
analyzed: ussukka manāḥ byāvaṭa cittā katañjalī iti namassamānāhi devatāhi paggahitañjalī sādisī iti

original: sabbāva tumhe sādisiyo. Ko nevāti ko nu evaṃ. Kalahaṃ udīrayīti idaṃ nānāgāhaṃ viggahaṃ kathesi vaḍḍhesi.
analyzed: tumhe sādisiyaḥ kaḥ na iva ati kaḥ nu evam kalaham udīrayi iti idam nānāgāham viggaham kathesi vaḍḍhesi

original: Athassa tā kathayamānā gāthamāhaṃsu –
analyzed: athassa tāḥ kathayamānāḥ gātham āhaṃsu

original: “Yo sabbalokaccarito mahāmuni, dhamme ṭhito nārado saccanikkamo;
analyzed: yaḥ sabba loka caritaḥ mahā muni dhamme ṭhitaḥ nāradaḥ sacca nikkamaḥ

original: So nobravi girivare gandhamādane, gantvāna bhūtādhipameva pucchatha;
analyzed: saḥ giri vare gandhamādane gantvāna bhūta adhipam eva pucchatha

original: Sace na jānātha idhuttamādhama”nti.
analyzed: sace na jānātha idhuttamā ādhamanti

original: Tattha saccanikkamoti tathaparakkamo.
analyzed: tattha sacca nikkamo ti

original: Taṃ sutvā sakko “imā catassopi mayhaṃ dhītarova, sacāhaṃ ‘etāsu ekā guṇasampannā
analyzed: tam sutvā sakkaḥ imāḥ catassaḥ api mayham dhītaraḥ uva sacā aham etāsu ekā guṇa sampannā

original: uttamā’ti vakkhāmi, sesā kujjhissanti, na sakkā ayaṃ aḍḍo vinicchinituṃ, imā himavante
analyzed: uttamā ati vakkhāmi sesā kujjhissanti na sakkā ayam aḍḍaḥ vinicchinitum imāḥ himavante

original: kosiyatāpasassa santikaṃ pesesāmi, so etāsaṃ aḍḍaṃ vinicchinissatī”ti cintetvā “ahaṃ
analyzed: kosiya tāpasassa santikam pesesāmi saḥ etāsam aḍḍam vinicchinissati iti cintetvā aham

original: tumhākaṃ aḍḍaṃ na vinicchinissāmi, himavante kosiyo nāma tāpaso atthi, tassāhaṃ attano
analyzed: tumhākam aḍḍam na vinicchinissāmi himavante kosiyaḥ nāma tāpasaḥ atthi tassa aham attano

analyzed: sudhā bhojanam pesessāmi saḥ parassa a datvā na bhuñjati dadantaḥ ca vicinitvā guṇavantānam

original: deti, yā tumhesu tassa hatthato bhattaṃ labhissati, sā uttamā bhavissatī”ti ācikkhanto gāthamāha –

original: “Asu brahāraññacaro mahāmuni, nādatvā bhattaṃ varagatte bhuñjati;

original: Viceyya dānāni dadāti kosiyo,
analyzed: viceyya dānāni dadāti kosiyaḥ

original: Yassā hi so dassati sāva seyyasī”ti.
analyzed: yassā hi saḥ dassati sā ava seyyasi iti

original: Tattha brahāraññadharoti mahāaraññavāsī.
analyzed: tattha mahā arañña vāsī

original: Iti so tāpasassa santikaṃ pesetvā mātaliṃ pakkosāpetvā tassa santikaṃ pesento anantaraṃ gāthamāha –
analyzed: iti saḥ tāpasassa santikam pesetvā mātalim pakkosāpetvā tassa santikam pesentaḥ anantaram gātham āha

original: “Asū hi yo sammati dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ, gaṅgāya tīre himavantapassani;
analyzed: asū hi yaḥ sammati dakkhiṇam disam gaṅgāya tīre himavanta passani

original: Sa kosiyo dullabhapānabhojano, tassa sudhaṃ pāpaya devasārathī”ti.
analyzed: sa kosiyaḥ dullabha pāna bhojanaḥ tassa sudham deva sārathi iti

original: Tattha sammatīti vasati. Dakkhiṇanti himavantassa dakkhiṇāya disāya. Passanīti passe.
analyzed: tattha sammatīti vasati dakkhiṇanti himavantassa dakkhiṇāya disāya passanīti passe

original: Tato satthā āha –
analyzed: tatas satthā āha

original: “Sa mātalī devavarena pesito, sahassayuttaṃ abhiruyha sandanaṃ;
analyzed: sa mātalī deva varena pesitaḥ sahassa yuttam abhiruyha sandanam

original: Sukhippameva upagamma assamaṃ, adissamāno munino sudhaṃ adā”ti.
analyzed: su khippam eva upagamma assamam a dissamānaḥ munino sudham adāti

original: Tattha adissamānoti, bhikkhave, so mātali devarājassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā taṃ
analyzed: tattha a dissamānaḥ ti bhikkhave saḥ mātali devarājassa vacanam sampaṭicchitvā tam
