original: paccūsasamaye aggiṃ paricaritvā vibhātāya rattiyā udentaṃ sūriyaṃ namassamānassa
analyzed: paccūsa samaye aggim paricaritvā vibhātāya rattiyā udentam sūriyam namassamānassa

original: ṭhitassa tassa hatthe sudhābhojanapātiṃ ṭhapesi.
analyzed: ṭhitassa tassa hatthe sudhā bhojana pātim ṭhapesi

original: Kosiyo taṃ gahetvā ṭhitakova gāthādvayamāha –
analyzed: kosiyaḥ tam gahetvā ṭhitakaḥ uva gāthā dvayam āha

original: “Udaggihuttaṃ upatiṭṭhato hi me, pabhaṅkaraṃ lokatamonuduttamaṃ;
analyzed: udaggihuttam upatiṭṭhataḥ hi me pabhaṅkaram loka tamonud uttamam

original: Sabbāni bhūtāni adhicca vāsavo;
analyzed: sabbāni bhūtāni adhicca vāsavaḥ

original: Ko neva me pāṇisu kiṃ sudhodahi.
analyzed: kaḥ nā iva me pāṇisu kim

original: “Saṅkhūpamaṃ setamatulyadassanaṃ, suciṃ sugandhaṃ piyarūpamabbhutaṃ;
analyzed: saṅkhu upamam setam atulya dassanam sucim sugandham piya rūpam abbhutam

original: Adiṭṭhapubbaṃ mama jātu cakkhubhi, kā devatā pāṇisu kiṃ sudhodahī”ti.
analyzed: a diṭṭha pubbam mama jātu cakkhubhi kā devatā pāṇisu kim

original: Tattha udaggihuttanti udakaaggihuttaṃ paricaritvā aggisālato nikkhamma paṇṇasāladvāre
analyzed: tattha udaggi huttam ti udaka aggi huttam paricaritvā aggi sālataḥ nikkhamma paṇṇasāla dvāre

original: ṭhatvā pabhaṅkaraṃ lokatamonudaṃ uttamaṃ ādiccaṃ upatiṭṭhato mama sabbāni bhūtāni
analyzed: ṭhatvā pabhaṅkaram loka tamonudam uttamam ādiccam upatiṭṭhataḥ mama sabbāni bhūtāni

original: adhicca atikkamitvā vattamāno vāsavo nu kho evaṃ mama pāṇīsu kiṃ sudhaṃ kiṃ nāmetaṃ
analyzed: adhicca atikkamitvā vattamānaḥ vāsavaḥ nu kho evam mama pāṇīsu kim sudham kim nāma itaṃ

original: odahi. “Saṅkhūpama”ntiādīhi ṭhitakova sudhaṃ vaṇṇeti.
analyzed: saṅkhū pamanti ādīhi ṭhitakā uva sudham

original: Tato mātali āha –
analyzed: tatas mātali āha

original: “Ahaṃ mahindena mahesi pesito, sudhābhihāsiṃ turito mahāmuni;
analyzed: aham mahindena mahesi pesitaḥ sudhā abhihāsim turitaḥ mahā muni

original: Jānāsi maṃ mātali devasārathi, bhuñjassu bhattuttama mābhivārayi.
analyzed: jānāsi mam mātali deva sārathi bhuñjassu bhattuttama mā abhivārayi

original: “Bhuttā ca sā dvādasa hanti pāpake, khudaṃ pipāsaṃ aratiṃ daraklamaṃ;
analyzed: bhuttā ca sā dvādasa hanti pāpake khudam pipāsam aratim dara klamam

original: Kodhūpanāhañca vivādapesuṇaṃ, sītuṇha tandiñca rasuttamaṃ ida”nti.
analyzed: vivāda pesuṇam tandin ca rasuttamam

original: Tattha sudhābhihāsinti imaṃ sudhābhojanaṃ tuyhaṃ abhihariṃ. Jānāsīti jānāhi maṃ tvaṃ,
analyzed: tattha sudhā abhihāsinti imam sudhā bhojanam abhiharim jānāsi iti jānāhi mama tvam

original: ahaṃ mātali nāma devasārathīti attho. Mābhivārayīti na bhuñjāmīti appaṭikkhipitvā
analyzed: aham mātali nāma deva sārathī iti atthaḥ mā abhivārayi iti na bhuñjāmi iti a paṭikkhipitvā

original: bhuñja mā papañca kari. Pāpaketi ayañhi sudhā bhuttā dvādasa pāpadhamme hanati. Khudanti
analyzed: bhuñja mā papañca kari pāpaka iti ayan hi sudhā bhuttā dvādasa pāpa dhamme hanati khudanti

original: paṭhamaṃ tāva chātabhāvaṃ hanati, dutiyaṃ pānīyapipāsaṃ, tatiyaṃ ukkaṇṭhitaṃ, catutthaṃ
analyzed: paṭhamam tāva chāta bhāvam hanati dutiyam pānīya pipāsam tatiyam ukkaṇṭhitam catuttham

original: kāyadarathaṃ, pañcamaṃ kilantabhāvaṃ, chaṭṭhaṃ kodhaṃ, sattamaṃ upanāhaṃ, aṭṭhamaṃ
analyzed: pañcamam kilanta bhāvam chaṭṭham kodham sattamam upanāham aṭṭhamam

original: vivādaṃ, navamaṃ pesuṇaṃ, dasamaṃ sītaṃ, ekādasamaṃ uṇhaṃ, dvādasamaṃ tandiṃ ālasiyabhāvaṃ,
analyzed: vivādam navamam pesuṇam dasamam sītam ekādasamam uṇham dvādasamam tandim ālasiya bhāvam

original: idaṃ rasuttamaṃ uttamarasaṃ sudhābhojanaṃ ime dvādasa pāpadhamme hanati.
analyzed: idam uttama rasam sudhā bhojanam ime dvādasa pāpa dhamme

original: Taṃ sutvā kosiyo attano vatasamādānaṃ āvikaronto –
analyzed: tam sutvā kosiyaḥ attanaḥ vata samādānam āvikarontaḥ

original: “Na kappatī mātali mayha bhuñjituṃ, pubbe adatvā iti me vatuttamaṃ;
analyzed: na kappati mātali mayha bhuñjitum pubbe a datvā iti me

original: Na cāpi ekāsnamariyapūjitaṃ, asaṃvibhāgī ca sukhaṃ na vindatī”ti. –
analyzed: na ca api asaṃvibhāgī ca sukham na vindati iti

original: Gāthaṃ vatvā, “bhante, tumhehi parassa adatvā bhojane kaṃ dosaṃ disvā idaṃ vataṃ samādinna”nti mātalinā puṭṭho āha –
analyzed: gātham vatvā bhante tumhehi parassa a datvā bhojane kam dosam disvā idam vatam samādinnam ti mātalinā puṭṭhaḥ āha

original: “Thīghātakā ye cime pāradārikā, mittadduno ye ca sapanti subbate;
analyzed: thī ghātakāḥ ye cime pāradārikāḥ mitta ddunaḥ ye ca sapanti subbate

original: Sabbe ca te maccharipañcamādhamā, tasmā adatvā udakampi nāsniye.
analyzed: sabbe ca te mat śari pañcama adhamā tasmai a datvā udakampi

original: “Sohitthiyā vā purisassa vā pana, dassāmi dānaṃ vidusampavaṇṇitaṃ;
analyzed: sohitthiyā vā purisassa vā pana dassāmi dānam

original: Saddhā vadaññū idha vītamaccharā, bhavanti hete sucisaccasammatā”ti.
analyzed: saddhā vadaññū idha vītamaccharāḥ bhavanti ha ite suci sacca sammatā ati

original: Tattha pubbeti paṭhamaṃ adatvā, atha vā iti me pubbe vatuttamaṃ idaṃ pubbeva mayā
analyzed: tattha pubbā iti paṭhamam a datvā atha vā iti me pubbe idam pubbā iva mayā

original: vataṃ samādinnanti dasseti. Na cāpi ekāsnamariyapūjitanti ekakassa asanaṃ na ariyehi
analyzed: vatam samādinnanti dasseti na ca api eka asnam ariya pūjitanti ekakassa asanam na ariyehi

original: buddhādīhi pūjitaṃ. Sukhanti dibbamānusikaṃ sukhaṃ na labhati. Thīghātakāti itthighātakā.
analyzed: buddha ādīhi pūjitam sukham ti dibba mānusikam sukham na labhati thī ghātakā ati itthi ghātakā

original: Ye cimeti ye ca ime. Sapantīti akkosanti. Subbateti dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇe. Maccharipañcamāti
analyzed: ye cima iti ye ca ime sapanti iti akkosanti subbata iti dhammika samaṇa brāhmaṇe macchari pañcamā ti

original: maccharī pañcamo etesanti maccharipañcamā. Adhamāti ime pañca adhamā nāma. Tasmāti
analyzed: pañcamaḥ mad śarī pañcamā adhamā ati ime pañca adhamāḥ nāma tasmāt iti

original: yasmā ahaṃ pañcamaadhamabhāvabhayena adatvā udakampi nāsniye na paribhuñjissāmīti
analyzed: yasmai aham pañcama adhama bhāva bhayena a datvā udakam pi na paribhuñjissāmi iti

original: imaṃ vataṃ samādiyiṃ. Sohitthiyā vāti so ahaṃ itthiyā vā. Vidusampavaṇṇitanti vidūhi
analyzed: imam vatam samādiyim sohitthiyā vāti saḥ aham itthiyā vā

original: paṇḍitehi buddhādīhi vaṇṇitaṃ. Sucisaccasammatāti ete okappaniyasaddhāya samannāgatā
analyzed: paṇḍitehi buddha ādīhi vaṇṇitam ete okappaniya saddhāya samannāgatā

original: vadaññū vītamaccharā purisā sucī ceva uttamasammatā ca hontīti attho.
analyzed: vadaññū vītamaccharā purisā sucī ca iva uttamasammatā ca honti iti attho

original: Taṃ sutvā mātali dissamānakāyena aṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe tā catasso devakaññāyo catuddisaṃ
analyzed: tam sutvā mātali dissamāna kāyena aṭṭhāsi tasmin khaṇe tā catasso deva kaññāyo catuddisam

original: aṭṭhaṃsu, sirī pācīnadisāya aṭṭhāsi, āsā dakkhiṇadisāya, saddhā pacchimadisāya, hirī
analyzed: sirī pācīna disāya āsā dakkhiṇa disāya saddhā pacchima disāya hirī

original: uttaradisāya. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
analyzed: uttara disāya tam attham pakāsentaḥ satthā āha

original: “Ato matā devavarena pesitā, kaññā catasso kanakattacūpamā;
analyzed: atas matā deva varena pesitā kaññā catasso

original: Āsā ca saddhā ca sirī tato hirī, taṃ assamaṃ āgamu yattha kosiyo.
analyzed: āsā ca saddhā ca sirī tatas hirī tam assamam āgamu yattha kosiyaḥ

original: “Tā disvā sabbo paramappamodito, subhena vaṇṇena sikhārivaggino;
analyzed: tāḥ disvā sabbaḥ parama pamoditaḥ subhena vaṇṇena sikhāri vagginaḥ

original: Kaññā catasso caturo catuddisā, iccabravī mātalino ca sammukhā.
analyzed: kaññā catasso caturaḥ catuddisā iccabravī mātalino ca sammukhā

original: “Purimaṃ disaṃ kā tvaṃ pabhāsi devate, alaṅkatā tāravarāva osadhī;
analyzed: purimam disam kā tvam pabhāsi devate alaṅkatā osadhī

original: Pucchāmi taṃ kañcanavelliviggahe, ācikkha me tvaṃ katamāsi devatā.
analyzed: pucchāmi tam kañcana velli viggahe ācikkha me tvam katamā asi devatā

original: “Sirāha devī manujehi pūjitā, apāpasattūpanisevinī sadā;
analyzed: sirā āha devī manujehi pūjitā a pāpa sattūpa nisevinī sadā

original: Sudhāvivādena tavantimāgatā, taṃ maṃ sudhāya varapañña bhājaya.
analyzed: sudhā vivādena tava antimā āgatā tam mama sudhāya vara pañña bhājaya

original: “Yassāhamicchāmi sudhaṃ mahāmuni, so sabbakāmehi naro pamodati;
analyzed: yassa aham icchāmi sudham mahā muni so sabba kāmehi naraḥ pamodati

original: Sirīti maṃ jānahi jūhatuttama, taṃ maṃ sudhāya varapañña bhājayā”ti.
analyzed: sirīti mam jānahi jūhatuttama tam mama sudhāya vara pañña bhājayāti

original: Tattha atoti tato. Matāti anumatā, atha devavarena anumatā ceva pesitā cāti attho.
analyzed: tattha ato ti tatas matā ati anumatā atha deva varena anumatā ca iva pesitā ca ati

original: Sabbo paramappamoditoti anavaseso hutvā atipamodito. “Sāma”ntipi pāṭho, tā devatā
analyzed: sabbo parama pamā udito ti anavasesaḥ hutvā atipamā uditaḥ tāḥ devatāḥ

original: sāmaṃ disvāti attho. Caturoti caturā. Ayameva vā pāṭho, cāturiyena samannāgatāti
analyzed: sāmam disvā iti attho caturā iti caturā ayam eva vā cāturiyena samannāgatā iti

original: attho. Tāravarāti tārakānaṃ varā. Kañcanavelliviggaheti kañcanarūpasadisasarīre.
analyzed: tāra varā ti tārakānam varā kañcana velli viggahā iti kañcana rūpa sadisa sarīre

original: Sirāhāti sirī ahaṃ. Tavantimāgatāti tava santikaṃ āgatā. Bhājayāti yathā maṃ sudhā
analyzed: sirā hā ati sirī aham tavantim āgatā ati tava santikam āgatā yathā mama sudhā

original: bhajati, tathā karohi, sudhaṃ me dehīti attho. Jānahīti jāna. Jūhatuttamāti aggiṃ juhantānaṃ uttama.
analyzed: bhajati tathā karohi sudham me dehi iti atthaḥ jānahi iti jāna aggim juhantānam uttama

original: Taṃ sutvā kosiyo āha –
analyzed: tam sutvā kosiyaḥ āha

original: “Sippena vijjācaraṇena buddhiyā, narā upetā paguṇā sakammunā;
analyzed: sippena vijjā ācaraṇena buddhiyā narāḥ upetā paguṇā sa kammunā

original: Tayā vihīnā na labhanti kiñcanaṃ, tayidaṃ na sādhu yadidaṃ tayā kataṃ.
analyzed: tayā vihīnāḥ na labhanti kiñcanam tayā idam na sādhu yat idam tayā katam

original: “Passāmi posaṃ alasaṃ mahagghasaṃ, sudukkulīnampi arūpimaṃ naraṃ;
analyzed: passāmi posam alasam mahagghasam su dukkulīnam pi arūpimam naram

original: Tayānugutto siri jātimāmapi, peseti dāsaṃ viya bhogavā sukhī.
analyzed: tayā anuguttaḥ peseti dāsam viya bhogavā sukhī

original: “Taṃ taṃ asaccaṃ avibhajjaseviniṃ, jānāmi mūḷhaṃ vidurānupātiniṃ;
analyzed: tam tam asaccam a vibhajja sevinim jānāmi mūḍham vidura anupātinim

original: Na tādisī arahati āsanūdakaṃ, kuto sudhā gaccha na mayha ruccasī”ti.
analyzed: na tādisī arahati āsanūdakam kutas sudhā gaccha na ruccasi iti

original: Tattha sippenāti hatthiassarathadhanusippādinā. Vijjācaraṇenāti vedattayasaṅkhātāya
analyzed: tattha sippena ati hatthi assa ratha dhanu sippa ādinā vijjā ācaraṇena ati veda ttaya saṅkhātāya

original: vijjāya ceva sīlena ca. Paguṇā sakammunāti attano purisakārena padhānaguṇasamannāgatā.
analyzed: vijjāya ca iva sīlena ca paguṇā ati attano purisakārena padhāna guṇa samannāgatā

original: Kiñcananti kiñci appamattakampi yasaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā na labhanti. Yadidanti yaṃ etaṃ
analyzed: kiñcananti kiñci appamattakam pi yasam vā sukham vā na labhanti yat idam iti yam etam

original: issariyatthāya sippāni uggaṇhitvā carantānaṃ tayā vekallaṃ kataṃ, taṃ te na sādhu.
analyzed: issariya tthāya sippāni uggaṇhitvā carantānam tayā vekallam katam tam te na sādhu

original: Arūpimanti virūpaṃ. Tayānuguttoti tayā anurakkhito. Jātimāmapīti jātisampannampi
analyzed: arūpimanti virūpam tayā anuguttaḥ ti tayā anurakkhitaḥ jātimām api iti jāti sampannam pi

original: sippavijjācaraṇabuddhikammehi sampannampi. Pesetīti pesanakārakaṃ karoti. Taṃ tanti
analyzed: sippa vijjā ācaraṇa buddhi kammehi sampannam pi peseti iti pesana kārakam karoti tam tanti

original: tasmā taṃ. Asaccanti sabhāvasaṅkhāte sacce avattanatāya asaccaṃ uttamabhāvarahitaṃ.
analyzed: tasmā tam sabhāva saṅkhāte sacce avattanatāya asaccam uttama bhāva rahitam

original: Avibhajjasevininti avibhajitvā yuttāyuttaṃ ajānitvā sippādisampannepi itarepi sevamānaṃ.
analyzed: avibhajja sevinim ti a vibhajitvā yutta ayuttam a jānitvā sippa ādi sampanne pi itare pi sevamānam

original: Vidurānupātininti paṇḍitānupātiniṃ paṇḍite pātetvā pothetvā viheṭhetvā caramānaṃ.
analyzed: vidura anupātinim ti paṇḍita anupātinim paṇḍite pātetvā pothetvā viheṭhetvā caramānam

original: Kuto sudhāti tādisāya nigguṇāya kuto sudhābhojanaṃ, na me ruccasi, gaccha mā idha tiṭṭhāti.
analyzed: kutas sudhā ati tādisāya nigguṇāya kutas sudhā bhojanam na me ruccasi gaccha mā idha tiṭṭha ati

original: Sā tena paṭikkhittā tatthevantaradhāyi. Tato so āsāya saddhiṃ sallapanto āha –
analyzed: sā tena paṭikkhittā tattha iva antaradhāyi tatas saḥ āsāya saddhim sallapantaḥ āha

original: “Kā sukkadāṭhā paṭimukkakuṇḍalā, cittaṅgadā kambuvimaṭṭhadhārinī;
analyzed: kā sukka dāṭhā paṭimukka kuṇḍalā cittaṅgadā kambu vimaṭṭha dhārinī

original: Osittavaṇṇaṃ paridayha sobhasi, kusaggirattaṃ apiḷayha mañjariṃ.
analyzed: ositta vaṇṇam paridayha sobhasi kusaggi rattam apiḷayha mañjarim

original: “Migīva bhantā saracāpadhārinā, virādhitā mandamiva udikkhasi;
analyzed: migī iva bhantā sara cāpa dhārinā virādhitā mandam iva udikkhasi

original: Ko te dutīyo ida mandalocane, na bhāyasi ekikā kānane vane”ti.
analyzed: te manda locane na ekikā kānane vana iti

original: Tattha cittaṅgadāti citrehi aṅgadehi samannāgatā. Kambuvimaṭṭhadhārinīti karaṇapariniṭṭhitena
analyzed: tattha cittaṅgadā ati citrehi aṅgadehi samannāgatā kambu vimaṭṭha dhārinī iti karaṇa pariniṭṭhitena

original: vimaṭṭhasuvaṇṇālaṅkāradhārinī. Osittavaṇṇanti avasittaudakadhāravaṇṇaṃ dibbadukūlaṃ.
analyzed: vimaṭṭha suvaṇṇa alaṅkāra dhārinī ositta vaṇṇanti avasitta udaka dhāra vaṇṇam dibba dukūlam

original: Paridayhāti nivāsetvā ceva pārupitvā ca. Kusaggirattanti kusatiṇaggisikhāvaṇṇaṃ.
analyzed: nivāsetvā ca iva pārupitvā ca kusaggi rattanti kusa tiṇaggi sikhā vaṇṇam

original: Apiḷayha mañjarinti sapallavaṃ asokakaṇṇikaṃ kaṇṇe piḷandhitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Saracāpadhārināti
analyzed: a piḷayha mañjarin ti sa pallavam asoka kaṇṇikam kaṇṇe piḷandhitvā iti vuttam hoti sara cāpa dhārinā iti

original: luddena. Virādhitāti viraddhapahārā. Mandamivāti yathā sā migī bhītā vanantare ṭhatvā
analyzed: luddena virādhitā ati viraddha apahārā mandam iva ati yathā sā migī bhītā vanantare

original: taṃ mandaṃ mandaṃ oloketi, evaṃ olokesi.
analyzed: tam mandam mandam evam

original: Tato āsā āha –
analyzed: tatas āsau āha

original: “Na me dutīyo idha matthi kosiya, masakkasārappabhavamhi devatā;
analyzed: na me dutīyaḥ idha matthi kosiya masakkasāra ppabhavamhi devatā

original: Āsā sudhāsāya tavantimāgatā, taṃ maṃ sudhāya varapañña bhājayā”ti.
analyzed: āsā sudhā sāya tavantim āgatā tam mama sudhāya vara pañña bhājayāti

original: Tattha masakkasārappabhavāti tāvatiṃsabhavane sambhavā.
analyzed: tattha tāvatiṃsa bhavane sambhavā

original: Taṃ sutvā kosiyo “tvaṃ kira yo te ruccati, tassa āsāphalanipphādanena āsaṃ desi, yo te na ruccati, tassa na desi, natthi tayā samā patthitatthavināsikā”ti dīpento āha –
analyzed: tam sutvā kosiyaḥ tvam kira yaḥ te ruccati tassa āsā phala nipphādanena āsam desi yaḥ te na ruccati tassa na desi natthi tayā samā patthitatthavināsikā ti dīpentaḥ āha

original: “Āsāya yanti vāṇijā dhanesino, nāvaṃ samāruyha parenti aṇṇave;
analyzed: āsāya yanti vāṇijāḥ dhanesinaḥ nāvam samāruyha parenti aṇṇave

original: Te tattha sīdanti athopi ekadā, jīnādhanā enti vinaṭṭhapābhatā.
analyzed: te tattha sīdanti ekadā enti

original: “Āsāya khettāni kasanti kassakā, vapanti bījāni karontupāyaso;
analyzed: āsāya khettāni kasanti kassakāḥ vapanti bījāni karontu pāyasaḥ

original: Ītīnipātena avuṭṭhitāya vā, na kiñci vindanti tato phalāgamaṃ.
analyzed: a vuṭṭhitāya vā na kiñci vindanti phala āgamam

original: “Athattakārāni karonti bhattusu, āsaṃ purakkhatvā narā sukhesino;
analyzed: athattakārāni karonti bhattusu āsam purakkhatvā narā sukhesinaḥ

original: Te bhatturatthā atigāḷhitā puna, disā panassanti aladdha kiñcanaṃ.
analyzed: te bhattuḥ atthāḥ atigāḷhitāḥ puna disā panassanti kiñcanaṃ

original: “Hitvāna dhaññañca dhanañca ñātake, āsāya saggādhimanā sukhesino;
analyzed: hitvāna dhaññañca dhanañca ñātake āsāya sagga adhimanāḥ sukhesinaḥ

original: Tapanti lūkhampi tapaṃ cirantaraṃ, kumaggamāruyha parenti duggatiṃ.
analyzed: tapanti lūkham pi tapam cirantaram ku maggam āruyha parenti duggatim

original: “Āsā visaṃvādikasammatā ime, āse sudhāsaṃ vinayassu attani;
analyzed: ime āse visaṃvādika sammatāḥ ime āse vinayassu

original: Na tādisī arahati āsanūdakaṃ, kuto sudhā gaccha na mayha ruccasī”ti.
analyzed: na tādisī arahati āsanūdakam kutas sudhā gaccha na ruccasi iti

original: Tattha parentīti pakkhandanti. Jīnādhanāti jīnadhanā. Iti tava vasena eke sampajjanti
analyzed: tattha parenti iti pakkhandanti jīnādhanā ati jīna dhanā iti tava vasena eke sampajjanti

original: eke vipajjanti, natthi tayā sadisā pāpadhammāti vadati. Karontupāyasoti taṃ taṃ kiccaṃ
analyzed: eke vipajjanti natthi tayā sadisā pāpa dhammā ati vadati karontu pāyasā iti tam tam kiccam

original: upāyena karonti. Ītīnipātenāti visamavātamūsikasalabhasukapāṇakasetaṭṭhikarogādīnaṃ
analyzed: upāyena karonti visama vāta mūsika salabha suka pāṇaka seta ṭṭhika roga ādīnam

original: sassupaddavānaṃ aññataranipātena vā. Tatoti tato sassato te kiñci phalaṃ na vindanti,
analyzed: sassu paddavānam aññatara nipātena vā tatoti tatas sassato te kiñci phalam na vindanti

original: tesampi āsacchedanakammaṃ tvameva karosīti vadati. Athattakārānīti yuddhabhūmīsu
analyzed: tesam pi āsa chedana kammam tvam eva karosi iti vadati athattakārāni iti yuddha bhūmīsu

original: purisakāre. Āsaṃ purakkhatvāti issariyāsaṃ purato katvā. Bhatturatthāti sāmino atthāya.
analyzed: purisakāre āsam purakkhatvā ati issariyāsam puratas katvā bhattuḥ attha ati sāminaḥ atthāya

original: Atigāḷitāti paccatthikehi atipīḷitā viluttasāpateyyā ddhastasenavāhanā hutvā. Panassantīti
analyzed: atigāḷitā ati paccatthikehi atipīḷitā vilutta sāpateyyāḥ hutvā panassanti iti

original: palāyanti. Aladdha kiñcananti kiñci issariyaṃ alabhitvā. Iti etesampi issariyālābhaṃ
analyzed: palāyanti kiñci issariyam a labhitvā iti etesam pi issariya alābham

original: tvameva karosīti vadati. Saggādhimanāti saggaṃ adhigantumanā. Lūkhanti nirojaṃ pañcatapādikaṃ
analyzed: tvam eva karosi iti vadati sagga adhimanāḥ saggam adhigantu manāḥ nirojam

original: kāyakilamathaṃ. Cirantaranti cirakālaṃ. Āsā visaṃvādikasammatā imeti evaṃ ime sattā
analyzed: kāya kilamatham cirantaranti cira kālam āsā visaṃvādika sammatāḥ ime iti evam ime sattā

original: saggāsāya duggatiṃ gacchanti, tasmā tvaṃ āsā nāma visaṃvādikasammatā visaṃvādikāti
analyzed: saggāsāya duggatim gacchanti tasmai tvam āsā nāma visaṃvādika sammatā visaṃvādikā ati

original: saṅkhaṃ gatā. Āseti taṃ ālapati.
analyzed: saṅkham gatā āsa iti tam ālapati

original: Sāpi tena paṭikkhittā antaradhāyi. Tato saddhāya saddhiṃ sallapanto gāthamāha –
analyzed: sā api tena paṭikkhittā antaradhāyi tatas saddhāya saddhim sallapantaḥ gātham āha

original: “Daddallamānā yasasā yasassinī, jighaññanāmavhayanaṃ disaṃ pati;
analyzed: daddallamānā yasasā yasassinī jighañña nāma vhayanam disam pati

original: Pucchāmi taṃ kañcanavelliviggahe, ācikkha me tvaṃ katamāsi devate”ti.
analyzed: pucchāmi tam kañcana velli viggahe ācikkha me tvam katamā asi devatā iti

original: Tattha daddallamānāti jalamānā. Jighaññanāmavhayananti aparāti ca pacchimāti ca evaṃ jighaññena lāmakena nāmena vuccamānaṃ disaṃ pati daddallamānā tiṭṭhasi.
analyzed: tattha daddallamānā ati jalamānā jighañña nāma vhayanam ti aparā ati ca pacchimā ati ca evam jighaññena lāmakena nāmena vuccamānam disam pati daddallamānā tiṭṭhasi

original: Tato sā gāthamāha –
analyzed: sā gātham āha

original: “Saddhāha devī manujehi pūjitā, apāpasattūpanisevinī sadā;
analyzed: saddhā āha devī manujehi pūjitā a pāpa sattu upanisevinī sadā

original: Sudhāvivādena tavanti māgatā, taṃ maṃ sudhāya varapañña bhājayā”ti.
analyzed: sudhā vivādena mā āgatā tam mama sudhāya vara pañña bhājayāti

original: Tattha saddhāti yassa kassaci vacanapattiyāyanā sāvajjāpi hoti anavajjāpi. Pūjitāti
analyzed: tattha saddhā ati yassa kassaci vacana pattiyā āyanā sā avajjā api hoti anavajjā api pūjitā ati

original: anavajjakoṭṭhāsavasena pūjitā. Apāpasattūpanisevinīti anavajjasaddhāya ca ekantapattiyāyanusabhāvāra
analyzed: anavajja koṭṭhāsa vasena pūjitā a pāpa sattu upanisevinī iti anavajja saddhāya ca

original: paresupi pattiyāyanavidahanasamatthāya devatāyetaṃ nāmaṃ.
analyzed: paresu pi devatāya itam nāmam

original: Athaṃ naṃ kosiyo “ime sattā yassa kassaci vacanaṃ saddahitvā taṃ taṃ karontā kattabbato akattabbameva bahutaraṃ karonti, taṃ sabbaṃ tayā kāritaṃ nāma hotī”ti vatvā evamāha –
analyzed: ime sattāḥ yassa kassaci vacanam saddahitvā tam tam karontā kattabbataḥ a kattabbam eva bahutaram karonti tam sabbam tayā kāritam nāma hoti iti vatvā evam āha

original: “Dānaṃ damaṃ cāgamathopi saṃyamaṃ, ādāya saddhāya karonti hekadā;
analyzed: dānam damam saṃyamam ādāya saddhāya karonti hekadā

original: Theyyaṃ musā kūṭamathopi pesuṇaṃ, karonti heke puna viccutā tayā.
analyzed: theyyam musā pesuṇam karonti heke puna tayā

original: “Bhariyāsu poso sadisīsu pekkhavā, sīlūpapannāsu patibbatāsupi;
analyzed: bhariyāsu posaḥ sadisīsu pekkhavā sīlu upapannāsu

original: Vinetvāna chandaṃ kulitthirāsupi, karoti saddhaṃ puna kumbhadāsiyā.
analyzed: vinetvāna chandam karoti saddham puna

original: “Tvameva saddhe paradārasevinī, pāpaṃ karosi kusalampi riñcasi;
analyzed: tvam eva saddhe para dāra sevinī pāpam karosi riñcasi

original: Na tādisī arahati āsanūdakaṃ, kuto sudhā gaccha na mayha ruccasī”ti.
analyzed: na tādisī arahati āsanūdakam kutas sudhā gaccha na ruccasi iti

original: Tattha dānanti dasavatthukaṃ puññacetanaṃ. Damanti indriyadamanaṃ. Cāganti deyyadhammapariccāgaṃ.
analyzed: tattha dānanti dasa vatthukam puñña cetanam damanti indriya damanam cāganti deyya dhamma pariccāgam

original: Saṃyamanti sīlaṃ. Ādāya saddhāyāti “etāni dānādīni mahānisaṃsāni kattabbānī”ti vadataṃ
analyzed: saṃyamanti sīlam ādāya saddhāya ati etāni dāna ādīni mahā nisaṃsāni kattabbāni iti vadatam

original: vacanaṃ saddhāya ādiyitvāpi karonti ekadā. Kūṭanti tulākūṭādikaṃ vā gāmakūṭādikaṃ
analyzed: vacanam saddhāya ādiyitvā api karonti ekadā tulā kūṭa ādikam vā gāma kūṭa ādikam

original: kammaṃ vā. Karonti heketi eke manussā evarūpesu nāma kālesu imesañca atthāya theyyādīni
analyzed: kammam vā karonti heke iti eke manussāḥ evarūpesu nāma kālesu imesam ca atthāya theyya ādīni

original: kattabbānīti kesañci vacanaṃ saddahitvā etānipi karonti. Puna viccutā tayāti puna
analyzed: kattabbāni iti kesañci vacanam saddahitvā etāni pi karonti puna tayā ati puna

original: tayā visuttā sāvajjadukkhavipākānetāni na kattabbānīti vadataṃ vacanaṃ apattiyāyitvāpi
analyzed: tayā visuttā sāvajja dukkha vipākāni etāni na kattabbāni iti vadatam vacanam

original: karonti. Iti tava vasena sāvajjampi anavajjampi kareyyāsi vadati.
analyzed: karonti iti tava vasena sāvajjampi anavajjampi kareyyāsi vadati

original: Sadisīsūti jātigottasīlādīhi sadisīsu. Pekkhavāti pekkhā vuccati taṇhā, sataṇhoti
analyzed: sadisīsu iti jāti gotta sīla ādīhi sadisīsu pekkhavā ti pekkhā vuccati taṇhā sa taṇho ti

original: attho. Chandanti chandarāgaṃ. Karoti saddhanti kumbhadāsiyāpi vacane saddhaṃ karoti,
analyzed: chandanti chanda rāgam karoti saddhanti kumbhadāsiyā api vacane saddham karoti

original: tassā “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ idaṃ nāma upakāraṃ karissāmī”ti vadantiyā pattiyāyitvā kulitthiyopi
analyzed: tassāḥ aham tumhākam idam nāma upakāram karissāmi iti vadantiyā pattiyā ayitvā

original: chaḍḍetvā tameva paṭisevati, asukā nāma tumhesu paṭibaddhacittāti kumbhadāsiyāpi
analyzed: chaḍḍetvā tam eva paṭisevati asukā nāma tumhesu paṭibaddha cittā ati kumbhadāsiyā api

original: vacane saddhaṃ katvāva paradāraṃ sevati. Tvameva saddhe paradārasevinīti yasmā taṃ
analyzed: vacane saddham katvā ava para dāram sevati tvam eva saddhe para dāra sevinī iti yasmai tam

original: taṃ pattiyāyitvā tava vasena paradāraṃ sevanti pāpaṃ karonti kusalaṃ jahanti, tasmā
analyzed: tam pattiyāyitvā tava vasena paradāram sevanti pāpam karonti kusalam jahanti tasmai

original: tvameva paradārasevinī tvaṃ pāpāni karosi, kusalampi riñcasi, natthi tayā samā lokavināsikā
analyzed: tvam eva para dāra sevinī tvam pāpāni karosi kusalam pi riñcasi natthi tayā samā loka vināsikā

original: pāpadhammā, gaccha na me ruccasīti.
analyzed: pāpa dhammā gaccha na me ruccasi iti

original: Sā tattheva antaradhāyi. Kosiyopi uttarato ṭhitāya hiriyā saddhiṃ sallapanto gāthādvayamāha –
analyzed: sā tattha iva antaradhāyi kosiyaḥ api uttaratas ṭhitāya hiriyā saddhim sallapantaḥ gāthā dvayam āha

original: “Jighaññarattiṃ aruṇasmimūhate, yā dissati uttamarūpavaṇṇinī;
analyzed: jighaññarattim aruṇasmim ūhate yā dissati uttama rūpa vaṇṇinī

original: Tathūpamā maṃ paṭibhāsi devate, ācikkha me tvaṃ katamāsi accharā.
analyzed: tathūpamā mam paṭibhāsi devate ācikkha me tvam katamā asi accharā

original: “Kāḷā nidāgheriva aggijāriva, anileritā lohitapattamālinī;
analyzed: kāḷā nidāgheḥ iva aggijāḥ iva anila īritā lohita patta mālinī

original: Kā tiṭṭhasi mandamigāvalokayaṃ, bhāsesamānāva giraṃ na muñcasī”ti.
analyzed: kā tiṭṭhasi manda miga avalokayam giram na muñcasi iti

original: Tattha jighaññarattinti pacchimarattiṃ, rattipariyosāneti attho. Ūhateti aruṇe uggate.
analyzed: tattha jighañña rattim ti pacchima rattim ratti pariyosāne iti attho ūhata iti aruṇe uggate

original: Yāti yā puratthimā disā rattasuvaṇṇatāya uppamarūpadharā hutvā dissati. Kāḷā nidāgherivāti
analyzed: yā ati yā puratthimā disā ratta suvaṇṇa tāya uppama rūpa dharā hutvā dissati kāḷā nidāgheḥ iva ati

original: nidāghasamaye kāḷavalli viya. Aggijārivāti aggijālā iva, sāpi nijjhāmakhettesu taruṇauṭṭhitakāḷavalli
analyzed: nidāgha samaye kāḷavalli aggi jārivā ati aggi jālā iva sā api nijjhāma khettesu taruṇa oṭṭhita kāḷavalli

original: viyāti attho. Lohitapattamālinīti lohitavaṇṇehi pattehi parivutā. Kā tiṭṭhasīti yathā
analyzed: viyā ti atthaḥ lohita patta mālinī iti lohita vaṇṇehi pattehi parivutā kā tiṭṭhasi iti yathā

original: sā taruṇakāḷavalli vāteritā vilāsamānā sobhamānā tiṭṭhati, evaṃ kā nāma tvaṃ tiṭṭhasi.
analyzed: sā taruṇa kāḷavalli vāta īritā vilāsamānā sobhamānā tiṭṭhati evam kā nāma tvam tiṭṭhasi

original: Bhāsesamānāvāti mayā saddhiṃ bhāsitukāmā viya hosi, na ca giraṃ muñcasi.
analyzed: mayā saddhim bhāsitu kāmā hosi na ca giram muñcasi

original: Tato sā gāthamāha –
analyzed: sā gātham āha

original: “Hirāha devī manujehi pūjitā, apāpasattūpanisevinī sadā;
analyzed: devī manujehi pūjitā a pāpa sattūpa nisevinī sadā

original: Sudhāvivādena tavantimāgatā, sāhaṃ na sakkomi sudhampi yācituṃ;
analyzed: sudhā vivādena sā aham na sakkomi yācitum

original: Kopīnarūpā viya yācanitthiyā”ti.
analyzed: kopīna rūpāḥ

original: Tattha hirāhanti hirī ahaṃ. Sudhampīti sā ahaṃ sudhābhojanaṃ taṃ yācitumpi na sakkomi.
analyzed: tattha hirāhanti hirī aham sudham pi iti sā aham sudhā bhojanam tam yācitum pi na sakkomi

original: Kiṃkāraṇā? Kopīnarūpā viya yācanitthiyā, yasmā itthiyā yācanā nāma kopīnarūpā viya
analyzed: kiṃkāraṇā kopīna rūpā viya yācanitthiyā yasmai itthiyā yācanā nāma kopīna rūpā

original: rahassaṅgavivaraṇasadisā hoti, nillajjā viya hotīti attho.
analyzed: rahassaṅga vivaraṇa sadisā hoti nillajjā viya hoti iti attho

original: Taṃ sutvā tāpaso dve gāthā abhāsi –
analyzed: tam sutvā tāpasaḥ dve gāthāḥ abhāsi

original: “Dhammena ñāyena sugatte lacchasi, eso hi dhammo na hi yācanā sudhā.
analyzed: dhammena ñāyena sugatte lacchasi esaḥ hi dhammaḥ na hi yācanā sudhā

original: Taṃ taṃ ayācantimahaṃ nimantaye, sudhāya yañcicchasi tampi dammi te.
analyzed: tam tam a yācantim aham nimantaye sudhāya yat cicchasi tam pi dammi te

original: “Sā tvaṃ mayā ajja sakamhi assame, nimantitā kañcanavelliviggahe;
analyzed: sā tvam mayā ajja sakamhi assame nimantitā kañcana velli viggahe

original: Tuvañhi me sabbarasehi pūjiyā, taṃ pūjayitvāna sudhampi asniye”ti.
analyzed: tuvan hi me sabba rasehi pūjiyā tam pūjayitvāna asniyā iti

original: Tattha dhammenāti sabhāvena. Ñāyenāti kāraṇena. Na hi yācanā sudhāti na hi yācanāya
analyzed: tattha dhammena ati sabhāvena ñāyena ati kāraṇena na hi yācanā sudhā ati na hi yācanāya

original: sudhā labbhati, teneva kāraṇena itarā tisso nalabhiṃsu. Taṃ tanti tasmā taṃ. Yañcicchasīti
analyzed: sudhā labbhati tena iva kāraṇena itarā tissaḥ tam tasmai tam yat cicchasi iti

original: na kevalaṃ nimantemiyeva, yañca sudhaṃ icchasi, tampi dammi te. Kañcanavelliviggaheti
analyzed: na kevalam yat ca sudham icchasi tam pi dammi te

original: kañcanarāsisassirikasarīre. Pūjiyāti na kevalaṃ sudhāya, aññehipi sabbarasehi tvaṃ
analyzed: kañcana rāsi sassirika sarīre na kevalam sudhāya aññehi pi sabba rasehi tvam

original: mayā pūjetabbayuttakāva. Asniyeti taṃ pūjetvā sace sudhāya avasesaṃ bhavissati, ahampi bhuñjissāmi.
analyzed: mayā tam pūjetvā sace sudhāya avasesam bhavissati aham pi bhuñjissāmi

original: Tato aparā abhisambuddhagāthā –
analyzed: tatas aparā abhisambuddha gāthā

original: “Sā kosiyenānumatā jutīmatā, addhā hiri rammaṃ pāvisi yassamaṃ;
analyzed: sā kosiyena anumatā jutīmatā addhā hiri rammam pāvisi yassamam

original: Udakavantaṃ phalamariyapūjitaṃ, apāpasattūpanisevitaṃ sadā.
analyzed: udakavantam phalam ariya pūjitam a pāpa sattu upanisevitam sadā

original: “Rukkhaggahānā bahukettha pupphitā, ambā piyālā panasā ca kiṃsukā;
analyzed: rukkhaggahānā bahukā ittha pupphitā ambā piyālā panasā ca kiṃsukā

original: Sobhañjanā loddamathopi paddhakā, kekā ca bhaṅgā tilakā supupphitā.
analyzed: sobhañjanā loddamathā upi paddhakā kekā ca bhaṅgā tilakā supupphitā

original: “Sālā karerī bahukettha jambuyo, assatthanigrodhamadhukavetasā;
analyzed: sālā karerī bahukā ittha assattha nigrodha madhuka vetasā

original: Uddālakā pāṭali sinduvārakā, manuññagandhā mucalindaketakā.
“Hareṇukā veḷukā keṇu tindukā, sāmākanīvāramathopi cīnakā;
analyzed: hareṇukā veḷukā keṇu tindukā cīnakā

original: Mocā kadalī bahukettha sāliyo, pavīhayo ābhūjino ca taṇḍulā.
analyzed: mocā kadalī bahukā ittha sāliyaḥ pavīhayaḥ ca taṇḍulā

original: “Tassevuttarapassena, jātā pokkharaṇī sivā;
analyzed: tassa iva uttara passena jātā pokkharaṇī sivā

original: Akakkasā apabbhārā, sādhu appaṭigandhikā.
analyzed: akakkasā a pabbhārā sādhu appaṭigandhikā

original: “Tattha macchā sanniratā, khemino bahubhojanā;
analyzed: tattha macchā sanniratā kheminaḥ bahu bhojanā

original: Siṅgū savaṅkā saṃkulā, satavaṅkā ca rohitā;
analyzed: siṅgū savaṅkā saṃkulā satavaṅkā ca rohitā

original: Āḷigaggarakākiṇṇā, pāṭhīnā kākamacchakā.
analyzed: āḷigaggarakākiṇṇā pāṭhīnā kākamacchakā

original: “Tattha pakkhī sanniratā, khemino bahubhojanā;
analyzed: tattha pakkhī sanniratā kheminaḥ bahu bhojanā

original: Haṃsā koñcā mayūrā ca, cakkavākā ca kukkuhā;
analyzed: haṃsā koñcā mayūrā ca cakkavākā ca kukkuhā

original: Kuṇālakā bahū citrā, sikhaṇḍī jīvajīvakā.
“Tattha pānāya māyanti, nānā migagaṇā bahū;
analyzed: tattha pānāya māyanti nānā miga gaṇāḥ bahū

original: Sīhā byagghā varāhā ca, acchakokataracchayo.
analyzed: sīhā byagghā varāhā ca

original: “Palāsādā gavajā ca, mahiṃsā rohitā rurū;
analyzed: palāsādā gavajā ca mahiṃsā rohitā rurū

original: Eṇeyyā ca varāhā ca, gaṇino nīkasūkarā;
analyzed: eṇeyyā ca varāhā ca gaṇinaḥ nīka sūkarā

original: Kadalimigā bahukettha, biḷārā sasakaṇṇikā.
analyzed: kadalimigā bahukā ittha biḷārā sa sakaṇṇikā

original: “Chamāgirī pupphavicitrasanthatā, dijābhighuṭṭhā dijasaṅghasevitā”ti.
analyzed: chamā girī puppha vicitra santhatā dija abhighuṭṭhā dija saṅgha sevitā ati

original: Tattha jutīmatāti ānubhāvasampannena. Pāvisi yassamanti pāvisi assamaṃ, ya-kāro byañjanasandhikaro.
analyzed: tattha jutīmatā ati ānubhāva sampannena pāvisi yassamanti pāvisi assamam yakāraḥ byañjana sandhi karaḥ

original: Udakavantanti tesu tesu ṭhānesu udakasampannaṃ. Phalanti anekaphalasampannaṃ. Ariyapūjitanti
analyzed: tesu tesu ṭhānesu udaka sampannam phalanti aneka phala sampannam ariya pūjitanti

original: nīvaraṇadosarahitehi jhānalābhīhi ariyehi pūjitaṃ pasatthaṃ. Rukkhaggahānāti pupphūpagaphalūpagarukkhagahanā.
analyzed: nīvaraṇa dosa rahitehi jhāna lābhīhi ariyehi pūjitam pasattham rukkhaggahānā ati pupphu upaga phalu upaga rukkhagahanā

original: Sobhañjanāti siggurukkhā. Loddamathopi paddhakāti loddarukkhā ca padumarukkhā ca.
analyzed: sobhañjanā ati siggu rukkhā paddhakā ati lodda rukkhā ca paduma rukkhā ca

original: Kekā ca bhaṅgāti evaṃnāmakā rukkhā eva. Karerīti karerirukkhā. Uddālakāti vātaghātakā.
analyzed: kekā ca bhaṅgā ati evaṃnāmakā rukkhā eva karerī iti kareri rukkhā uddālakā ati vātaghātakā

original: Mucalindaketakāti mucalindā ca pañcavidhaketakā ca. Hareṇukāti aparaṇṇajāti. Veḷukāti
analyzed: mucalindaketakā ati mucalindā ca pañcavidhaketakā ca hareṇukā ati aparaṇṇajāti veḷukā ati

original: vaṃsabhedakā. Keṇūti araññamāsā. Tindukāti timbarurukkhā. Cīnakāti khuddakarājamāsā.
analyzed: vaṃsabhedakā keṇū ti araññamāsā tindukā ati timbarurukkhā cīnakā ati khuddakarājamāsā

original: Mocāti aṭṭhikakadaliyo. Sāliyoti nānappakārā jātassaraṃ upanissāya jātā sāliyo. Pavīhayoti
analyzed: mocā ati aṭṭhikakadaliyo sāliyo ti nānappakārā jātassaram upanissāya jātā sāliyo pavīhayo ti

original: nānappakārā vīhayo. Ābhūjinoti bhujapattā. Taṇḍulāti nikkuṇḍakathusāni sayaṃjātataṇḍulasīsāni.
analyzed: nānappakārāḥ vīhayaḥ bhuja pattā taṇḍulāti nikkuṇḍaka thusāni sayaṃjāta taṇḍula sīsāni

original: Tassevāti, bhikkhave, tasseva assamassa uttaradisābhāge. Pokkharaṇīti pañcavidhapadumasañchannā
analyzed: tassa iva ati bhikkhave tassa iva assamassa uttara disā bhāge pokkharaṇī iti pañcavidha paduma sañchannā

original: jātassarapokkharaṇī. Akakkasāti macchasippikasevālādikakkasarahitā. Apabbhārāti acchinnataṭā
analyzed: jātassara pokkharaṇī a kakkasā ati maccha sippi kasevāla ādi kakkasa rahitā a pabbhārā ati a chinna taṭā

original: samatitthā. Appaṭigandhikāti apaṭikkūlagandhena udakena samannāgatā. Tatthāti tassā
analyzed: samatitthā appaṭigandhikā ati a paṭikkūla gandhena udakena samannāgatā tattha ati tassā

original: pokkharaṇiyā. Kheminoti abhayā. “Siṅgū”tiādīni tesaṃ macchānaṃ nāmāni. Kuṇālakāti
analyzed: pokkharaṇiyā khemino ti abhayā siṅgu iti ādīni tesam macchānam nāmāni kuṇālakā ti

original: kokilā. Citrāti citrapattā. Sikhaṇḍīti uṭṭhitasikhā morā, aññepi vā matthake jātasikhā
analyzed: kokilā citrā ati citra pattā sikhaṇḍī iti uṭṭhita sikhā morā aññe pi vā matthake jāta sikhā

original: pakkhino. Pānāya māyantīti pānāya āyanti. Palāsādāti khaggā. Gavajāti gavayā. Gaṇinoti
analyzed: pakkhinaḥ pānāya mā āyanti iti pānāya āyanti palāsādāti khaggāḥ gavajāti gavayāḥ gaṇino ti

original: gokaṇṇā. Kaṇṇikāti kaṇṇikamigā. Chamāgirīti bhūmisamapatthaṭā piṭṭhipāsāṇā. Pupphavicitrasanthatāti
analyzed: gokaṇṇā kaṇṇikā ati kaṇṇikamigā chamāgirī iti bhūmi sama patthaṭā piṭṭhi pāsāṇā puppha vicitra santhatā ati

original: vicitrapupphasanthatā. Dijābhighuṭṭhāti madhurassarehi dijehi abhighuṭṭhā. Evarūpā
analyzed: vicitra puppha santhatā dija abhighuṭṭhā ati madhurassarehi dijehi abhighuṭṭhā evarūpā

original: tattha bhūmipabbatāti evaṃ bhagavā kosiyassa assamaṃ vaṇṇeti.
analyzed: tattha bhūmi pabbatā ti evam bhagavā kosiyassa assamam vaṇṇeti

original: Idāni hirideviyā tattha pavisanādīni dassetuṃ āha –
analyzed: idāni hirideviyā tattha pavisana ādīni dassetuṃ āha

original: “Sā suttacā nīladumābhilambitā, vijjū mahāmegharivānupajjatha;
analyzed: sā

original: Tassā susambandhasiraṃ kusāmayaṃ, suciṃ sugandhaṃ ajinūpasevitaṃ;
analyzed: tassā su sambandha siram kusāmayam su cim su gandham ajina upasevitam

original: Atricca kocchaṃ hirimetadabravi, nisīda kalyāṇi sukhayidamāsanaṃ.
analyzed: atrit ca hirim etat abravi nisīda kalyāṇi sukhayi dam āsanam

original: “Tassā tadā kocchagatāya kosiyo, yadicchamānāya jaṭājinandharo;
analyzed: tassa tadā koccha gatāya kosiyaḥ yat icchamānāya jaṭā ajinandharaḥ

original: Navehi pattehi sayaṃ sahūdakaṃ, sudhābhihāsī turito mahāmuni.
analyzed: navehi pattehi sayam sahūdakam sudhā abhihāsī turitaḥ mahā muni

original: “Sā taṃ paṭiggayha ubhohi pāṇibhi, iccabravi attamanā jaṭādharaṃ;
analyzed: sā tam paṭiggayha ubhohi pāṇibhiḥ atta manāḥ jaṭādharam

original: Handāhaṃ etarahi pūjitā tayā, gaccheyyaṃ brahme tidivaṃ jitāvinī.
analyzed: handa aham etarahi pūjitā tayā gaccheyyam brahme tidivam jitāvinī

original: “Sā kosiyenānumatā jutīmatā, udīritā vaṇṇamadena mattā;
analyzed: sā kosiyena anumatā jutīmatā udīritā vaṇṇa madena mattā

original: Sakāse gantvāna sahassacakkhuno, ayaṃ sudhā vāsava dehi me jayaṃ.
analyzed: sakāse gantvāna sahassa cakkhunaḥ ayam sudhā vāsava dehi me jayam

original: “Tamena sakkopi tadā apūjayi, sahindadevā surakaññamuttamaṃ;
analyzed: tam ena sakkā upi tadā apūjayi sa hinda devā sura kaññam uttamam

original: Sā pañjalī devamanussapūjitā, navamhi kocchamhi yadā upāvisī”ti.
analyzed: sā pañjalī deva manussa pūjitā navamhi kocchamhi yadā upāvisīti

original: Tattha suttacāti succhavī. Nīladumābhilambitāti nīlesu dumesu abhilambitā hutvā,
analyzed: tattha su tacā ati su chavī nīla duma abhilambitā ati nīlesu dumesu abhilambitā hutvā

original: taṃ taṃ nīladumasākhaṃ parāmasantīti attho. Mahāmegharivāti tena nimantitā mahāmeghavijju
analyzed: tam tam nīla duma sākham parāmasanti iti tena nimantitā mahā megha vijju

original: viya tassa taṃ assamaṃ pāvisi. Tassāti tassā hiriyā. Susambandhasiranti suṭṭhu sambandhasīsaṃ.
analyzed: viya tassa tam assamam pāvisi tassa ati tassā hiriyā su sambandha siranti suṭṭhu sambandha sīsam

original: Kusāmayanti usīrādimissakakusatiṇamayaṃ. Sugandhanti usīrena ceva aññena sugandhatiṇena
analyzed: kusāmayanti usīra ādi missaka kusa tiṇa mayam sugandhanti usīrena ca iva aññena sugandha tiṇena

original: ca missakattā sugandhaṃ. Ajinūpasevitanti upariatthatena ajinacammena upasevitaṃ.
analyzed: ca missaka ttā sugandham ajina upasevitanti upari atthatena ajina cammena upasevitam

original: Atricca kocchanti evarūpaṃ kocchāsanaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre attharitvā. Sukhayidamāsananti
analyzed: evarūpam kocchāsanam paṇṇasāla dvāre attharitvā

original: sukhaṃ nisīda idamāsanaṃ.
analyzed: sukham nisīda idam āsanam

original: Yanti yāvadatthaṃ. Icchamānāyāti sudhaṃ icchantiyā. Navehi pattehīti taṅkhaṇaññeva
analyzed: yanti yāvadattham icchamānāya ati sudham icchantiyā navehi pattehi iti

original: pokkharaṇito ābhatehi allapaduminipattehi. Sayanti sahatthena. Sahūdakanti dakkhiṇodakasahitaṃ.
analyzed: pokkharaṇitaḥ ābhatehi alla padumini pattehi sayanti sa hatthena dakkhiṇa udaka sahitam

original: Sudhābhihāsīti sudhaṃ abhihari. Turitoti somanassavegena turito. Handāti vavassaggatthe
analyzed: sudhā abhihāsi iti sudham turitaḥ iti somanassa vegena turitaḥ handa ati vavassagga tthe

original: nipāto. Jitāvinīti vijayappattā hutvā.
analyzed: nipātaḥ jitāvinī iti vijaya ppattā hutvā

original: Anumatāti idāni yathāruciṃ gacchāti anuññātā. Udīritāti tidasapuraṃ gantvā sakkassa
analyzed: anumatā ati idāni yathārucim gacchāti anuññātā udīritā iti tidasapuram gantvā sakkassa

original: santike ayaṃ sudhāti udīrayi. Surakaññanti devadhītaraṃ. Uttamanti pavaraṃ. Sā pañjalī
analyzed: santike ayam sudhā ati udīrayi surakaññanti deva dhītaram uttamanti sā pañjalī

original: devamanussapūjitāti pañjalī devehi ca manussehi ca pūjitā. Yadāti yadā nisīdanatthāya
analyzed: deva manussa pūjitā ti pañjalī devehi ca manussehi ca pūjitā yadā ati yadā nisīdana tthāya

original: sakkena dāpite nave kañcanapīṭhasaṅkhāte kocche sā upāvisi, tadā naṃ tattha nisinnaṃ
analyzed: sakkena dāpite nave kañcana pīṭha saṅkhāte kocche sā upāvisi tadā nam tattha nisinnam

original: sakko ca sesadevatā ca pāricchattakapupphādīhi pūjayiṃsu.
analyzed: sakko ca sesa devatā ca pāricchattaka puppha ādīhi pūjayiṃsu

original: Evaṃ sakko taṃ pūjetvā cintesi – “kena nu kho kāraṇena kosiyo sesānaṃ adatvā imissāva
analyzed: evam sakkaḥ tam pūjetvā cintesi kena nu kho kāraṇena kosiyaḥ sesānam a datvā

original: sudhaṃ adāsī”ti. So tassa kāraṇassa jānanatthāya puna mātaliṃ pesesi. Tamatthaṃ āvi
analyzed: sudham adāsi iti saḥ tassa kāraṇassa jānana atthāya puna mātalim pesesi tam attham āvi

original: karonto satthā āha –
analyzed: karontaḥ satthā āha

original: “Tameva saṃsī punadeva mātaliṃ, sahassanetto tidasānamindo;
analyzed: tam eva saṃsī punar eva mātalim sahassanettaḥ tidasānam indo

original: Gantvāna vākyaṃ mama brūhi kosiyaṃ, āsāya saddhā siriyā ca kosiya;
analyzed: gantvāna vākyam mama brūhi kosiyam āsāya saddhā siriyā ca kosiya

original: Hirī sudhaṃ kena malattha hetunā”ti.
analyzed: hirī sudham kena malattha hetunā ati

original: Tattha saṃsīti abhāsi. Vākyaṃ mamāti mama vākyaṃ kosiyaṃ brūhi. Āsāya saddhā siriyā cāti āsāto ca saddhāto ca sirito ca hirīyeva kena hetunā sudhamalatthāti.
analyzed: tattha abhāsi vākyam mama ati mama vākyam kosiyam brūhi āsāya saddhā siriyā ca ati āsātaḥ ca saddhātaḥ ca siritaḥ ca hirīyā iva kena hetunā sudham alattha ati

original: So tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā vejayantarathamāruyha agamāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
analyzed: saḥ tassa vacanam sampaṭicchitvā vejayanta ratham āruyha agamāsi tam attham pakāsentaḥ satthā āha

original: “Taṃ suplavatthaṃ udatārayī rathaṃ, daddallamānaṃ upakāriyasādisaṃ;
analyzed: tam su plavattham udatārayiḥ ratham daddallamānam upakāriya sādisam

original: Jambonadīsaṃ tapaneyyasannibhaṃ, alaṅkataṃ kañcanacittasannibhaṃ.
analyzed: jambonadīsam tapaneyya sannibham alaṅkatam kañcana citta sannibham

original: “Suvaṇṇacandettha bahū nipātitā, hatthī gavāssā kikibyagghadīpiyo;
analyzed: bahū nipātitāḥ hatthī gavāssā

original: Eṇeyyakā laṅghamayettha pakkhino, migettha veḷuriyamayā yudhā yutā.
analyzed: eṇeyyakāḥ laṅgha mayā ittha pakkhinaḥ migā ittha veḷuriya mayāḥ yudhā yutā

original: “Tatthassarājaharayo ayojayuṃ, dasasatāni susunāgasādise;
analyzed: ayojayum dasa satāni su su nāga sādise

original: Alaṅkate kañcanajāluracchade, āveḷine saddagame asaṅgite.
analyzed: alaṅkate kañcana jālura chade āveḷine saddagame asaṅgite

original: “Taṃ yānaseṭṭhaṃ abhiruyha mātali, disā imāyo abhinādayittha;
analyzed: tam yāna seṭṭham abhiruyha mātali disāḥ abhinādayittha

original: Nabhañca selañca vanappatiniñca, sasāgaraṃ pabyathayittha mediniṃ.
analyzed: nabhañca selañca vanappatiniñca sa sāgaram pabyathayittha medinim

original: “Sa khippameva upagamma assamaṃ, pāvāramekaṃsakato katañjalī;
analyzed: sa khippam eva upagamma assamam pāvāram ekaṃsakataḥ katañjalī

original: Bahussutaṃ vuddhaṃ vinītavantaṃ, iccabravi mātali devabrāhmaṇaṃ.
analyzed: bahussutam vuddham vinītavantam mātali devabrāhmaṇam

original: “Indassa vākyaṃ nisāmehi kosiya, dūto ahaṃ pucchati taṃ purindado;
analyzed: indassa vākyam nisāmehi kosiya dūtaḥ aham pucchati tam purindadaḥ

original: Āsāya saddhā siriyā ca kosiya, hirī sudhaṃ kena malattha hetunā”ti.
analyzed: āsāya saddhā siriyā ca kosiya hirī sudham kena malattha hetunā ati

original: Tattha taṃ suplavatthanti taṃ vejayantarathaṃ sukhena plavanatthaṃ. Udatārayīti uttāresi
analyzed: tattha tam su plavattham ti tam vejayanta ratham sukhena plavana ttham udatārayi iti uttāresi

original: ukkhipitvā gamanasajjamakāsi. Upakāriyasādisanti upakaraṇabhaṇḍehi sadisaṃ, yathā
analyzed: ukkhipitvā upakāriya sādisanti upakaraṇa bhaṇḍehi sadisam yathā

original: tassa aggisikhāya samānavaṇṇāni upakaraṇāni jalanti, tatheva jalitanti attho. Jambonadīsanti
analyzed: tassa aggi sikhāya samāna vaṇṇāni upakaraṇāni jalanti tathā iva jalitanti attho jambonadī santi

original: jambunadasaṅkhātaṃ rattasuvaṇṇamayaṃ īsaṃ. Kañcanacittasannibhanti, kañcanamayena
analyzed: jambu nada saṅkhātam ratta suvaṇṇa mayam īsam kañcana citta sannibhanti kañcana mayena

original: sattaratanavicittena aṭṭhamaṅgalena samannāgataṃ. Suvaṇṇacandetthāti suvaṇṇamayā
analyzed: satta ratana vicittena aṭṭhamaṅgalena samannāgatam suvaṇṇa candettha ati suvaṇṇa mayā

original: candakā ettha rathe. Hatthīti suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimayā hatthī. Gavādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: candakāḥ ettha rathe hatthī iti suvaṇṇa rajata maṇi mayāḥ hatthī go ādīsu pi esa iva nayo

original: Laṅghamayettha pakkhinoti ettha rathe laṅghamayā nānāratanamayā pakkhigaṇāpi paṭipāṭiyā
analyzed: laṅgha mayā ittha pakkhinoti ettha rathe laṅgha mayā nānā ratana mayā pakkhi gaṇā api paṭipāṭiyā

original: ṭhitā. Yudhā yutāti attano attano yudhena saddhiṃ yuttā hutvā dassitā.
analyzed: ṭhitā yudhā yutā ati attanaḥ attanaḥ yudhena saddhim yuttā hutvā dassitā

original: Assarājaharayoti harivaṇṇamanomayaassarājāno. Susunāgasādiseti balasampattiyā taruṇanāgasadise.
analyzed: assa rāja harayo ti harivaṇṇa manaḥ maya assa rājāno bala sampattiyā taruṇa nāga sadise

original: Kañcanajāluracchadeti kañcanajālamayena uracchadālaṅkārena samannāgate. Āveḷineti
analyzed: kañcana jāla uracchada iti kañcana jāla mayena uracchada alaṅkārena samannāgate āveḷinā iti

original: āveḷasaṅkhātehi kaṇṇālaṅkārehi yutte. Saddagameti patodappahāraṃ vinā saddamatteneva
analyzed: āveḷa saṅkhātehi kaṇṇa alaṅkārehi yutte patoda ppahāram vinā

original: gamanasīle. Asaṅgīteti nissaṅge sīghajave evarūpe assarāje tattha yojesunti attho.
analyzed: gamana sīle asaṅgīta iti nissaṅge sīgha jave evarūpe assa rāje tattha yojesun ti attho

original: Abhinādayitthāti yānasaddena ekaninnādaṃ akāsi. Vanappatiniñcāti vanappatinī ca vanasaṇḍe
analyzed: abhinādayittha ati yāna saddena eka ninnādam akāsi vanappatiniñca ati vanappatinī ca vana saṇḍe

original: cāti attho. Pabyathayitthāti kampayittha. Tattha ākāsaṭṭhakavimānakampanena nabhakampanaṃ
analyzed: ca ati pabyathayittha ati kampayittha tattha ākāsaṭṭhaka vimāna kampanena nabha kampanam

original: veditabbaṃ. Pāvāramekaṃsakatoti ekaṃsakatapāvāradibbavattho. Vuddhanti guṇavuddhaṃ.
analyzed: veditabbam pāvāram ekaṃsakato ti ekaṃsa kata pāvāra dibba vatthaḥ vuddham ti guṇa vuddham

original: Vinītavantanti vinītena ācāravattena samannāgataṃ. Iccabravīti rathaṃ ākāse ṭhapetvā
analyzed: vinītavantanti vinītena ācāravattena samannāgatam ratham ākāse ṭhapetvā

original: otaritvā evaṃ abravi. Devabrāhmaṇanti devasamaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ.
analyzed: otaritvā evam abravi deva brāhmaṇanti deva samam brāhmaṇam

original: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā gāthamāha –
analyzed: saḥ tassa vacanam sutvā gātham āha

original: “Andhā sirī maṃ paṭibhāti mātali, saddhā aniccā pana devasārathi.
analyzed: andhā sirī mam paṭibhāti mātali saddhā aniccā pana deva sārathi

original: Āsā visaṃvādikasammatā hi me, hirī ca ariyamhi guṇe patiṭṭhitā”ti.
analyzed: āsā visaṃvādika sammatā hi me hirī ca ariyamhi guṇe patiṭṭhitā ati

original: Tattha andhāti sippādisampannepi asampannepi bhajanato “andhā”ti maṃ paṭibhāti. Aniccāti
analyzed: tattha andhā ati sippa ādi sampanne pi asampanne pi bhajanataḥ andhā ati mama paṭibhāti aniccā iti

original: saddhā pana taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ pahāya aññasmiṃ aññasmiṃ uppajjanato hutvā abhāvākārena
analyzed: saddhā pana tam tam vatthum pahāya aññasmin aññasmin uppajjanataḥ hutvā abhāva ākārena

original: “aniccā”ti maṃ paṭibhāti. Visaṃvādikasammatāti āsā pana yasmā dhanatthikā nāvāya
analyzed: aniccā ati mama paṭibhāti visaṃvādika sammatā ati āsā pana yasmai dhanatthikā

original: samuddaṃ pakkhanditvā vinaṭṭhapābhatā enti, tasmā “visaṃvādikā”ti maṃ paṭibhāti.
analyzed: samuddam pakkhanditvā enti tasmā visaṃvādikā ati mama paṭibhāti

original: Ariyamhi guṇeti hirī pana hirottappasabhāvasaṅkhāte parisuddhe ariyaguṇe patiṭṭhitāti.
analyzed: ariyamhi guṇe iti hirī pana hirā uttappa sabhāva saṅkhāte parisuddhe ariya guṇe patiṭṭhitā ati

original: Idāni tassā guṇaṃ vaṇṇento āha –
analyzed: idāni tassāḥ guṇam vaṇṇentaḥ āha

original: “Kumāriyo yācimā gottarakkhitā, jiṇṇā ca yā yā ca sabhattuitthiyo;
analyzed: kumāriyaḥ gotta rakkhitāḥ jiṇṇā ca yā yā ca

original: Tā chandarāgaṃ purisesu uggataṃ, hiriyā nivārenti sacittamattano.
analyzed: tā chanda rāgam purisesu uggatam hiriyā nivārenti

original: “Saṅgāmasīse sarasattisaṃyute, parājitānaṃ patataṃ palāyinaṃ;
analyzed: saṅgāma sīse sarasatti saṃyute parājitānam patatam palāyinam

original: Hiriyā nivattanti jahitva jīvitaṃ, te sampaṭicchanti punā hirīmanā.
analyzed: hiriyā nivattanti jahitva jīvitam te sampaṭicchanti punā hirīmanā

original: “Velā yathā sāgaravegavārinī, hirāya hi pāpajanaṃ nivārinī;
analyzed: velā yathā sāgara vega vārinī hirāya hi pāpa janam nivārinī

original: Taṃ sabbaloke hirimariyapūjitaṃ, indassa taṃ vedaya devasārathī”ti.
analyzed: tam sabba loke hiri mariya pūjitam indassa tam vedaya deva sārathi iti

original: Tattha jiṇṇāti vidhavā. Sabhattūti sasāmikā taruṇitthiyo. Attanoti tā sabbāpi parapurisesu

original: evamakkhāyati evañca anusūyati, tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍeti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesapadayojanāyapi

original: “Evaṃ vutte kuṇālo sakuṇo taṃ puṇṇamukhaṃ phussakokilaṃ evaṃ apasādesi – ‘nassa tvaṃ,
analyzed: evam vutte kuṇālaḥ sakuṇaḥ tam puṇṇamukham phussa kokilam evam apasādesi nassa tvam

original: samma jamma vasala, vinassa tvaṃ, samma jamma vasala, ko nu tayā viyatto jāyājinenā’ti.
analyzed: samma jamma vasala vinassa tvam samma jamma vasala kaḥ nu tayā viyattaḥ jāyā ajinena ati

original: Evaṃ apasādito ca pana puṇṇamukho phussakokilo tatoyeva paṭinivatti.

analyzed: ābādhaḥ uppajji lohita pakkhandikā bāḷhāḥ vedanāḥ vattanti māraṇantikāḥ atha khalu

analyzed: bho puṇṇamukhassa phussa kokilassa paricārikānam dija kaññānam etat ahosi ābādhikaḥ

original: ‘Haṃ, samma, kuṇālā’ti.

analyzed: phussa kokilassa saḥ ābādhaḥ paṭippassambhi iti

original: Tattha piyakāti setapupphā. Hasanāti ha-kāro sandhikaro, asanāyeva. Tirīṭīti ekā
analyzed: tattha piyakā ati setapupphā hasanā ati hakāro sandhi karaḥ asanāya iva tirīṭī iti ekā

original: Devadārukacocagahaneti devadārurukkhehi ceva kadalīhi ca gahane. Kaccikārāti ekā
analyzed: devadāru kacoca gahana iti devadāru rukkhehi ca iva kadalīhi ca gahane ekā

original: rukkhajāti. Kaṇikārāti mahāpupphā. Kaṇṇikārāti khuddakapupphā. Kiṃsukāti vātaghātakā.
analyzed: rukkhajāti kaṇikārāti mahāpupphā kaṇṇikārāti khuddakapupphā kiṃsukā ati vātaghātakā

original: Yodhikāti yūthikā. Vanamallikamanaṅgaṇamanavajjabhaṇḍisurucirabhaginimālāmalyadhareti
analyzed: yodhikā ati yūthikā

original: etehi jātisumanādīhi vitate nadikacchapabbatakacche. Saṃkusumitalatāti tesu tesu

original: Gaṇādhivuṭṭheti etesaṃ vijjādharādīnaṃ gaṇehi adhivuṭṭhe. Puṇṇamukhoti mukhaparipuṇṇatāya
analyzed: gaṇa adhivuṭṭhā iti etesam vijjādhara ādīnam gaṇehi adhivuṭṭhe puṇṇa mukho ti mukha paripuṇṇa tāya

original: puṇṇamukho. Parehi phuṭṭhatāya phussakokilo. Vilāsitanayanoti vilāsitanetto. Mattakkhoti

analyzed: parampara ghosena cha sutvā yebhuyyena tattha sannipatiṃsu bahu nāga supaṇṇa kinnara vijjādhara ādīnam pi

analyzed: saddhim iddhiyā tattha gantvā ekamantam nisīdi buddhānam desanā sannipāta sadisaḥ mahā samāgamaḥ

analyzed: ahosi atha mahāsattaḥ jāti ssara ñāṇena itthi dosa paṭisaṃyuttam atīta bhave diṭṭha kāraṇam

analyzed: puṇṇamukham kāya sakkhim katvā kathesi tam attham pakāsentaḥ satthā āha

original: “Atha khalu, bho, kuṇālo sakuṇo taṃ puṇṇamukhaṃ phussakokilaṃ gilānavuṭṭhitaṃ aciravuṭṭhitaṃ gelaññā etadavoca –

original: “‘Diṭṭhā mayā, samma puṇṇamukha, kaṇhā dvepitikā pañcapatikāya chaṭṭhe purise cittaṃ paṭibandhantiyā, yadidaṃ kabandhe pīṭhasappimhī”’ti. Bhavati ca panuttarettha vākyaṃ –

original: “Athajjuno nakulo bhīmaseno, yudhiṭṭhilo sahadevo ca rājā;
analyzed: atha ajjunaḥ nakulaḥ bhīmasenaḥ yudhiṭṭhilaḥ sahadevaḥ ca rājā

original: Ete patī pañca maticca nārī, akāsi khujjavāmanakena pāpa’nti.

original: “Diṭṭhā mayā, samma puṇṇamukha, saccatapāpī nāma samaṇī susānamajjhe vasantī catutthabhattaṃ pariṇāmayamānā surādhuttakena pāpamakāsi.

original: “Diṭṭhā mayā, samma puṇṇamukha, kākavatī nāma devī samuddamajjhe vasantī bhariyā venateyyassa naṭakuverena pāpamakāsi.

original: “Evañhetaṃ mayā ñātaṃ, brahmadattassa mātaraṃ;
analyzed: evam ha etam mayā ñātam brahmadattassa mātaram

original: Ohāya kosalarājaṃ, pañcālacaṇḍena pāpamakāsi.

original: “Natthi tāsaṃ vinayo na saṃvaro, majjamaṃsaniratā asaññatā;
analyzed: na atthi tāsam vinayaḥ na saṃvaraḥ majja maṃsa niratāḥ asañña tā

original: Tā gilanti purisassa pābhataṃ, sāgareva makaraṃ timiṅgalo.
analyzed: tāḥ gilanti purisassa sāgarā iva makaram timiṅgalo

original: “Pañcakāmaguṇasātagocarā, uddhatā aniyatā asaññatā;
analyzed: pañca kāmaguṇa sāta gocarā uddhatā aniyatā asañña tā

original: Osaranti pamadā pamādinaṃ, loṇatoyavatiyaṃva āpakā.
analyzed: osaranti pamadā pamādinam āpakā

original: “Yaṃ naraṃ upalapenti nāriyo, chandasā vā ratiyā dhanena vā;
analyzed: yam naram upalapenti nāriyaḥ chandasā vā ratiyā dhanena vā

original: Jātavedasadisampi tādisaṃ, rāgadosavadhiyo dahanti naṃ.
analyzed: jātavedas disam pi tādisam rāga dosava dhiyaḥ dahanti nam

original: “Aḍḍhaṃ ñatvā purisaṃ mahaddhanaṃ, osaranti sadhanaṃ sahattanā;
analyzed: aḍḍham ñatvā purisam mahat dhanam osaranti sa dhanam sahattanā

original: Rattacittamativeṭhayanti naṃ, sāla māluvalatāva kānane.
analyzed: ratta cittam ativeṭhayanti nam sāla kānane

original: “Tā upenti vividhena chandasā, citrabimbamukhiyo alaṅkatā;
analyzed: tāḥ upenti vividhena chandasā citra bimba mukhiyaḥ alaṅkatā

original: Uhasanti pahasanti nāriyo, sambarova satamāyakovidā.
analyzed: uhasanti pahasanti nāriyaḥ

original: “Jātarūpamaṇimuttabhūsitā, sakkatā patikulesu nāriyo;
analyzed: jātarūpa maṇi mutta bhūsitā sakkatāḥ pati kulesu nāriyaḥ

original: Rakkhitā aticaranti sāmikaṃ, dānavaṃva hadayantarassitā.
analyzed: rakkhitāḥ aticaranti sāmikam dānavam va

original: “Tejavāpi hi naro vicakkhaṇo, sakkato bahujanassa pūjito;
analyzed: tejavā api hi naraḥ vicakkhaṇaḥ sakkataḥ bahu janassa pūjito

original: Nārinaṃ vasagato na bhāsati, rāhunā upahatova candimā.
analyzed: nārinam vasagataḥ na bhāsati rāhunā upahata uva candimā

original: “Yaṃ kareyya kupito diso disaṃ, duṭṭhacitto vasamāgataṃ ariṃ;
analyzed: yam kareyya kupitaḥ disaḥ disam duṭṭha cittaḥ vasamāgatam arim

original: Tena bhiyyo byasanaṃ nigacchati, nārinaṃ vasagato apekkhavā.
analyzed: tena bhiyyas byasanam nigacchati nārinam vasagataḥ apekkhavā

original: “Kesalūnanakhachinnatajjitā, pādapāṇikasadaṇḍatāḷitā;
analyzed: kesa lūna nakha chinna tajjitā pāda pāṇi ka sa daṇḍa tāḷitā

original: Hīnamevupagatā hi nāriyo, tā ramanti kuṇapeva makkhikā.
analyzed: hīnam eva upagatāḥ hi nāriyaḥ tāḥ ramanti kuṇapā iva makkhikā

original: “Tā kulesu visikhantaresu vā, rājadhāninigamesu vā puna;
analyzed: tā kulesu visikhantaresu vā rājadhāni nigamesu vā puna

original: Oḍḍitaṃ namucipāsavākaraṃ, cakkhumā parivajje sukhatthiko.
analyzed: oḍḍitam namuci pāsava ākaram cakkhumā parivajje sukhatthiko

original: “Ossajitva kusalaṃ tapoguṇaṃ, yo anariyacaritāni mācari;
analyzed: ossajitva kusalam tapaḥ guṇam yaḥ an ariya caritāni

original: Devatāhi nirayaṃ nimissati, chedagāmimaṇiyaṃva vāṇijo.
analyzed: devatāhi nirayam nimissati cheda gāmi maṇiyam va vāṇijaḥ

original: “So idha garahito parattha ca, dummatī upahato sakammunā;
analyzed: saḥ idha garahitaḥ parattha ca dummatī upahataḥ sa kammunā

original: Gacchatī aniyato gaḷāgaḷaṃ, duṭṭhagadrabharathova uppathe.
analyzed: gacchatī aniyataḥ gaḷāgaḷam uppathe

original: “So upeti nirayaṃ patāpanaṃ, sattisimbalivanañca āyasaṃ;
analyzed: saḥ upeti nirayam patāpanam āyasam

original: Āvasitvā tiracchānayoniyaṃ, petarājavisayaṃ na muñcati.
analyzed: āvasitvā peta rāja visayam na muñcati

original: “Dibyakhiḍḍaratiyo ca nandane, cakkavatticaritañca mānuse;
analyzed: ca nandane cakkavatti caritam ca mānuse

original: Nāsayanti pamadā pamādinaṃ, duggatiñca paṭipādayanti naṃ.
analyzed: nāsayanti pamadā pamādinam duggatim ca paṭipādayanti naṃ

original: “Dibyakhiḍḍaratiyo na dullabhā, cakkavatticaritañca mānuse;
analyzed: dibya khiḍḍa ratiyaḥ na dullabhā cakkavatti caritam ca mānuse

original: Soṇṇabyamhanilayā ca accharā, ye caranti pamadāhanatthikā.
analyzed: ca accharāḥ ye caranti

original: “Kāmadhātusamatikkamā gati, rūpadhātuyā bhāvo na dullabho;
analyzed: kāmadhātu samatikkamā gati rūpadhātuyā bhāvaḥ na dullabhaḥ

original: Vītarāgavisayūpapatti yā, ye caranti pamadāhanatthikā.
analyzed: yāḥ ye caranti

original: “Sabbadukkhasamattikkamaṃ sivaṃ, accantamacalitaṃ asaṅkhataṃ;
analyzed: sivam accantam acalitam asaṅkhatam

original: Nibbutehi sucihī na dullabhaṃ, ye caranti pamadāhanatthikā”’ti.
analyzed: nibbutehi na dullabham ye caranti

original: Tattha sallapeti “sace mayā saddhiṃ sallapessasi, sīsaṃ te pātessāmī”ti vatvā khaggaṃ
analyzed: tattha sallapa iti sace mayā saddhim sallapessasi sīsam te pātessāmi iti vatvā khaggam

original: ādāya ṭhitenāpi, “sallapitamatteyeva taṃ khāditvā jīvitavināsaṃ pāpessāmī”ti dosinā
analyzed: ādāya ṭhitena api tam khāditvā jīvita vināsam pāpessāmi iti dosinā

original: hutvā ṭhitenāpi pisācena saddhiṃ sallape. “Upagataṃ ḍaṃsitvā nāsessāmī”ti ṭhitaṃ
analyzed: hutvā ṭhitena api pisācena saddhim sallape upagatam ḍaṃsitvā nāsessāmi iti ṭhitam

original: uggatejaṃ uragampi āside. Eko pana hutvā raho ekāya pamadāya na hi ālape. Lokacittamathanāti
analyzed: ekaḥ pana hutvā ekasmai pamadāya na hi ālape

original: lokassa cittaghātikā. Dīpe rakkhasigaṇoti yathā dīpe rakkhasigaṇo manussavesena vāṇije
analyzed: lokassa citta ghātikā dīpe rakkhasi gaṇaḥ ti yathā dīpe rakkhasi gaṇaḥ manussa vesena vāṇije

original: upalāpetvā attano vase gate katvā khādati, evaṃ imāpi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi attano vase
analyzed: upalāpetvā attanaḥ vase gate katvā khādati evam imā api pañcahi kāmaguṇehi attanaḥ vase

original: katvā satte mahāvināsaṃ pāpentīti attho. Vinayoti ācāro. Saṃvaroti mariyādo. Purisassa
analyzed: katvā satte mahā vināsam pāpenti iti atthaḥ vinayo ti ācāro saṃvaro ti mariyādaḥ purisassa

original: pābhatanti dukkhasambhataṃ dhanaṃ gilanti nāsenti.
analyzed: dukkha sambhatam dhanam gilanti nāsenti

original: Aniyatāti aniyatacittā. Loṇatoyavatiyanti loṇatoyavantaṃ samuddanti attho. Āpakāti
analyzed: aniyatā ati aniyata cittā loṇatoyavatiyanti loṇatoyavantam

original: āpagā, ayameva vā pāṭho. Yathā samuddaṃ nadiyo osaranti, evaṃ pamādinaṃ pamadāti
analyzed: āpagāḥ ayam eva vā pāṭhaḥ yathā samuddam nadiyaḥ osaranti evam pamādinam pamadāti

original: attho. Chandasāti pemena. Ratiyāti pañcakāmaguṇaratiyā. Dhanena vāti dhanahetu vā.
analyzed: chandasā ati pemena ratiyā iti pañca kāmaguṇa ratiyā dhanena vā ati dhana hetu vā

original: Jātavedasadisanti guṇasampattiyā aggimiva jalitampi. Rāgadosavadhiyoti kāmarāgadosehi
analyzed: guṇa sampattiyā aggim iva jalitam pi kāma rāga dosehi

original: vadhikā. Rāgadosagatiyotipi pāṭho. Osarantīti dhanagahaṇatthāya madhuravacanena taṃ
analyzed: vadhikāḥ madhura vacanena tam

original: bandhantiyo upagacchanti. Sadhananti sadhanā. Ayameva vā pāṭho, vatthālaṅkāratthāya
analyzed: bandhantiyaḥ upagacchanti sadhananti sadhanāḥ ayam eva vā pāṭhaḥ vattha alaṅkāra tthāya

original: kiñci attano dhanaṃ datvāpi osarantīti attho. Sahattanāti attabhāvena saddhiṃ attabhāvampi
analyzed: kiñci attanaḥ dhanam da tvā api osaranti iti attho sahattanā ati atta bhāvena saddhim atta bhāvam pi

original: tasseva pariccajantiyo viya honti. Ativeṭhayantīti dhanagahaṇatthāya ativiya veṭhenti pīḷenti.

original: Vividhena chandasāti nānāvidhena ākārena. Citrabimbamukhiyoti alaṅkāravasena citrasarīrā
analyzed: vividhena chandasā ati nānāvidhena ākārena alaṅkāra vasena citra sarīrā

original: citramukhiyo hutvā. Uhasantīti mahāhasitaṃ hasanti. Pahasantīti mandahasitaṃ hasanti.
analyzed: citra mukhiyaḥ hutvā uhasanti iti mahā hasitam hasanti pahasanti iti manda hasitam hasanti

original: Sambarovāti māyākārapuriso viya asurindo viya ca. Dānavaṃva hadayantarassitāti yathā
analyzed: māyākāra purisaḥ viya asurindaḥ viya ca yathā

analyzed: kutas nu āgacchatha bho karaṇḍaka jātake hadaya antara nissitā antar udara gatā api

original: dānavaṃ aticari, evaṃ aticaranti. Arakkhitā hetāti dīpeti. Na bhāsatīti na virocati
analyzed: dānavam aticari evam aticaranti a rakkhitā hetā ati dīpeti na bhāsati iti na virocati

original: haritacalomasakassapakusarājāno viya. Tenāti tamhā amittena katā byasanā atirekataraṃ
analyzed: viya tena ati tamhā amittena katāḥ byasanāḥ atirekataram

original: byasananti attho. Apekkhavāti sataṇho.
analyzed: byasanam ti atthaḥ apekkhavā ati sa taṇhaḥ

original: Kesalūnanakhachinnatajjitāti ākaḍḍhitvā lūnakesā nakhehi chinnagattā tajjitā pādādīhi
analyzed: kesa lūna nakha chinna tajjitā ati ākaḍḍhitvā lūna kesā nakhehi chinna gattā tajjitā pāda ādīhi

analyzed: ca hutvā yaḥ kilesa vasena ete api vippakāre karoti tādisam hīnam eva upagatā

original: nāriyo ramanti, na ete vippakāre pariharanti, madhurasamācāre kiṃkāraṇā tā na ramanti.
analyzed: nāriyaḥ ramanti na ete vippakāre pariharanti madhura samācāre kiṃkāraṇā tāḥ na ramanti

original: Kuṇapeva makkhikāti yasmā jegucchahatthikuṇapādimhi makkhikā viya tā hīneyeva ramantīti
analyzed: kuṇapā iva makkhikā ati yasmai jeguccha hatthi kuṇapa ādimhi makkhikāḥ viya tāḥ ramanti iti

original: attho. Oḍḍitanti na etā itthiyo nāma, atha kho imesu ṭhānesu namucino kilesamārassa
analyzed: na etāḥ itthiyaḥ nāma atha kho imesu ṭhānesu namucinaḥ kilesa mārassa

analyzed: miga pakkhi gahaṇa attham luddakehi oḍḍitam pāsam ca vākaram ca ati maññamānaḥ paññā cakkhumā

original: puriso dibbamānusikena sukhena atthiko parivajjeyya.
analyzed: purisaḥ dibba mānusikena sukhena atthikaḥ parivajjeyya

original: Ossajitvāti devamanussesu mahāsampattidāyakaṃ tapoguṇaṃ chaḍḍetvā. Yoti yo puriso
analyzed: ossajitvā ati deva manussesu mahā sampatti dāyakam tapo guṇam chaḍḍetvā yaḥ ti yaḥ puriso

analyzed: anariyesu a parisuddhesu kāma guṇesu kāma rati caritāni ācarati devatāhi nirayam nimissati iti

original: so devalokena parivattitvā nirayaṃ gaṇhissati. Chedagāmimaṇiyaṃva vāṇijoti yathā

original: bālavāṇijo satasahassagghabhaṇḍaṃ datvā chedagāmimaṇikaṃ gaṇhāti, tathārūpo ayaṃ

original: hotīti attho. Soti so itthīnaṃ vasaṃ gato. Aniyatoti ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ apāyesu paccissatīti
analyzed: hoti iti attho saḥ ti saḥ itthīnam vasam gataḥ aniyataḥ ti ettakam nāma kālam apāyesu paccissati iti

analyzed: aniyataḥ gaḷāgaḷanti deva lokāḥ vā manussa lokāḥ vā gaḷitvā apāyam eva gacchati iti attho

analyzed: yathā kim yathā kūṭa gadrabha yutta rathaḥ maggāḥ okkamitvā

original: uppatheyeva gacchati, tathā. Sattisimbalivananti sattisadisehi kaṇṭakehi yuttaṃ āyasaṃ
analyzed: uppatheya iva gacchati tathā satti simbali vananti satti sadisehi kaṇṭakehi yuttam āyasam

original: simbalivanaṃ. Petarājavisayanti petavisayañca kālakañcikaasuravisayañca.
analyzed: simbali vanam peta rāja visayanti peta visayañca kālakañcika asura visayañca

original: Pamādinanti pamattānaṃ. Te hi pamadāsu pamattā tāsaṃ sampattīnaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ kusalaṃ
analyzed: pamādinanti pamattānam te hi pamadāsu pamattā tāsam sampattīnam mūla bhūtam kusalam

original: suvaṇṇamayavimānavāsiniyo. Pamadāhanatthikāti ye purisā pamadāhi anatthikā hutvā
analyzed: suvaṇṇa maya vimāna vāsiniyaḥ ye purisā pamadā hi anatthikā hutvā

analyzed: brahmacariyam caranti kāmadhātu samatikkamā ati kāmadhātu samatikkamā yā gati rūpadhātuyā

original: Vītarāgavisayūpapatti yāti yā vītarāgavisaye suddhāvāsaloke upapatti, sāpi tesaṃ

original: na dullabhāti attho. Accantanti antātītaṃ avināsadhammaṃ. Acalitanti kilesehi akampitaṃ.

original: Nibbutehīti nibbutakilesehi. Sucihīti sucīhi parisuddhehi evarūpaṃ nibbānaṃ na dullabhanti.
analyzed: nibbutehi iti nibbuta kilesehi sucihi iti sucīhi parisuddhehi evarūpam nibbānam na dullabhanti

analyzed: ākāse ṭhitā devatā ca aho buddha līlāya kathitā ati sādhukāram ānandaḥ gijjha rājā

original: nārado devabrāhmaṇo puṇṇamukho ca phussakokilo attano attano parisaṃ ādāya yathāṭhānameva
analyzed: nāradaḥ deva brāhmaṇaḥ puṇṇamukho ca phussa kokilaḥ attano attano parisam ādāya yathāṭhānam eva

original: gamiṃsu. Mahāsattopi sakaṭṭhānameva gato. Itare pana antarantarā gantvā mahāsattassa
analyzed: gamiṃsu mahāsattaḥ api saka ṭṭhānam eva gataḥ itare pana antar antarā gantvā mahāsattassa

original: santike ovādaṃ gahetvā tasmiṃ ovāde ṭhatvā saggaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ.
analyzed: santike ovādam gahetvā tasmin ovāde ṭhatvā sagga parāyaṇāḥ ahesuṃ

original: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānento osānagāthā abhāsi –
analyzed: satthā imam dhamma desanam āharitvā jātakam samodhānentaḥ osāna gāthāḥ abhāsi

original: “Kuṇālohaṃ tadā āsiṃ, udāyī phussakokilo;

original: Ānando gijjharājāsi, sāriputto ca nārado;
analyzed: ānandaḥ gijjha rājā asi sāriputto ca nāradaḥ

original: Parisā buddhaparisā, evaṃ dhāretha jātaka”nti.

analyzed: te pana bhikkhū gamana kāle sattha anubhāvena gantvā āgamana kāle attanaḥ attanaḥ iva ānubhāvena

analyzed: āgatā tesam satthā mahā vaneyā iva kammaṭṭhānam kathesi sabbe pi te tam divasam eva

analyzed: arahattam pāpuṇiṃsu mahādevatā samāgamaḥ ahosi athassa bhagavā mahāsamaya suttam kathesi

original: Kuṇālajātakavaṇṇanā catutthā.
analyzed: kuṇāla jātaka vaṇṇanā catutthā

original: [537] 5. Mahāsutasomajātakavaṇṇanā
Kasmā tuvaṃ rasaka edisānīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aṅgulimālattheradamanaṃ
analyzed: kasmā tuvam rasake edisāni iti idam satthā jetavane viharantaḥ aṅguli mālatthera damanam

original: vuttanayena vitthārato veditabbā. So pana saccakiriyāya mūḷhagabbhāya itthiyā sotthibhāvaṃ

analyzed: katvā tatas paṭṭhāya sulabha piṇḍaḥ hutvā apara bhāge arahattam patvā

original: abhiññātova asītiyā mahātherānaṃ abbhantaro ahosi. Tasmiṃ kāle dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ

original: Tattha ariyassāti ācāraariyassa. Sakhyanti sakhidhammo mittadhammo. Paññāṇavatāti
