original: ñāṇasampannena. Sametīti gaṅgodakaṃ viya yamunodakena saṃsandati. Dhātuso hi sattā
analyzed: ñāṇa sampannena sameti iti gaṅgā udakam viya yamunā udakena saṃsandati dhātusaḥ hi sattā

original: saṃsandanti. Passeyya tanti sutasomo porisādassa ciraṃ jīvitaṃ icchanto viya paṭhamaṃ
analyzed: saṃsandanti passeyya tanti sutasomo porisādassa ciram jīvitam icchantaḥ viya paṭhamam

original: attano jīvitavaraṃ yācati. Paṇḍitassa hi “mama jīvitaṃ dehī”ti vattuṃ ayuttaṃ, apica
analyzed: attanaḥ jīvita varam yācati paṇḍitassa hi mama jīvitam dehi iti vattum ayuttam apica

original: so ‘mayhameva esa ārogyaṃ icchatī’ti cintetvā tussissatīti evamāha.
analyzed: saḥ mayham eva esaḥ ārogyam icchati iti cintetvā tussissati iti evam āha

original: Sopi taṃ sutvāva “ayaṃ issariyā dhaṃsetvā idāni maṃsaṃ khāditukāmassa evaṃ mahāanatthakarassa
analyzed: saḥ api tam sutvā ava ayam issariyā dhaṃsetvā idāni maṃsam khāditu kāmassa evam mahā anattha karassa

original: mahācorassa mayhameva jīvitaṃ icchati, aho mama hitakāmo”ti tuṭṭhamānaso vañcetvā
analyzed: mahā corassa jīvitam icchati aho mama hita kāmo ti tuṭṭha mānasaḥ vañcetvā

original: varassa gahitabhāvaṃ ajānitvā taṃ varaṃ dadamāno gāthamāha –
analyzed: varassa gahita bhāvam a jānitvā tam varam dadamānaḥ gātham āha

original: “Ariyassa ariyena sameti sakhyaṃ, paññassa paññāṇavatā sameti;
analyzed: ariyassa ariyena sameti sakhyam paññassa paññāṇavatā sameti

original: Passāsi maṃ vassasataṃ arogaṃ, etaṃ varānaṃ paṭhamaṃ dadāmī”ti.
analyzed: passāsi mam vassa satam arogam etam varānam paṭhamam dadāmi iti

original: Tattha varānanti catunnaṃ varānaṃ paṭhamaṃ.
analyzed: tattha varānam ti catunnam varānam paṭhamam

original: Tato bodhisatto āha –
analyzed: tatas bodhisattaḥ āha

original: “Ye khattiyāse idha bhūmipālā, muddhābhisittā katanāmadheyyā;
analyzed: ye khattiyāse idha bhūmipālāḥ kata nāmadheyyā

original: Na tādise bhūmipatī adesi, etaṃ varānaṃ dutiyaṃ varāmī”ti.
analyzed: na tādise bhūmipatī adesi etam varānam dutiyam varāmi iti

original: Tattha katanāmadheyyāti muddhani abhisittattāva “muddhābhisittā”ti katanāmadheyyā. Na tādiseti tādise khattiye na adesi mā khādi.
analyzed: tattha kata nāmadheyyā ati muddhani muddhābhisittā ati kata nāmadheyyā na tādisā iti tādise khattiye na adesi mā khādi

original: Iti so dutiyaṃ varaṃ gaṇhanto parosatānaṃ khattiyānaṃ jīvitavaraṃ gaṇhi. Porisādopissa dadamāno āha –
analyzed: iti saḥ dutiyam varam gaṇhantaḥ parosatānam khattiyānam jīvita varam gaṇhi porisādopissa dadamānaḥ āha

original: “Ye khattiyāse idha bhūmipālā, muddhābhisittā katanāmadheyyā;
analyzed: ye khattiyāse idha bhūmipālāḥ kata nāmadheyyā

original: Na tādise bhūmipatī ademi, etaṃ varānaṃ dutiyaṃ dadāmī”ti.
analyzed: na tādise bhūmipatī a demi etam varānam dutiyam dadāmi iti

original: Kiṃ pana te tesaṃ saddaṃ suṇanti, na suṇantīti? Na sabbaṃ suṇanti. Porisādena hi
analyzed: kim pana te tesam saddam suṇanti na suṇanti iti na sabbam suṇanti porisādena hi

original: rukkhassa dhūmajālaupaddavabhayena paṭikkamitvā aggi kato, aggino ca rukkhassa ca
analyzed: rukkhassa dhūma jāla opaddava bhayena paṭikkamitvā aggi kataḥ aggino ca rukkhassa ca

original: antare nisīditvā mahāsatto tena saddhiṃ kathesi, tasmā sabbaṃ asutvā upaḍḍhupaḍḍhaṃ
analyzed: antare nisīditvā mahāsatto tena saddhim kathesi tasmai sabbam a sutvā upaḍḍhupaḍḍham

original: suṇiṃsu. Te “idāni sutasomo porisādaṃ damessati, mā bhāyathā”ti aññamaññaṃ samassāsesuṃ.
analyzed: te idāni suta somaḥ porisādam damessati mā bhāyatha ati aññam aññam samassāsesuṃ

original: Tasmiṃ khaṇe mahāsatto imaṃ gāthamāha –
analyzed: tasmin khaṇe mahāsattaḥ imam gātham āha

original: “Parosataṃ khattiyā te gahītā, talāvutā assumukhā rudantā;
analyzed: parosatam khattiyā te gahītā talāvutā assu mukhā rudantā

original: Sake te raṭṭhe paṭipādayāhi, etaṃ varānaṃ tatiyaṃ varāmī”ti.
analyzed: sake te raṭṭhe paṭipādayāhi etam varānam tatiyam varāmi iti

original: Tattha parosatanti atirekasataṃ. Te gahītāti tayā gahitā. Talāvutāti hatthatalesu āvutā.
analyzed: tattha atireka satam te gahītā ati tayā gahitā talāvutā ati hattha talesu āvutā

original: Iti mahāsatto tatiyaṃ varaṃ gaṇhanto tesaṃ khattiyānaṃ sakaraṭṭhaniyyātanavaraṃ gaṇhi.
analyzed: iti mahāsatto tatiyam varam gaṇhanto tesam khattiyānam sakaraṭṭha niyyātana varam gaṇhi

original: Kiṃkāraṇā? So akhādantopi verabhayena sabbe te dāse katvā araññeyeva vāseyya, māretvā
analyzed: kiṃkāraṇā saḥ a khādantaḥ api vera bhayena sabbe te dāse katvā a raññeya iva vāseyya māretvā

original: vā chaḍḍeyya, paccantaṃ netvā vā vikkiṇeyya, tasmā tesaṃ sakaraṭṭhaniyyātanavaraṃ
analyzed: vā chaḍḍeyya paccantam netvā vā vikkiṇeyya tasmā tesam sa karaṭṭha niyyātana varam

original: gaṇhi. Itaropissa dadamāno imaṃ gāthamāha –
analyzed: imam gātham āha

original: “Parosataṃ khattiyā me gahītā, talāvutā assumukhā rudantā;
analyzed: parosatam khattiyā me gahītā talāvutā assu mukhā rudantā

original: Sake te raṭṭhe paṭipādayāmi, etaṃ varānaṃ tatiyaṃ dadāmī”ti.
analyzed: sake te raṭṭhe paṭipādayāmi etam tatiyam dadāmi iti

original: Catutthaṃ pana varaṃ gaṇhanto bodhisatto imaṃ gāthamāha –
analyzed: catuttham pana varam gaṇhantaḥ bodhisatto imam gātham āha

original: “Chiddaṃ te raṭṭhaṃ byathitā bhayā hi, puthū narā leṇamanuppaviṭṭhā;
analyzed: chiddam te raṭṭham byathitāḥ bhayā hi puthū narāḥ leṇam anuppaviṭṭhā

original: Manussamaṃsaṃ viramehi rāja, etaṃ varānaṃ catutthaṃ varāmī”ti.
analyzed: manuḥ sa maṃsam viramehi rāja etam varānam catuttham varāmi iti

original: Tattha chiddanti na ghanavāsaṃ tattha tattha gāmādīnaṃ uṭṭhitattā savivaraṃ. Byathitā
analyzed: na ghana vāsam tattha tattha gāma ādīnam uṭṭhita ttā sa vivaram byathitā

original: bhayāhīti “porisādo idāni āgamissatī”ti tava bhayena kampitā. Leṇamanuppaviṭṭhāti
analyzed: bhayāhi iti porisādaḥ idāni āgamissati iti tava bhayena kampitā leṇam anuppaviṭṭhā ati

original: dārake hatthesu gahetvā tiṇagahanādinilīyanaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā. Manussamaṃsanti duggandhaṃ
analyzed: dārake hatthesu gahetvā tiṇa gahana ādi nilīyana ṭhānam paviṭṭhāḥ manussa maṃsanti duggandham

original: jegucchaṃ paṭikkūlaṃ manussamaṃsaṃ pajaha. Nissakkatthe vā upayogaṃ, manussamaṃsato viramāhīti attho.
analyzed: jeguccham paṭikkūlam manussa maṃsam pajaha nissakka tthe vā upayogam manussa maṃsataḥ viramāhi iti atthaḥ

original: Evaṃ vutte porisādo pāṇiṃ paharitvā hasanto “samma sutasoma kiṃ nāmetaṃ kathesi, kathāhaṃ tumhākaṃ etaṃ varaṃ dassāmi, sace gaṇhitukāmo, aññaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
analyzed: evam vutte porisādaḥ pāṇim paharitvā hasantaḥ samma sutasoma kim nāma etam kathesi kathā aham tumhākam etam varam dassāmi sace gaṇhitu kāmaḥ aññam gaṇhāhi iti vatvā gātham āha

original: “Addhā hi so bhakkho mama manāpo, etassa hetumhi vanaṃ paviṭṭho;
analyzed: addhā hi so bhakkhaḥ mama manāpaḥ etassa hetumhi vanam paviṭṭhaḥ

original: Sohaṃ kathaṃ etto upārameyyaṃ, aññaṃ varānaṃ catutthaṃ varassū”ti.
analyzed: sā uham katham ettas upārameyyam aññam varānam catuttham varassu ti

original: Tattha vananti rajjaṃ pahāya imaṃ vanaṃ paviṭṭho.
analyzed: tattha vananti rajjam pahāya imam vanam paviṭṭhaḥ

original: Atha naṃ mahāsatto “tvaṃ ‘manussamaṃsassa piyatarattā tato viramituṃ na sakkomī”ti vadasi. Yo hi piyaṃ nissāya pāpaṃ karoti, ayaṃ bālo”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
analyzed: atha nam mahāsatto tvam manussa maṃsassa piyatarattā tatas viramitum na sakkomi iti vadasi yaḥ hi piyam nissāya pāpam karoti ayam bālaḥ iti vatvā gātham āha

original: “Na ve ‘piyaṃ me’ti janinda tādiso, attaṃ niraṃkacca piyāni sevati;
analyzed: na ve piyam mā iti janinda tādisaḥ attam niraṃkacca piyāni sevati

original: Attāva seyyo paramā ca seyyo, labbhā piyā ocitatthena pacchā”ti.
analyzed: attā ava seyyo paramā ca seyyo labbhā piyā ocitatthena pacchā ati

original: Tattha tādisoti janinda tādiso yuvā abhirūpo mahāyaso “idaṃ nāma me piya”nti piyavatthulobhena
analyzed: tattha tādisaḥ iti janinda tādisaḥ yuvā abhirūpaḥ mahāyasaḥ idam nāma me piyanti piya vatthu lobhena

original: tattha attānaṃ niraṃkatvā sabbasugatīhi ceva sukhavisesehi ca cavitvā niraye pātetvā
analyzed: tattha attānam sabba su gatīhi ca iva sukha visesehi ca cavitvā niraye pātetvā

original: na ve piyāni sevati. Paramā ca seyyoti purisassa hi paramā piyavatthumhā attāva varataro.
analyzed: na ve piyāni sevati paramā ca seyyā uti purisassa hi paramā piya vatthumhā attā ava varataraḥ

original: Kiṃkāraṇā? Labbhā piyāti, piyā nāma visayavasena ceva puññena ca ocitatthena vaḍḍhitatthena
analyzed: kiṃkāraṇā labbhā piyā ati piyā nāma visaya vasena ca iva puññena ca ocitatthena vaḍḍhitatthena

original: diṭṭhadhamme ceva parattha ca devamanussasampattiṃ patvā sakkā laddhuṃ.
analyzed: diṭṭhadhamme ca iva parattha ca deva manussa sampattim patvā sakkā laddhum

original: Evaṃ vutte porisādo bhayappatto hutvā “ahaṃ sutasomena gahitaṃ varaṃ vissajjāpetumpi manussamaṃsato viramitumpi na sakkomi, kiṃ nu kho karissāmī”ti assupuṇṇehi nettehi gāthamāha –
analyzed: evam vutte porisādaḥ bhaya pattaḥ hutvā aham sutasomena gahitam varam vissajjāpetum pi manussa maṃsataḥ viramitum pi na sakkomi kim nu kho karissāmi iti assu puṇṇehi nettehi gātham āha

original: “Piyaṃ me mānusaṃ maṃsaṃ, sutasoma vijānahi;
analyzed: piyam me mānusam maṃsam suta soma vijānahi

original: Namhi sakkā nivāretuṃ, aññaṃ varaṃ samma varassū”ti.
analyzed: namhi sakkā nivāretum aññam varam samma varassu ti

original: Tattha vijānahīti tvampi jānāhi.
analyzed: tattha vijānahi iti tvam pi jānāhi

original: Tato bodhisatto āha –
analyzed: tatas bodhisattaḥ āha

original: “Yo ve ‘piyaṃ me’ti piyānurakkhī, attaṃ niraṃkacca piyāni sevati;
analyzed: yaḥ ve piyam mā iti piya anurakkhī attam piyāni sevati

original: Soṇḍova pitvā visamissapānaṃ, teneva so hoti dukkhī parattha.
analyzed: soṇḍā uva pitvā tena iva saḥ hoti dukkhī parattha

original: “Yo cīdha saṅkhāya piyāni hitvā, kicchenapi sevati ariyadhamme;
analyzed: yaḥ ci idha saṅkhāya piyāni hitvā kicchena api sevati ariya dhamme

original: Dukkhitova pitvāna yathosadhāni, teneva so hoti sukhī paratthā”ti.
analyzed: dukkhitaḥ uva pitvāna yathā usadhāni tena iva saḥ hoti sukhī parattha ati

original: Tattha yo veti, samma porisāda, yo puriso “idaṃ me piya”nti pāpakiriyāya attānaṃ
analyzed: tattha yaḥ veti samma porisāda yaḥ purisaḥ idam me piyanti pāpa kiriyāya attānam

original: niraṃkatvā piyāni vatthūni sevati, so surāpemena visamissaṃ suraṃ pitvā soṇḍo viya
analyzed: piyāni vatthūni sevati saḥ surā pemena visamissam suram pitvā soṇḍaḥ viya

original: tena pāpakammena parattha nirayādīsu dukkhī hoti. Saṅkhāyāti jānitvā tuletvā. Piyāni
analyzed: tena pāpa kammena parattha niraya ādīsu dukkhī hoti saṅkhāya ati jānitvā tuletvā piyāni

original: hitvāti adhammapaṭisaṃyuttāni piyāni chaḍḍetvā.
analyzed: hitvā ati adhamma paṭisaṃyuttāni piyāni chaḍḍetvā

original: Evaṃ vutte porisādo kalūnaṃ paridevanto gāthamāha –
analyzed: evam vutte porisādaḥ kalūnam paridevantaḥ gātham āha

original: “Ohāyahaṃ pitaraṃ mātarañca, manāpiye kāmaguṇe ca pañca;
analyzed: pitaram mātaram ca kāma guṇe ca pañca

original: Etassa hetumhi vanaṃ paviṭṭho, taṃ te varaṃ kinti mahaṃ dadāmī”ti.
analyzed: etassa hetumhi vanam paviṭṭho tam te varam kinti maham dadāmi iti

original: Tattha etassāti manussamaṃsassa. Kinti mahanti kinti katvā ahaṃ taṃ varaṃ demi.
analyzed: tattha etassa ati manussa maṃsassa kinti mahanti kinti katvā aham tam varam demi

original: Tato mahāsatto imaṃ gāthamāha –
analyzed: tatas mahāsattaḥ imam gātham āha

original: “Na paṇḍitā diguṇamāhu vākyaṃ, saccappaṭiññāva bhavanti santo;
analyzed: na paṇḍitāḥ diguṇam āhu vākyam bhavanti santaḥ

original: ‘Varassu samma’ iti maṃ avoca, iccabravī tvaṃ na hi te sametī”ti.
analyzed: samme iti mam avocaḥ id ca bravīḥ tvam na hi te sameti iti

original: Tattha diguṇanti, samma porisāda, paṇḍitā nāma ekaṃ vatvā puna taṃ visaṃvādentā dutiyaṃ
analyzed: tattha samma porisāda paṇḍitāḥ nāma ekam vatvā puna tam visaṃvādentā dutiyam

original: vacanaṃ na kathenti. Iti maṃ avocāti, “samma sutasoma varassu vara”nti evaṃ maṃ abhāsasi.
analyzed: vacanam na kathenti iti mam avoca ati samma suta soma evam mama abhāsasi

original: Iccabravīti tasmā yaṃ tvaṃ iti abravi, taṃ te idāni na sameti.
analyzed: tasmai yam tvam iti abravi tam te idāni na sameti

original: So puna rodanto eva gāthamāha –
analyzed: saḥ punar rodantaḥ eva gātham āha

original: “Apuññalābhaṃ ayasaṃ akittiṃ, pāpaṃ bahuṃ duccaritaṃ kilesaṃ;
analyzed: apuñña lābham ayasam akittim pāpam bahum duccaritam kilesam

original: Manussamaṃsassa kate upāgā, taṃ te varaṃ kinti mahaṃ dadeyya”nti.
analyzed: manussa maṃsassa kate upāgā tam te varam kinti maham dadeyyanti

original: Tattha pāpanti kammapathaṃ appattaṃ. Duccaritanti kammapathappattaṃ. Kilesanti dukkhaṃ.
analyzed: tattha pāpanti kammapatham appattam duccaritanti kammapatha ppattam kilesanti dukkham

original: Manussamaṃsassa kateti manussamaṃsassa hetu. Upāgāti upagatomhi. Taṃ teti taṃ tuyhaṃ
analyzed: manussa maṃsassa katā iti manussa maṃsassa hetu upāgāti upagataḥ amhi tam te iti tam tuyham

original: kathāhaṃ varaṃ demi, mā maṃ vārayi, anukampaṃ kāruññaṃ mayi karohi, aññaṃ varaṃ gaṇhāhīti āha.
analyzed: kathā aham varam demi mā mama vārayi anukampam kāruññam mayi karohi aññam varam gaṇhāhi iti āha

original: Atha mahāsatto āha –
analyzed: atha mahāsattaḥ āha

original: “Na taṃ varaṃ arahati jantu dātuṃ, yaṃ vāpi datvā na avākareyya;
analyzed: na tam varam arahati jantu dātum yam vā api da tvā na avākareyya

original: Varassu samma avikampamāno, pāṇaṃ cajitvānapi dassamevā”ti.
analyzed: samma a vikampamānaḥ pāṇam dassam eva ati

original: Evaṃ tena paṭhamaṃ vuttagāthaṃ āharitvā dassetvā varadāne ussāhento gāthā āha –
analyzed: evam tena paṭhamam vutta gātham āharitvā dassetvā vara dāne ussāhentaḥ gāthāḥ āha

original: “Pāṇaṃ cajanti santo nāpi dhammaṃ, saccappaṭiññāva bhavanti santo;
analyzed: pāṇam cajanti santaḥ na api dhammam sacca ppaṭiññāḥ ava bhavanti santaḥ

original: Datvā varaṃ khippamavākarohi, etena sampajja surājaseṭṭha.
analyzed: da tvā varam khippam avākarohi etena sampajja su rāja seṭṭha

original: “Caje dhanaṃ aṅgavarassa hetu, aṅgaṃ caje jīvitaṃ rakkhamāno;
analyzed: caje dhanam aṅga varassa hetu aṅgam caje jīvitam rakkhamānaḥ

original: Aṅgaṃ dhanaṃ jīvitañcāpi sabbaṃ, caje naro dhammamanussaranto”ti.
analyzed: aṅgam dhanam jīvitam ca api sabbam caje naraḥ dhammam anussarantaḥ ti

original: Tattha pāṇanti jīvitaṃ. Santo nāma api jīvitaṃ cajanti, na dhammaṃ. Khippamavākarohīti
analyzed: tattha pāṇanti jīvitam santaḥ nāma api jīvitam cajanti na dhammam khippam avākarohi iti

original: idha khippaṃ mayhaṃ dehīti attho. Etenāti etena dhammena ceva saccena ca sampajja
analyzed: idha khippam mayham dehi iti attho etena ati etena dhammena ca iva saccena ca sampajja

original: sampanno upapanno hohi. Surājaseṭṭhāti taṃ paggaṇhanto ālapati. Caje dhananti, samma
analyzed: sampannaḥ upapannaḥ hohi su rāja seṭṭha ati tam paggaṇhantaḥ ālapati caje dhananti samma

original: porisāda, paṇḍito puriso hatthapādādimhi aṅge chijjamāne tassa rakkhaṇatthāya bahumpi
analyzed: porisāda paṇḍito puriso hattha pāda ādimhi aṅge chijjamāne tassa rakkhaṇa tthāya bahumpi

original: dhanaṃ cajeyya. Dhammamanussarantoti aṅgadhanajīvitāni pariccajantopi “sataṃ dhammaṃ
analyzed: dhanam cajeyya dhammam anussarantaḥ ti aṅga dhana jīvitāni pariccajantaḥ api satam dhammaṃ

original: na vītikkamissāmī”ti evaṃ dhammaṃ anussaranto.
analyzed: na vītikkamissāmi iti evam dhammaṃ anussarantaḥ

original: Evaṃ mahāsatto imehi kāraṇehi taṃ sacce patiṭṭhāpetvā idāni attano gurubhāvaṃ dassetuṃ gāthamāha –
analyzed: evam mahāsattaḥ imehi kāraṇehi tam sacce patiṭṭhāpetvā idāni attanaḥ guru bhāvam dassetum gātham āha

original: “Yasmā hi dhammaṃ puriso vijaññā, ye cassa kaṅkhaṃ vinayanti santo;
analyzed: yasmā hi dhammam purisaḥ vijaññā ye ca assa kaṅkham vinayanti santaḥ

original: Taṃ hissa dīpañca parāyaṇañca, na tena mittiṃ jirayetha pañño”ti.
analyzed: tam hissa dīpam ca parāyaṇam ca na tena mittim jirayetha

original: Tattha yasmāti yamhā purisā. Dhammanti kusalākusalajotakaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Vijaññāti vijāneyya.
